scn aaaElizaInjectionScript
short iDoOnce
BEGIN GameMode
if (iDoOnce == 0) ;Eliza's Type 93 Assault Rifle AddFormToFormList NVDLC02PerkGruntWeapons aaaElizaGun AddFormToFormList WeaponMachinegunLIST aaaElizaGun AddFormToFormList WeaponRiflesLIST aaaElizaGun AddFormToFormList GunsList aaaElizaGun AddFormToFormList NVAllWeapons aaaElizaGun AddFormToFormList WeaponListRangedALL aaaElizaGun AddFormToFormList NVCompanionWeapons aaaElizaGun ;Sawed-Off Laser Shotgun AddFormToFormList LaserCommanderWeaponsList aaaLaserShotgun AddFormToFormList EnergyWeapons aaaLaserShotgun AddFormToFormList NVAllWeapons aaaLaserShotgun AddFormToFormList WeaponListRangedALL aaaLaserShotgun AddFormToFormList ExplodesGasTrapsOnHit aaaLaserShotgun ;Laser Shotgun AddFormToFormList LaserCommanderWeaponsList aaaLaserShotgunLarge AddFormToFormList EnergyWeapons aaaLaserShotgunLarge AddFormToFormList NVAllWeapons aaaLaserShotgunLarge AddFormToFormList WeaponListRangedALL aaaLaserShotgunLarge AddFormToFormList ExplodesGasTrapsOnHit aaaLaserShotgunLarge ;Converted Grenade Pistol AddFormToFormList PerkDemolitionExpertWeapons aaaGrenadePistol AddFormToFormList WeaponLauncherLIST aaaGrenadePistol AddFormToFormList NVHoldoutWeapons aaaGrenadePistol AddFormToFormList NVImprovedHoldoutWeapons aaaGrenadePistol AddFormToFormList NVAllWeapons aaaGrenadePistol AddFormToFormList ExplodesGasTrapsOnHit aaaGrenadePistol ;Suppressed .45 SMG AddFormToFormList NVDLC02PerkGruntWeapons aaaUnique45SMG AddFormToFormList WeaponMachinegunLIST aaaUnique45SMG AddFormToFormList GunsList aaaUnique45SMG AddFormToFormList NVAllWeapons aaaUnique45SMG AddFormToFormList WeaponListRangedALL aaaUnique45SMG set iDoOnce to 1 StopQuest aaaInitElizaInjectionQuest endif
END

scn aaaElizaScript
short HasBeenHired short L38 short DoOnce
int CombatStyleRanged int CombatStyleMelee int IsFollowingDefault int IsFollowingLong int FollowerSwitchAggressive int Waiting
Begin GameMode If (DoOnce != 1) Set HasBeenHired to 0 Set L38 to 0 Set CombatStyleRanged to 1 Set CombatStyleMelee to 0 Set IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set IsFollowingLong to 0 Set FollowerSwitchAggressive to 0 Set Waiting to 0 Set DoOnce to 1 EndIf End

scn aaaElizaQuestScript
int Approval short bElizaHireable short bElizaDoOnce
Begin GameMode if (bElizaDoOnce != 1) Set bElizaHireable to 1 Set bElizaDoOnce to 1 EndIf End

SCN aaaElizaIdleChatterScript ;Copied with permission from Jokerine, and then probably fucked up by me
Float ftimer Float fRandom Int iCounter Short bElizaBarked Short bQuestDelayFast Short bRegionSection Float fSpeakTime
Begin GameMode
If aaaElizaREF.HasBeenHired != 1 || aaaElizaREF.IsWaiting == 1 || aaaElizaREF.GetDistance Player >= 800 Return Elseif aaaElizaREF.IsInCombat == 1 || aaaElizaREF.GetSleeping == 1 || aaaElizaREF.IsSneaking == 1 Return ElseIf Player.IsInCombat ;STFU if player is in combat Return Elseif MenuMode ;STFU if player is in menu, inventory, or whatnot Return ElseIf (bElizaBarked == 1) && (GameDaysPassed >= fSpeakTime + .25) Set bElizaBarked to 0 Return endif
;;;Region Section ;Goodsprings first If bElizaBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion VMapGoodspringsRegion == 1 aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationGoodsprings 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return ;Jacobstown Region Next ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion VMapJacobstownRegion == 1 aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationJacobstown 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return ;NCRCF Region next ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion VMapNCRCFRegion == 1 aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationNCRCF 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return ;Novac Region next ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion VMapNovacRegion == 1 aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationNovac 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return ;Fiend Region next ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion vMapVault3FiendRegion == 1 aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationFiends 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return ;Nellis Region next ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion vMapNellisAFBRegion == 1 aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationNellis 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return ;Boulder City next ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion VMapBoulderCityRegion == 1 aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationBoulder 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return ;Camp Forlorn Hope next ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion VMapCampForlornHopeRegion == 1 aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationHope 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return ;Nelson Region next ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion vMapNelsonRegion == 1 aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationNelson 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && (IsPlayerInRegion vMapRSAlphaRegion == 1 || IsPlayerInRegion vMapRSBravoRegion == 1 || IsPlayerInRegion vMapRSCharlieRegion == 1 || IsPlayerInRegion vMapRSDeltaRegion == 1 || IsPlayerInRegion vMapRSEchoRegion == 1 || IsPlayerInRegion vMapRSFoxtrotRegion == 1) Set fRandom to GetRandomPercent If fRandom <= 50 aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationRangers 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return Else ;50% chance that NCRlocation line is barked aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationNCR 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return Endif ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion VMapTheFortRegion == 1 ;Fort Region Set fRandom to GetRandomPercent If fRandom <= 50 ;50% chance that Fort line is barked aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationFort1 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return Else ;50% chance that Fort2 line is barked aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationFort2 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return ;Bittersprings Region next Endif ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion VMAPBitterSpringsRegion == 1 aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationBittersprings 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return ;Hoover Dam next ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion MapHooverDam == 1 aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationHooverDam 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return ;Mojave Outpost next ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion vMapMojaveOutpostRegion == 1 aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationOutpost 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return ;Red Rock Canyon next ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion VMapRedRockCanyonRegion == 1 aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationRedRock 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return ;Camp Guardian next ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion vMapCampGuardianRegion == 1 aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationCampGaurdian 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return ;Nipton next ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && IsPlayerinRegion vMapNiptonRegion == 1 aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationNipton 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return ;Cottonwood Next ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && IsPlayerinRegion vMapCottonwoodCove == 1 aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationCottonwood 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return ;Black Mountain Next ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && IsPlayerinRegion vMapBlackMtnRegion == 1 aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationBlackMt 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return ;Quarry Junction Next; scary deathclaws ahead ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && IsPlayerinRegion vMapQuarryJunctionRegion == 1 aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationQuarryJunction 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return ;Hidden Valley Next ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && IsPlayerinRegion VMapHiddenValleyRegion == 1 aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationHiddenValley 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return ;Primm Next ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && IsPlayerinRegion MapPrimm == 1 aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationPrimm 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return ;Camp Golf next ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && IsPlayerinRegion vMapRegionCampGolf == 1 aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationCampGolf 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return ;The Strip next ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && Player.GetInWorldSpace TheStripWorldNew == 1 Set fRandom to GetRandomPercent If fRandom <= 50 ;50% chance that Fort line is barked aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationStrip 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return Else ;50% chance that Fort2 line is barked aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationStreet 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return Endif ;Freeside next ElseIf bElizaBarked == 0 && (Player.GetInWorldSpace FreesideWorld == 1 || Player.GetInWorldSpace FreesideNorthWorld == 1) aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaLocationFreeside 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return ;;;;;;;;; Elseif bElizaBarked == 0 ;I didn't include random singing so feel free to canonize me as a saint aaaElizaREF.SayTo Player aaaElizaGeneralBarks 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bElizaBarked to 1 Return EndIf
End

ESP.ORIGINAL: Salvage Operation
ESP.TRADUIT: 打捞作业

ESP.ORIGINAL: Orders are to dredge as much of Lake Mead as possible. Supposedly a shipment of top-tier energy weapons was scuttled to keep it out of legion hands. We're going in fully-armed, as the Van Graffs are aware of this shipment as well, and will likely try to claim it. Keep this information to yourself, and be discreet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 命令是尽可能地搜索米德湖。据说为防止落入军团之手，一批顶级能武被沉入湖中。我们需要全副武装地前往，因为范格拉夫也知道这批货，并很可能尝试占有它们。你要保守秘密，谨慎行事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your Job
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的任务

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Thanks again for taking on this contract, Mr. Butler!
All the intel I've gathered suggests that there may very well be an Enclave storage depot somewhere within the general vicinity of the old Tumbleweed Ranch. I need you to find the location, if it exists. Once you've done that, I'll need you and your men to clear out any automated security down there, and also eliminate any pests that might have moved in.
Don't damage any of the equipment down there, however! Especially terminals, holotapes, or other data storage devices! I will pay you a bonus if everything down there is in pristine condition.
Also, I have left California, so we won't be meeting up back where I hired you in Shady. I've relocated to a small bungalow in Jacobstown. It's the one covered in cameras and receivers. Make sure to knock! I have some defenses set up to deal with trespassers, haha.
Dr. Clarence Yamamoto
ESP.TRADUIT:
再次感谢你接受这份合同，巴特勒先生！
我收集到的所有情报表明，在老风滚草牧场附近的某个地方，很可能有一个英克雷仓库。我需要你找到它的位置，如果它存在的话。一旦你找到了，我需要你和你的人清除那里的任何自动安全系统，同时清除任何可能进入的害虫。
但是，不要损坏下面的任何设备！尤其是终端、全息磁带或其他数据存储设备！如果下面的一切都完好无损，我会额外给你奖金的。
另外，我已经离开加州了，所以我们不会在我雇你的地方见面了。我搬到了雅各布斯镇的一间小平房里。它被摄像头和接收器覆盖着。一定要敲门！我有一些防御措施来对付非法闯入者，哈哈。
克拉伦斯·山本博士

ESP.ORIGINAL: Upgraded Design
ESP.TRADUIT: 升级版设计方案

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I've made several improvements on Emerson's designs. Quite frankly, his concept was laughable. Everyone know that upping the power consumption results in higher output. Likewise, we are all aware that beams can be split multiple times. Combining these concepts is not a new idea.
I, however, have made it wholly original.
-I have removed the superfluous porting frame. It added unnecessary weight to the unit, and made the weapon less useful in confined quarters.
-I have also removed the handguard. We'll simply have to have faith that any users will simply, in their fumbling way, not drop their gun.
-I have coated the outside of the weapon in a silicon-carbide finish. This will protect the unit from scratching and inclement weather conditions. It also cuts down on reflectivety, in the event of a night operation.
-I cut down the power usage. This does render the beams slightly less punishing, but it is still stronger than any single-shot laser rifle on the market, and the difference is negligible when compared to the subpar original version.
-Emerson's weapon fired six beams. Mine fires seven.
Dr. Natalie Vaughn
ESP.TRADUIT:
我对埃莫森的设计做了一些改进。坦率的说，他的思路荒唐可笑。任何人都知道加大能量消耗能提高输出。同样地，我们也都认识到了光束可以多次分裂。把这两者结合起来并不算是一个新主意。
然而，我，做出了完全独创的设计。
-我移除了多余的端口架。它不仅增加了不必要的重量，还影响武器在封闭空间中的性能。
-我还拆掉了护手部分。我们应当相信，武器的使用者即使再笨拙也不至于把他们的枪丢掉。
-我在武器表面涂上了一层碳化硅。它能够为武器提供针对刮蹭和恶劣天气条件的防护能力。此外还能降低夜间操作时的反光。
-我降低了能量利用率。光束的杀伤力确实因此稍微减弱，但仍然强于市面上的任何单发激光步枪。况且若和那不达标的初始版本相比，这点变化是微不足道的。
-埃莫森的武器能射出六束激光。我的是七束。
- 娜塔莉·沃恩博士

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personal Log 1
ESP.TRADUIT: 私人记录1

ESP.ORIGINAL:
So, here we are. Four scientists, three protectrons, and a bunker with the resources to keep us all alive for the next century. All so we can help serve the war effort.
What effort, I wonder? Surely there are no soldiers left to fight. Regardless, I find it calming. It's far easier to be alone with my work with the rest of the human race vaporized in an instant. I am fond of none of my new colleagues, but I can tolerate three voices chattering at once.
ESP.TRADUIT:
所以，我们到了。四个科学家，三个机器保安，还有一个地堡，有足够的资源让我们活到下个世纪，并且一直为战争活动服务。
我想知道是什么样的战争活动？到那时肯定已经没有剩下的士兵可以战斗了。不管怎样，我觉得这里很平静。工作要容易得多，如果其他人瞬间蒸发只有我独自一人的话。我不喜欢我的新同事，但我尚能忍受三个声音同时喋喋不休。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personal Log 2
ESP.TRADUIT: 私人记录2

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dr. Emerson has begun work on some sort of "laser-shotgun" project. It is bulky and innefficient. I expect I'll have to devise my own solution to the problem in the coming days. As if I didn't have enough to do.
Dr. Elise informed me that she was working on a modified strain of the New Plague. An uninspired name, that one. I imagine the alternatives: "Relevant Disease" and "Current Events Virus" were considered. Regardless, she is working on modifying the plague to target specific racial groups, specifically, those of Asian heritage.
An interesting notion, but one that would likely have been more useful if it were devised before the nukes were launched. I wonder how she plans to test her virus?
ESP.TRADUIT:
埃莫森博士已经开始进行某种“激光霰弹枪”项目。它体积大，效率低。我想我得在今后几天里自己想出一套解决这个问题的方案。好像我没有足够的事情做似的。
爱丽斯博士告诉我她正在研究一种新瘟疫的改良毒株。对于名字还没有灵感。我想可以从“相关疾病”和“时事病毒”里选择。不管怎样，她正致力于修改病毒的攻击对象，使其指向特定的种族群体，特别是那些亚裔。
这是一个有趣的想法，但如果它是在核武器发射之前设计出来的，可能会更有用。我想知道她打算怎么测试她的病毒？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personal Log 3
ESP.TRADUIT: 私人记录3

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Emerson was angry with me for creating a superior version of his prototype. I would find his distress more amusing if I didn't know I would be sealed in this bunker with him for, most likely, the rest of our lives.
Dr. Garth informed me that he did not believe anyone would come for us. I told him I don't care. There is food, water, air, and shelter down here. It is a mostly-silent place for me to do my work, without interruption. He continues to fret over his wife and children. There is almost no chance they are alive. He could choose to worry about things that actually matter, such as the prototype "Disabler" rifle.
I am starting to suspect that I will have to salvage the Disabler project, as well.
ESP.TRADUIT:
埃莫森很生气，因为我创造的升级版本胜过他的原版设计。他的不满本可以让我更加愉悦，如果我没有发现我很可能要和他一起被封在这座地堡里度过余生的话。
加斯博士告诉我他不相信会有任何人来找我们。我说我不在意。这里有食物、水、空气和住处。这是最安静的环境，我可以在这里不受打扰地工作。他为他的妻子和孩子们焦虑不安。他们基本上不可能还活着。他应该选择去关注真正重要的事情，比如"除能者"步枪原型机。
我开始怀疑，我将不得不挽救除能者计划，又一次。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personal Log 4
ESP.TRADUIT: 私人记录4

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I will not be having to do any work on the Disabler project due to outside circumstances. Specifically, Emerson is locked in the infectious diseases laboratory.
Apparently, he went to speak with Dr. Elise. She was busy elsewhere, and so Emerson began to look around her research. At some point, he broke the seal on the container of Elise's New Plague strain. The facility, I'm happy to report, automatically detected the breach, and sealed off the laboratory for quarantine.
Emerson will remain inside until such a time that we are 100% positive he is not infectious. Work is so much easier without that cretin trying to prove himself.
ESP.TRADUIT:
就外面的情况而言，我其实不必再为除能者计划做任何工作。特别是，埃莫森被锁在了传染病研究室。
显然，他跑去找爱丽丝博士聊天。而她正在别的地方忙着，于是埃莫森开始随便看她的研究。然后他不知怎地就打破了封有爱丽丝的新毒株的容器。系统， 我很高兴地指出，自动检测到了这起违例行为，然后对传染病研究室实施了封闭隔离。
埃莫森将待在里面直到可以确定他百分之百不会传染别人。那个总是渴望证明自己的笨蛋不在的时候，工作变得简单多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personal Log 5
ESP.TRADUIT: 私人记录5

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Apparently Dr. Elise's project failed to meet her goal. According to her, the disease was only capable of being contracted by people of Asian descent.
And yet, Emerson is dying. We can see through the observation window. He is sweating profusely, his breathing is labored, and he lacks energy. Swelling around the face and neck, discolored cysts, auditory and visual hallucinations. Dr. Garth is, as expected, playing pretend and stating that Emerson will make a recovery. He will not. I congratulated Dr. Elise on her strain. Even if it failed the primary goal, it's impressively lethal and efficient.
ESP.TRADUIT:
显然，爱丽丝博士的预期目标并未实现。按照她的预想，病毒应当只能感染有亚洲血统的人。
而现在，埃莫森就快要死了。我们可以透过观察窗看到，他大量出汗，呼吸无力，体能不足，面部和颈部肿胀，长有变色囊肿，存在试听幻觉。不出意料，加斯博士装模作样地宣称埃莫森正在好转。他不会好转了。我为毒株向爱丽丝博士致贺。尽管未能达到初始目标，它的致命性和有效性依然令人赞叹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personal Log 6
ESP.TRADUIT: 私人记录6

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Emerson is dead, and per protocols, the lab has been purged and sterilized. All of Dr. Elise's samples were destroyed in the purge, but her research is untouched, which is a net victory. Unfortunately, the entire lab now smells like burned meat. The sterilizers were probably not intended to be used while humans were still in the room. This would bother me more if I had any reason to linger in the laboratory. I do not.
Dr. Garth vomited once we opened the door. This is disgusting, so naturally, he had to clean it up. While he was at it, we made him dispose of the charred corpse, as well. I imagine we could have made the protectrons do that, if the idea had occurred to us.
ESP.TRADUIT:
埃莫森死了。按照协议，实验室被清扫和消毒了。爱丽斯博士所有的样本都在清扫中被毁了。但她的研究并未被打断，这算是个胜利。不幸的是，整个实验室现在都有一股烤肉味。消毒程序似乎原本不该在房间中还有人类时启动。如果我有任何理由去实验室闲逛的话，这将给我造成更多的困扰。而我没有。
我们一打开房门，加斯博士就吐了。这够恶心，自然地，他要负责清理干净。在他清理的时候，我们让他顺便把烧焦的尸体处理掉。我想我们本可以让机器保安来做，如果我们当时想到这个主意的话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personal Log 7
ESP.TRADUIT: 私人记录7

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dr. Garth abandoned the facility in the night. At least he had the common courtesy to use the airlock so as to not introduce outside particles into our environment. I can't imagine he survived long out there. For now, we press ever onward.
Dr. Elise overindulged herself with alcohol after dinner. This would be worrisome, if not for the facility's auto-sealing laboratories. As it is, I have no need to worry about her drunkenly stumbling into her sample cooler and infecting the place. Still. The protectrons make for better company than this drunken reprobate.
ESP.TRADUIT:
加斯博士在一个夜晚离开了这座设施。至少他有公德地使用了气闸，这样就不会把外界的粒子引入我们的环境。我无法想象他在外面还能活多久。现在，我们继续前进。
爱丽丝博士晚饭后酗酒过度。这将是令人担忧的，如果不是设施自动密封了实验室。这使我不必担心她喝醉后跌跌撞撞地摔进样品冷却器，然后感染这个地方。仍然要说的是，机器保安比这个醉鬼更适合作伴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personal Log 8
ESP.TRADUIT: 私人记录8

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The medical facility suffered structural damage last night. The facility should hold up for the next century, after which point, I expect it to collapse entirely in on itself. I will be long dead by then.
Speaking of death, Dr. Elise is now spending all of her time drinking amd engaging the protectrons in circular conversations.
There is a lack of work being done. We were given this facility for the sole purpose of creating tools to advance the war effort. There may not be a war effort anymore, but there is so much work we could do. I hope Dr. Elise returns to her senses soon. I do not know anything about engineering pathogens, and I would hate to have the lab wasted.
ESP.TRADUIT:
医疗设施昨晚遭到结构性损坏。这个设施应该能撑到下个世纪，在那之后，我预计它会完全自行倒塌。那时我早就死了。
说到死亡，爱丽丝博士现在把她所有的时间都花在喝酒上，以及和保安机器人进行循环对话。
目前缺乏可以推进的工作。我们得到这个设施的唯一目的是创造工具来推进战争。也许不会再有战争了，但我们还有很多工作可以做。我希望爱丽斯博士能够很快恢复理智。我对编辑病原体一无所知，而我讨厌实验室被浪费着。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personal Log 9
ESP.TRADUIT: 私人记录9

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dr. Elise slit her wrists last night. It looks like the laboratory will be wasted after all. A shame.
ESP.TRADUIT: 爱丽斯博士昨晚割腕了。看来实验室终究会被浪费掉的。真可惜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personal Log Final Entry
ESP.TRADUIT: 私人记录最后一条

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I have officially completed every possible project I could while being sealed in this lab. There is no chance that I will be heading outside, so I shall occupy myself with the entertainment archives. Once I have finished that, I expect I'll overdose on sleeping pills.
It was a pleasure to work in an environment such as this.
Dr. Natalie Vaughn
ESP.TRADUIT:
我已经正式完成了所有我能做的项目，而我被封在这个实验室里。我不可能去外面，所以我将投身于娱乐档案库。一旦我都玩遍了，我想我会过量服用安眠药。
在这样的环境中工作是一种乐趣。
- 娜塔莉·沃恩博士

ESP.ORIGINAL: To-do List
ESP.TRADUIT: 待办清单

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Things that I need to do!
-See if there are any whores still hanging out in Nipton
-Visit my cousin, Franklin! He sent me a letter telling me that he actually found an old bunker in this canyon, and my route goes right by it! He told me he wanted to clear it out and see how deep it goes. Ever since he bought that set of power armor back in Dayglow, he's basically untouchable! Maybe I'll get to watch him work for a bit! Oh man, I hope there are ferals for him to kill in his armor! He always despised ghouls, haha.
-Meet the Khan at the Mojave outpost. Get the package for a thousand NCR bucks. No sweat!
ESP.TRADUIT:
本人需要做的事情！
-看看尼普顿还有没有妓女营业。
-拜访我的表亲，富兰克林！他来信说他在那个峡谷里发现了一座旧地堡，我刚好要路过那里！他说他要把地堡清理出来，看看它到底有多深。自从在日耀城买了那套动力甲，他基本上就无敌了！也许我可以去看看他干活的样子！哦伙计，我希望那里有狂暴僵尸可以让他的动力甲露上一手！他一贯鄙视僵尸，哈哈。
-在莫哈维前哨站跟大汗帮的人会面。花一千NCR钞票买到那个包裹。小菜一碟！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Donelly's Journal
ESP.TRADUIT: 唐纳利的日记

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I'll have to remember to overpay Klamath Bob next time I'm in town. Boss kept going on and on about how being in the Mojave too long'd get us all killed. Had to explain about a dozen times that no one in Westside is gonna run to the NCR to sell anyone out, 'specially since it's pretty much just a handful of Rangers who even still care enough to want us dead. But, of course, it was the promise of a well-stocked liquor store that actually convinced him.
Guess we'll be heading north in a half-week. That seems a lot less suicidal than crossing the Colorado and waging some little guerilla war against the Legion. Hopefully no Fiends break in here and shit the beds while we're gone.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我下次进城时得记得多付克拉马斯·鲍勃的钱。老板不停地不停地说，在莫哈韦呆太久会把我们都害死。不得不向他解释了十几次，在西区没有人会跑去向NCR出卖任何人，特别是因为几乎只有几个游骑兵还在关心我们的死亡。但是当然，最后还是一家货源充足的酒类专卖店让他真正信服了。
估计半周后我们就要北上了。这么做的自杀性似乎比穿越科罗拉多发动一场针对军团的小型游击战要低不少。希望我们不在的时候不会有恶魔帮闯进这里，在床上拉屎。

ESP.TRADUIT: 草稿一

ESP.ORIGINAL: Draft Eleven
ESP.TRADUIT: 草稿十一

ESP.ORIGINAL: I give up. Fuck this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我放弃了，操。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sermon Excerpt
ESP.TRADUIT: 布道节选

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I ask you, where was Mr. House and his personal army when those thugs dragged Trisha Hansen from her home and subjected her to untold horrors before ending her life?
Where were the NCR when the Fiends doused Gerald Neary in gasoline and set him ablaze while his sister was within full view on the wall?
Where was Caesar when that masked abomination split Sally Park, a girl of ten, in half with his chainsaw?
We can trust no one but ourselves, alone. Recognize that these outsiders see us as nothing more than chattel, while preaching of their own godliness for doing so. These are the very definitions of a False Prophet; a snake whispering treachery into our ears.
They are the LIES of degenerate figureheads, gorging themselves on the lifeblood of YOU, good people! Even our own militia is weak and craven; placing your lives in the hands of bloodthirsty monsters, driven by bloodlust and addiction. We are riddled with tumors, my friends. We must cut them away before we can truly purify ourselves. I beg of you all, it is time to take up arms. We must purge ourselves of the addicts and the pushers. The outsiders and the deceivers. We must forge a new society from the wreckage of this one. A society where it is the EVIL men who must fear the GOOD.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我问你，当那些暴徒把特里莎·汉森从她家里拖出来，在结束她的生命之前让她经历无数难言的恐怖的时候，豪斯先生和他的私人军队在哪里？
当恶魔帮把杰拉尔德·尼里浇在汽油里，点燃他，而他的妹妹在墙看着整个过程的时候，NCR在哪里？
当那个蒙面的憎恶一样的怪胎用电锯把十岁的女孩莎莉·帕克劈成两半的时候，恺撒在哪里？
我们只能相信自己。认识到这些外人一边仅仅把我们看作是资产，一边还在宣扬这种行为的神圣。这就是典型的虚假先知，如一条蛇窃窃私语地将背叛灌入我们耳中。
他们是堕落的傀儡们的谎言，贪婪地吸食着你们的鲜血，好人们！连我们自己的民兵也软弱怯懦，把你的生命交给残忍的怪物，任由嗜血和毒瘾驱使。我的朋友们，我们身上布满了肿瘤。在我们真正净化自己之前，我们必须把它们割掉。我求求你们，是时候拿起武器了。我们必须清除瘾君子和毒贩子，外人和骗子。我们必须从这个废墟中建立一个新的社会。一个坏人必须敬畏好人的社会。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last Words
ESP.TRADUIT: 遗言

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I'm not going to survive this. I'm not sure if anyone thought I would, but at least I got the bastard who did it. Never figured I'd have to use this old pistol, but there it is.
He got me in the stomach, though. He got to go out quick. Me... I don't know how long it takes a man to bleed out. I can't walk, though. Hurts too much. I know I'll be here a while. Didn't figure getting shot was what they meant when they told me mining was dangerous work. What the fuck even happened here? Rockwell was a dying settlement. Why would they organize themselves enough to claim it?
I'm rambling. Because I don't want to face the truth. Dying here, alone, means I'll never see Sharon again. Never see our son. She probably won't know what happened to me. Best case scenario... She just hears about this attack and puts it together in her head when I don't come home. I don't want to die. I'm not ready to leave them. Not like this.
At least death can't hurt anymore. I'm tired. Feel like I need to sleep. I guess that's probably my body slowly shutting down. But, I know I can't be helped now. Door is locked. I can't move myself. Dying quick is my best bet. So I'll close my eyes and see if this fatigue does what it usually does and puts me right to sleep. I don't think I'll wake up.
I'm so sorry, Sharon. Michael. I'm sorry I can't be there for you anymore. I'll miss you both so much.
Hal
ESP.TRADUIT:
我这回是挺不过去了。我不清楚有没有人觉得我能做到，但至少我击中了那个混蛋。从没想过我会用上这把老手枪，但它就这样派上了用场。
他还是射中了我的肚子。他可得快点出去。至于我...我不知道一个人失血而死需要多长时间。我没法走，太疼了。我知道我得在这待上一阵。没想到他们说的挖矿的危险还包括中枪。这里他妈的到底发生了什么？洛克威尔是一个快要完蛋的地方。他们为什么要把自己搞到足以导致这样的结果？
我在说胡话。因为我不想面对现实。在这里等死，孤零零地，意味着我再也见不到莎仑了。再也见不到我们的儿子。她可能不会知道我出了什么事。最好的预期是...她听说了这起袭击，并且在在脑袋里把这件事和我不回家联系起来。我不想死。我没准备好离开他们。不是像这个样子。
至少死了就不会再疼了。我累了。感觉我要睡一觉。我想这可能是我的身体逐渐停摆了。但是，我知道我无能为力。门锁上了。我无法移动自己。快点死掉是我能期待的最好的事情。所以我将闭上眼睛，看看这疲惫能否像往常一样让我倒头就睡。我不认为我还会醒来。
我很抱歉，莎仑。米歇尔。我很抱歉我再也不能陪你们了。我非常想念你们俩。
- 哈尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personal Notes
ESP.TRADUIT: 私人笔记

ESP.ORIGINAL:
-I've had to shell out an additional handful of caps to purchase the services of a large, intimidating gentleman with a shotgun to loiter outside the front door. I rather despise both the investment, and the image that comes associated with armed guards, but until muggers stop running roughshod in this particular neighborhood, the guard will have to stay. A thought: Perhaps the muggers would go elsewhere if the Kings would choose a different street corner as their designated spot to hand garbage to "positive citizens."
- I need to think of a way to disincentivize smoking in my office. One would think it would be easy, but given the caliber of visitors I host, it should come as no surprise that they aren't swayed by me politely asking them to take it outside. I could ask Patrice to enforce the policy, but then all my business partners would be dead on the first day.
- Mr. Marino suggested I move my office to the Strip. I mean, really. The man simply has no concept.
- It's come to my attention that Frank Doyle has been killed. While my first instinct is to blame Rangers for the death of their traitorous compatriot, I suspect his demise was organized by the Great Khans. After all, Doyle was a rather influential member of that ridiculous "Big Daddy" gang that had been in direct competition with the Khans. In any event, I'll try to grab up that old saloon that Doyle had been operating out of. It's a good enough space, and God knows that Saul and his boys won't be needing it anymore.
- Nevermind, apparently a half-feral junkie/murderer/rapist/cannibal Fiend has claimed the building. If he invites a sister to share the space with him, I'll have to just burn the whole building down.
ESP.TRADUIT:
-我不得不再掏出一把瓶盖来雇佣一名身形高大样貌吓人的绅士拿着霰弹枪站在门口。我相当鄙视这项投资，以及与武装警卫有关的形象，但除非抢劫犯停止在这个特定的社区肆意横行，否则警卫将不得不留下来。一个想法：如果猫王帮们选择一个不同的街角作为他们把垃圾交给“热心公民”的指定地点，也许劫匪们就会去别的地方。
-我需要想一个办法来阻止在我的办公室吸烟的行为。有人会认为这很容易，但考虑到我接待的访客们的素质，他们对我的礼貌地请求毫不理睬也就不足为奇了。我可以让帕特里斯强制执行这个规则，但这样一来我所有的生意伙伴在第一天会面时就死了。
-马力诺先生建议我把办公室搬到赌城区。我是说，真的。这个人根本不知所谓。
-我注意到弗兰克·多伊尔被杀了。虽然我的第一反应是游骑兵在清理叛徒，但我怀疑他的死是大汗帮安排的。毕竟，多伊尔是那个可笑的，一直和大汗帮直接竞争的“大老爹”团伙里的一个相当有影响力的成员。不管怎样，我都会设法抢走多伊尔经营的那家老酒馆。那是一块好地方，上帝知道索尔和他的孩子们将不再需要它了。
-算了，显然有个半疯的瘾君子/杀人犯/强奸犯/食人恶魔占领了这座建筑。如果他再邀请一个姐妹和他共享空间，我就得把整栋楼都烧了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pleasant-Smelling Letter
ESP.TRADUIT: 香气宜人的信

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dear &PCName;,
I'm sorry I took so long to write this letter. I was afraid of the feelings that I had, but no longer. Though our meeting was brief, as I stared into your eyes, I knew there was something between us. Surely, you felt it as well. A love this powerful could not be restricted to only one person!
I'm sure I've been on your mind, just as you've been on mine. Come to me, my love. I'll be where I was when first we met, waiting for you to return to me.
-Your Soulmate
ESP.TRADUIT:
亲爱的&PCName;,
很抱歉我花了这么长时间写这封信。我曾经害怕那种感觉，但现在我不怕了。虽然我们的会面很短暂，但当我凝视着你的眼睛时，我知道我们之间有某种东西。当然，你也感觉到了。如此强大的爱不可能只来自一方！
我肯定我在你心里，就像你在我心里一样。到我这里来，我的爱人。我会在我们第一次见面的地方，等着你回到我身边。
-你的灵魂伴侣

ESP.ORIGINAL: Missing Loot!
ESP.TRADUIT: 丢失的战利品！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
That asshole stole our loot-trunk! I can't believe it! I was only gone for a couple minutes, but that fucker grabbed the trunk and hauled ass! I don't know exactly where he ran off to, but don't worry too much. Remember how he was bragging about his "truck-boat" thing? I'm willing to bet that he took off and is hiding somewhere on the water with it. Lake Mead sounds about right to me. I know a guy who can hook us up with a skiff for cheap. We'll get on out there, find the truck-boat, and our goddamn loot.
And, yes, I will front the caps for the skiff, since the loot got grabbed on my watch. Now that I've got that out of the way upfront, I don't want to hear any of you sons-of-bitches giving me shit about it in person!
ESP.TRADUIT:
那个混蛋偷走了我们装战利品的箱子！我简直无法相信！我才离开几分钟，那个操蛋的就把箱子给拖走了！我不知道他到底往哪跑了，但是我不太担心。记得他是怎么吹他的什么“驳船”之类的玩意吗？我敢打赌，他一定躲在水面上的什么地方。我觉得就是米德湖。我认识一个伙计能帮忙搞到便宜的小船。我们会去那里，找到那驳船，还有我们该死的战利品。
还有，没错，我会付小船的前款，因为战利品是在我当值的时候丢的。现在我已经爽快地解决了这个问题，我不想再听到任何一个狗娘养的再当着我的面说三道四！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Instructions
ESP.TRADUIT: 说明

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what you must do. Do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道你必须做什么。去做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 笔记

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could have sworn I saw that truck-boat on the horizon, on the water kinda north of that giant Legion camp on the hill. If they see that bastard, they might do my job for me! Anyway, I can't be sure that's what I saw. I can also see some kind of floating structure on the lake. I'll investigate that, first. I think I see some people walking around on it. Big ones. Armor? Good thing I brought that missile launcher along.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以发誓我在地平线上看到了那艘驳船，就在山上那个巨大的军团营地北边的水面上。如果他们看到那个混蛋，他们可能会替我做我的工作！不管怎样，我不确定我看到了什么。我还可以看到湖面上有某种漂浮的结构物。我先调查一下。我想我看到一些人在上面走来走去。大个头的。穿着盔甲？幸好我带了导弹发射器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Upcoming Features
ESP.TRADUIT: 即将推出

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Upcoming features, currently in production. (Note, as these films are still as-of-yet unfinished, all titles and synopses listed are purely speculative, and not guaranteed for the final product. With this in mind, keep this fucking list ON SET at ALL TIMES. We don't need a repeat of the incident in Freeside.)
"Naughty Ranger Captured by Legionaries 7" Ranger Chief Handjob gets herself into a sticky situation when she is captured by Legion boys for the seventh time!
"Date With a Deathclaw 3" No animals were harmed in the making of this film.
"The Erotic Adventures of Dongo-Hot" The more-than-equal sequel!
"The Odyssey of Spew-lysses" A very, very, very, VERY, long erotic epic.
"Caesar's (nether) Region" Find out just what Caesar does with all those nubile young slave girls! (This is distasteful. Please throw the negatives into a garbage fire.)
"The Last Seduction of Christ" Jessie Christ just can't stop sinning! Also co-starring the Mastodonic Mutant in a special guest role as Judas Dickscariot!
"The Legend of Al Breast-Reach: Part Sixer McDickser, Slurp my Elixir" The legend returns for this family-unfriendly romp through the Mojave, with plenty of mustache rides for everyone!
"The Siege of Camp Whorelorn Hope" Can the battled-HARDENED NCR girls survive a surprise Legion assault, or will Lanius's forces penetrate their tight defenses? (This one might be in poor taste. Please advise.)
"The Cunt of Monte Cristo" No.
ESP.TRADUIT:
即将推出的专题，目前正在制作中(请注意，由于这些电影还未完成，所有列出的标题和概要纯粹是前期构想，并不能保证与最终产品完全一致。记住这一点，并且把这个该死的单子一直放在片场。我们不需要重蹈自由城的覆辙。）
"被军团俘虏的淘气游骑兵 7" 当她第七次落入军团的男孩们手中时，游骑兵长官“手冲”小姐陷入了窘境！
"与死亡爪约会 3" 在这部电影的制作过程中没有动物受到伤害。
"东哥热的情色冒险" 精益求精的续集!
"喷利西斯的奥德赛" 一部非常非常非常非常长的情色史诗。
"凯撒（下面）的地盘" 看看凯撒对那些性感的年轻的女奴做了些什么！(这太恶心了。请把底片扔进垃圾堆。）
"基督最后的诱惑" 杰西基督就是不能停止犯罪！乳齿变种人特别出演，饰演犹大鸡巴卡里奥!
"Al Breast-Reach 传奇:麦克吉巴尔第六部,咂吧我的精华" 传说归来！不宜全家观看的莫哈维韵事，看胡子佬上每一个人!
"围攻一线生姬" 是顽强战斗的NCR女孩在军团的突然袭击中幸存，还是拉尼乌斯的部队穿透她们严密的防御？(这件可能不怎么样。请提意见。）
"鸡督山恩仇记" 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bloody Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 沾血的笔记

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn it, I didn't expect such a sturdy lock on this thing! I'll try to pick it, but I might need to make a stealth-run back and see if I can grab the key. I think that woman had it? Whatever. I've got plenty of time here. No way they'll get this close to the Legion camp, fucking cowards. Anyway, it's not like I'm going to
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，我没想到这东西上有这么结实的锁！我会试着撬开，但我可能需要偷偷跑回去看看能不能拿到钥匙。我觉得在那个女人身上？无论如何。我在这儿有很多时间。他们不可能离军团营地这么近，该死的胆小鬼。不管怎样，我也不会

ESP.ORIGINAL: Notice
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This is the fate that awaits any who invoke my wrath. Test my resolve, and you may find yourself locked in your own crate; a six-by-eight metal tomb, slowly cooking you as the midday sun soaks into the steel, and the corpses of your dearest friends fester around you.
B
ESP.TRADUIT:
这是任何引起我愤怒的人将要面临的命运。考验我的决心，你可能会发现自己被锁在箱子里；一座六乘八的金属墓穴，正午的太阳透过钢铁慢慢地煮着你，而你最亲爱的朋友们的尸体正在你身边腐烂。
B

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stack of Papers
ESP.TRADUIT: 一叠纸

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Target Name: "Graf" & any associates
Age: 30s
Race: Caucasian
Loyalties: Jackal gang
Last known location: Near NV Medical Clinic & Molerat Ranch
Wanted for the rape and murder of Trisha Hansen
Reward: 500 caps, payable upon proof of termination (ear) by Maddie O'Doyle, Westside Militia.
(Page 2)
Target Name: Dragger
Age: Unknown
Race: Ghoul
Loyalties: Possibly Fiends
Last known location: Neighborhood ruins outside SS headquarters
Wanted for the the murders of the Jacobi family and multiple counts of arson
Reward: 650 caps, payable upon proof of termination (ear) by Maddie O'Doyle, Westside Militia.
(Page 3)
Target Name: Stanley
Age: 24
Race: African-American
Loyalties: Viper gang
Last known location: Horowitz Farm
Wanted for mass murder, multiple counts of rape, torture, vandalism, arson, robbery, and assault.
Reward: 1000 caps, payable upon proof of termination (ear) by Maddie O'Doyle, Westside Militia.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标名称: "格拉夫"及其同伙
年龄: 30s
种族: 高加索裔
帮派: 豺狼帮
最近出现地点: 新维加斯诊所和鼹鼠牧场附近
因为强奸和谋杀崔莎·汉森而被通缉

(第2页)
目标名称: 拖钩
年龄: 不明
种族: 僵尸
帮派: 可能是恶魔帮
最近出现地点: 夕阳沙士总部附近的废墟
因为谋杀雅各比家族和多次纵火罪而被通缉
奖励金额: 650瓶盖， 凭死亡证明(耳朵)向麦迪·奥多伊尔领取，西区民兵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slaver's Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 奴隶贩子的信

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Greene, sales will slow down for a while between us. Nothing that can be done about it, either. Fucking retard raiders up here kept bugging the NCR and finally got annoying enough that Rangers locked the tunnel up tight. Transport fees at this point would end up costing me more than anything I could make by reselling your merchandise.
I do have some business advice, though, at least until this bullshit with the NCR is squared away. The Legion is buying boys and young men en masse. Use them as conscripts I imagine. They buy women, too, but don't pay as much. Weirdly enough, they're some of the most solid buyers I've ever dealt with. They've never tried to rip me off, haggle with me, or even show up late to a meet. You should see if you can work out a deal with them, too.
Tex
Oh yeah, my son is having quite the time with that slut you sent over with the last bunch. Good call.
ESP.TRADUIT:
格林尼，我们之间的生意将会放缓一段时间。我对此也无能为力。他妈的弱智突袭者一直在这里骚扰NCR，最后终于烦的游骑兵把隧道紧密封锁了。这导致运输成本高过了我们交易任何商品所能产生的的利润。
不过，我确实有一些商业建议，至少在NCR的破事解决之前。军团正在大批收购男孩和年轻男子，大概想把他们当义务兵吧，我猜。他们也买女人，但出价不高。奇怪的是，他们是我见过的最可靠的买家。他们从来没有试图敲诈我，也不和我讨价还价，甚至会面从不迟到。你也应该看看能不能和他们达成交易。
- 特克斯
哦，是的，我儿子和你上次送来的那个荡妇相处得很愉快。真不错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: R.I.P. Dippy
ESP.TRADUIT: 安息吧蠢货

ESP.ORIGINAL:
We were going to unveil Project Virtue tomorrow. And then, halfway through work today, Phil announces we need to delay the release. I was horrified, naturally. Had some bug managed to slip through the cracks? Was the onboard AI locking down?
No.
Apparently, "Dippy the Task Manager" is a racial stereotype. Somehow. He wouldn't elaborate on whose behalf he was so deeply offended. Khan took the opportunity to propose removing Dippy from the system altogether, as he is still upset that we included a "childish feature" in the first place.
Mr. Jennings, who is retarded, ordered Dippy to be removed from the system so as to not offend any ethnic minorities.
I am going to murder Phil.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我们打算明天正式揭幕美德计划。然后，今天工作进行到一半，菲尔宣布我们需要推迟发布。我自然被吓坏了。有什么bug从石头缝里蹦出来了吗？机上AI锁定了吗？
不。
显然，出于某种原因，"任务经理迪皮"这个形象涉嫌种族歧视。他不肯说明他是代表谁遭受了如此严重的冒犯。可汗利用这个机会提议将迪皮从系统中完全删除，显然他仍然为我们的采用这种“幼稚的形象”深感担忧。
詹宁斯先生，这个智障，下令将迪皮从系统中删除，以免冒犯任何少数族裔。
我要杀了菲尔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Fuck is This Shit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么鸡巴玩意？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Jennings came by and told me to prepare "alternate voice modules" for the Project. I asked him to elaborate, and he clasped his hands together and mumbled something about money. Then he told me that I also need to create "new style packs" and have them ready to launch. Again, I asked him what the fuck he was talking about. Apparently, even though projections put the Project Virtue launch at a $500 million opening week, Jennings wants us to have some functionally worthless baubles ready and waiting, to be sold to rich retards and/or children.
I remember back when I worked at Allied Technologies, and we would do cool things like have passion for our projects. I seem to recall Khan bragging about attending a party on a private yacht that Jennings owns. One would think that men who host/attend yacht parties wouldn't need to nickel-and-dime their consumers, but clearly I'm speaking as a man who has yet to accept the company spirit, i.e. Satan.
ESP.TRADUIT:
詹宁斯过来告诉我为这个项目准备“备用语音模块”。我请他详细说明一下，他双手合十，咕哝着什么钱的事。然后他告诉我，我还需要创建“新样式包”，并准备好发布。我又问他到底他妈的在说什么。很显然，尽管预计美德计划启动的第一周就能赚5亿美元，詹宁斯还是希望我们准备一些功能上毫无价值的小装饰品，并等待着出售给有钱的弱智和/或儿童。
我记得我在联合科技公司工作的时候，我们会做一些很酷的事情，比如对我们的项目充满热情。我好像还记得可汗吹嘘说要在詹宁斯的私人游艇上参加一个聚会。有人会认为，能够主持/参加游艇派对的男人不需要零打碎敲地长期消耗他们的消费者的钱包，但很明显，我说的是一个尚未接受企业精神的人，也就是撒旦。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please Kill Me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请杀了我。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Today, I presented Jennings with my outline for an energy-saving measure that would keep the user from needing to buy a replacement heat sink for at least a half-year. He asked me if I could make my design "awesomer", and he seemed offended at the suggestion that we provide our consumers a quality product that wouldn't have them crawling back to buy replacement parts.
Then Phil came in. He also presented a design idea. Phil's idea was a vocabulary calendar that would charge the user $5 dollars a month, and present them with a single esoteric word a month for their money. I pointed out that what he was suggesting was worthless, because any fucking person in the universe could just walk down to a bookstore and buy a thesaurus for a single payment of $5 dollars. Jennings responded: "So?"
We're to implement Phil's idea immediately, and to hide the opt-out button at the very bottom of the ToS, in 0.4 sized font. And it's in unfiltered Comic Sans.
I think what I'm going to do is go into Phil's office while he takes his daily half-hour bathroom break. It should take all of five minutes to rework his calendar so the only word for every single month is "cunt", which seems more rather more apt.
ESP.TRADUIT:
今天，我向詹宁斯介绍了一项节能措施的概要，这项措施可以让用户在至少半年的时间内不需要购买替换散热器。他问我是否可以让我的设计更“出彩”，他似乎对我们为消费者提供高质量产品的建议很生气，因为这样的建议不会让他们爬回来买替换零件。
然后菲尔进来了。他也提出了一个设计理念。菲尔的想法是一个词汇日历，每月向用户收取5美元的费用，然后每月向用户解释一个业内词汇作为他们的报酬。我指出他所说的毫无价值，因为宇宙中任何一个该死的人只要花5美元就可以走进书店买一本词典。詹宁斯回答说：“那又如何？”
我们将立即实现菲尔的想法，并在服务条款的最底部隐藏退出按钮，字体大小为0.4。而且是原始的手写字体。
我想我要做的是走进菲尔的办公室，在他每天上半小时厕所的时候。重写他的日历程序要花上五分钟，于是每个月都只会提供一个词“贱人”，这似乎更贴切。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Red's Gone
ESP.TRADUIT: 红鸡巴走了

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Bad news, Rob. I followed that trail like you said, and sure enough, Red-Cock was all trussed up with a rolled-up sock in his mouth and one of those blinking collars on his neck. The slaver crew was heading for the Colorado, so I figure Cock's been separated his namesake and had it traded in for a big-ass bag of Legion gear by now.
On the bright side, we won't ever have to listen to his girls screaming and crying throughout the entire night anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT:
坏消息，罗伯。我像你说的那样沿着踪迹跟下去，然后确定无疑地看到，红鸡巴被捆得严严实实，嘴里叼着一只卷起的袜子，脖子上戴着一个闪闪发光的项圈。奴隶贩子的团伙正前往科罗拉多，所以我想鸡巴哥的鸡巴已经和他分家了，被拿去换了一大袋军团装备。
好的一面是，我们再也不用听他的姑娘们整夜尖叫了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Casualty Write-Up
ESP.TRADUIT: 伤亡报告

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I'd like to preface this by saying that I am not remorseful in the least, nor do I feel that I was in the wrong.
At around 8:30 PM, last Sunday, Two men entered town with three individuals in slave collars. One of the captives was a young child. I asked the now-deceased individuals what they thought they were doing. They informed me, point-blank, that they were transporting slaves to be sold. I ordered them to surrender their arms and release their captives, citing the illegal status of slavery in the NCR. It is still illegal, right Jim? Or did they repeal that when I wasn't looking?
The slavers refused and drew their weapons. I fired one barrel for each of the slavers, and released their captives after confirming that both slavers were dead.
Deputy Samantha Roarke
ESP.TRADUIT:
我想先说一句，我一点也不后悔，也不觉得自己做错了。
上周日晚上8:30左右，两名男子带着三名戴奴隶项圈的人进城。其中一个俘虏是个小孩。我问那两个现在已经去世的人，他们认为自己在做什么。他们直截了当地告诉我，他们正在运送奴隶出售。鉴于奴隶制在NCR的非法地位，我命令他们交出他们的武器，释放他们的俘虏。这仍然是违法的，对吗，吉姆？或者他们在我没看到的时候废除了这条法律？
奴隶贩子拒绝我的命令，并拔出他们的武器。我向每一个奴隶贩子开了一枪，在确认两个都死了之后，释放了他们的俘虏。
萨曼莎·罗克副警长

ESP.ORIGINAL: Letter
ESP.TRADUIT: 信

ESP.ORIGINAL:
(The letter is written in a shaky, barely-legible scrawl.)
Hey Amanda! I'm not going to be back when I said I was. I hope you're staying out of trouble. I was robbed at gunpoint of the money you gave me to travel. Could you please convince mom to send more? My boyfriend Lee was disappointed I can't go, cause he wants to meet my family. He is really great. He's helped me with my jet problem. I haven't touched it for months now. I work at a bar, now. It's nice but it doesn't pay very well, so that's why I need mom to send more money. Hey, how is school?
Love, Suzie
ESP.TRADUIT:
(这封信字迹潦草到几乎看不清)
嘿，阿曼达！我不能在之前说的时间回来了。希望你不会遇上麻烦。你给我的路费被人拿枪抢走了。你能说服妈妈再多送点吗？我男朋友李对我不能回去很失望，因为他想见我的家人。他真的很棒。他帮我解决了杰特的问题。我已经好几个月没碰它了。我现在酒吧工作。这里很好，但报酬不高，所以我需要妈妈多寄点钱。嘿，在学校过得怎么样？
爱你的，苏丝

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ava's Journal
ESP.TRADUIT: 艾娃的日记

ESP.ORIGINAL:
June 3
Well, here I am. Home, I suppose it is. It'll have to do, seeing as how I don't got any plans to move somewhere else. In the meanwhile, it's as good a place as any to train. Good sightlines on the airport, so I should be able to practice my marksmanship. I think, once I can peg a bloatfly in the eye from a hundred yards, that's when I'll start my hunt for real. Not that I'll kill that fuck from too far. I'll blow out his kneecaps, but I'm going to look him in the eye before I paint the ground with his brains.
Sheridan. His fucking face is the first thing I see when I wake, and the last thing before I sleep. I bet he doesn't even remember me. A monster like that wouldn't remember his victims. I bet I ain't even unique. My dad can't be the only man he flayed. Dad'd kill me if I didn't avenge him.
Rumors say that Sheridan drifted way out east after Brighton. Damn NCR sent Alquist running before I could ask him if he heard anything. Probably for the best, though. I don't need anyone else taking my kill.
June 8
Some fucking nerd showed up today. Wanted to set up equipment to monitor the airstrip. I told him to get the hell out of here while he still has eyes in his head. Fucking unbelievable. I just want to be alone until I'm ready to hunt.
June 15
I shot at one of those NCR ghouls today, but my gun jammed up after the first shot. The thing charged me, and... I don't know. I just lost it. I pounded the thing's skull into the ground until there wasn't nothing but sandy red paste left. It felt good, but it made me think... I need to know what it really means to kill a man, first. All the training in the world won't help me if I freeze up when the cocksucker is in my sights. I know what to do.
July 2
Just got back. Need to rest in my own bed. Will write tomorrow.
July 3
I can't stop seeing the life fade out of the Legionary's eyes. I stabbed him in the spine and watched him bleed out. I puked afterwards, but... I can do this. I'm a killer. I'll practice, for now. I'm getting more and more ready for this. I've never been more excited in my life.
ESP.TRADUIT:
6月3日
好吧，我来了。我想这就算是家吧。既然我不打算搬到别的地方去，那就只好这样了。同时，这也是一个训练的好地方。机场的视线很好，所以我应该可以练习射击。我想，一旦我能在一百码外射中一只肿头蝇的眼睛，我就要开始真正的狩猎了。不是说我会从很远的地方杀了那个混蛋。我要先轰掉他的膝盖骨，但在我用他的脑浆粉刷地面之前，我要直视他的眼睛。
谢尔丹。他操蛋的脸是我醒来时第一眼看到的，也是我睡觉前最后一眼看到的。我打赌他都不记得我了。这样的怪物不会记得他的受害者。我打赌我不是独一无二的。我爸爸不可能是唯一一个被他剥了皮的人。如果我不替他报仇，爸爸会杀了我的。
有传言说谢尔丹在布莱顿之后向东漂流。在我还能没问阿尔奎斯特有没有听到任何消息之前，该死的NCR就让他跑了。不过，这也许是最好的。我不需要别人去杀我的目标。
6月8日
今天来了个他妈的书呆子。想安装设备来监控飞机跑道。我告诉他趁他的眼珠子还在脑袋上，赶紧离开这里。他妈的难以置信。我只想一个人待着，直到我准备好狩猎。
6月15日
今天我向NCR的一个僵尸开了枪，但是第一枪打完后我的枪就卡住了。这件事让我很难过，而且……我不知道。我有点迷失了。我把那东西的头骨砸在地上，直到只剩下沙红色的浆糊。感觉很好，但它让我觉得……我首先要知道杀人到底意味着什么。如果我在看到那个混蛋的时候僵住了，世界上所有的训练都帮不了我。我知道该怎么办。
7月2日
刚回来。我需要上床休息。明天再写。
7月3日
我不停地看着生命从军团士兵的眼睛里消失。我捅了他一刀，看着他流血不止。后来我吐了，但是……我能做到。我是个杀手。我先练习一下。我准备得越来越充分了。我这辈子从来没有这么兴奋过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion Novel
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团小说

ESP.ORIGINAL:
It was a normal day in the NCR town. Nobody liked to live there because of the bastards with guns who controled everything. It was.... THE NCR!!!
One day, the village was attacked by badass soldiers in awesome red armor. They used razor sharp machetes and also threw spears and killed the NCR soilders. After all the NCR guys were dead, the commander of the Legion came and said "We are Caesar's Legion! We will free you from the evil of the NCR!" Said the Legoin Commander. "Who is the strongest man in this village?" He asked. Everyone looked at the one they knew was the strongest... it was... John! "I'm the stongest!" Said John. Everyone knew it was true because of how muscular and sexy he was.
"We also need the smartest man!" Said the Commander. "Well..." Said John. "I am also the smartest man!" the commander smiled and gave John a badass katana. John knew that was an honor because Katanas are the best swords. "You will be the new second in command for Caesar!" said the commander. "We will take all the weak men and boys of your town, and we will make them strong soliders! They'll kill all the NCR bastards once we train them!" John thought this was really cool, because he hated how weak the villagers were. he knew the Legion would make them awesome!! "I want to be a soldeir, to!" yelled a lady. John knew her, and he did not like her. She was a traitorous whore, just like all women. "You will serve the legion to make us a new generation, you greedy bitch!" Yelled the commander angrily.
The legion men all took the bitches to be mothers for new legion solidars. It was a great honor for them to be with real men like John, instead of the weak men of the village. the Legion was the best thing that ever happened to the town!!
John went to Caesar's castle, and met Caesar. It reminded him of the pictures back in the NCR of President Kimball, because they were the EXACT OPPOSITE!!! Kimball's picture made him look like the old weak man he was, and it was obvious that he was also a sodomite. Caesar was very muscular and attractive. John knew that Caesar could destroy the NCR by himself if he wanted. But he was a good man and he only fought to improve the lives of his people. "John..." He said. "I have a special job for you... I cannot take over Vegas without your help, John! Will you help the Legion? Asked Caesar.
"Yes." Said John.
ESP.TRADUIT:
这是NCR的城镇里普普通通的一天。没有人愿意住在那里，因为拿枪的混蛋们控制着所有的事情。他们就是...NCR！！！
一天，这个村子被身穿帅气的红色盔甲的超级威猛的士兵攻击了。他们用剃刀般锋利的砍刀和投矛杀死了NCR士兵。当所有NCR士兵都死掉之后，军团的指挥官走了出来，说：“我们是凯撒的军团！我们将从邪恶的NCR手中解放你们！”军团指挥官说道 “谁是这个村子里最强壮的人？”他问道。每个人都看向那个最强壮的人... 那是... 约翰！“我就是最强的！”约翰说道。每个人都知道这是事实，因为他是那么的健壮和性感。 "我们还需要最聪明的人!" 指挥官说道。 "好吧..." 约翰说。"最聪明的也是我！" 指挥官微微一笑，递给约翰一把超级厉害的武士刀。约翰知道这是一项荣誉，因为武士刀是最好的剑。"你将成为凯撒的新任二当家！" 指挥官说道。"我们会带走你的镇上所有弱小的男人和男孩，然后我们将把他们变成强壮的士兵！当我们把他们训练好，他们将杀光NCR混蛋！" 约翰心想这真是太酷了，因为他痛恨这些村民的弱小。他知道军团会把他们变得威武雄壮！“我也想做一个士兵！”一位女士叫到。约翰知道她，而且不喜欢她。她是个背信弃义的妓女，就像所有女人一样。"你会为军团生产下一代，你这贪婪的婊子!"指挥官生气地喊道。
军团的男子们都领到了即将成为新的军团士兵的母亲的婊子。能和像约翰这样的真男人在一起，而不是村里那些弱鸡，对她们来说实在太幸运了。军团的到来是这座城镇有史以来发生过的最好的事情！
约翰来到了凯撒的城堡，见到了凯撒。这使他想起了NCR总统金博尔的画像，因为他们实在是截然相反!!! 金博尔的画像看起来又老又弱，并且显然他是一个鸡奸犯。凯撒非常健硕而迷人。约翰知道凯撒可以单枪匹马摧毁NCR，只要他想。但他是个好人，所以他的战斗只是为了改善他的子民的生活。"约翰..." 他说道。“我有一个特殊的任务要交给你...没有你的帮助我没法拿下维加斯，约翰! 你会帮助军团吗?” 凯撒问道。
"是的。" 约翰说道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stop it
ESP.TRADUIT: 停下

stop slitting their fucking pretty throats james their blood doesn't need to be on the ground you don't have to kill anyone james and you don't need to take them hear them screaming they're so warm I can't help it

ESP.ORIGINAL: Blood Oath
ESP.TRADUIT: 血誓

ESP.ORIGINAL:
We do solemnly swear, on pain of torture and death, that we shall avenge the wanton murder of our brother, Louis Kowalski, at the hands of &PCName;.
We are bound to this oath through blood, never to be released from our duty until &PCName; lies dead at our feet, or we ourselves are slain.
T.G.
J.S.
R.B.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我们以酷刑和死亡的痛苦郑重宣誓，我们将为我们的兄弟路易斯·科瓦尔斯基在&PCName;手中遭受的肆意谋杀复仇。
我们必须用鲜血来履行这个誓言，永不解脱直到&PCName;死在我们脚下，或者我们自己被杀。
T.G.
J.S.
R.B.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Journal Excerpt
ESP.TRADUIT: 日记摘录

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The preacher says that this world was made by God, long ago. But the creation was all the dream of the old things, willing the universe with a single errant thought. Now, we are here. God is long dead, and the old things are stirring. The world was split in two when they first began to rise, and their blood flows through the earth, now. Heretics and fools try to tempt us away, but as we accept their ancient blood, we are granted gifts. We no longer fear death. While soft, pink men wither away into nothing, we are eternal, at the cost of becoming twisted and mutilated. A price I pay gladly.
The old things require great sacrifice as a show of devotion. The preacher has told me that my time has come. I cried with joy. I have been chosen to show my loyalty and my faith.
We came in the night, as my human mother and father slept. As the wife of the weak man, Devon, slept. As the little ones that we spawned together slept. Each one, I bled. Staring into their eyes as the light drifted away. They cried and begged, asking for respite. Asking "why?" it was happening. If they had eyes, they would have seen. But they cast their eyes upon weak, mortal things, and averted their gaze from what was real. Their eyes were only ever cast upon false, meaningless things. So I cut them away. I gave them to the dark fires that only the enlightened know still burn.
Praise them. Praise them whom we cannot name. This world is filth and despair, and as the layers of infection are burned away, more and more shall see the truth. But there will always be a price, and they must pay it, as I have.
ESP.TRADUIT:
传教士说这个世界是上帝很久以前创造的。但创世不过是古老者的一个梦，只用一个飘忽不定的念头就塑造了宇宙。现在，到了我们这个时代。上帝早就死了，古老者正要苏醒。当他们开始崛起的时候，世界被一分为二，现在他们的血液正在大地中流淌。异端和愚人试图引诱我们离开，但当我们接受他们古老的血液时，我们将被授予礼物。我们不再害怕死亡。当柔软的粉色的人们凋零成无物时，我们是永恒的，代价是扭曲和残缺。我很乐意为此付出代价。
古老者需要巨大的牺牲来表示忠诚。传教士告诉我我的时辰到了。我高兴得哭了。我被选中是为了显示我的忠诚和信仰。
我们是在晚上来的，我的人类母亲和父亲在睡觉。作为弱者的妻子，戴文在睡觉。我们一起产下的小东西在睡觉。我放光了他们的血，每一个人。凝视着他们的眼睛知道其中的光芒散尽。他们哭着乞求，求饶。问“为什么？”事情就是这样发生了。如果他们有眼睛，他们就会看见。但他们把目光投向了脆弱的凡人，把目光从真实的事物上移开。他们的目光只投向虚假的、毫无意义的东西。所以我把它们挖掉了。我把它们献给了黑暗的火焰，只有开明的人才知道它还在燃烧。
赞美他们。赞美那些我们叫不出名字的人。这个世界是肮脏和绝望的，随着被感染的表层被烧掉，越来越多的人将看到真相。但总会有代价的，他们必须付出代价，就像我一样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Letter from Tommy
ESP.TRADUIT: 汤米的来信

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hey, Watermelon.
That was a good find, man. Where'd you scavenge a functioning laundry machine, anyway? Well, however that happened, we appreciate it.
I hope you were joking when you said the NCR was closing in. You make a habit of pissing them off, they'll shit on your whole world, man. I hate them as much as the next guy, but I swear to god, if you get yourself killed, there's no way in hell Carol would let me attend the funeral, you know?
I'm telling you, ain't nobody going to go make a martyr out of any raiders that get filled with lead, you hear me? There're more options than death by NCR or Legion, you know. I headed South, and I'm doing great. Remember Colin Luke, from that bullshit in '79? He went North, and he says he's boss of a whole town, now. Just get the hell out of the Mojave before you get buried.
Tommy
ESP.TRADUIT:
嘿，西瓜。
那是个好东西，伙计。你在哪里捡来了一台运转正常的洗衣机？不管怎样，我们都很感激。
我希望你说的NCR在围剿你是在开玩笑。你养成了招惹他们的习惯，他们会把你的整个世界都搞砸的，伙计。我和其他人一样恨他们，但我向上帝发誓，如果你把自己弄死了，卡罗尔可不会让我参加你的葬礼，你知道吗？
我告诉你，没有人会把被射成筛子的掠夺者当做烈士，你听到了吗？你知道，比起死在NCR或者军团手上，还有更多的选择。我往南走，我做得很好。还记得科林·卢克吗，79年那次认识的？他去了北方，他说他现在是整个镇的老板。在你被埋葬之前，赶紧离开莫哈韦。
- 汤米

ESP.ORIGINAL: Finished
ESP.TRADUIT: 结束了

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Big Daddy's dead, and so are all the guys. I hear the Khans had someone on the inside, and when they heard about the deal with that Legion cocksucker, they went and wiped out everyone in Ford Cavern. Frank's dead, too. He was outside Vegas, not anywhere near Ford, so it probably was them rangers that were after him. Dumb bastard.
The Khans want us all dead. The NCR wants us all dead. The Legion lost some men in the attack, so they probably want us all dead. I say fuck the Mojave. I got a cousin, mean bastard named Samir. He's a boss for some big gang way up North. I'm heading up that way, and you should, too.
-KP
ESP.TRADUIT:
大老爹死了，所有的人也都死了。我听说大汗帮有卧底，当他们听说我们和那个军团混蛋交易后，他们就去把福特山洞里的所有人都杀光了。弗兰克也死了。他在维加斯郊外，不在福特山洞附近，所以可能是追杀他的游骑兵干的。愚蠢的混蛋。
大汗帮想让我们都死光。NCR想让我们都死光。军团在这次袭击中失去了一些人，所以他们可能也想让我们都死光。我说去他妈的莫哈韦。我有一个表弟，一个叫萨米尔的卑鄙混蛋。他是北方某个大帮派的老大。我要往那边走，你也应该去。
- KP

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crumpled Map
ESP.TRADUIT: 皱巴巴的地图

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This nearly incomprehensible scrawl of a map seems to have been drawn by someone with the cartography skills of a five-year-old.
The only detail worth noting is a crude circle around the vague area of the Ivanpah lake bed.
ESP.TRADUIT:
这张几乎让人无法理解的潦草的地图似乎是由一个拥有五岁孩子般制图技能的人画的。
唯一值得注意的细节是围绕伊凡帕旱湖的区域模糊的粗糙圆圈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Proposition
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个提议

ESP.ORIGINAL:
&PCName;, I would like to meet with you, face-to-face, at your earliest possible convenience.
I have a proposition for you, one that could potentially be extremely profitable and of great benefit to the Republic. If that isn't enough incentive, I can offer you amnesty for any outstanding warrants the NCR may hold against you.
I understand if you may be wary of my intentions, so as a token of good faith, I encourage you to bring any equipment and/or personal associates you may require to feel comfortable.
Please report to the Office of Mojave Affairs building, outside the McCarran walls, at your earliest convenience.
I look forward to meeting you.
Sawyer
ESP.TRADUIT:
&PCName;, 我想在您方便的时候，与您面谈。
我有一个提议，一个可能非常有利可图，并且对共和国非常有益的提议。如果这还不足以引起您的兴趣，我可以就NCR针对您发布的任何尚待执行的裁决给予特赦。
我理解您可能对我的意图持谨慎态度，因此作为诚意的象征，我鼓励您带上您可能需要的任何装备和/或私人助理，以使您感到舒适。
在您方便的时候，望请尽早到麦卡伦墙外的莫哈韦事务大楼办公室报到。
我期待与您会面。
- 索耶

ESP.ORIGINAL: Open Contract
ESP.TRADUIT: 开放式合同

ESP.ORIGINAL:
A bounty of 5000 caps is on offer to anyone who successfully terminates &PCName; and provides proof of death.
Target is considered armed and extremely dangerous, and should be executed on sight.
This contract is open to the public, and can be turned in with any Lawrence & Pyke associate.
Happy hunting!
ESP.TRADUIT:
任何杀死 &PCName; 并提供有效证据者，将获得赏金5000瓶盖。
目标携带武器并且极度危险，一经发现，应当立即击毙。
本合同向公众开放，并可由任一劳伦斯&派克事务所承兑。
狩猎愉快！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Friendly Warning
ESP.TRADUIT: 友善的警告

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You don't have to personally like me, Rodney. While I would, of course, cherish your friendship, I suspect I'll survive without it. That said, undermining my authority as sheriff is another matter altogether. As I have said before, I was appointed to this position by the NCR after they were made aware of what happened to the Casey family. I came here from California to serve in that capacity, and that is the extent of it. If you ever take it upon yourself to accost visitors again to inform them of your crackpot conspiracy theories about me, we'll have words.
Tell me, if New Rockwell really is the lawless hellhole that you claim it to be, then where's the wisdom or sense in trying to erode the authority of the local law enforcement office?
In layman's terms: Don't fuck with me, Rodney, and I won't fuck with you.
Sheriff James Ferrar
ESP.TRADUIT:
就私交而言，你不必喜欢我，罗德尼。而我当然会珍视你的友谊，尽管没有它我也能活。话虽如此，削减我作为警长的权威就完全是另一回事了。就像我之前说过的，NCR是在认识到了凯西一家发生了什么事情之后把我安排到这个岗位上的。我从加利福尼亚来到这里负责这个职位，而这就是这个职权的范围。如果你再擅自和游客搭话，跟他们讲你那套关于我的离奇的阴谋论，我们就得谈谈了。
告诉我，如果新洛克威尔真的如你所说是个无法无天藏污纳垢的地方，那么努力削弱本地执法机构的权威这一行为究竟蕴含着怎样的智慧或理性？
用通俗的语言来说: 别他妈搞我，罗德尼，那么我就不会搞你。
- 詹姆斯·费拉尔警长

ESP.ORIGINAL: Permanant Contract
ESP.TRADUIT: 长期合同

ESP.ORIGINAL:
James, we got a chance to make a lot more money on a permanent basis. Some squirelly little doctor type got us searching for some kinda Enclave bunkers for tech. Sounds like he wants to camp up in one, and I'm gonna suggest he take us on as permanent guards. He can afford it. I bet he'll agree right away, but if not, I'm happy to make a demonstration of why you need security.
You ever get the chance to fuck any of these crazy Jackal bitches? Dumb whore wouldn't stop fighting me. Crazy bitch tried to bite my fucking throat out. She pissed me off, so I made her suck on my .44 as a closing act. Dumb bitch.
What are you doing at the NCR mountain camp? You better not think about taking that Legion contract. Shit's a death sentence.
ESP.TRADUIT:
詹姆斯，我们有个机会可以长期赚到大笔钱。有个有钱的、像是个博士的那种人想雇我们去个什么英克雷地堡调查战前科技。听起来他想长期驻扎在一个地堡里，我打算建议他雇我们做长期保镖。他付得起钱。我打赌他会同意的，但如果他不同意，我会很乐意为他演示一下人为什么需要保镖。
你有没有干过那些豺狼帮的婊子？蠢女人就是非要反抗不可。疯婊子想把我他妈的喉咙咬烂。她把我惹毛了，所以我让她给我的.44 口交来收场。蠢婊子。
你在山上的NCR营地干什么？你最好别想着接那个军团的合同。那他妈就是个死刑判决书。

ESP.ORIGINAL: These Are the Guys
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这些人

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Vince, I dug up all the info I could on those guys you were talking about.
We know there's one of 'em by Lake Mead, one is staying at the Ultra-Luxe, and one of them is up in the desert to the north.
The names are Black Killian, Cameron "The Butcher" Butler, and Brian.
I'm 100% that your rat is one of these three.
This wasn't easy info to get, so we're even now, alright?
ESP.TRADUIT:
文斯，我把你说的那些人的资料能查出来的都查出来了。
我们知道其中一个在米德湖边，一个住在超美多酒店，还有一个在北部的沙漠里。
他们的名字是布莱克基利安, 卡梅龙 "屠夫" 巴特勒, 以及布莱恩。
我百分之百确定你的老鼠就在这三者之中。
这些信息可不容易得到，所以我们现在扯平了，好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: FUCK YOU
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的

ESP.ORIGINAL: TRYING TO STEAL MY PILLOW, HUH?! HOW'S THAT FUCKING BEAR TRAP FEEL? IF I SEE ANYONE LIMPING AROUND WITH A BLOODY LEG, I'LL KILL YOU!
ESP.TRADUIT: 想偷我的枕头，嗯？！那该死的捕熊器感觉怎么样？任何人如果被我看到腿上带血一瘸一拐的，我就杀了你！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep out of my house!
ESP.TRADUIT: 离我的房子远点！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
This is my house! You sons-of-bitches better keep out! Unless you're a dirty skank with big ol' titties, in which case you can just have a seat and wait for ol' Cheffy to finish his shift at the grill.
Lots of love
Cheffy!
ESP.TRADUIT:
这是我的房子！你们这帮狗娘养的滚远点！除非你是个奶子够大的脏婊子，那么你可以坐下来等着你谢非大爷从烧烤店换班回来。
满满的爱
谢非!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just to Clarify
ESP.TRADUIT: 谨为澄清

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Mr. Greene, firstly, I offer my sincerest apologies regarding the last shipment. I assure you, it won't happen again. Be that as it may, I feel it necessary to point out that, in your request, you at no point specified that the dark-haired girl must be virginal. If that's something you require, I can easily oblige, but I must remind you that most of my stock comes from sexual backgrounds. Bearing this in mind, I'm afraid I must inform you that, given the relative scarcity of this trait, I will require additional funds.
If we can agree to these terms, I would be overjoyed to continue to do business with you. I'm an optimistic man, so with that in mind, here is my current stock. Any of these can be ready-to-move at a moment's notice.
1. Age 11, female, dark hair + eyes. This one is unspoiled. 3000 caps.
2. Age 23, female, dark hair + green eyes. Former prostitute. 1000 caps.
3. Age 13, female, red hair + blue eyes. Addicted to opiates, non-virgin. 1100 caps.
4. Age 29, male, dark hair + eyes. Junkie. 450 caps.
Let me know if any of these strike your fancy.
Sincerely Roy Sullivan
ESP.TRADUIT:
格林尼先生, 首先, 我就上一批货向您表达诚挚的歉意。我向您保证，这种事情再也不会发生了。尽管如此，我仍感有必要指出，在您的要求中，您并未特别指出那个黑发女孩必须是处女。如果那确是您明确要求的，我可以很容易地满足您的需求。但是我必须提醒您，我们的货物大多产自性工作场所。请记住这一点， 恐怕我必须告知您，考虑到这种特质的相对稀缺性，我会收取额外的费用。
如果我们能就上述事项达成共识，我将不胜愉快地继续与您交易。我是个乐观的人，考虑到这一点，在此为您呈上我现有的库存。其中任何货物一经通知，即刻起送。
1. 年龄11, 女性, 黑发黑眼。这一个没被糟蹋过。3000瓶盖。
2. 年龄23, 女性, 黑发绿眼。前性工作者。1000 瓶盖。
3. 年龄13, 女性, 红发蓝眼。鸦片成瘾，非处。1100 瓶盖。
4. 年龄29, 男性, 黑发黑眼。吸毒者。450 瓶盖。
若您看上其中任何一个，望请告知。
真诚的 - 罗伊·苏利文

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chore List
ESP.TRADUIT: 杂事清单

ESP.ORIGINAL:
OK, assholes. I'm writing this down because I don't want to repeat myself.
1. Do something about that pile of unarmed explosives near the door. Either set them up to explode any dumbass who comes in here, or sell them off. I don't care. Right now, the things are just a fucking tripping hazard.
2. Leave that safe alone! Look, I get that it seems enticing, 'cause it's a safe we can't open. But try using your heads for a few seconds, OK? Some shitty old safe in a pre-war sewer installation ain't going to have shit in it. If anything, it'll just have some paperwork, and maybe some pre-war cash. Worthless. Just leave the fucking thing alone.
3. STAY OUT OF SLOAN.
ESP.TRADUIT:
好吧，混蛋们。我把这个写下来是因为我不想总重复自己说过的话。
1.对门口那堆没激活的炸药做点什么。要么让他们炸了进来的蠢货，要么把他们卖了。我不在乎。现在，这些东西只能他妈的把人绊倒。
2. 别管那个保险箱！听着，我知道这看起来很诱人，因为这个保险箱我们打不开。但是试着用你的脑袋思考几秒钟，好吗？战前下水道里的破保险箱里不会有什么玩意的。如果有的话，那只是一些文件，也许还有一些战前的现金。一文不值。别管那该死的东西。
3. 离斯罗恩远一点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't Touch the Radio!
ESP.TRADUIT: 别碰收音机！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Leave the radio alone!
We've got this thing amped to the perfect volume, and we've had it blasting RNV for the past couple of days, non-stop. The slaves have barely been able to sleep at all, and they're going pretty fucking crazy. It's just about the funniest thing I've seen in a long time. Yesterday, that "It's a sin to tell a lie!" song got played 28 times. 28, in one fucking day! After the twentieth or so loop, that blonde dude started screaming his head off and throwing himself against the cell door. We had to bind and gag the douchebag just so he wouldn't kill himself right then and there.
You know that bitchy girl who was spitting at us and making all sorts of bullshit threats about getting free and killing us all? Well, it was her turn to see the boss-man this morning, and when he was done and told me to toss her back in her cell, I swear to god she started crying and begging with the "I swear, I'll do anything you want! Anything at all! Just please don't send me back down there!"
So, yeah, this thing is fucking hilarious, so none of you dipshits go messing with it, OK?
ESP.TRADUIT:
别碰收音机！
我们已经把它放大到了完美的音量，在过去的几天里，我们让它不停地放新维加斯电台。奴隶们几乎睡不着觉，他们简直要疯了。这是我这么长时间以来见过的最有趣的事了。昨天，“说谎是一种罪恶！”这首歌放了28次。28次，一天之内！在大约二十轮之后，那个金发的家伙开始大喊大叫，把自己撞到牢房门上。我们得把那个笨蛋绑起来塞住嘴，以免他当场自杀。
你知道那个朝我们吐唾沫的坏女孩吗？她用各种各样的废话威胁我们放了她，还要把我们都杀了？今天早上轮到她去见老板了，当他说完话让我把她扔回牢房时，我向上帝发誓，她开始哭着乞求：“我发誓，你想做什么我都愿意！什么都可以！只是请不要把我送回那里！”
所以，是的，这事真他妈的很搞笑，所以你们这些笨蛋都不许捣乱，好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Numbers
ESP.TRADUIT: 数字

ESP.ORIGINAL: [There are a series of seemingly random numbers penciled on this note. On the back of the paper, someone has doodled a stick-figure with improbably large genitalia.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [这张纸条上有一系列看似随机的数字。在纸的背面，有人用大的不可思议的生殖器留下了一个棍状印记。]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Updated Orders
ESP.TRADUIT: 升级指令

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Alright, after that shit last week, I think I got it figured out, now. Any jerkoff attack/fight/whatever that goes down here in Rockwell is happening 'cause they figure they can break the cargo in the holding pens out. New plan is this: Anyone who ain't one of us tries to get down into the pens, kill all the slaves right then and there. See if anyone tries a pussy little raid again when they know doing it will get their target's head splattered on a wall. Fuck 'em all.
-Ari
ESP.TRADUIT:
好吧，上个星期那件事之后，我想我现在明白了。在洛克威尔会发生被人突袭这种烂事，是因为有人觉得他们能闯进畜栏把货抢走。新计划是这样的：只要有任何一个不是我们的人试图进入畜栏，就立刻杀死所有的奴隶。当他们知道这样做会让他们的目标的脑浆溅在墙上的时候，看看还有没有人再尝试一次小突袭。操他们。
- 阿里

ESP.ORIGINAL: Folded Note
ESP.TRADUIT: 折叠的字条

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You little shit.
You had one job- ONE- and you fucked it up. Watch the fucking deal. Make sure nobody pulls any bullshit. The package is handed off, we get our money, and everyone is fucking happy. But, no, you had to be a fucking hero. Big badass over here, pulling his fucking piece on our client to show how fucking serious you are. What a display. YOU'RE SUCH A FUCKING SMART, COOL GUY, I HOPE MY FUCKING CHILDREN GROW UP TO BE JUST AS FUCKING BADASS AS YOU.
You're fucking dead.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你这个小逼崽子。
你有一个任务- 就一个- 然后你搞砸了。咱们理一理这点破事，别让人说我胡扯。把包裹交出去，把钱拿回来，大伙都高兴。但是，不，你必须他妈的是个英雄。他妈的在我们的客户身上耍花招来显示你他妈的有多重要，简直就是这里最牛逼的人。多精彩啊。你可真他妈是个又酷又聪明的人，我希望我他妈的孩子长大以后和你一样他妈的牛逼。
你他妈死定了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Parker's Ledger
ESP.TRADUIT: 帕克的账本

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Make sure:
Liver, good condition, male B- blood type. ASAP. D will pay extra for this. Maybe not feasible. Good livers in short supply around here.
Drain blood into bags. All types, don't care if it's sterile, always say that it is. Followers, NCR both need as much as possible. Will pay up front. Mercs ask less questions. Enjoy the hepatitis and syphilis.
Hire help? Bitch got away last night.
Need new bonesaw. Last skull too thick. No market for brains, no point wasting time & tools. Related: Hammer to skull and/or spine is cost effective + efficient.
F says make NCR gamblers, civs, hookers, etc priority over all others. Will alert Kings if locals are chosen. Too picky, pays extra for compliance.
Scratched hand. Need gloves now; not mixing blood with theirs. Filth.
NV medical clinic offering discount on implants. Something for steadier hands? Not taking steady. Won't end up dirty junkie on own table.
ESP.TRADUIT:
务必:
肝脏，状况良好，男性B型血。尽快。D将为此支付额外费用。可能不可行。好肝在这里供不应求。
把血倒进袋子里。所有的类型，不在乎它是否无菌，坚持说它无菌就行了。追随者，NCR都会有多少要多少。我会先付定金。商人问的问题更少。享受肝炎和梅毒去吧。
雇佣帮手？那个婊子昨晚逃走了。
我需要新骨锯。最后一个头骨太厚了。大脑没有市场，浪费时间和工具没有意义。相关：锤击颅骨和/或脊柱更有效益+效率。
F说NCR赌徒、公民、妓女优先。如果选当地人话可能惊动猫王帮。太挑剔了，需要额外付费。
手被抓伤。现在需要手套；不要混进他们的血。污秽。
新维加斯诊所提供打折植入。要植入点什么让手更稳吗？ 这样就不用吃稳定剂了。免得以后自己反倒成了个肮脏的瘾君子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Folded Contract
ESP.TRADUIT: 折叠的合同

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The target's name is Joachim Levy. Mid-30ish or so. Last I heard, he had a mustache and dirty-blonde hair.
Levy's a scumbag war profiteer. He must have some contact in the NCR military, 'cause he's always the first one to hear about field casualties. He swoops in, collects their weapons and gear, then sells 'em off to the highest bidder. The Gun Runners are sick of this prick getting any of their profits, and survivors are none too pleased with some jackass yanking their rifles away while they're bleeding in the dirt.
Apparently, Levy make semi-frequent stops at this little mining town called New Rockwell. Might catch him there.
Payout is an even 1000 caps, plus you get to keep anything he has in his pockets.
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标的名字是约阿西姆·利维。35岁左右。据我最近所了解的，他留着胡子和脏兮兮的金发。
利维是个卑鄙的战争奸商。他一定和NCR军方有联系，因为他总是第一个听说战地伤亡的人。他突袭进来，收集他们的武器和装备，然后卖给出价最高的人。军火贩子厌倦了这个混蛋从中获利，幸存者们对这个在他们倒在泥地里流血时拽走他们的步枪的混蛋也不太满意。
显然，利维相对频繁地出现在这个新洛克威尔。可能会在那里遇到他。
悬赏金额是1000瓶盖，再加上你可以留下他口袋里的任何东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know this guy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道这个家伙？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Gus, I know you're out of the info game, but if you could maybe hit up some of your contacts or whatever, I'd owe you.
I was reading some old reports, and I came across this (frankly kinda terrifying) report of some weird shit that went down in Oregon, near a little settlement called Boulder Lake. I guess it was somewhere between a tribe and an independent town. Apparently they got into some kinda dispute with the NCR over petty bullshit, and the Republic dispatched a Ranger to clear them out.
Here's where it gets weird. It's verified that this Ranger, David Keyes, arrived at Boulder Lake, but then went radio silent. Two weeks later, Ranger Keyes reports back in that his mission was a success. But there are no details about what actually happened, or how the mission was completed. Local rumor, though, has it that every night, one of the settlers would be killed. In the morning, the folks would come out of their homes and find one of their fellows gutted/scalped/blinded and hanging upside-down from a tree branch. They got so freaked out that eventually they all just cleared out.
Now, if Ranger Keyes was the one doing that, isn't that against the NCR's principles, and all that shit? You'd think he'd be court martialed, censured, and probably put in front of a firing squad.
Instead... He vanishes. His record just stops. If he died, why isn't it listed in his file? Something about this just gives me a really bad feeling. Please tell me what you dig up.
-T
You might be onto something, given how my contacts ran into a big "Classified" wall when they tried to dig into this. All I got is that Keyes was sent on a number of solo-ops, and every one of them is as blank as the one you found. He's definitely not dead, but it seems like he got transferred out of the Rangers circa 2078. I can't get more than that without setting off all sorts of warning bells.
Anyway, this is your only favor like this. I don't trade info anymore, and I only did this one 'cause you're you.
Gus
ESP.TRADUIT:
格斯，我知道你已经退出了情报游戏，但如果你能找到一些你的联系人或者别的什么，这回我欠你的。
我读了一些旧的报告，偶然发现了这个（坦白说有点可怕的）报告，在俄勒冈一个叫博尔德湖的小定居点附近发生了一些奇怪的事情。我猜它在一个部落和一个独立的城镇之间。很明显，他们和NCR就一些琐事发生了争执，共和国派出了一名游骑兵去把他们撵走。
这里就奇怪了。经核实，这个游骑兵，大卫·凯斯，到达了博尔德湖，但随后进入无线电沉默的状态。两周后，游骑兵凯斯报告说，他的任务完成了。但是没有关于实际发生了什么，或者任务是如何完成的细节。不过，当地有传言说，每晚都会有一名定居者被杀。早上，人们会从家里出来，发现其中一个同伴被掏了内脏/头皮/眼睛，倒挂在树枝上。他们被吓坏了，最后都逃走了。
如果说是游骑兵凯斯干的，那不是违反了NCR的原则吗？你会认为他可能会受到军事法庭的审判，会受到谴责，甚至会被交给行刑队。
但相反……他消失了。他的记录刚好结束。如果他死了，为什么没写在他的档案里？这件事让我感觉很不好。请告诉我你发现了什么。
- T
你可能发现了什么，因为当我的联系人试图挖掘这个时，他们撞上了一堵很大的“机密”墙。我只知道凯斯被派去执行了一系列单独行动，每一个都和你找到的一样空白。他肯定没死，但好像在2078年从游骑兵部队调走了。我也无法在不触发任何警报的前提下，得到更多信息了。
不管怎样，我只帮你这一次。我不再做信息生意了，我这次这么做只是为了你。
- 格斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Small Favor
ESP.TRADUIT: 帮个小忙

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hello, &PCName;.
I have a small favor to ask of you. I understand you're a newcomer to the charming little township of New Rockwell, and may not be familiar with things yet.
Across the street from the General Store is a metal building where local slavers ply their trade. I'd appreciate it if you could enter that establishment, meet with the man running their operation, and ask him for a job.
I can assure you that, whatever triviality you're called upon to perform, you won't be required to do anything that would actively benefit the slave trade, offensive as that industry is to most civilized peoples.
If you do this for me, there will be further rewards down the line. I'll be in touch.
S
ESP.TRADUIT:
你好, &PCName;.
我想请你帮个小忙。我知道你刚刚来到迷人的新洛克威尔小镇，并且可能对这里还不太熟悉。
杂货店对面的街道上有一座金属建筑，当地的奴隶贩子在那里做生意。如果你能进入那家机构，与他们的业务负责人会面，并向他申请一份工作，我将不胜感激。
我可以向你保证，不管你被要求做什么鸡毛蒜皮的事，你都不必真的去做任何有利于奴隶贸易的事情，因为那项产业对大多数文明人来说是一种冒犯。
如果为我做这件事，你将获得长远的回报。我会联系你的。
- S

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I deserve this. I deserve this. I deserve this. I deserve this.
I lost it all with the unification treaty. My family, my reason to be on this fucking earth. I thought I could find something new, but it's all gone. It's all fucking gone. That mine broke my body, and the NCR killed whatever was left.
Look at me. I had a chance. I don't know how the hell anyone could look at some ancient, broken relic like me and see anything worthwhile, but it happened. 2000 caps, so I could go to the strip. A chance to pick myself up and maybe see if anything could be salvaged. Well, stranger, you happy with your investment? I... I looked at the gate. Just once. And then I turned right the fuck around and threw it all away at the fucking Wrangler. Because it's easier to just pump myself full of shit to feel good, instead of reaching for that chance to save myself.
What if I failed again?
No more. No more fuck ups. Going to make the first right choice of my life since '71.
Ron Schafer Desert Rangers.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我活该，我活该，我活该，我活该。
统一协议让我失去了一切。失去了我的家庭，失去了我活在这操蛋的世界上的理由。我曾想过重新开始，但事实是一切都结束了。一切都他妈结束了。那颗地雷毁了我的身体，然后NCR毁了我残存的一切。
看看我。我有过一个机会。我不知道究竟为什么有人能从我这样的又老又破的残留物身上看出价值来，但事情就这样发生了。2000瓶盖，所以我可以进到赌城区。一个机会让我可以找回自己，看看或许还有什么是可以挽回的。好吧，陌生人，为你的投资感到高兴吗？我...我看着那大门。只看了一眼。然后我他妈向右转把自己扔进了他妈的原子牛仔。因为，抓住这个机会拯救自己，不如给身体注满毒气让自己好受来的简单。
如果我又失败了呢？
再也不要了。再也不要搞砸了。我要做出71年以来人生中第一个正确的选择。
- 罗恩·谢弗 沙漠游骑兵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Senator's Son Exposed in Sex Scandal
ESP.TRADUIT: 参议员之子惊爆性丑闻

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Senator's Son Exposed in Sex Scandal By Bruce Levine
No one could be blamed if they said they hadn't heard overmuch regarding the Burke family. While they have been wealthy and influential, dating even as far back as before the Great War, it was only when Henry Burke took his place in the senate that the family received any mainstream attention.
But now, thanks to the actions of Henry's son, the Burke surname is on the lips of every moral person in California.
Henry Burke, 55, is a widower, and has been for the past 15 years. His wife, Helena, succumbed to an illness that, according to Henry, they had resolved to keep private. They only had a single child before she passed away.
That child, Adam, is now an adult of 22, and is the sole suspect in a string of violent rapes that had been plaguing Shady Sands. And, if this weren't damning enough, there isn't a single victim over the age of nine.
Burke was first publicly accused by the Smith family, who claimed that Adam had their seven-year-old daughter, Nancy, escorted out of class and into an unknown location, whereupon he repeatedly raped her over the span of five hours. Nancy was returned home, two hours later than usual, with a bruised body, a scarred psyche, and an envelope containing a sum of money and an anonymous note, ordering silence on pain of death.
The Smiths did not accept these terms, and publicly accused Adam. Then, one by one, seven other families began to do the same, all sharing similar stories. Adam himself has vanished, with unconfirmed reports claiming that he fled NCR territory altogether by way of New Vegas.
When asked for comment, Henry Burke only said: "I assure you, I do not know the location of my son. I am committed to his safe return, where he can respond to these spurious rumors that have been fabricated about him."
It may be a paternal instinct that has prompted this response in Henry Burke, but given the sheer level of evidence against Adam, one cannot help but wonder if Henry, a personal friend of President Kimball, may be silently hoping that his only son simply vanishes from reach, and public memory.
ESP.TRADUIT:
参议员之子惊爆性丑闻 布鲁斯·莱文报道
没有人会因为没怎么听说过伯克家族而被人批评。尽管他们的富有和影响力可以追溯到大战之前，但直到亨利·伯克就任参议员，这个家族才获得主流关注。
但现在，由于亨利儿子的行为，伯克这个姓氏正在被加州每个有道德的人时时谈起。
55岁的亨利·伯克是个鳏夫，在过去的15年里一直是。他的妻子海伦娜因为某种，据亨利说他们决定保密的，疾病去世。她去世前他们只有一个孩子。
那个孩子亚当现在已经22岁了，他是一系列对沙荫造成恶劣影响的暴力强奸案的唯一嫌疑人。而且，如果这还不够糟糕的话，没有一个受害者超过九岁。
伯克首先被史密斯一家公开指控。他们声称亚当把他们七岁的女儿南希从课堂上带走到一个未知的地方，然后他在五个小时内多次强奸了她。南希回家的时间比平时晚了两个小时，身上有瘀伤，精神受创。她还带有一个信封，里面装着一笔钱和一张匿名纸条，上面写着对若想避免死亡之痛，就须保持沉默。
史密斯夫妇不接受这些条款，并且公开指责亚当。然后，其他七个家庭一个接一个地开始这样做，他们都有着相似的故事。亚当本人也消失了，未经证实的报道称，他取道新维加斯逃离了NCR领土。
当被问及对此事的评论时，亨利·伯克只说：“我向你保证，我不知道我儿子的在哪里。我保证他会安全返回，届时他可以对这些蓄意捏造的虚假谣言作出回应。”
也许是父亲的本能促使亨利·伯克做出了这样的反应，但考虑到针对亚当的确凿证据，人们不禁要问，作为金博尔总统的私人朋友，亨利是否在默默地希望他的独生子能够从执法范围和公众记忆中消失。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Massacre in Ford Cavern!
ESP.TRADUIT: 福特洞穴大屠杀！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Massacre in Ford Cavern! By Macy Haywood
It would seem that the Bitter Springs refugee camp has some sort of strange draw for bloody massacres. First, there was the Bitter Springs incident, where non-combatants were accidently caught in the crossfire of an NCR raid.
And now, a far more confusing massacre has occurred. The area surrounding the refugee camp is dotted with natural caverns, and one of them contained something straight out of nightmares. Ford Cavern, a sulfur cavern to the south of the camp was, apparently, the site of a brutal massacre with a bodycount in the dozens.
When a local scavenger descended into the depths, he had no idea what he was walking in on. Bodies were strewn all throughout the cave, all of them well-armed. The cavern itself appeared to have been artificially fortified with metal structures for purposes that are currently unclear.
The names of the dead filling the cavern are likely never to be known, and equally mysterious is the identity of whomever would lay claim to the dozens of murders. Whatever happened here, the people forced to seek refuge in Bitter Springs are unlikely to sleep soundly for quite some time yet.
ESP.TRADUIT:
福特洞穴大屠杀！ 玛西·海伍德 报道
似乎苦泉镇难民营和血腥屠杀之间存在某种奇怪的联系。先是在苦泉镇事件中，大量非军事人员在NCR的突袭中丧生。
现在，这里又发生了一起更加令人迷惑的屠杀。大量天然洞穴遍布难民营四周，而其中之一竟然充斥着真实的噩梦。福特洞穴，一座位于营地南方的硫磺洞，正是一起造成数十人死亡的残忍屠杀的发生地。
一名当地拾荒者步入这深渊时，他完全不知道自己将会目睹何等惨状。尸体遍布整座洞穴，每一具都全副武装。现场显示，有人用金属加固过洞穴，其目的尚不明确。
填满洞穴的死者们的名字可能永远不得而知了，同样神秘的是应当为这数十起谋杀负责的凶手的身份。不论这里究竟发生了什么，那些不得不到苦泉镇避难的难民们很长一段时间都难以安心入睡了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Accommodations
ESP.TRADUIT: 住处

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Expect to hear a lot of well-dressed gentlemen refering to you as "Robert Keane" from now on. As per our arrangements, there is a private suite reserved for yourself at the Ultra Luxe, paid for in full by our friends for as long as you'd like it, as a thank you for your invaluable work on behalf of our government.
We would like to extend a reminder that the terms of our deal are of the utmost confidentiality, and are not to be shared with anyone. We trust you understand.
Please, enjoy the accommodations, Mr. Keane. You've more than earned it.
ESP.TRADUIT:
从现在起，您将成为衣冠楚楚的绅士们口中的“罗伯特·基恩”先生。按照我们的约定，您已在超美多拥有一套私人套房。我们的朋友已经全额付款，您可以住到任何时候。这是感谢您对政府做出的杰出贡献。
我们再次提醒，与您约定的内容属于最高机密，不可让任何人知晓。我们相信您对此深有理解。
请享用您的套房吧，基恩先生。这是您应得的礼遇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Target
ESP.TRADUIT: 目标

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The target is Preacher Halford. That son of a bitch... his people came in the night, and snatched my husband... dragged him away, screaming. I hid in the closet, 'cause there were too many of them. But you're an expert, right? Kill that piece of shit, and all his lackeys. If Joe is still alive, bring him back to me. But I figure he ain't. I know I'm not rich, but I'm fully prepared to sell off my property and my land to pay for your services.
M
ESP.TRADUIT:
目标是传教士哈尔福德那个狗娘养的...他的人趁夜闯入，抢走了我丈夫...把他拖走了，他一直在惨叫。我藏在壁橱里，因为他们人太多了。但你是个专家，对吧？杀了那混蛋和他的走狗。如果乔还活着，把他带回来给我。但我想他不在了。我知道我并不富有，但我已经做好了充分的准备卖掉我的财产和土地来报偿你。
- M
