ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thug [08050696] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaapornoquest_greeting_0005069a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see that blonde whore, works the corners out there? Bitch wants me to pay; won't give a freebie to the boss's guy. You believe that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到那个金发碧眼的妓女了吗，在外面的角落里工作的那个？这婊子要我付钱；甚至不会给老板的人免费的东西。你相信吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thug [08050696] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaapornoquest_greeting_000a4119_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The fuck you want? Can't you see I'm busy, here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的想要什么？你没看到我很忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Benny Alberta [0804C9A9] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaapornoquest_greeting_000a411c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You better not touch that fucking robot, I'm warning you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好不要碰那个该死的机器人，我警告你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Benny Alberta [0804C9A9] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaapornoquest_greeting_000a4125_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Motherfucker! Do you have any idea how much that's gonna set me back?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 操你妈的！你知道那会给我带来多大的损失吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Benny Alberta [0804C9A9] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaapornoquest_greeting_000a4126_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got nothing else for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有别的东西给你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Benny Alberta [0804C9A9] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaapornoquest_greeting_000a413d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a little busy, but, uh, what can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有点忙，但是，呃，我可以为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbounty_greeting_000605ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was wondering when you'd get here. Probably would've been faster if Roy shut the fuck up, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还在想你什么时候会来呢。如果罗伊闭上嘴巴，可能会更快，是吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_greeting_0006de07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: OK. I've got a little job I need you to take care of. Call it... a trial run. See if I like how you operate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。我有个小工作需要你去处理。就叫它...试运行。看看我是否喜欢你的操作方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_greeting_0006de07_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you ready to get your hands dirty?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你准备好弄脏你的手了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_greeting_0006de07_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，有什么事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_greeting_0006de0e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, no time to speak right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，现在没有时间说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_greeting_0009dadf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，怎么了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_greeting_0009e115_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_greeting_0009e124_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You couldn't have come sooner? I've been tied up here for the last hour. Ugh, whatever. Drop trou and lets get this over with. Oh, hey, got any jet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就不能早点来吗？我已经被绑在这里一个小时了。唉，随便吧。扔下东西，让我们把这事解决了。哦，嘿，有杰特吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rocky [08020905] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaavincent_greeting_0009e12a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you want something, or what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要什么吗，还是怎样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should go and meet with Mr. Sawyer. We can talk later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该去和索耶先生见面。我们可以稍后再谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_greeting_00083033_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand you've been contracted. Congratulations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你已经签约了。恭喜你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_greeting_00083034_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing here is quite as important as whatever assignments Mr. Sawyer might give you, but it's work all the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的工作不会比索耶先生可能给你的任何任务更重要，但多少也算是工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_greeting_00083034_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a handful of private contracts here. People that need to die, basically.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这里有几份私人合同。基本上都是需要死的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_greeting_00083034_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can find their contracts on the notice board over there. If you have any further questions about them, feel free to ask.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以在那边的通知板上找到他们的合同。如果你有任何关于他们的进一步问题，请随时询问。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_greeting_00083034_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，有什么事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_greeting_0009d4e1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Oh, uh... Who're you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？哦，呃...你是谁？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maria [08084904] (mod) Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaharvesterquest_greeting_00085aff_1.ogg

I can't talk right now, sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在不方便说话，对不起。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something else you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还想要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maria [08084904] (mod) Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Incoherent nonsense.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [不连贯的胡言乱语。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shitman [0808BB14] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaarivasdr_greeting_00093919_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Motor-Runner is dead. I doubt anyone will miss the prick, but we needed him alive, all the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 轰鸣恶煞死了。我怀疑有人会怀念这个混蛋，但我们却需要他活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaarivasdr_greeting_00096902_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, we're preparing to get the hell out of here once the Legion moves on the dam, but in the mean time, we need all the caps we can get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我们正准备一旦军团在大坝上行动，就离开这个鬼地方，但同时，我们需要我们能得到的所有瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaarivasdr_greeting_00096902_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've already figured it out. I got three clients in mind, that, if they all doubled their orders, would recoup any loss from the Fiends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经想好了。我心里有三个客户，如果他们的订单都增加一倍，就能挽回恶魔帮造成的任何损失。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaarivasdr_greeting_00096902_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to make sure they do. And, no, you don't have a choice. It is your fault that Motor-Runner is dead, after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要确保他们这样做。而且，不，你没有选择。毕竟，摩托车手的死是你的错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaarivasdr_greeting_00096902_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't hold it against you. There are plenty of good reasons to waste that prick. But, all the same, you need to pay us back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不认为这是针对你。有很多很好的理由来废掉那个刺头。但是，不管怎么说，你需要赔偿我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaarivasdr_greeting_00096902_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaRivasDrugsQuest 10
'Sup, dude?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，伙计？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dakota [0805AB7A] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaarivasdr_greeting_000980ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，老兄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Durrl [0808C10F] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult04\aaarivasdr_greeting_00099ee3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You all done? Good, let me get those orders from you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们都完成了吗？很好，给我那些订单。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaarivasdr_greeting_0009d4db_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There, everything worked itself out. We get to leave the Mojave with cash in our pockets, and no one murders you for killing Motor-Runner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，一切都自己解决了。我们可以带着现金离开莫哈韦，而且没有人因为你杀了轰鸣恶煞而谋杀你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaarivasdr_greeting_0009d4db_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And they'd probably have killed me, too, since I endorsed your membership, and all that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们可能也会杀了我，因为我认可了你的成员资格，以及所有这些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaarivasdr_greeting_0009d4db_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaRivasDrugsQuest 50
I consider myself an excellent judge of character, friend. I have a skill for reading people, and making informed wagers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 朋友，我认为自己是一个优秀的性格判断者。我有一种看人的技巧，并且会下明智的赌注。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykriegquest_greeting_0009f319_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told Mr. Marino that you were going to be an asset. I told him that he shouldn't saddle you with busywork.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉马力诺先生，你将会是一笔财富。我告诉他，他不应该让你承担繁忙的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykriegquest_greeting_0009f319_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regardless, he's seen the error of his ways, and we're ready to move forward. And, it just so happens that I have the perfect job for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么说，他已经看到了自己的错误，我们已经准备好继续前进。而且，恰好我有一个完美的工作给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykriegquest_greeting_0009f319_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And there he is, our proud patriot. Or, at least, that's the image you seem to cultivate. What an honor to meet you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而他就在那里，我们骄傲的爱国者。或者，至少，这似乎是你建立的形象。很荣幸见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreenequest_greeting_000a6554_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And there she is, our proud patriot. Or, at least, that's the image you seem to cultivate. What an honor to meet you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而她就在那里，我们骄傲的爱国者。或者，至少，这似乎是你建立的形象。很荣幸见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreenequest_greeting_000a6555_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And in walks the Courier, the most important postal employee in America.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在走来的是信使，美国最重要的邮政工作人员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreenequest_greeting_000a6556_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreenequest_greeting_000a6557_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're bothering me. I trust there's a reason, or I'll have you collared and caged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在打扰我。我相信这是有原因的，否则我就把你戴上项圈扔进笼子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Greene [08013E19] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaagreenequest_greeting_000bee21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What in the hell is going on, here?! Who are these rangers, and what the hell are they doing in my fucking town?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里到底发生了什么？这些游骑兵是谁，他们在我他妈的镇上做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwellquest_greeting_000b2d3b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They won't say a damn thing to me, but apparently you're some kinda shot-caller in all this, so start talking, dammit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们不会对我说一个该死的字，但显然你在这一切中起关键作用，所以赶紧给我说清楚吧，该死的!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwellquest_greeting_000b2d3b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Howdy, stranger! I can't say I've ever seen your face around these parts before. Welcome to New Rockwell. Sheriff Jim Ferrar, pleasure to meet you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，陌生人! 我不能说我以前在这地方见过你的脸。欢迎来到新洛克威尔。我是吉姆·费拉尔警长，很高兴见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwellquest_greeting_000b3937_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, since it's your first time here, let me lay out the rules. Don't want no misunderstandings, do we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，既然你是第一次来这里，就让我把规则说清楚。我们不希望有任何误解，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwellquest_greeting_000b3937_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First off, this here town is a proud part of the NCR. Best keep it to yourself if you're opposed to that notion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，这个小镇是NCR的骄傲。如果你反对这个说法，最好不要说出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwellquest_greeting_000b3937_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Second, absolutely no vigilante executions. No exceptions!
ESP.TRADUIT: 第二，绝对不能进行私刑处决。没有例外!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwellquest_greeting_000b3937_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care if you head into the saloon and see Billy the Baby-Rapist, wanted for a million caps, sitting at the bar. You leave him be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使你走进酒馆，看到被通缉的婴儿强奸犯比利坐在酒吧里，他被悬赏了一百万瓶盖，你也不能对他动手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwellquest_greeting_000b3937_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got to draw iron on someone, you two can take it out of my town. We clear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要对某人拔枪，你们两个可以到我的镇子外面去解决。我们讲清楚了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwellquest_greeting_000b3937_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, what can I do you for?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我能为你做什么呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can I help you?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hellfire, I ain't never seen nothing like that before!
ESP.TRADUIT: 地狱之火，我以前从未见过这样的事情!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwellquest_greeting_000c300d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Still... I think the town'll be better off. Don't you worry yourself about the slaves they had locked up over there. I'll see that they get home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过...我想这个镇会好起来的。你不用担心他们关在那里的奴隶。我会看着他们回家的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwellquest_greeting_000c300d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Much obliged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 乐意效劳。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh god, dad! No! Someone, help!

NPC : Reggie Perkins [080ADDF6] (mod) Quest : ([080AF6EC]aaaRoyInformantQuest) You're of Their Kind EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, hello. I had heard the famed Courier was in town, but it seems words don't do you justice, darling. Marcus LeDoux, at your service.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，您好。我听说著名的 "邮差"在镇上，果然闻名不如见面，亲爱的。马库斯·勒杜, 为您服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxsquest_greeting_000df6bd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, you must be the fabled Courier 6. I'd heard you were in town, for some reason or another. Marcus LeDoux, at your service.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，您一定是传说中的6号邮差。我听说您因为某种原因来到了镇上。马库斯·勒杜, 为您服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxsquest_greeting_000df6be_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又见面了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Delivery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快递。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [080E3E7A] (mod) Quest : ([080E3E80]aaaNewElizaCourierDialogue) 080E3E80 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult08\aaaneweliz_greeting_000e3e81_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have nothing else to say to you. Just get it over with before I succumb to age.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有别的话要对你说。只要在我老到不行之前结束它就可以了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: It took you long enough to come after me, didn't it? I don't see the point... The NCR really too impatient to just wait for an old man to die?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你花了很长时间才找到我，不是吗？我看不出有什么意义...NCR真的太没耐心了，就这么等不及让一个快要老死的的老头子死？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have any last words, at least not for the likes of you. So just do your duty, and get it over with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有任何遗言，至少对你们这些人来说没有。所以，只要做好你的职责，就可以了结此事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadialogue_lostidle_00025608_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 战术？天啊，我没有被征召，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_followerstactic_0003b01e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lets hit it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们开始吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想了一下，还是留在我身边吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, whatever. Good talk, chief.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，不管怎样。说得好，长官。

ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，当然，我们开始行动，好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, nevermind. Stay with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，没事。留在我身边。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'm sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我确定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, your call. I'm gonna head for home. That's around Callville Bay, near the trailer park, in case you get lonely and want to hit me up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你的决定。我准备回家了。在卡维尔湾，在拖车公园附近，如果你感到孤独，想找我的话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaHoboDen
This place... Might as well be the dregs of the Mojave. They call it "the Den." Guess it rolls off the tongue better than "the shithole."
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里...就像莫哈维的残渣。他们把这叫做“窝点”。我想叫成“粪坑“可能更顺口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Schafer [08007BE7] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold02\aaamiscdialogue_aaahoboden_0000c66d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're a whore, so used-up that the Fiends wouldn't want you, or you're so jet-addled the Followers would call you a lost cause, welcome home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你是个妓女，那么恶魔帮对你这种多手货不感兴趣，而如果你杰特抽得头脑不清，追随者们会说你无可救药，欢迎回家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Schafer [08007BE7] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold02\aaamiscdialogue_aaahoboden_0000c66d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're looking for a taste of the good life in Freeside, go for the Wrangler. Ain't no out-of-towner come here for this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想要在自由之地体验美妙生活，就去原子牛仔。没有外地人会来这个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Schafer [08007BE7] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold02\aaamiscdialogue_aaahoboden_0000c66d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么地方？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaHoboFreeside
Lot of bullshit that fucks over the little guy, no matter which way it goes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管发生什么，都是些操蛋的屁事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Schafer [08007BE7] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold02\aaamiscdia_aaahobofreeside_0000c66f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got kids shoving each other into the dirt to be the first to get a bite of a diseased street rat...
ESP.TRADUIT: 臭小子们相互推搡争着想第一个咬到街上的病老鼠......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Schafer [08007BE7] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold02\aaamiscdia_aaahobofreeside_0000c66f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kings and NCR stuck in an endless fucking pissing contest, and guess what? People like me just get soaked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 猫王帮和NCR还在他妈没完没了的竞争，你猜怎么样？像我这样的人不过都是被卷了进去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Schafer [08007BE7] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold02\aaamiscdia_aaahobofreeside_0000c66f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Strung-out junkie cocksuckers spring out from every shadow around so they can bash your skull, steal your caps, and fuck your ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吸毒成瘾的瘾君子们遍布每一个阴暗角落，他们会敲开你的头颅，偷走你的钱，然后操烂你的屁眼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Schafer [08007BE7] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold02\aaamiscdia_aaahobofreeside_0000c66f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hate this fucking place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我憎恨这个他妈的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Schafer [08007BE7] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold02\aaamiscdia_aaahobofreeside_0000c66f_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything going on in Freeside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 自由之城发生了什么事情没？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaHoboBackground
I'm a fucking veteran. Desert Rangers. Ever heard of them? No? Doesn't matter, NCR broke us down and sucked us up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是个他妈的退伍军人。沙漠游骑兵。听说过吗？没有？没关系，NCR让我们崩溃，然后把我们吸干。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Schafer [08007BE7] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold02\aaamiscdia_aaahobobackgrou_0000c671_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honestly, I'd've just took one in my pride and served in the NCR Rangers. But I'm crippled. Body is half-broken from a Legion frag mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 诚实地说，我本该很自豪地在NCR游骑兵服役。但是我残废了。身体的一半被军团的一颗地雷炸掉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Schafer [08007BE7] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold02\aaamiscdia_aaahobobackgrou_0000c671_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Rangers- the real Rangers- would have helped me. But they're not around anymore, are they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵- 真正的游骑兵- 本该可以帮助我的。但是他们不在了，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Schafer [08007BE7] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold02\aaamiscdia_aaahobobackgrou_0000c671_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说说你的故事好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaHoboInsult

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Schafer [08007BE7] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll give you the bottom of my boot, you disgusting hobo waste-of-space.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你一脚底板，你这个恶心的流浪汉废物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaHoboJesus
What? Are you just fucking with me, or...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你是在耍我，还是...？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Schafer [08007BE7] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold02\aaamiscdia_aaahobojesus_0000c675_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh my god. Thank you, stranger. I-I don't even know what to say. You just saved my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦天啊。谢谢你，陌生人。我-我不知道该说什么。你拯救了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Schafer [08007BE7] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold02\aaamiscdia_aaahobojesus_0000c675_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I'm getting out of here. If you ever need anything, anything from me, it's done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我离开这里。如果你有任何需要，需要我帮忙的话，一定赴汤蹈火。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Schafer [08007BE7] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold02\aaamiscdia_aaahobojesus_0000c675_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardkarma 500 player.removeitem caps001 2000
aaaHoboREF.disable showmessage aaaHoboMessage aaaDeadHoboREF.enable aaaElizaREF.Sayto Player aaaElizaHoboResponse
Here's 2000 caps. That should get you onto the Strip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是2000瓶盖。这能让你进入赌城。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaHoboGoodbye

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Schafer [08007BE7] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMutantBackground
The fuck do you care? I'm security, so unless I'm breaking your dumb body in half, we don't have business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关你屁事？我是保安，除非要我把你砍成两半，否则你我没有任何瓜葛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrice [0800F35A] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\creaturelowintsm\aaamiscdia_aaamutantbackgr_0000f9ae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, go bother Mr. Sullivan, before you and I have business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，去找苏利文先生，在你我之间出事之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrice [0800F35A] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\creaturelowintsm\aaamiscdia_aaamutantbackgr_0000f9ae_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMutantWalk
Are you serious? I walked, asshole! Lift one foot, put it in front of the other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈认真的吗？我走过来的，傻逼！一脚一脚地走过来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrice [0800F35A] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\creaturelowintsm\aaamiscdia_aaamutantwalk_0000f9b0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you end up in Freeside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么来到自由之城的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMutantElaborate
Holy dogshit. I left because most mutant communities are filled up with fucking retards who try to kill me with inane bullshit questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去他妈的。我离开是因为大多数充满白痴的变种人社区想要用毫无意义的狗屁问题烦死我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrice [0800F35A] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\creaturelowintsm\aaamiscdia_aaamutantelabor_0000f9b2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sound familiar, you annoying son of a bitch?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是不是听起来很耳熟，你这个烦人的杂种？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrice [0800F35A] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\creaturelowintsm\aaamiscdia_aaamutantelabor_0000f9b2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But why did you come here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你为什么要来这里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMutantSullivan
He's my fucking employer. He pays me to literally do nothing but stand here, in this spot, and make sure everyone plays nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是我他妈的老板。他给我钱要我站在这里，在这个地点上，确保每个人都玩得愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrice [0800F35A] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\creaturelowintsm\aaamiscdia_aaamutantsulliv_0000f9b4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what? Mr. Sullivan loves talking. I have an idea: you go talk to him, and leave me alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道吗？苏利文先生喜欢谈话。我有个主意：你去找他聊，别来烦我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrice [0800F35A] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\creaturelowintsm\aaamiscdia_aaamutantsulliv_0000f9b4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about Mr. Sullivan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我苏利文先生的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMutantTalk
You're a tremendous cunt. Has anyone ever told you that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是个了不起的人渣。有人告诉过你吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrice [0800F35A] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\creaturelowintsm\aaamiscdia_aaamutanttalk_0000f9b6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I want to talk with you some more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我还想跟你再多聊聊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMutantPolitics
I'm imagining the sound your spine would make if I took hold of your head and just slowly twisted it all the way around...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在想象在我抓住你的头然后慢慢把它扭一圈的时候，你的脊柱会发出什么样的响声...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrice [0800F35A] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\creaturelowintsm\aaamiscdia_aaamutantpoliti_0000f9b8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd be interested in hearing your take on the regional politics. Please, enlighten me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有兴趣听你讲讲地区的政治话题。拜托，指点一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMutantGoodbye
Finally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总算走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Patrice [0800F35A] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\creaturelowintsm\aaamiscdia_aaamutantgoodby_0000f9ba_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJetWhoreYes
Yeah, yeah, this'll be worth it, promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，是的，绝对值得，我保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Suzie [0801009F] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaajetwhoreyes_000100a4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.RemoveItem caps001 100 applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX Player.CIOS WellRestedSpell
Got your caps right here, babe. Let's party.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有瓶盖，宝贝。我们嗨一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJetWhoreJet
You ain't gonna regret this, no way. This shit gets me in a partying mood, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你绝对不会后悔的。这东西能给我制造派对的气氛，知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Suzie [0801009F] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaajetwhorejet_000100a7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.RemoveItem jet 1 applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX Player.CIOS WellRestedSpell
Jet? You got it, sweetheart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰特？没问题，甜心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaJetWhoreGoodbye
Come back soon, OK? Please?
ESP.TRADUIT: 快点回来，好吗？拜托？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Suzie [0801009F] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaajetwhoregood_000100a9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCheffMenu
No refunds!
ESP.TRADUIT: 本店据不退货！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cheffy [080106EA] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult06\aaamiscdia_aaacheffmenu_00011929_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
Can I see what's on the menu?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能看下菜单上有什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCheffHygeine
Bitch, I cook my shit. It's clean as fuck. I'll bash your fucking skull open and think nothing of it, motherfucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 婊子，东西都是我自己做的。它们他妈的很干净。你有脑子吗，操你妈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cheffy [080106EA] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult06\aaamiscdia_aaacheffhygeine_0001192b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't smell... sanitary. Is it safe to eat here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不太...卫生。在这里吃东西安全吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaHoboSlayer
Didn't like the fucking look he was giving me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈不喜欢他的样子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Outlaw [08011922] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaamiscdia_aaahoboslayerdu_00012535_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, why'd you kill that old guy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦，你为什么要杀那个老家伙？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDeputyBackground
Nothing special. I'm from California. I joined the military with hopes of being a Ranger. I washed out, then I deserted, then I ended up in a cell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么特别的。我从加利福利亚来。我想成为一名游骑兵而加入了军队。我感到疲倦所以逃跑了，然后我就被关进牢房了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam Roarke [08016443] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaamiscdia_aaadeputybackgr_0001a7ef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't spend too much time in there. They were probably gonna hang me, but Jim stepped in. Got my record expunged... somehow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那里没待多久。他们可能要绞死我，但是吉姆介入了。把我的记录给...抹去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam Roarke [08016443] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaamiscdia_aaadeputybackgr_0001a7ef_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At first, I kinda figured he just did it looking for a "reward" from the pretty inmate, but turns out he was looking for trained gunmen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 起初，我以为他这么做只是想在漂亮的囚犯里面找点“奖励”，但事实上他只是在寻找训练有素的枪手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam Roarke [08016443] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaamiscdia_aaadeputybackgr_0001a7ef_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever. Deputy Roarke suits me just fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便吧。罗克副警长很适合我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam Roarke [08016443] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaamiscdia_aaadeputybackgr_0001a7ef_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说说你的故事好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDeputyVagrant
The bum sitting in the drunk tank? Was losing at cards the other night. He called a guy for cheating, then stabbed him in the throat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拘留所里面坐着的那个无业游民？前几天晚上在牌桌上输了钱。他认为一个家伙出老千，然后割了他的喉咙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam Roarke [08016443] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaamiscdia_aaadeputyvagran_0001a7f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I imagine Jim'll take him out back and plug him in the back of the head pretty soon, and then spend the rest of the day bitching about wasting ammo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能想象吉姆把他拖出去然后迅速地打了他的后脑勺，接着整天骂骂咧咧地说什么浪费子弹之类的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam Roarke [08016443] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaamiscdia_aaadeputyvagran_0001a7f1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell, you could blow him away right now if you want. "Random act of violence" is just a little less paperwork for me to fill out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操，如果你想的话现在就可以一枪毙了他。“突发性暴力”对我来说不过就是一件文字处理工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam Roarke [08016443] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaamiscdia_aaadeputyvagran_0001a7f1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't actually shoot him, please. They would probably make me hose down the cell and strip the carpeting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但别真的杀了他，拜托。他们可能会要我来冲洗牢房和剥光地毯的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam Roarke [08016443] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaamiscdia_aaadeputyvagran_0001a7f1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's that guy in the cell?
ESP.TRADUIT: 牢房里的那家伙是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDeputyRockwell
Nothing that Martinez or Jim couldn't tell you. Honestly, I couldn't tell you much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马丁内斯或者吉姆能告诉你全部的事。诚实地讲，我没法告诉你更多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam Roarke [08016443] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaamiscdia_aaadeputyrockwe_0001a7f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if I was a people person, and I'm not, I don't got any interest in living it up with the filth out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使我不是个普通人，我也没兴趣跟外面那些垃圾一起放声欢笑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam Roarke [08016443] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaamiscdia_aaadeputyrockwe_0001a7f3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a hard enough time not wasting those scumbags as is. Every time some unwashed outlaw cocksucker comes onto me, my trigger finger gets itchier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直在强忍着别废了那些卑鄙的家伙。每次碰上那些肮脏的逃犯，我都手痒得想要扣动扳机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam Roarke [08016443] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaamiscdia_aaadeputyrockwe_0001a7f3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about New Rockwell?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我些关于新洛克威尔的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDeputyLaw
Yeah... I'll be straight up with you. I'm better at frontier justice than actual law-bringing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的...我直接跟你说。我更善长正义制裁而不是真正的带来法律。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam Roarke [08016443] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaamiscdia_aaadeputylaw_0001a7f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When Jim hired me on, I kinda figured that was what he had in mind. Turns out he's just a corrupt hick lining his pockets instead of doing his job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当吉姆招募我时，我以为那就是他脑袋里所想的。事实证明他只不过是个腐败的乡巴佬，他不做自己的工作，却在往口袋里捞钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam Roarke [08016443] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaamiscdia_aaadeputylaw_0001a7f5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We got a guy who pimps out junkies across the way, a slave-trader a couple yards away from the whorehouse, and a back-alley dentist for medical.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们这里在街对面有个家伙在给瘾君子们拉皮条，离妓院几码外有个奴隶贩子，还有一个非法营业的牙科医生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam Roarke [08016443] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaamiscdia_aaadeputylaw_0001a7f5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd just as soon paste the whole lot of 'em, but... whatever. Sometimes you get a crazy in the saloon that I can shoot, so that's always fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我宁愿把他们全部都指控了，但是...随便吧。有时候会在沙龙里开枪射几个疯子，那总是很有趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam Roarke [08016443] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaamiscdia_aaadeputylaw_0001a7f5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seems like you guys kind of play fast and loose with the law, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看上去你们这些人在玩弄法律，哈？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDeputyTakeover
What, like murder him? I wouldn't shed any tears, but that ain't how it works here. Maybe around Vegas, sure, but not here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，杀了他吗？我不会掉一滴眼泪，但这里事情不是这样做的。也许维加斯是这样，但这里不是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam Roarke [08016443] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaamiscdia_aaadeputytakeov_0001a7f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is still technically NCR territory, which means that they would appoint the new sheriff. No promotion for me, that's for damn sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里还是NCR的地盘，意味着他们会指派新的警长。我不会得到提拔的，那他妈是肯定的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam Roarke [08016443] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaamiscdia_aaadeputytakeov_0001a7f7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing to be done for it but to sit here on my ass, babysitting drunks and chem fiends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我什么都不能做，只能坐在这里照看那些酒鬼和瘾君子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sam Roarke [08016443] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaamiscdia_aaadeputytakeov_0001a7f7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like it might be better for everyone if Jim were out of the picture.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来要是吉姆不在其中的话对每个人都更好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDeputyKhans
aaaPaperBoyTapes
[The child gesticulates at the array of holotapes he is hawking. You surmise you're allowed to freely read them.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [小孩的手势指向他卖的那一堆全息卡带。你猜你可以自由地阅读它们。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Newsboy [0801ADF3] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这干嘛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaPaperBoyTalk
[The child frowns and shakes his head. Then, he opens his mouth and shows you the poorly-healed stump of a tongue he has.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [孩子皱着眉头摇摇头。然后，他张开嘴巴给你看他愈合不良的舌根。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Newsboy [0801ADF3] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you not speak?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能说话吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaPaperBoyBye
[The child shrugs apathetically.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [小孩漠然地耸耸肩。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Newsboy [0801ADF3] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGenStorePurchase
Okey-doke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rodney [08014B86] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamiscdia_aaagenstorepurc_0001cbf3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
Let me see what you have in stock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看你有什么存货。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGenStoreBackground
Uhm. Nothing too interesting. Been in town pretty much forever. I don't look for trouble. I just want to stay in here and tinker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。没什么太有趣的。一直都住在镇上。我不找麻烦。我只想待在这里，修修东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rodney [08014B86] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamiscdia_aaagenstoreback_0001cbf5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your background?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么背景？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGenStoreRockwell
Uh... It's a fine place. Fine place. I like the NCR, and, uh... yeah, fine place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...这是个好地方。不错的地方。我喜欢NCR，还有，呃...是的，好地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rodney [08014B86] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamiscdia_aaagenstorerock_0001cbf7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about New Rockwell?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我些关于新洛克威尔的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGenStoreSpeech
[FAILED] That's... that's OK, really. Feel free to browse, alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 没...没关系，真的。请随意浏览，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rodney [08014B86] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamiscdia_aaagenstorespee_0001cbf9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please tell me more?
ESP.TRADUIT: 能再告诉我更多吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I... Alright, stranger. OK. I remember how this place was, before these criminals came.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 我...好吧，陌生人。好。我还记得这里以前是什么样子的，就在那些逃犯到来之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rodney [08014B86] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamiscdia_aaagenstorespee_0001cbfa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a small, quiet place. NCR folks lived here. Most of them worked the mines, but those didn't last forever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是个又小又清净的地方。NCR的人住在这里。大多数人在矿里工作，但那没有一直持续下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rodney [08014B86] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamiscdia_aaagenstorespee_0001cbfa_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The mines started drying up, and folk started leaving. Place was mostly a ghost town. Things changed all at once, though. One night, just like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 矿场采光了，人们开始离开。这里基本成了鬼镇。然而一切都变了。一夜之间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rodney [08014B86] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamiscdia_aaagenstorespee_0001cbfa_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The old sheriff, Mr. Casey, his home... Just burst into flames. Strange men, never seen them before, were hanging around outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老警长，凯西先生，他的家...突然起火了。一些奇怪的人，以前从没见过的，在外面游荡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rodney [08014B86] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamiscdia_aaagenstorespee_0001cbfa_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The men were all laughing. Sounded like they took turns beating and torturing the sheriff and his family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们全都笑着。听起来他们在轮流殴打和折磨警长与他的家人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rodney [08014B86] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamiscdia_aaagenstorespee_0001cbfa_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess they... abused the womenfolk until they got bored. Both of them; sheriff's wife and his little girl. Then, they cut their throats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜他们...无聊之后又侵犯了女人们。所有的女人；警长的妻子和女儿。然后，他们割开了警长和家人们的喉咙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rodney [08014B86] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamiscdia_aaagenstorespee_0001cbfa_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The town was lawless then. The strangers who did the killing, they vanished one morning. But other outlaws came. Used Rockwell as a sanctuary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从那之后镇上就没了法律。那些杀人的陌生人在一个早上消失了。但是其他的逃犯来了。把洛克威尔当做了一个庇护所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rodney [08014B86] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamiscdia_aaagenstorespee_0001cbfa_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me and Bert, Mr. Martinez, and Mr. Victor were the only citizens who didn't run when the outlaws came. Mr. Ferrar came a few weeks later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和伯特，马丁内斯先生，还有维克多先生是仅剩的在逃犯们到来而没有跑掉的人了。费拉尔先生是几周后才来到这里的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rodney [08014B86] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamiscdia_aaagenstorespee_0001cbfa_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He had the papers. He was sheriff now. But... the outlaws are still here. Mr. Ferrar isn't doing anything. Now those energy-gun men are here...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他有文件。他现在是警长了。但是...那些逃犯还是在这里。费拉尔先生什么都没做。现在那些拿着能量武器的家伙也来了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rodney [08014B86] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamiscdia_aaagenstorespee_0001cbfa_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They murdered Mr. Victor four days ago. Things just get worse and worse...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们四天前谋杀了维克多先生。情况变得越来越糟了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rodney [08014B86] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamiscdia_aaagenstorespee_0001cbfa_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardxp 5
You can trust me. Nothing you say will leave this room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以相信我。你说的话不会传出这个房间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGenStoreNevermind
OK.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Rodney [08014B86] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\malegenericghoul\aaamiscdia_aaagenstoreneve_0001cbfc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDougPurchase
Acknowledged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carbine [080195F3] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\robotprotectron\aaamiscdia_aaadougpurchase_0001cc00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
Let's see what you have for sale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看你都卖些什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDougBackground
This establishment was the property of one Lars Victor. Records indicate that Lars Victor was the victim of violence, and is now deceased.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这家店是拉尔斯·维克多的财产。记录显示拉尔斯·维克多是一起暴力行为的受害者，并且已经身亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carbine [080195F3] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\robotprotectron\aaamiscdia_aaadougbackgrou_0001cc02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Control of this business was transferred to this unit once every other eligible nominee declined the opportunity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 此生意的管理权已经移交给当前单位，而其他符合条件的候选人拒绝了这个机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carbine [080195F3] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\robotprotectron\aaamiscdia_aaadougbackgrou_0001cc02_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you come to run the gun store?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么经营枪店的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDougBye
Acknowledged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Carbine [080195F3] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\robotprotectron\aaamiscdialogue_aaadougbye_0001cc04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Adios, robot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见，机器人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaForrestBackground
Well, since you asked, I happen to be the fastest pistol on this side of the Colorado, motherfucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你这么问了，我正好是科罗拉多这一带最快的枪手，混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Travis Forrester [08014BA9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult05\aaamiscdia_aaaforrestbackg_0001f0d7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And before you tell me to stop telling bullshit stories, let me stop you right there. I wasn't born a gunslinging badass. I'm trained.
ESP.TRADUIT: 免得你认为我在胡扯，我先跟你说。我并不是天生就这么厉害。我是训练出来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Travis Forrester [08014BA9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult05\aaamiscdia_aaaforrestbackg_0001f0d7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And not in some bitch-ass army outfit. No-no, I was trained by my uncle, Martin fucking Forrester himself. Oh yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且我不是在什么他妈的军队里训练的。不，是我的叔叔训练的我，是他妈的马丁·弗雷斯特。噢耶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Travis Forrester [08014BA9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult05\aaamiscdia_aaaforrestbackg_0001f0d7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说说你的故事好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaForrestHaveHeard
That's right. Not only is that in my blood, but I remember everything he taught me. And you keep that in mind, in case you get careless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错。不仅仅有血缘关系，而且我还记得他教过我的每一件事。你最好记牢了，以免万一你粗心大意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Travis Forrester [08014BA9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult05\aaamiscdia_aaaforresthaveh_0001f0d9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Martin Forrester? As in the raider boss?
ESP.TRADUIT: 马丁·弗雷斯特？掠夺者头目？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaForrestNotHeard
Well, I guess maybe you lived under a fucking rock, then. What are you, some kinda pansy-ass Vaulter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你住在石头堆下面吧。你是什么东西，是那些避难所的娘娘腔吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Travis Forrester [08014BA9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians Comment (NAM2) : kim-BALL EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult05\aaamiscdia_aaaforrestnothe_0001f0db_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uncle Marty was the baddest outlaw to ever make a stand against the NCR. He took any goddamn thing he wanted, and wasted anyone who got in the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马丁叔叔曾经是反对NCR的最厉害的罪犯。他想要什么就他妈拿什么，然后灭掉任何挡他道的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Travis Forrester [08014BA9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians Comment (NAM2) : kim-BALL EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult05\aaamiscdia_aaaforrestnothe_0001f0db_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear ol' Kimball still pisses himself when he hears my family name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说金博尔听到我家族的名字仍然会被吓得尿裤子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Travis Forrester [08014BA9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians Comment (NAM2) : kim-BALL EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult05\aaamiscdia_aaaforrestnothe_0001f0db_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaForrestNCR
Hey, I don't do shit for the Republic, motherfucker. I'm a certified deputy, but I ain't doing anything for those cocksuckers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我他妈什么事也没帮NCR做，混蛋。我是被认证的副警长，但是我不为那些杂种做事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Travis Forrester [08014BA9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult05\aaamiscdia_aaaforrestncr_0001f0dd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can ask Jim. This town might have that fucking bear flag, but we make our own laws here. Hell, half these guys here got outstanding warrants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以去问吉姆。这个镇是有那个他妈的熊旗帜，但是我们这里有自己的法律。操，这里一半的人身上都背着通缉令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Travis Forrester [08014BA9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult05\aaamiscdia_aaaforrestncr_0001f0dd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't give a fuck. As long as they respect my badge, they can keep breathing. And if not, I can teach them to respect this .45-70 here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈才不管。只要他们尊重我的警徽，他们就能活。如若不然，我会教他们如何尊重我手里这把.45-70。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Travis Forrester [08014BA9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult05\aaamiscdia_aaaforrestncr_0001f0dd_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're so proud of your outlaw uncle, how'd you wind up in the NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你如此佩服你的逃犯叔叔，那你怎么又沦落到NCR来了呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaForrestRockwell
New Rockwell. Heh, you know what happened to Old Rockwell?
ESP.TRADUIT: 新洛克威尔。哈，你知道老洛克威尔发生什么了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Travis Forrester [08014BA9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult05\aaamiscdia_aaaforrestrockw_0001f0df_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some pussified little NCR mining-shithole, full of flag-waving retards who like living under the thumb of douchebags in California.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些娘娘腔的NCR矿工，全是沙文主义的白痴，他们喜欢被加利福利亚那些人渣玩弄于股掌之间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Travis Forrester [08014BA9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult05\aaamiscdia_aaaforrestrockw_0001f0df_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, their mine dried up, the NCR told 'em to fuck off and find work somewhere else. Only a few people stayed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的矿挖干了，NCR叫他们滚蛋然后去别处找工作。只有很少的人留了下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Travis Forrester [08014BA9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult05\aaamiscdia_aaaforrestrockw_0001f0df_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That creepy zombie running the general store, he's an old-timer. So was Victor, before he was a glowing puddle. Martinez, too, but he's alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个古怪的僵尸经营着杂货店，他是这里的老居民。维克多也是，在他变成发光的水坑之前。还有马丁内斯，但他很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Travis Forrester [08014BA9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult05\aaamiscdia_aaaforrestrockw_0001f0df_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Old Rockwell died with their old sheriff. Got himself killed by badass outlaws. Serves him right, you ask me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老洛克威尔随着他们的老警长一起死了。他被一帮厉害的逃犯杀了。要我说的话，他是罪有应得。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Travis Forrester [08014BA9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult05\aaamiscdia_aaaforrestrockw_0001f0df_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jim got assigned the new position, and he was smart enough to bring me on as a deputy. New Rockwell, motherfucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 吉姆被任命到这个新的位置上，他很明智地让我来当副警长。新洛克威尔，操他妈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Travis Forrester [08014BA9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult05\aaamiscdia_aaaforrestrockw_0001f0df_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about New Rockwell?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我些关于新洛克威尔的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyQuest1Start
I have a number of tasks that require the aid of a skilled operator. I do hope you'll be up for the task. I suspect you already are, yes?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一些任务需要有技能的人。我希望你对这些任务做好准备。我猜你已经好了，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquest1sta_0001fce8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll start you off with a rather simple venture- ideally so that we might gauge how well we may work together in the future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我先给你来个简单的冒险——理想情况下我们也许可以评估我们将来合作得会有多好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquest1sta_0001fce8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you, by any chance, much of a poker player?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你，会不会刚好，是个扑克牌的好手？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquest1sta_0001fce8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can I help you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎么帮你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyOffice
Why, thank you! I oversaw the renovations myself. I would've preferred a penthouse location, but this does the job quite nicely, I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢！我亲自监督装修。我本来想要个顶楼位置，但是我想在这里工作也不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyoffice_0001fd0b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure you noticed the power armor. The jewel of my collection, that piece. I purchased it from an associate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信你注意到了那个动力装甲。那是我收藏品里的明珠。我从一个同事那里买到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyoffice_0001fd0b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently he bought it from some high-end, invite-only merchant, hidden up North-West a ways. All very clandestine and exciting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然他是从某个躲藏在西北边的高端的，仅供会员的商人那里买来的。一切都非常秘密和令人兴奋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyoffice_0001fd0b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, the flowers are interesting. I had them imported from one of the local vaults... Excuse me, I'm sure you aren't interested in my rambling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些花也很有趣。我把它们从本地的一个避难所里弄出来...不好意思，我想你对我的啰嗦不感兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyoffice_0001fd0b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was there anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyoffice_0001fd0b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice office.
ESP.TRADUIT: 办公室不错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaPaperBoyCigs
[The child flips you off. You conclude that he is a little prick, and resolve to put your foot up his ass at a later date.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [小孩手指对你弹了弹。你得出结论他是个小杂种，下定决心以后要用你的脚踹他的屁股。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Newsboy [0801ADF3] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: You shouldn't smoke, kid. You're too young for that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不该抽烟，孩子。你还太年轻。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaPaperBoyParents
[He mimics a shotgun firing. Perhaps his parents were fired out of a cannon. Alternatively, they could just be dead.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他模仿霰弹枪射击。也许他的父母是被大炮射出来的。要不然，就是表示他们已经死了。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Newsboy [0801ADF3] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey kid, where are your parents?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，小孩，你的父母在哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLegion
You're asking me my opinion on the army of raping, slaving, torturing lunatics camped across the river?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你问我对河对面那个热衷于强奸，奴役，折磨的疯子军队有什么看法？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizalegion_000226f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turns out, I'm not a fan of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然，我可不是他们的粉丝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizalegion_000226f8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The legion are scum. I don't even consider their soldiers to be people. Sometimes I feel bad about shooting Fiends or whatever, but Legionaries?
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团都是人渣。我甚至不能把那些士兵当人看。有时我会对打死恶魔帮或者别的人感到不适，但是对于军团士兵呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizalegion_000226f8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're fucked. Either they honestly buy into Caesar's bullshit- and they need to die. Or they've been so whipped they just do whatever they're told.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们完蛋了。要么是因为他们狂热地相信凯撒说的那些鬼话——那他们必须得死。要么是因为他们被鞭子驱赶着做任何事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizalegion_000226f8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, they need to die, too. Fuck 'em. Fuck 'em from the lowest recruit all the way up to Caesar himself. Fucking prick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那样他们也必须得死。操他妈的。从最低级的新兵直到凯撒，都该被操。操这些鸟逼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizalegion_000226f8_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are your thoughts on the Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对军团有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaBoS
Nah, I don't like 'em. They've been keeping themselves locked up with that Codex for way too long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不喜欢他们。他们一直用法典将自己束缚了太长时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizabos_000226fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A bunch of self-indoctrinated tech-worshippers who believe that they're a higher class of human than everyone else. That's the last thing we need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过是一帮自我洗脑，只崇拜技术，认为自己高人一等的人。这是我们最不需要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizabos_000226fb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't even want to imagine what kind of bullshit they would get up to if there was no one to keep them in check.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我甚至不屑于去想象如果没有人约束他们的时候，他们会干出什么屁事来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizabos_000226fb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any thoughts on the Brotherhood?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对钢铁兄弟会有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKillianBackground
None of your business, that's what.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与你无关，就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Black Killian [080017EC] (mod) Quest : ([0802621D]aaaMercenaryQuest) Truth That Dies EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamercena_aaakillianbackg_00026221_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们在这干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKillianSpeech
[FAILED] Like I said: None of your fucking business. Get out of my face before I throw your carcass in the lake.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 就像我说的：管你屁事。在我把你尸体扔进湖里之前赶紧从我面前消失。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Black Killian [080017EC] (mod) Quest : ([0802621D]aaaMercenaryQuest) Truth That Dies EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamercena_aaakillianspeec_00026223_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, you know you want to tell me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 来吧，我知道你会告诉我的...

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Fine, whatever. My guys and I are on a salvage recovery job for some interested parties back in California.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 好吧，无所谓。我和我的人正在为加利福利亚的某个利益关系人进行回收作业。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Black Killian [080017EC] (mod) Quest : ([0802621D]aaaMercenaryQuest) Truth That Dies EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamercena_aaakillianspeec_00026224_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a pretty sensitive, high-risk job, so I got nothing else to say about it. Best move on now, alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个相当敏感，高风险的工作，所以我不能再说了。最好现在走开，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Black Killian [080017EC] (mod) Quest : ([0802621D]aaaMercenaryQuest) Truth That Dies EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamercena_aaakillianspeec_00026224_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, what was that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，那是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Black Killian [080017EC] (mod) Quest : ([0802621D]aaaMercenaryQuest) Truth That Dies EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamercena_aaakillianspeec_00026224_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck me! Van Graffs! Everyone, lock and load!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我操！范·格拉夫帮！各位，子弹上膛准备战斗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Black Killian [080017EC] (mod) Quest : ([0802621D]aaaMercenaryQuest) Truth That Dies EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamercena_aaakillianspeec_00026224_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVanGraffREF.enable
I'm not trying to poach your contract. I'm just trying to find someone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是要抢你的生意。我只是想找个人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKillianNevermind
Right, off you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，走开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Black Killian [080017EC] (mod) Quest : ([0802621D]aaaMercenaryQuest) Truth That Dies EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamercena_aaakilliannever_00026227_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaKillianCombat
Oh yeah? Well, this will be a nice distraction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦是吗？好吧，这是个不错的消遣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Black Killian [080017EC] (mod) Quest : ([0802621D]aaaMercenaryQuest) Truth That Dies EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamercena_aaakilliancomba_00026229_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait...
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Black Killian [080017EC] (mod) Quest : ([0802621D]aaaMercenaryQuest) Truth That Dies EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamercena_aaakilliancomba_00026229_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit! Van Graffs! Nobody gets out of here alive! Open fire!
ESP.TRADUIT: 操！范·格拉夫帮！谁也不能活着出去！开火！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Black Killian [080017EC] (mod) Quest : ([0802621D]aaaMercenaryQuest) Truth That Dies EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamercena_aaakilliancomba_00026229_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaaVanGraffREF.enable
[Attack] I'm here to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击] 我是来杀你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCameronBackground
Plowing your mama. What a whore! Seriously though, fuck off before I whip you silly and fuck you stupid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在操你的老母。噢她真棒！但是说真的，在我动手抽你这傻逼之前给我滚出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cameron Butler [080017ED] (mod) Quest : ([0802621D]aaaMercenaryQuest) Truth That Dies EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaamercena_aaacameronbackg_0002622e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们在这干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCameronFight
This day just keeps getting better. Let's gut this fucker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天真是个好日子。让我们削了这个杂种！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cameron Butler [080017ED] (mod) Quest : ([0802621D]aaaMercenaryQuest) Truth That Dies EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaamercena_aaacameronfight_00026230_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
[Attack] I'm here to kill you, asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击] 我是来杀你的，混蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCameronGoodbye
Yeah, fuck off before you get hurt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，在你受伤前赶紧滚蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cameron Butler [080017ED] (mod) Quest : ([0802621D]aaaMercenaryQuest) Truth That Dies EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaamercena_aaacamerongoodb_00026232_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaBrianBrian
Oh shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢该死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Brian [080017EE] (mod) Quest : ([0802621D]aaaMercenaryQuest) Truth That Dies EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaamercena_aaabrianbrian_00026236_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
Are you, uh, Brian?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是，呃，布莱恩吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRivasQuest1
You're shitting me, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在跟我开玩笑，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([0801EADB]aaaElizaQuest) The Girl From North Country EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaaelizaqu_aaarivasquest1_0002d31e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, I mean, yeah. Yeah, there's plenty of shit that needs to get done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，我是说，没错。是的，这里有一大堆事情需要搞定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([0801EADB]aaaElizaQuest) The Girl From North Country EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaaelizaqu_aaarivasquest1_0002d31e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, just not used to actual, patched-in members actually being willing to help out. Usually I just have to make prospects do the bitchwork.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，只是不太习惯，有加入的成员愿意主动帮忙。通常我只能幻想这些屁事能够解决。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([0801EADB]aaaElizaQuest) The Girl From North Country EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaaelizaqu_aaarivasquest1_0002d31e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speaking of which, I could use some help with that, specifically. A girl came by here... maybe a week ago?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说到这里，我的确需要一些帮助。一个女孩来过这里...大概在一周之前吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([0801EADB]aaaElizaQuest) The Girl From North Country EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaaelizaqu_aaarivasquest1_0002d31e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cute little red-haired thing. She asked to join up, out of nowhere. Never seen her before in my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一头红发，很可爱。她莫名其妙地要求加入我们，我这辈子还从来没见过她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([0801EADB]aaaElizaQuest) The Girl From North Country EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaaelizaqu_aaarivasquest1_0002d31e_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I gave her a delivery job. Nothing too big, but I'd like a fucking status update, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给了她一个送货任务。虽然不是什么重要的事，但是我想知道他妈的进展，你知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([0801EADB]aaaElizaQuest) The Girl From North Country EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaaelizaqu_aaarivasquest1_0002d31e_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to find her and see what's up. Finish the delivery if she got bored and fucked it up. The drop is supposed to be at... Hmm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你去找到她然后看看情况怎么样了。如果她厌倦或者搞砸了就帮助完成这个送货任务。停留地点应该是...嗯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([0801EADB]aaaElizaQuest) The Girl From North Country EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaaelizaqu_aaarivasquest1_0002d31e_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, Mojave Outpost, or whatever it's called. The place with the fucking NCR statues. Remember: Girl, red hair.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，叫什么莫哈维前哨站的地方。就是那个有他妈的NCR雕像的地方。记住：女孩，红头发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([0801EADB]aaaElizaQuest) The Girl From North Country EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaaelizaqu_aaarivasquest1_0002d31e_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And watch out for those NCR douchebags all over that place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心那里全是NCR的杂种。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([0801EADB]aaaElizaQuest) The Girl From North Country EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaaelizaqu_aaarivasquest1_0002d31e_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaElizaQuest 10 set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaELBigDaddyDead to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaELBigDaddyDead + 1
Hey, now that I'm a full member, got any work for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，现在我是正式成员了，有什么工作给我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaPackage
Huh? Oh, yeah, that shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈？噢，是的，那玩意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizapackage_0002d97f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, yeah, I still got it, right here. The guy who was supposed to take it off my hands never showed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，是，我还带着呢，在这里。那个本该来拿货的家伙一直没有出现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizapackage_0002d97f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been here for the last couple days, listening to these NCR pricks bitching about the weather, waiting for this asshole to show.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经在这里待了几天了，一边听这些NCR的鸟人们整天抱怨天气，一边等着那个混蛋出现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizapackage_0002d97f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell, I was gonna leave if he didn't show up today.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操，如果他今天还不出现我就走人。
