ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizapackage_0002d97f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setenemy vCaesarsLegionFaction aaaElizaFaction 0 setenemy vCaesarsLegionTheFortFaction aaaElizaFaction 0 setenemy vCaesarsLegionCCoveFaction aaaElizaFaction 0 setenemy CaesarsLegionNelsonFaction aaaElizaFaction 0 set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaELMetEliza to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaELMetEliza + 1
I'm here about a package delivery you're doing for the Great Khans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来这里是关于你帮大汗帮运送那个包裹的任务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaContact
Right here. Well, not right here as in the bar, but... The Mojave outpost. They said I'd probably get here first, and to wait him out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在这里。呃，不是这个酒吧，但...就在莫哈维前哨站。他们说我可能会先到达这里，然后等他出现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizacontact_0002d981_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dude was supposed to be on the Mojave side of the border, and coming in South-Eastish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个家伙应该是在莫哈维边境上，大概从东南边过来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizacontact_0002d981_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Through a canyon, or something. I don't much give a shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 经过一个峡谷什么的。我不太关心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizacontact_0002d981_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaDoorREF.unlock aaaElizaMapREF.enable
Where were you supposed to make the delivery?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该在哪里交货？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaCanyon
Sure, why not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，有可能。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizacanyon_0002d983_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, you figuring on going searching for him down there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，你是说去那里找他？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizacanyon_0002d983_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crescent Canyon?
ESP.TRADUIT: 新月峡谷吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaSearchYes
Alright, well... I'm gonna tag along, in that case.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，呃...既然这样的话，我要跟你一起去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasearchy_0002d985_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can see for yourself that this wasn't my fault. Douchebag just didn't show, OK?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以看看那不是我自己的问题。而是那个傻逼自己没有出现，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasearchy_0002d985_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaElizaQuest 20 set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 1 setally aaaElizaFaction PlayerFaction 1
Planned on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有这个打算。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaSearchNo
Well, uh... Change your mind, then, alright? Come on, let's go take a peek at this canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...那么改变你的主意，好吗？拜托，让我们去看一眼这个峡谷吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasearchn_0002d987_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, you'll see. This asshole just didn't show. You can tell that to your boss, or whatever. This wasn't on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，你会看见的。是那个混蛋没有出现。你可以告诉你的老板。这不是我的错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasearchn_0002d987_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaElizaQuest 20 set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval - 1 setally aaaElizaFaction PlayerFaction 1
Probably not, no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能不，不行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyPoker
See? You and I, we have good tastes, don't we? I've always said, if you want to get a feel of a man's character, you hand him a deck of cards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看？你和我，我们品味相同，不是吗？我总是说，如果你想了解一个男人的性格，就递给他一副扑克牌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroypoker_0003144f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You especially want to watch out for anyone who uses those cards to play caravan. That's a sure sign of low intellect, right there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你尤其要小心那些玩大篷车扑克的人。那肯定是智力低下的表现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroypoker_0003144f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caravan aficionados are, without fail, an unwashed sort, utterly lacking in discretion and proper breeding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沉迷大篷车扑克的人，必定是，肮脏的那种人，完全缺乏判断力和教养。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroypoker_0003144f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you don't find it terribly uncouth of me, but I simply cannot trust or rely upon someone who would find their enjoyment in such a manner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你不要觉得我太无礼了，只是我不能相信或者依靠以这种方式找乐趣的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroypoker_0003144f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...I seem to have gotten off track, haven't I? I hope you'll forgive me- verbosity simply comes natural to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...我好像跑题了，是吗？我希望你会原谅我——啰嗦对我来说是很自然的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroypoker_0003144f_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure I am.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyCaravanYes
...Of course you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...当然了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroycaravanye_00031451_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm, my bodyguard, Patrice, he tells me that caravan is wildly popular among second-gen Super Mutants. Isn't that interesting?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我的保镖，帕特里斯，他告诉我大篷车扑克在第二代超级变种人中间很流行。是不是很有趣？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroycaravanye_00031451_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, regardless, I originally asked because I have a point to make.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，不管了，我起初这样问是因为我要表达一个观点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroycaravanye_00031451_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like caravan, myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢玩大篷车扑克。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyBlackjack
There's no shame in that, my friend. Personally, I prefer to take things at a slightly slower pace, but that's just me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这没什么丢脸的，我的朋友。以我个人来说，我喜欢慢节奏一点，但那就是我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyblackjack_00031453_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't take that to mean I enjoy every ponderous card game, mind you. I'd hate if someone took that to mean I enjoy caravan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别以为我每一个沉闷的扑克游戏都喜欢。我讨厌别人以为我喜欢大篷车扑克。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyblackjack_00031453_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, no. You and I, we have more refined tastes. A love of caravan tends to indicate a lack of discretion and a narrow gene pool.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不。你和我，我们有更高雅的品味。沉迷于大篷车扑克则更倾向于表现出缺乏判断力和先天基因缺乏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyblackjack_00031453_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, excuse me. I do tend to rattle on sometimes. I didn't intend to waste your time by discussing the worst form of entertainment in human history.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，不好意思。我有时确实喜欢喋喋不休。我并不想用人类历史上最糟糕的娱乐方式来浪费你的时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyblackjack_00031453_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm more of a blackjack player, to be honest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，我是个玩21点的高手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyNoGames
You should try it sometime! And may I just say, there is no finer method of elucidating another person's character, let me tell you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该试试！我可以说，没有更好的方式能表现一个人的品质了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroynogames_00031455_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personally, I'm of the opinion that it's the easiest way to see who a person truly is. Well, poker and violence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以我来说，我认为这是看清一个人的最简单办法。扑克和暴力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroynogames_00031455_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I'm not a violent man, no sir. I haven't been in a fight since I was seven. And believe me, I certainly didn't initiate that scuffle!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是个喜欢暴力的人，不先生。自从我7岁以来就没有跟人争斗过。相信我，我当然没有发起那场冲突！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroynogames_00031455_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, excuse me. I've gotten sidetracked. You'll have to forgive me for the rambling. I'm, perhaps, overly fond of conversation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，不好意思。我跑题了。你得原谅我的啰嗦。我也许是太喜欢说话了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroynogames_00031455_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not really, no.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyQuestContinue
Right! My original point being that I have some friends who enjoy a nice bit of poker just as much as myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对！我最先的话题是我有一些跟我一样非常喜欢扑克的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquestcont_00031459_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The key difference being the stakes. I've simply never gotten into the mindset where I could comfortably match the wagers of these gentlemen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关键的区别在于赌注。我从来没有可以轻松达到这些绅士们的赌注的这种心态。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquestcont_00031459_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I couldn't hope to tell you any exact numbers, of course. I doubt they could, either. It's all about the vulgar display of wealth, I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然我没法告诉你具体的数字。我怀疑他们也不能。我想那是庸俗地展示财富的方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquestcont_00031459_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, even though they're patriotic citizens of the NCR, the NCR refuses to reciprocate the fond feelings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使他们是NCR的爱国公民，NCR也拒绝对他们报以喜爱之情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquestcont_00031459_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're forced to hold their games in clandestine locations. Out of sight, and under heavy guard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们被迫在秘密地点举行赌局。在大众视线之外，并且被重兵保卫着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquestcont_00031459_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As I'm sure you can imagine, Vegas is quite appealing to my friends. Sadly, high-stakes gambling is restricted to the approved casinos.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信你可以想象，维加斯对我的朋友们很有吸引力。不幸的是，在授权赌场内不允许进行高赌注的赌博。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquestcont_00031459_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I've gone ahead and found a location in outer Vegas, where they can gamble their little hearts away, with the authorities none the wiser.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在外维加斯找到一个地方，在那里他们可以尽情地赌博，而当局却全然不知晓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquestcont_00031459_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right, and your original point...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，你最先的话题是...

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyHobos
Exactly so, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 的确是的，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyhobos_0003145b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Indeed, the location I'm eyeing for them is discreet, defensible, and rather spacious. It just has a small... infestation problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 的确，我为他们看中的这个地方非常谨慎，防卫性强，而且相当宽敞。只是有一点小小的...被骚扰问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyhobos_0003145b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Specifically... What's the proper nomenclature? Vagrants? Squatters? Hmm, no matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确切地说是被一些...应该怎么叫来着？无业游民？占用土地者？嗯，无所谓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyhobos_0003145b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I simply cannot host the wealthy elite in a building where they'll be forced to interact with unwashed vagrant-types.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我根本无法在楼里接待富有的精英们，因为他们将被迫与肮脏的流浪汉打交道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyhobos_0003145b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need them gone, as thorough as can be. That's your first job, my friend. Just head on down there and get rid of those filthy... people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要他们离开，越彻底越好。这就是你的第一个工作，我的朋友。赶紧去那里除掉那些肮脏的...人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyhobos_0003145b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yes, one other thing! The interior of the space is going to be utterly gutted and renovated. There's simply no avoiding that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，对了，还有一件事！这个空间的内部将被彻底地挖空和翻新。这是无法避免的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyhobos_0003145b_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Which means you have free reign to simply kill the squatters. We'll be tearing out the carpets anyways, so a few blood stains are no problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这意味着你有自由支配权去杀死那些非法占地者。不管怎样我们都会把地毯撕掉的，所以一点点血污是没问题的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyhobos_0003145b_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hurry back once you're done, friend. We have much to discuss!
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞定了赶紧回来，朋友。我们还有很多事情要商量！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyhobos_0003145b_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaRoyHoboQuest 10
And let me guess. There's a catch?
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我猜猜。这里面有玄机？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSquatterFight
What? Damn it! Alright, let's teach this fucker a lesson!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？该死！好吧，让我们给这个混蛋好好上一课！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mitch [08008FDB] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult07\aaaroyhobo_aaasquatterfigh_00031a57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
[Attack] Relax, I'm just going to kill you all, nice and easy.
ESP.TRADUIT: [攻击] 放松点，我只是要杀掉你们全部人，保证让你们死得很痛快。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSquatterThreaten
[FAILED] You don't scare me, punk. Come on, guys! Let's teach this fucker a lesson!
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 你吓不到我，小流氓。来吧，兄弟们！让我们给这个混蛋好好上一课！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mitch [08008FDB] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult07\aaaroyhobo_aaasquatterthre_00031a59_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
If you don't leave right now, I'm going to go over there and slap you right in the face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你们现在不离开，我就过来狠狠扇你的耳光。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Okay, okay! You made your point! Jesus!
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 好吧，好吧！你说得对！天啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mitch [08008FDB] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult07\aaaroyhobo_aaasquatterthre_00031a5a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn it, we have nowhere to go... Come on, guys. Let's get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，我们无处可去...来吧，兄弟们。我们出去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mitch [08008FDB] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult07\aaaroyhobo_aaasquatterthre_00031a5a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showmessage aaaMitchMessage aaaMitchREF.disable setstage aaaRoyHoboQuest 20 player.rewardkarma -50
This is your only chance to get out of here with all your teeth still in your skull, jackass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你们完好无损离开这里的唯一机会，蠢货。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSquatterBackground
I'm not looking to make new friends, stranger. Stow the friendly chit-chat and just walk back out the way you came.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不打算交新朋友，陌生人。收起你那无聊的友善，从你来的地方出去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mitch [08008FDB] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult07\aaaroyhobo_aaasquatterback_00031a5c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just trying to take care of my friends, here. We're hungry, broke, and beat down. So, please, just leave us alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只想在这里照顾我的朋友们。我们饥饿，贫穷，而且疲惫。所以，拜托，别来烦我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mitch [08008FDB] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult07\aaaroyhobo_aaasquatterback_00031a5c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you guys?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些家伙们是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSquatterBribe
Well... We could probably buy a couple of rooms in the Madrid for that...
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...那我们可以在马德里买几栋房子...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mitch [08008FDB] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult07\aaaroyhobo_aaasquatterbrib_00031a5e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, deal. Let's get out of here, guys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，成交。我们出去吧，兄弟们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mitch [08008FDB] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult07\aaaroyhobo_aaasquatterbrib_00031a5e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 1000 showmessage aaaMitchMessage aaaMitchREF.disable setstage aaaRoyHoboQuest 20
How about this: I give you a thousand caps, and you guys head for greener pastures.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要不这样：我给你们1000瓶盖，你们去找个更好的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaGoodbye
aaaElizaNCR
I prefer them over the Legion, but that's not exactly difficult. I feel the same way about communal toilets, for example.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相比军团我更喜欢他们，但这并不难。比如我对公共厕所也有同感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizancr_00049200_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're just another bunch of power-hungry douchebags who want total control over the lives of everyone else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们只不过是另一帮追逐权力的人，妄图控制每一个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizancr_00049200_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not for any actual reason, mind you. Power is it's own reward, especially when you're rich and self-justifying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有什么真正的理由。权力本身就是一种回报，尤其是当你有钱然后又能自我洗白的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizancr_00049200_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And they're real good at that. They love to espouse concepts like democracy, or personal freedoms, but only because it makes them sound good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们很擅长这个。他们喜欢拥护民主，或者个人自由的概念，这只是因为能让他们听起来很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizancr_00049200_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What makes the NCR different from Caesar? Caesar will call you a slave while he takes what's yours and leaves you with nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR和凯撒有什么不一样？凯撒会称你为奴隶，然后剥夺你的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizancr_00049200_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR will call you a proud citizen. Well, this isn't California, and no one here is one of their citizens.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR会称你为市民。但这里不是加利福利亚，这里没人是他们的市民。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizancr_00049200_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they really care about the common good, then they should wipe out the Legion, and then head home, for good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们真的关心公众利益，那他们应该先扫除军团，然后回家去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizancr_00049200_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you feel about the NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得NCR怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWWTestDialogue
That's correct, you do not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错，你没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Debug Dude [0800BA72] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have Wild Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有狂野废土技能。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do, indeed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是有，没错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Debug Dude [0800BA72] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do have Wild Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有狂野废土技能。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaType93
What? Oh, it's nothing. Hard to make it out here without a good weapon, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？噢，没什么。没有一把好武器很难在这里生存，知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizatype93_0003ec22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, uh... what's the story with your gun?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那，呃...你的那把枪有什么来历？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, that's right. Good eye. Know your guns, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，没错。眼力不错。对枪很了解，哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizatype93_0003ec23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of my earliest memories were shooting this old .22 into a snowbank behind our cabin as a kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最早的记忆是小时候用这把老.22枪射小屋后面的雪堆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizatype93_0003ec23_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My dad made sure that, if I was gonna be firing guns, I need to know how to maintain them. I like to think I do a good job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我爸爸认为，如果我要学会用枪，就先得学会怎么保养它们。我觉得我还做得不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizatype93_0003ec23_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found this old, weather-beaten piece of crap a few years back. Hmm... '78, I think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在几年前发现了这个老旧的久经风霜的破烂。嗯...估计是2078年生产的吧，我想？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizatype93_0003ec23_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn hard to find compatible parts in this part of the world, but, to be honest, that's probably why I stuck with it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这个地方很难找到合适的配件，但是，说实在的，这也可能是我被它迷住的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizatype93_0003ec23_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been tinkering with it since the day I picked it up. Shoots pretty good, now. And hell, I got it serviceable pretty much by myself. Feels nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从我捡到它的那天起我就一直在修补它。现在射击手感已经很不错了。操，都是我自己一个人把它修好的。感觉真棒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizatype93_0003ec23_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One interesting bit, someone rechambered this one in 5.45. Not as easy to find, but I actually prefer it to 5.56. Might just be in my head, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有意思的一点是，有人将这枪重新组装成使用5.45子弹。那可没那么容易找到，但是我其实更喜欢5.56子弹。然而可能也就是我脑子里的想法而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizatype93_0003ec23_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 3
Nice rifle. Chinese, right? Type 93?
ESP.TRADUIT: 枪不错。中国产的，对吗？93式？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaNCRGood
Sure, hence why I don't include them in my "shoot on sight" Legion policy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，因此我才没有把他们归为像军团那样“格杀勿论”那一类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizancrgood_0003f227_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't begrudge the soldiers who think they're doing the right thing. Or who don't give a fuck, and are just following orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会对那些认为自己做的都是正确的士兵，或者对那些谁他妈也不关心，只知道执行命令的人感到不满。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizancrgood_0003f227_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, on paper, you can make the Republic sound good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，表面上，你可以让共和国听起来很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizancrgood_0003f227_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There ain't any circumstances where I'll tolerate someone endorsing: "Everyone should be enslaved for the benefit of some limp-dick old man."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我绝无任何可能容忍有人支持: “每个人都应该为了某个瘸腿老人的利益而被奴役”的看法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizancrgood_0003f227_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But someone honestly buys into the "order, safety, and rule of law" shit, fine. They're naive, but whatever. Like I said, it sounds good on paper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是有人的确支持“秩序，安全，以及法治”的屁话，好吧。他们太天真了，不过随他便。就像我说的，在表面上看起来很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizancrgood_0003f227_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I got nothing bad to say about the Rangers. I saw one cut through a whole handful of raiders with a single magazine, once. Thing of beauty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而我觉得游骑兵还不错。我曾经看到过一名游骑兵只用一个弹夹就干掉了一群掠夺者。真漂亮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizancrgood_0003f227_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surely the NCR must have some good points?
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR肯定有一些优点吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaBackground
"Tell you about myself"? What do you want, a fucking application?
ESP.TRADUIT: “告诉你我自己的事情”？你想要什么，一份他妈的申请书吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizabackgro_0003fe1c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, no offense, but I barely know you. I'm not going to pour my life story on you, OK?
ESP.TRADUIT: 无意冒犯，但我跟你不熟。我不会把我的生活经历告诉你的，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizabackgro_0003fe1c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和我说说你自己吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just a girl from Utah with an assault rifle and crippling self-esteem issues because of my big-ass forehead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是一名拿着突击步枪的犹他州女孩，因为自己愚蠢的头脑而伤害了自尊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizabackgro_0003fe1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What did you want to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想知道什么呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizabackgro_0003fe1d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You willing to talk about yourself, yet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要说说你自己的事情了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: OK, shoot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，说吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizabackgro_0003fe1e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to ask you some personal questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想问你点私人问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaPolitics
Oh no. No way, dude. I don't even like talking about that shit with people I actually know well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢不。不行，伙计。甚至跟我很熟的人我都不谈论这个话题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizapolitic_0003fe20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Christ, you might as well walk up to a stranger and ask: "Hey, pal, do you like taking it in the ass?"
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，你不妨走到一个陌生人跟前问问：“嘿，老兄，你想把它插到屁眼里吗？”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizapolitic_0003fe20_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I shoot Legion on sight, because I'm not a sociopath. Beyond that, it's just semantics that people get really bitchy about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对军团格杀勿论，因为我不是个反社会者。除此之外，它只是个人们相当讨厌的词语。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizapolitic_0003fe20_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have some questions about your political leanings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对你的政治倾向有些疑问。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd... rather not. Sorry, nothing personal. I just don't enjoy the subject. Another time, maybe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...宁愿不。对不起，并非针对个人。我只是不喜欢这个话题。以后再说，也许？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizapolitic_0003fe21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, willing to tell me your political opinions, yet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，想跟我谈谈你的政治见解吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, alright, goddamnit. Ask away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧，该死。问吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizapolitic_0003fe22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, can I ask about your politics yet?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那，我能问你政治方面的问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words Comment (NAM2) : Unenthused. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizapolitic_0003fe23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a political question for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有些政治问题要问你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaUtah
Northern Utah, up in the mountains.
ESP.TRADUIT: 犹他州北部，在山上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizautah_0003fe25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, no, before you ask, I've never had any association with those New Canaanite types.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有，不，我从来没跟那些新迦南人有过联系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizautah_0003fe25_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was always snowy, back home, and I still remember the smell. Just this... fresh, pine smell. There are a lot more living trees up there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里总是下着雪，而我仍然记得那个气味。就像这个...新鲜的松树的气味。那上面还有很多活的树。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizautah_0003fe25_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honestly, I kinda miss it at times. Still, I would have gone crazy, just staying in one place for my whole life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老实说，我有时有点想念它。如果我一辈子都需要待在某个地方的话，那会让我发疯的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizautah_0003fe25_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I left when I was 17...ish. And, after a long time of meandering all over the place, I ended up here in the Mojave. It's been... interesting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我17岁时候离开了...大概吧。而且，经过长时间的四处游荡，我来到了莫哈维这里。这很...有意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizautah_0003fe25_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, where are you from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那，你从哪里来？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaHouse
Between him, NCR, and Caesar, I'd much rather that House's ass is the one sitting in the metaphorical Vegas throne when the dust settles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在他和NCR，凯撒之间，我更宁愿尘埃落定的时候是豪斯先生坐在维加斯的宝座上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahouse_000418f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That being said, he can go fuck himself. He's, what, a ghoul? Self-aware AI? A fucking ghost?
ESP.TRADUIT: 话虽如此，去他妈的。他是个，什么，尸鬼吗？有自我意识的AI？还是一个他妈的鬼魂？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahouse_000418f0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, whatever he is, he does nothing but sit in his ivory fucking tower, never getting involved with anyone unless it's to fleece them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管他是什么，他除了坐在象牙塔里面什么也没做，永远不和任何人交往，除非是为了敲诈他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahouse_000418f0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He wants to run Vegas like it's a corporation, where lives are just meaningless numbers in his ledger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他想把维加斯当做公司一样运营，生命不过是他账本上豪无意义的数字而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahouse_000418f0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I'm sure he touts the same old tired bullshit about "the greater good" that every tyrant pulls out of their ass. Bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我肯定他会吹嘘那些“更大利益”的老掉牙的废话，所有的暴君都用过这种鬼话。简直是放屁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahouse_000418f0_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have an opinion on Mr. House?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对豪斯先生有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaStrip
Would it surprise you if I said I have?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我说去过你会不会感到惊奇？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizastrip_000418f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: 'Course, I'm imagining you're surprised because I don't seem rich, rather than something condescending about me, personally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我想象你会吃惊是因为我看起来并不是有钱人，而不是因为对我有居高临下的感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizastrip_000418f2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That being the case, you'd be right. I don't have the money to front a legitimate visit to the Strip. What I do have is a forged passport.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样的话，你是对的。我没有钱能够合法地游览赌城。我有的只是一张伪造的通行证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizastrip_000418f2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, yeah, I've been to the Strip a few times.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，是的，我去过赌城几次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizastrip_000418f2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ultra-Luxe is full of pervert clowns and rich NCR fucks, the Tops is what would happen if the Kings were even more annoying and self-absorbed...
ESP.TRADUIT: 超美多赌场全是些变态的小丑和有钱的NCR混蛋，如果猫王帮更让人烦恼和固执己见的话就去上好佳赌场...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizastrip_000418f2_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...and Gomorrah is full of liquor, chems, and titties.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...而罪恶城则全是酒，毒品和妓女。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizastrip_000418f2_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess which one is my favorite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你猜我最喜欢哪一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizastrip_000418f2_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever been to the Strip?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你曾经去过赌城吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaPatriotic
Yeah, yeah, of fucking course you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，是，你他妈当然是了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizapatriot_00041eed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, really. I'm so glad my travelling partner is a mindless drone who's been programmed to endorse living under the thumb of the rich.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，真的。我真高兴我的旅伴是个无脑的机器人，被编程成支持生活在富人的掌控之下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizapatriot_00041eed_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And how the fuck are you an initiated member of the Great Khans? You know they're the total ideological opposites of each other, yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么加入成为大汗帮的成员的？你知道他们在思想意识上跟NCR是完全对立的吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizapatriot_00041eed_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ugh, whatever. Let's just go. This is why I despise talking about this shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，随便吧。我们走吧。所以这就是为什么我鄙视讨论这个话题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizapatriot_00041eed_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval - 1
The NCR is bringing peace and stability to the region, and I support their actions.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR为这个地区带来了和平与稳定，我支持他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaAnarchist
Exactly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 的确。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaanarchi_00041eef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only thing they're good for is shooting the Legion. Just wait and see. After Caesar's been broken, the NCR will end up slinking back home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们唯一好的地方就是对付军团。等着看吧。当凯撒被打败之后，NCR最终会灰溜溜地滚回家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaanarchi_00041eef_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if it takes a bit of prodding. With a bayonet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可能需要给他们点刺激。用刺刀捅一捅。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaanarchi_00041eef_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 4
I'm not a fan of living my life under someone else's terms. I can't say I like the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢按照他人要求的条款来生活。我不喜欢NCR。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaTaxes
Uhh... Yeah, okay, I'm... I'm also not a fan of, uh, taxes. Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...是，好吧，我...我也不喜欢，呃，交税。是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizataxes_00041ef1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 1
I just hate taxes SO FUCKING MUCH!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈非常讨厌征税！

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaPowderGang
Those fucking morons? I didn't know they were important enough to even warrant an opinion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些他妈的蠢货？我都不知道他们是不是值得我发表看法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizapowderg_0004498f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't get me wrong, I have a certain admiration for anyone who'll say "fuck you" to the NCR in such an, uh, explosive fashion, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 别误解我，我对任何向NCR说“去你妈”的人都有某种敬佩之情，呃，这种爆炸式时尚，但是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizapowderg_0004498f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These idiots get their freedom, and what do they do? Run away? Turn their life around? Assume new identities?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些白痴得到了自由，但他们做了什么？改变他们的生活？得到新的身份？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizapowderg_0004498f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, they stay in their prison, and do everything they possible can to get the NCR's attention again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，他们待在监狱里，尽一切可能重新引起了NCR的注意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizapowderg_0004498f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, my opinion is that they're the dumbest sons-of-bitches in the entire Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，我的看法是他们是整个莫哈维最白痴的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizapowderg_0004498f_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any opinions on the Powder Gangers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对炸药帮有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaSingle
Are... are you fucking hitting on me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...你他妈在开玩笑吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasingle_00041ef4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you seeing anyone, or...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那，你在和谁交往，还是...？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaFlirtM
Well, good for you. I'll choose to take that as a compliment, but that's about where it ends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，真有你的。我会把这当做是个表扬，但这就是失败所在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaflirtm_00041ef6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, I try to have a policy of never getting intimate with people I actually know. A for effort, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，我有一个准则，永远不要和我真正认识的人过于亲密。尽管劳而无功。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaflirtm_00041ef6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, if that didn't answer your original question, no. I'm not seeing anyone, and I don't want any sort of relationship at this point in my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这没有解决你开始的疑问的话。那么我没有和任何人交往，而且我不需要这样的关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaflirtm_00041ef6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like things simple and casual. Actually, that applies to every aspect of my life. I guess that must make me a boring shit, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢简单随意的东西。事实上，这适用于我生活的各个方面。我猜这让我变得很无趣，哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaflirtm_00041ef6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, let's hit the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便吧，我们走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaflirtm_00041ef6_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 3
That was my intention, yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就是想知道，是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heh, well, don't think I don't appreciate the attention. Sadly, it's all for not. I have a rule about sleeping with people I actually know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，呃，谢谢你的关心。可惜，这是徒劳无功的。我对是否跟我认识的人睡觉有我自己的准则。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaflirtm_00041ef7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It just makes things awkward, you know? I mean, feel free to keep doing it, 'cause I like it, but... Just thought you should know where we stand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只会让事情变得尴尬，知道吗？我是说，随你怎么说，我倒是喜欢，但是...我只是觉得你应该知道我们的立场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaflirtm_00041ef7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regarding your original point, I'm 100% single, with the caveat that I'm not interested in changing that status, at the moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回答你开始的问题，我100%单身，但事先声明我不想改变这种状况，就目前来说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaflirtm_00041ef7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd rather keep things nice and simple and casual. Actually, that's my entire life philosophy, in a nutshell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我宁愿一切保持简单和随意。事实上，这是我的人生哲学，简而言之。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaflirtm_00041ef7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose, if I were being introspective, I'd conclude that I'm a boring fuck. Fortunately, I'm not that self-aware. Let's hit the road, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想，如果我反省自己，我会得出自己是个无聊的混蛋的结论。幸运的是，我还没那么有自知之明。我们走吧，哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaflirtm_00041ef7_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 4
That was my intention.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就是想知道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaNoFlirt
Right, whatever. Uh, no. No, I'm not in any sort of relationship, and I don't plan on changing that anytime soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，随便。呃，不。不，我没有跟任何人交往，而且我近期不想改变这种状态。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizanoflirt_00041ef9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I prefer keeping everything simple and casual, which means I'm much more content with one-night stands and hookers. You should try it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我宁愿保持一切都简单和随便，也就是说我更满足于一夜情和男妓。你应该试试！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizanoflirt_00041ef9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the meantime, let's get moving, yeah? Things to do, and all that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同时，我们上路吧？还有事情要做呢，就这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizanoflirt_00041ef9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? No, no, I was just curious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？不，不，我只是好奇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaFlirtDouche
Blow it our your ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去你妈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaflirtdo_00041efb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval - 1
Don't flatter yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别自以为是了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDebugApprovalGain
Alright, I'll tell her that you never make sweeping generalizations about people in order to justify your condescending shitbag attitude.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会告诉她你从来不对人一概而论，来解释你居高临下的狗屁态度是正确的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Debug Dude [0800BA72] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 50
Make Eliza hate me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让伊莉莎恨我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDebugApprovalLoss
OK! I'll tell her that you're the type of person who asks obvious questions about the mod without reading the fucking FAQ, first!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好！我会告诉她你他妈根本没有先仔细阅读我的MOD说明，就问这些傻逼的问题！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Debug Dude [0800BA72] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval - 50
Make Eliza hate me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让伊莉莎恨我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaIndependence
That's what the Mojave needs, plain and simple.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就是莫哈维所需要的，简单而又明了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaindepen_000491fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The methods are different, but at the end of the day, Caesar, House, and Kimball... they're all the same. They have the same goals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 方式虽然不同，但是最终，凯撒，豪斯，还有金博尔...他们都一样。他们都有同样的目的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaindepen_000491fb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: None of them care about the people who live here. The NCR sees them as resources. Caesar sees slaves. House couldn't care less.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们都不关心这里生活的人民。在NCR眼中他们不过是资源。在凯撒眼中他们是奴隶。在豪斯眼中则什么都不是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaindepen_000491fb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The best thing for the people here is to be able to be free to just live their fucking lives on their own terms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对这里的人民来说，最好的就是按照他们自己的意志来他妈的生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaindepen_000491fb_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What're your feelings on an independent Vegas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对维加斯独立自主有什么看法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaDad
He did, alone. Mom wasn't around, and I never met the woman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。妈妈不在身边，我从来没见过她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizadad_00043107_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Way I hear it, she was pregnant with what would've been my brother. Something fucked up along the way, and they both died.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说，她当时怀着我的弟弟。结果中间出了点事，然后他们都死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizadad_00043107_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before you all crazy-sympathetic on me, lemme reiterate that I have no memory of this. I was way too young, so it didn't affect me none.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别猛地想同情可怜我，我重申一下我根本不记得这件事情。我那时还太小，所以这事根本对我没有影响。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizadad_00043107_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But anyway, yeah. My dad raised me. Taught me survival, shooting, gun maintenance... all the useful shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是不管怎样，是的。是我爸爸抚养了我。教会我生存，射击，枪械保养...所有有用的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizadad_00043107_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He reminds me of a lot of the grizzled old rangers you see around the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他让我想起在莫哈维见到的那些头发花白的老游骑兵们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizadad_00043107_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said your dad raised you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说是你的爸爸把你抚养大的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaSpookyPlace
People who praise the Gun Runner's manufacturing skills, even though they can't make a 20 gauge without resorting to duct tape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们都在赞扬军火贩子的制造工艺，即使那些人不用胶带连颗20号霰弹也造不出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaspookyp_00043109_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, alright. Lemme think... Yeah, so, I'm not really the type to get disturbed, but objectively...
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧。让我想想...是的，我不是那种容易困扰的人，但是客观地说...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaspookyp_00043109_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw a jet-fiend in New Reno stick the barrel of a flare gun into a baby's mouth and pull the trigger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看见新里诺有一个杰特狂，把信号枪的枪管塞进一个婴儿的嘴里然后扣动了扳机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaspookyp_00043109_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the most disturbing thing you've seen out there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你见过的最令人困扰的事情是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRivasUpdate
Well, that's fucking fantastic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，那真是太他妈好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([0801EADB]aaaElizaQuest) The Girl From North Country EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaaelizaqu_aaarivasupdate_00043719_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, whatever. I ain't got any more errands I need run, so you can tell Red there to take a hike.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧无所谓了。我这里没有差事了，你可以告诉那个红头发女孩到一边凉快去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([0801EADB]aaaElizaQuest) The Girl From North Country EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaaelizaqu_aaarivasupdate_00043719_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On the other hand, I do got some shit I'd only trust with an actual member of the tribe. Namely, yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另一方面，我还有件事只能交给部落真正的成员去办。也就是说，给你去办。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([0801EADB]aaaElizaQuest) The Girl From North Country EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaaelizaqu_aaarivasupdate_00043719_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The buyer got killed by Geckos. He never made contact with Eliza.
ESP.TRADUIT: 买家被蜥蜴杀死了。他没有跟伊莉莎联系上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRivasEliza
What? No. That's not how it works.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？不。规矩不是这样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([0801EADB]aaaElizaQuest) The Girl From North Country EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaaelizaqu_aaarivaseliza_0004371c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are traditions in place. We only made an exception for you because you stopped that Legion bullshit, and took out Big Daddy and his goons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里讲究传统。我们为你专门破例是因为你阻止了那个军团的王八蛋，拯救了大老爹和他的蠢材们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([0801EADB]aaaElizaQuest) The Girl From North Country EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaaelizaqu_aaarivaseliza_0004371c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you really want her inducted, well... I don't know, have her tag along with you. She impresses, maybe I'll see what I can do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你真的想要介绍她入会的话，呃...我也不好说，带着她跟你一起旅行吧。她让人印象深刻，也许我看我能不能想想办法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([0801EADB]aaaElizaQuest) The Girl From North Country EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaaelizaqu_aaarivaseliza_0004371c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just don't expect anything soon. We're kinda focusing most of our free time towards getting ready to fuck off out of here when the Legion attacks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是别报太快的期望。我们现在首要聚焦的事情是如何在军团发起攻击的时候准备好离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([0801EADB]aaaElizaQuest) The Girl From North Country EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaaelizaqu_aaarivaseliza_0004371c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the meantime, I got a package I really need to send off, and you're standing right here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同时，我有个包裹想要运送，而你刚好在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([0801EADB]aaaElizaQuest) The Girl From North Country EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaaelizaqu_aaarivaseliza_0004371c_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaElizaQuest 50 aaaVincentREF.enable
You aren't going to initiate Eliza?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不接纳伊莉莎入会吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaQuestions
Yeah? What about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗？谈什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaquestio_00043d1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to ask you some questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想问你些问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaEndQuestions
Alright, let's hit it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我们走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaendques_00043d20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough of that, let's get moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这些了，我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaHatePowders
Yeah...It'd really do the world a favor if all their dynamite just spontaneously exploded for no reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的...要是他们的炸弹哪天毫无缘由地自行爆炸，那可真是给世上做了件好事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words Comment (NAM2) : emph: THAT EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahatepow_00044991_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm... Where do you think they get their explosives?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...你觉得他们是从哪里得到炸药的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words Comment (NAM2) : emph: THAT EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahatepow_00044991_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Nah, too much work. Bullets aren't that expensive.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...不，太麻烦了。用子弹也不算太贵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words Comment (NAM2) : emph: THAT EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahatepow_00044991_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 3
Yeah, they're barely worth the ammo it takes to put them down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，他们根本就不值得浪费子弹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLovePowders
Oh, no, I didn't mean like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，不，我不是那个意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizalovepow_00044994_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The guys who busted out of the jail and actually escaped are fine by me. Hell, I respect 'em for doing it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些家伙越狱对我来说没毛病。操，我甚至还挺尊敬这事的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizalovepow_00044994_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm specifically talking about the retards who're still wearing their prison colors, chucking dynamite at caravans and shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是针对这些仍然穿着囚衣向商队扔炸药的白痴们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizalovepow_00044994_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those guys can go fuck off and die in a hole, for all I care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些家伙最好自行了断，我才不在乎呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizalovepow_00044994_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, let's get a move on. Those idiots aren't worth this many words.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我们上路吧。那些蠢货根本不值得浪费口水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizalovepow_00044994_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 2
The NCR is corrupt and backwards. I can't fault the prisoners for trying to break free.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR既腐败又低能。我无法指责想要获得自由的囚犯们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaNoInitiation
aaaElizaJoinGang
Because!
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger
NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't fucking know. I just... I don't know. I want to be a part of something that isn't stupid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈也不知道。我只是...不清楚。我只想要加入一个不傻逼的组织罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been on my own for a few years, now. I'd... prefer that not be the case, at least for a little while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在已经一个人呆了几年了。我...宁愿不是这样，至少有一段时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I guess I'm selfish. Whoop-de-fucking-doo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，我想我很自私。真他妈闹腾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why is it so important for you to join up with... something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你这么想要加入...组织？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaOfficialHire
I gotta be honest. Not super enthralled with the Great Khans at the moment. But, I also got nothing to do, so... Fuck it, fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我老实说。我现在并不是特别痴迷于大汗帮。但是，我反正也没事做，所以...去他妈的，好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, let's get going, I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，我们走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rivas said I should tag along with you for a while and he might make an exception about joining.
ESP.TRADUIT: 里瓦斯说我应该带你一起旅行，他也许会在入会的事情上破个例。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaSupportHouse
Really? And why is that, exactly? I guess maybe it's just my perspective as an outsider to the region, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗？为什么？我想这也许只是我作为一个外来者的观点，但是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasupport_000491f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I dunno, I'm just failing to see how a narcissistic industrialist with a god complex would be a good choice to lead the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，我只是不认为一个有着上帝情结的自恋企业家来领导莫哈维会是个好的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasupport_000491f7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a strong personality, and nothing else. You think he's a strong leader? Take a look around Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的个性很鲜明，除此之外就没了。你认为他是个强有力的领袖？你好好看看自由之城。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasupport_000491f7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A cesspool full of thieves, rapists, and murderers just a few yards down the street from his big fancy tower. What a man of the people he is!
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在他那漂亮的塔楼下街外几码远的地方，坐落着一个充满盗贼，强奸犯和凶手的粪池。他是一个多么了不起的人啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasupport_000491f7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to look at what he does, and not what he says. Anyone can make lofty fucking promises.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要看看他做了什么，而不是他说了什么。谁他妈都会许下点崇高的承诺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasupport_000491f7_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Demagoguery aside, he just isn't qualified to guide the Mojave. He's never actually lived out here. His perspectives on things are fucked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了会煽动人心，他并没有资格领导莫哈维。他并没有真正在外面生活过。他的观点都糟透了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasupport_000491f7_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...I love legitimate excuses to drop words like that in conversation.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...我喜欢在谈话中用正当的借口抛出这些话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasupport_000491f7_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, let's get moving. Guys like House get off on people dedicating time and energy to thinking about them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我们走吧。像豪斯那样的家伙对花时间和精力去想他们的人特别来劲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasupport_000491f7_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval - 1
I think Mr. House is the best chance the Mojave has for prosperity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想豪斯先生是为莫哈维带来繁荣的最佳选择。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaHateHouse
Goddamn right, partner. On both counts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太他妈对了，伙伴。我举双手双脚赞成。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahatehou_000491f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you get the chance to pull the trigger, I advocate making him sweat a little, first. See how outrageous he gets as he tries to buy you off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有机会向他扣动扳机的话，我提议先让他出点汗。看看当他想收买你的时候能有多么地吃惊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahatehou_000491f9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That look on his face, when he realizes that there ain't anything in the world he can say to spare his miserable life...
ESP.TRADUIT: 当他意识到说什么也不能保住他那可怜的生命时，再看看他脸上的表情...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahatehou_000491f9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, nearly brings a tear to my eye, imagining it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，那样的话我都忍不住要哭了，想象一下吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahatehou_000491f9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 3
House is a just another tyrant who makes big promises. He'd be better off dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 豪斯只不过是个只会许诺的暴君。还不如死了的好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaSupportIndependence
Glad to hear it. Really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴你这么说。真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasupport_000491fd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, you're kinda at the center of everything going on around here. You might just be able to make this happen. Just saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道吗，你是这里发生的一切的中心人物。你也许能让这实现。我只是说说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasupport_000491fd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You do what you gotta do, make the right connects, hold onto the ideas in your head, I could see it happening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 做你要做的事情，进行正确的联络，坚持你自己的想法，我将看到它被实现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasupport_000491fd_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, if that's the case, I'll have your back. Probably.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是这样的话，我会支持你。也许。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasupport_000491fd_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyways, let's get moving, yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我们可以走了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasupport_000491fd_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 5
I agree. The people here shouldn't have their lives dictated by anyone else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我同意。这里的人不应该让别人来支配他们的生活。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaHateIndependence
Bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放屁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahateind_000491ff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fucking people, you all speak in hypotheticals to justify your existence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们他妈这些人，你们都用假说来证明你们的存在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahateind_000491ff_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Man, if we weren't here to take people's money and point guns at them and tell them where and how to live, they might do something awful! Maybe!"
ESP.TRADUIT: “伙计，如果没有我们在这里拿走人们的钱，用枪指着他们告诉他们到哪里和怎么生活的话，他们就会作出可怕的事情！可能会！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahateind_000491ff_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck you. Take a walk in a free community sometime, you sheltered shit. It'd probably make your fucking head explode.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操你妈的。有本事去自由的社区逛一逛，你这个被人庇护的傻逼。你的头可能会被别人给爆掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahateind_000491ff_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: People just getting on, taking care of themselves, not fucking with each other. Not because they're told they have to, but because it's right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们只需要好好地生活，照顾好他们自己，不要自相残杀就行了。不是因为有人告诉他们要这样做，而是这本来就是真理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahateind_000491ff_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So don't you sit there and dump that hypothetical bullshit on me. I didn't grow up under some regional warlord, or self-justified government.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以别跟我说那些假设的屁话。我可不是在某个土军阀或者自以为是的政府的管治下长大的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahateind_000491ff_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I must be the bane of your world view. I answer to no one but myself. The only one telling me how to live my life is me. And what do I do, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一定是你世界观里的祸根。我只对自己负责。我决定我自己该怎么生活。那么我该怎么办呢，哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahateind_000491ff_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't take shit that ain't mine, I don't rape no one... I make it a habit to only gun down the ones who would do the same to me, and life goes on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不拿不属于自己的东西，我也不会强暴别人...我只习惯于开枪干掉那些想对我做这些事情的人，生活还得继续。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahateind_000491ff_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking tool.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真他妈的是个工具人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahateind_000491ff_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval - 5
People can't be trusted with absolute freedom. They need someone to keep them in check.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们不能相信绝对的自由。他们需要有人来看管他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaGoals
Huh... Not a bad question.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈...问得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizagoals_00049202_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, you got the fun short-term shit. Y'know, make lots of money, get drunk and high and laid as much as possible...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说，你得到了短期的乐趣。赚大钱，喝大酒，不停地操...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizagoals_00049202_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to see more of the world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要更多地看看世界。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizagoals_00049202_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, maybe that isn't practical. More of the country, at least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，也许有点不切实际。但至少多看看这个国家。
