ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizagoals_00049202_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I dunno. Large-scale, I want to see the NCR and the Legion fuck off forever, but I have no plans to be a political assassin, so... Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。我更大的目标是，看到NCR和军团永远消失，但我并不想当一名政治型暗杀者，所以...没错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizagoals_00049202_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, wait, hold on, I just figured it out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，等等，等一下，我现在才知道！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizagoals_00049202_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to get really stoned and have a foursome. Never done that before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的想吸嗨到云里雾里然后来场4P。我还从来没有试过呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizagoals_00049202_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 2
What are your goals?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么理想吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaHardTimes
Like... what? My parents were killed and eaten by raiders? I spent the first half of my life as a slave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哪...种？我父母被掠夺者杀害并吃掉？还是我前半辈子都是一个奴隶？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahardtim_00049204_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, nothing like that. My mom died when I was really young, but, honestly, I was so young I just don't remember her at all. So, no trauma there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，并没有。我很小的时候妈妈就去世了，但是，说实话，我太小以致于对她根本没有印象。所以，没对我造成什么精神伤害。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahardtim_00049204_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wouldn't say my life was perfect, but I had a pretty decent upbringing, all things considered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会说我的生活很完美，但我的成长环境相当不错，从各方面来说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahardtim_00049204_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No worries. I'm still young; life's got plenty of time to break me in half.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用担心。我还很年轻；生活仍然有充足的时间来把我撕裂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahardtim_00049204_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any serious issues in your past?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你过去有什么严重的问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaReno
I know, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizareno_000497fe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 3
Fucking Reno, man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操他妈的新里诺，老兄。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaFlareBabby
Fuck if I know, dude. I think you've gotta be at the tail-end of a three-day jet bender to puzzle that one out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈怎么知道，伙计。我想你得狂吸三天杰特之后才能把那个弄清楚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaflareba_00049800_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Why?
ESP.TRADUIT: ...为什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaEducated
"Surprisingly"...?
ESP.TRADUIT: “出乎意料”...？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaeducate_00049802_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I get you, though. There weren't really any education resources where I grew up, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，尽管我明白你的意思。在我长大的地方可没有任何教育资源，知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaeducate_00049802_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There wasn't much of anything, 'cept snow. Certainly nothing for a little girl to do in her free time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了雪，那里基本没什么东西。当然一个小女孩在空闲时间也无事可做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaeducate_00049802_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... I read anything and everything I could get my hands on. Dad picked up on it, and started going out of his way to get me books.
ESP.TRADUIT: 于是...我阅读任何我能得到的东西。爸爸发现了这点，然后开始到处给我找书看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaeducate_00049802_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I get a bit older, more responsibilities... Then all I had to do was learn to shoot... and read more complicated shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我大一点的时候，责任就更多了...接着我就得学习如何射击...然后读更多复杂的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaeducate_00049802_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As far as formal education goes, it pretty much starts and ends with firearms, but hey, that's a hell of a lot more useful than fucking math.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相对正规教育来说，这基本上都是以枪支开始和结束的，但是，这也比该死的数学要有用多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaeducate_00049802_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 3
You're surprisingly... erudite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是出乎我意料地...博学。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRivasPackage
Couldn't be easier. I just need you to get this package to a guy named Vincent Marino. He works in that Gomorrah place on the Strip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再简单不过了。我只需要你把这个包裹带给一个叫做文森特·马力诺的人。他在赌城的罪恶城赌场里面做事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([0801EADB]aaaElizaQuest) The Girl From North Country EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaaelizaqu_aaarivaspackage_0004a413_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just try to use a little discretion, alright? This is an off-the-books kinda deal, and his employers shouldn't find out about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽量谨慎一点，好吗？这可是私底下的交易，不能让他的老板们知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([0801EADB]aaaElizaQuest) The Girl From North Country EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaaelizaqu_aaarivaspackage_0004a413_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vincent will be paying you for delivery, so no need to come back here... Although you should anyways, because there's more work to be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 文森特会给你报酬，所以不需要回这里来拿钱...但是你也应该回来一下，因为还有更多的事情要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([0801EADB]aaaElizaQuest) The Girl From North Country EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaaelizaqu_aaarivaspackage_0004a413_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go. Have fun in Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拿好了。祝你在维加斯愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07000DBF] (ID) Quest : ([0801EADB]aaaElizaQuest) The Girl From North Country EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\rivasvoice\aaaelizaqu_aaarivaspackage_0004a413_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaGangsterQuest 10 player.additem aaaDrugPackage 1
Alright, fine. What am I doing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。要我做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentPackage
You do? Well, hand it here, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗？好吧，那么把它给我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([08020F03]aaaGangsterQuest) Men of Wealth and Taste EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaagangste_aaavincentpacka_0004a417_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got a package here from your friend in the Great Khans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的大汗帮朋友叫我把这个包裹交给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentDrugDeal
Great, let me just take care of that. Here's your delivery fee.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常好，让我先收起来。这是你的跑腿费。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([08020F03]aaaGangsterQuest) Men of Wealth and Taste EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaagangste_aaavincentdrugd_0004a419_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, our mutual friend told me some good things about you. Said you get things done. That sound about right to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我们共同的朋友跟我讲了很多关于你的好话。说你办事牢靠。听起来貌似是对的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([08020F03]aaaGangsterQuest) Men of Wealth and Taste EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaagangste_aaavincentdrugd_0004a419_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaaDrugPackage 1 player.additem caps001 400
Here. All yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这。都给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentSkills
Don't be a wiseass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别自作聪明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([08020F03]aaaGangsterQuest) Men of Wealth and Taste EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaagangste_aaavincentskill_0004a41b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, I got some side projects going on here. Side projects that the bosses don't need to know about, understand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么说，我有一些分支项目要做。而这些是不需要让老板们知道的，明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([08020F03]aaaGangsterQuest) Men of Wealth and Taste EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaagangste_aaavincentskill_0004a41b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need someone who can get things done. Things I can't personally do myself, deal? There's a lot of money to be made, here. A fucking lot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要能将事情办妥的人。而这些事情我没法自己去做，好吗？这里有大笔的钱等着你去赚。一大笔他妈的钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([08020F03]aaaGangsterQuest) Men of Wealth and Taste EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaagangste_aaavincentskill_0004a41b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's true; I do have a habit of doing things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没错；我习惯将事情搞定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentAcceptQuest
Smart move. Alright, to get started, you'll need to meet my business partner. He'll have some work to get you on the right foot with us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明智的选择。好吧，首先，你要先见见我的生意伙伴。为了让你有个良好的开端，他会给你一些工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([08020F03]aaaGangsterQuest) Men of Wealth and Taste EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaagangste_aaavincentaccep_0004a41d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, head for Freeside. You're looking for this little shithole bar, should be next to that store... What's it... Mike and Ralph's? Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，去自由之城吧。你要找到这个小酒吧，就在那个商店旁边...叫什么...米克与拉尔夫的武器店？没错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([08020F03]aaaGangsterQuest) Men of Wealth and Taste EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaagangste_aaavincentaccep_0004a41d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go there, and head into the... Uh, the private section. Don't worry, they know I'm sending someone their way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到那里，然后去往这个...呃，私密区域。别担心，他们知道是我派你去的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([08020F03]aaaGangsterQuest) Men of Wealth and Taste EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaagangste_aaavincentaccep_0004a41d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're gonna be talking to this shifty little fuck named Sullivan. He'll have something to get you started.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去找那个叫做苏利文的贼眉鼠眼的小混蛋谈话。他会告诉你怎么着手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([08020F03]aaaGangsterQuest) Men of Wealth and Taste EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaagangste_aaavincentaccep_0004a41d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go on, now. There's good money to be made here, so don't take it slow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去吧。这里能赚大钱，所以要赶快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([08020F03]aaaGangsterQuest) Men of Wealth and Taste EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaagangste_aaavincentaccep_0004a41d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaGangsterQuest 20 aaaSullivanDoorREF.unlock
Alright, I'm listening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，我听着呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentDeclineQuest
Fine, then. Get the fuck out of my face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。滚出我的视线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([08020F03]aaaGangsterQuest) Men of Wealth and Taste EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaagangste_aaavincentdecli_0004a41f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaGangsterQuest 15
No thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDealerInventory
Here, take a look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这，看看吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dealer [0804C9AF] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult07\aaamiscdia_aaadealerinvent_0004e1c9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
What do you have?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有些什么货？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaSkills
Guns are my shit, man. I'm partial to assault rifles, but honestly, anything with full-auto is passable with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我拿手的就是枪。我钟爱突击步枪，但说实话，任何全自动的武器我都还可以。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaskills_0004e7c8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm pretty decent at keeping them maintained, too. I've been doing it for long enough, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还很会保养它们。我做这些很长时间了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaskills_0004e7c8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's about it for the practical shit. I'm not any sort of knife-fighter or kung-fu master, but that's why we invented bullets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这都是为了实用。我不是什么用刀行家或者功夫大师，因此我们才发明了子弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaskills_0004e7c8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are your skills?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的技能是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyQuestDone
That right there is the kind of professionalism that gets things done. We're gonna get a crew in there, clean the place up...
ESP.TRADUIT: 要的就是这种能把事情做好的专业精神。我们要派一队人进去，把那地方清理干净...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquestdone_0004fa7f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And what I'm gonna do, I'm gonna give you a nice little bonus for your work, alright? You take this, now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我要做什么呢，我要给你一点不错的奖赏，好吗？拿着这个吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquestdone_0004fa7f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaRoyHoboQuest 30 player.additem caps001 1250
Yeah, the building is all clear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大楼已经清理干净了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyQuestDoneGuilty
Oh, do you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquestdone_0004fa82_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must be imagining their families, I imagine? The people who raised them, seeing how far their children had fallen...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一定是想到了他们的家人吧？他们抚养了这群人，然而却看见自己的孩子死去...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquestdone_0004fa82_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry about that, alright? Greater good, alright? You remember that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，好吗？为了更大的利益，对吗？你要记住这点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquestdone_0004fa82_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, you got the job done, alright? So here's your payment. We're gonna get that building all cleaned up in the meantime, now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，你把工作完成了。这是你的报酬。我们现在得把那栋楼给清理干净。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquestdone_0004fa82_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gonna need some extra abraxo, I imagine. Sounds like it must have been awfully bloody.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想可能需要额外的阿伯莱萨清洁剂。听起来那里一定很血腥。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquestdone_0004fa82_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaRoyHoboQuest 30 player.additem caps001 750
I dealt with it. I feel bad for killing them, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我搞定了。但是我对杀人感觉很不好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it wasn't theirs, you know. They didn't pay anything for it. They just helped themselves on in, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那不是他们的家。他们并没有为此付出过什么。他们只是自己占用了那个地方，知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquestdone_0004fa83_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, you think about where they are now, alright? They're probably shooting up together... Spending time with the Fiends...
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外，你想想他们现在会在哪里？他们可能在一起开枪...跟那些恶魔帮...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquestdone_0004fa83_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're probably gonna finish their stash off, and go out, rob a family at gunpoint... rape the children and then burn 'em all alive...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们可能用光了自己的储存品，然后跑出去，拿枪抢劫别人的家...强奸别人的孩子，然后把他们活活烧死...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquestdone_0004fa83_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So just keep that in mind. Maybe kill the nasty little people, next time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以记住这一点。也许下次应该直接杀了那些讨厌的家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquestdone_0004fa83_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I'm gonna give you your money, and I'm gonna get some people in that building to clean the biological fluids. Alright, here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我要把你应得的钱给你，然后派一些人去那栋楼把现场打扫干净。好了，给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquestdone_0004fa83_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaRoyHoboQuest 30 player.additem caps001 750
It's done. I feel bad for forcing them out of their home, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞定了。但我对强迫他们离开自己的家感到不太好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaThugLady
Uhh... No, ma'am. I just meant... Uh, are you the fixer that Mr. Sullivan was sending?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...不，女士。我只是...呃，你是苏利文先生派来解决问题的人吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thug [08050696] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaapornoquest_aaathuglady_0005069c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do I look like a fucking guy to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得我他妈的像个男人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaThugProceed
The issue is that dickhead director-type. I went to collect the cash, and he told me to go fuck myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题就是那个貌似导演的混蛋。我去收钱，结果他让我自己滚蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thug [08050696] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaapornoqu_aaathugproceed_0005069e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told him that he got five seconds to pay up, and he had some big mutant fucker throw me on the street.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉他给他五秒钟时间交钱，然后他让某个大个子变种人把我扔到了街上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thug [08050696] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaapornoqu_aaathugproceed_0005069e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, what am I supposed to do, get my spine broken over some giant green cocksucker's knee?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说，我还能怎么办，让那个巨大的绿色怪物用膝盖把我的脊椎顶断吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thug [08050696] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaapornoqu_aaathugproceed_0005069e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I've done all I can here, OK? Only other idea I got is to firebomb the fuckin' studio, and that'd torch the money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经做了我所能做的事了，好吗？要么还有一个办法就是把燃烧弹丢进那个工作室，但是那样也会把钱给烧掉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thug [08050696] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaapornoqu_aaathugproceed_0005069e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, y'know, we're good, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，就这样了，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thug [08050696] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaapornoqu_aaathugproceed_0005069e_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaPornoQuest 20
Yeah, that's me. What's the issue, here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，就是我。这里有什么问题？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMagicFrankInventory
Ta-da!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Magic Franklin [08054368] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold02\aaamiscdia_aaamagicfrankin_00054adb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
What are you selling?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你都卖什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaStreetWalkerPrice
200 caps and I'll make your dreams come true.
ESP.TRADUIT: 200瓶盖，我会让你梦想成真。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Prostitute [0804B622] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaastreetwalker_00054adf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Within reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...非常公道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Prostitute [0804B622] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaastreetwalker_00054adf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How much?
ESP.TRADUIT: 多少钱？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaStreetWalkerAccept
Oh my god, I can't even go one night without being hit up for a freebie. Go away...
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢天啊，不去向人讨要免费的赠品的话，我连一个晚上都忍受不了。走开...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Prostitute [0804B622] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaastreetwalker_00054ae1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have that much money...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有那么多钱...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, let's party.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我们来嗨皮吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Prostitute [0804B622] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaastreetwalker_00054ae2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.RemoveItem caps001 200 applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX Player.CIOS WellRestedSpell
Sounds good to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得挺好的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaStreetWalkerDecline
Your loss, sweetheart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是你的损失，亲爱的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Prostitute [0804B622] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaastreetwalker_00054ae4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll pass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用您操心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyWhatNow
Well, that's the kind of question I like to hear!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，这才是我喜欢听到的问题！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroywhatnow_00055731_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I gave you the job I did because I wanted to gauge if you would be an asset.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把我的工作交给你，因为我想评估一下你是否是个有价值的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroywhatnow_00055731_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turns out, you are! I'm ready to cut you in, get you started onto bigger and better things, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实证明你是的！我准备好拉你入伙，让你开始干点大事，但...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroywhatnow_00055731_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, Mr. Marino isn't as trusting as I am. I told him what you were doing for us, he said "it's a good start" and such.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马力诺先生不像我这样信任你。我告诉了他你帮我们做的事情，他就只说了“这是个好的开头”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroywhatnow_00055731_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I respect his business acumen, but I feel he's being a tad unreasonable at the moment. Nonetheless, we'll have to appease him, I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我尊重他的商业头脑，但我觉得他目前稍有一点不太通情理。尽管如此，我想我们会安抚好他的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroywhatnow_00055731_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what I need you to do right now is take a walk on over to Gommorah, find Mr. Marino, and do whatever he needs done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我现在需要你做的就是去罪恶城，找到马力诺先生，然后完成他要你做的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroywhatnow_00055731_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, he'll pay you quite well for this, and I have no doubt you'll excel at whatever he has you do, alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他会付给你很多钱的，而且我毫不怀疑你能出色地完成他要你做的事情，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroywhatnow_00055731_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you just go hurry up and see what he needs so we can get it out of the way as soon as we can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你赶紧去看看他有什么需要，这样我们可以尽快地完成。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroywhatnow_00055731_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You take care, don't get ambushed by street thugs, now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要小心，别被街头的恶棍给偷袭了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroywhatnow_00055731_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaVincentWhoreQuest 10
So, what's next?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，接下来干嘛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMagicFrankTelevision
That's a fine question! But, first, I'd like to ask a question of you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 问得好！但首先，我要先问你个问题！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Magic Franklin [08054368] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold02\aaamiscdia_aaamagicfrankte_00056f25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is... this your card?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这...是你的卡吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Magic Franklin [08054368] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold02\aaamiscdia_aaamagicfrankte_00056f25_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem CardDiamonds9Tops 1
What's with the stack of televisons?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这堆电视机是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGusPowderGanger
Absolutely not. I'm an escaped con. Big fucking difference.
ESP.TRADUIT: 绝对不是。我是个逃犯。完全他妈的不一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gus [08054369] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaamiscdia_aaaguspowdergan_00056f29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I were a Powder Ganger, I'd be shoving sticks of dynamite up little old ladies asses and taking potshots at caravans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我是炸药帮的话，我会随手把炸药插进老妇人的屁眼，或者随意向大篷车队乱开枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gus [08054369] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaamiscdia_aaaguspowdergan_00056f29_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just a guy who was locked up, and then walked the fuck out the front door when the riot started.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是被关了起来，然后趁着骚乱开始的时候从前门逃了出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gus [08054369] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaamiscdia_aaaguspowdergan_00056f29_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, since Westside generally doesn't kowtow to the NCR, I'm not particularly worried about being turned in, or what have you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，由于西区一般不会向NCR屈服，所以我不是特别担心会被举报，或者被抓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gus [08054369] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaamiscdia_aaaguspowdergan_00056f29_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's with the outfit? You a Powder Ganger?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你那身衣服是怎么回事？你是炸药帮的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGusCrimes
Selling state secrets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出卖国家机密。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gus [08054369] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaamiscdia_aaaguscrimes_00056f2b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had some contacts in... "privileged positions" back in California. A lot of interesting information would come across their desks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟某些...加利福利亚的“特权阶级”有些关系。他们的办公桌上会出现许多有趣的信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gus [08054369] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaamiscdia_aaaguscrimes_00056f2b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes, if the information was interesting enough, a copy might happen to wind up in my hands. And from there, well...
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候，如果信息足够有趣，就可能会有一份拷贝流入到我手上。然后就会，呃...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gus [08054369] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaamiscdia_aaaguscrimes_00056f2b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Free market, baby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进入自由市场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gus [08054369] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaamiscdia_aaaguscrimes_00056f2b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why were you locked up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么被关起来？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGusTelevisions
Ugh. Okay, look. Frank likes to play up the "weird old man" angle, alright? Says it makes him memorable, which brings in repeat customers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃。好吧。弗兰克喜欢以“怪老头”的角度来播放。他说这会带来很多回头客，令人难忘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gus [08054369] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaamiscdia_aaagustelevisio_00056f2d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, any weirdness on his part is just a marketing gimmick. Personally, I find it kind of annoying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他这方面的任何古怪行为都只是一个营销手段。对我个人来说，我觉得有点烦人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gus [08054369] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaamiscdia_aaagustelevisio_00056f2d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Course, that might just be bitterness from having to lug a half-dozen of those fucking things in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为不得不把半打这样的垃圾拖到这里来可能是最痛苦的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gus [08054369] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaamiscdia_aaagustelevisio_00056f2d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a good guy, in spite of his... questionable marketing tactics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他还算是个不错的人，如果抛开他...可疑的营销策略不说的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gus [08054369] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaamiscdia_aaagustelevisio_00056f2d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, maybe good is code-word for "he pays me fair, on time, no bullshit."
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许关键是因为“他给的价钱不错，而且及时，不废话”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gus [08054369] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaamiscdia_aaagustelevisio_00056f2d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No complaints here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么好抱怨的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gus [08054369] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaamiscdia_aaagustelevisio_00056f2d_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's with the wall of televisions?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个电视墙是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGusJobs
I handle finances and secure the surplus ammo that Franklin sells.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我处理财务并确保富兰克林所卖的弹药供货充裕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gus [08054369] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaamiscdialogue_aaagusjobs_00057527_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Funny how much can fall from the back of an NCR truck when you grease the right palms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣的是，如果你打点得到位的话，一辆NCR的卡车后面能掉多少东西出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gus [08054369] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaamiscdialogue_aaagusjobs_00057527_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you do here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这儿是做什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaSupportBoS
...Why?
ESP.TRADUIT: ...为什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasupport_00057b38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Serious, now. Their entire purpose in life is to beat off to laser-gun manuals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 严肃地说。他们的全部人生目标就是为了获得激光枪而击退敌人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasupport_00057b38_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, no, wait... They're a group of insular, hostile, self-centered pricks who use their big guns and big armor to rob people of tech...
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，不，等等...他们是群保守，有敌意，以自我为中心的鸟人，用他们的大枪和装甲来抢夺人们的科技...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasupport_00057b38_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're raiders. They're raiders who think they're morally justified 'cause they say: "Give me thine laser rifle, or I shall taketh it by force!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是掠夺者。他们这群掠夺者认为自己在道义上是正当的，因为他们说：“把你的激光枪给我，否则我会动用武力夺走它！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasupport_00057b38_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Instead of the usual raider negotiating tactic of: "Fuckin' die, motherfucker! I'm gonna sell your shit and eat your corpse, blaaargh!"
ESP.TRADUIT: ...而通常掠夺者的谈判策略是：“死吧，杂碎！我要卖掉你的东西然后吃了你的尸体，哇啊啊！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasupport_00057b38_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're douchebags. You, uh... you should reconsider your gushing over 'em, or I'll just figure you for a douchebag, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们都是傻逼。你，呃...你需要重新考虑对他们的过分赞扬，否则我也只能把你当做一个傻逼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasupport_00057b38_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think they've got the right idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得他们的想法是对的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaNeutralBoS
Okay, sure. Fine. You've dealt with them more than I have, so I'll take you at your word.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。你和他们打交道的次数比我多，所以我相信你的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaneutral_00057b3a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, the thing is, though, the shit they do, ahh... their ideology, it's all kinds of fucked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题是，他们做的事情，呃...他们的意识形态，都很糟糕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaneutral_00057b3a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, they aren't at the level of Caesar, raping and crucifying people because they're fucking insane, but so what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的确不像凯撒那样，强暴和把人钉到十字架上，因为凯撒那些人是疯子，但那又怎样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaneutral_00057b3a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At some point, you have to put your foot down and say, y'know, the core tenets of the ideology is overshadowing them not being "bad people".
ESP.TRADUIT: 在某些时候，必须得坚定地说，意识形态的核心原则正在掩盖他们不是“坏人”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaneutral_00057b3a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not that different from NCR, in that regard. Maybe they should kiss and make up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这一点上跟NCR倒没有太大的区别。也许他们应该互相亲吻和好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaneutral_00057b3a_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway. Let's get a move on. We stand here any longer and a fissure's likely to open up under our feet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样。我们还是走吧。我们在这里站的时间再长一点，脚下可能会出现裂缝的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaneutral_00057b3a_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're not bad people, exactly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们其实不是坏人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaFuckBoS
See? This is why I like you. You got a decent head on your shoulders. Rare enough thing these days, I tell you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看？这就是我喜欢你的原因。你有个非常不错的头脑。在如今的日子可并不多见，我跟你说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizafuckbos_00057b3c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't necessarily want to see them all drop dead in their big ol' fancy suits, but if they can't adapt, well... Gotta put 'em down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我并不是非要看到他们穿着那漂亮的装甲死掉，但如果他们不适应的话，呃...还是脱掉它们再死吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizafuckbos_00057b3c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, lets get moving before my leg-muscles atrophy and fall off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，在我腿上的肌肉萎缩之前赶紧走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizafuckbos_00057b3c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 3
The Brotherhood is a relic. They need to shape up, or die off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 钢铁兄弟会是老古董了。他们需要改进，或者消失。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaAlrightResponse1
Yeah, the diagnosis was up in the air for a bit, there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，诊断结果暂时还悬而未决。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaalright_0005814f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seriously, though. You've been pretty cool. Not that I expected you to be an asshole, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，说真的。你真是酷毙了。不像我想的那样是个混蛋，但...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaalright_0005814f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. I haven't met a whole lot of people I got along with to a huge extent. I know some of that's on me, so...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。我还没有遇到过多少能跟我最大限度相处的人。我知道也有我的原因，所以...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaalright_0005814f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I just wanted to say sorry if I came off as kind of an ass, at first. Just wanted to get that out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，如果我表现得像个混蛋的话，我想先对你说声对不起。只是想要把这些话全都吐露出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaalright_0005814f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, uh, let's get back to it! There's money to be earned, and Legionaries that need killing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，呃，让我们继续吧！还有钱等着要赚，还有军团的人要杀！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaalright_0005814f_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, good. I was worried.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，好。我很担心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaAlrightResponse2
Well, that's all I needed to hear. Hear that, Mojave? There are two alright people standing right here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样说就够了。莫哈维，你听见了吗？这儿有两个好人站在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaalright_00058151_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seriously though, you've been cooler than I expected. Which isn't to say I expected you to be a prick, exactly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过说真的，你比我想象的还要酷。但我并不是说想象你是个烂人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaalright_00058151_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know I can be a bit shitty sometimes, so... Sorry, if that's how I came off. Just defaulting on my instincts, and I know that kinda sucks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道我有时会有点令人讨厌，所以...对不起，如果我之前是这么表现的话。只是我的直觉造成的，我知道那样比较混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaalright_00058151_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, just wanted to clear my chest there. So, let's get moving before a bunch of cazadors fall from the sky around us. Lead on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么样，我只是想吐露一下我的心迹。那么，趁着一群群大毒蜂从天上掉下来包围我们之前，我们赶紧走吧。带路吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaalright_00058151_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, thanks. Same to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，谢谢。你也是？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaAlrightResponse3
Alright, don't be a dick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，别傻了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaalright_00058755_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seriously though, you've been cooler than I expected. Which isn't to say I expected you to be a prick, exactly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过说真的，你比我想象的还要酷。但我并不是说想象你是个烂人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaalright_00058755_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know I can be a bit shitty sometimes, so... Sorry, if that's how I came off. Just defaulting on my instincts, and I know that kinda sucks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道我有时会有点令人讨厌，所以...对不起，如果我之前是这么表现的话。只是我的直觉造成的，我知道那样比较混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaalright_00058755_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, just wanted to clear my chest there. So, let's get moving before a bunch of cazadors fall from the sky around us. Lead on!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么样，我只是想吐露一下我的心迹。那么，趁着一群群大毒蜂从天上掉下来包围我们之前，我们赶紧走吧。带路吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaalright_00058755_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's... that's super, Eliza. Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这...这太棒了，伊莉莎。谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaFiends
Man, I gotta be honest, I feel bad for most of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，我说真的，我对他们大多数人感觉都很不好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizafiends_00058757_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of them are just regular people who're so fucked up on chems, they can't even think rationally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们大多数人不过都是被毒品所害的普通人，他们甚至不能理性地思考。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizafiends_00058757_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How many of them you think actually revel in hurting people, compared to how many are just pumped full of psycho and jet and god knows what else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得相比较他们磕疯狂药和杰特等毒品带来的快感，还会有多少人真正地拿残害他人来狂欢作乐？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizafiends_00058757_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You kill a Jackal, Viper, Powder Ganger, or Legion asshole, no problem. That's the consequence of their actions, so whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你杀掉豺狼帮，毒蛇帮，炸药帮，或者军团，没问题。这都是他们为自己行为付出的后果，所以无所谓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizafiends_00058757_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't always say the same for Fiends. I'll still defend myself, mind you. I just might feel a little bad about it, afterwards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不能总是这么说恶魔帮。我还是要为自己辩解一下。但我只是事后会感觉有点不好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizafiends_00058757_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any opinions on the Fiends?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对恶魔帮有什么看法吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaHateFiends
I'll keep that philosophy in mind, next time I see you indulge in something past the point I find fucking acceptable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会把这个态度记到脑海里，下次我再看到你沉迷于一些离题的事情，我就他妈的容易接受多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahatefie_00058759_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahatefie_00058759_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval - 3
If you say so. As far as I'm concerned, they're rabid dogs, and they need to be put down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你这么说。据我所知，他们都是疯狗，而且需要被打倒。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaFiendsAgree
That it is. Best case scenario, maybe some of them will drift back into society if their leadership collapses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。最佳方案是如果他们的领导力崩溃，也许他们一些人能够回归社会中来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizafiendsa_0005875b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ordinarily, I'd say that outside forces should try to help them out. The Followers being the obvious candidates, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常，我想说外部势力应该尝试帮助他们。当然追随者是明显的候选者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizafiendsa_0005875b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, of course, Fiends are usually too doped up to give a shit, so that'd just be a blood bath.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，当然恶魔帮通常太过于沉迷毒品而不会在乎，所以那会变成一场屠杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizafiendsa_0005875b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless the Khans all get day jobs as addiction counselors, I don't see any real solution in sight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非大汗帮全都转职做戒毒辅导员，否则我看不到任何解决办法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizafiendsa_0005875b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What a mess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是糟透了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizafiendsa_0005875b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 3
It's a tough situation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 形势很严峻。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaFiendSympathy
Hard to say. I'd... hesitate to call them organized, but there is some loose structure to them. I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很难说。我...不敢说他们都有组织，但还是有一些松散的结构。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizafiendsy_0005875d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe if that were to collapse, you'd get some of them wandering off for greener pastures. Maybe integrate with whatever community they bump into.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许如果它崩溃了，你可以让他们中的一些人去寻找更好的地方。也许能融入他们遇到的任何社区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizafiendsy_0005875d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'd also help if the NCR didn't take heavy military action against them. Not that I expect subtle, diplomatic nuance from the NCR, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果NCR不对他们实施如此重大的军事行动的话也会有点帮助。我并不期望NCR采用微妙的外交细节，但是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizafiendsy_0005875d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I don't think being shot at by fucking soldiers is a particularly good way to start a dialogue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不觉得被他妈的士兵给打死是开始对话的特别好的途径。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizafiendsy_0005875d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... Probably, most of them are beyond help. It sucks, but I guess that's life out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...也许，他们中的大多数人都无药可救。虽然很糟，但我想这就是命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizafiendsy_0005875d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad at least someone's spared them a single thought, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管如此，还是很高兴至少有人没有对他们不屑一顾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizafiendsy_0005875d_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 5
You think they could be helped?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为他们能得到帮助吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaNonspecificIdle
aaaElizaUlysses1
Wow, that was weird. Did you hear that? Your eyebot was making, like, toilet sounds for a solid 10-20 minutes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，真奇怪。你听见了吗？你的眼球机器人持续10-20分钟在发出厕所的声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments Comment (NAM2) : Blistering sarcasm EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizaulysses_00058d5c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaUlysses2
Christ. I'd shove that asshole's transceiver down his throat when we find him, 'cept he'd still probably be death-rattling for a half hour.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老天啊。当我们找到他的时候我要把那个混蛋的无线收发器塞到他喉咙里去，除非他还能响上半个小时。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizaulysses_00058d5e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaUlysses3
Yeah, keep talking, asshole. You'll get yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好啊，继续说啊，混蛋。你早晚会有报应。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizaulysses_00058d60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaGoodspringsComments
aaaElizaUlysses4
That's why I don't trust robots. You alright? Just a little jolt, yeah? C'mon, we owe this Ulysses cunt a skull full of lead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是为什么我不信任机器人的原因。你还好吗？有一点震惊，对吗？来吧，我们还得给这个尤利西斯的脑袋里好好灌满铅。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizaulysses_00059371_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 1
aaaElizaFuckUlysses
There he is, that asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他就在那里，那个混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizafuckuly_0005996e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at that. He ain't even facing the door. What a fucking moron.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看那里。他甚至都不面向门这边。真他妈的白痴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizafuckuly_0005996e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if he wants to make this easy for us, I won't hold it against him. Take a rifle, and pop him in the back of the head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他想让我们轻松点，我是不会埋怨他的。拿起步枪，从背后爆了他的头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizafuckuly_0005996e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaPlayerFuckUlysses
Beautiful. I bet he's got some eight-hour speech all prepped for you, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 漂亮。我打赌他肯定也为你准备了一场8个小时的演讲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizaplayerf_00059970_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 3
setenemy aaaElizaFaction NVDLC04UlyssesFaction 0 setenemy PlayerFaction NVDLC04UlyssesFaction 0
I like the way you think. Let's put this prick in the dirt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢你的思维方式。让我们把这个混蛋埋到土里去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaWhyHateUlysses
Is that a serious question? You have more cause than I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是认真问的吗？你比我有更多的缘由。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizawhyhate_00059972_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a fucking lunatic. Nothing he says makes any fucking sense, and he's delusional enough to figure that everyone else is just as crazy as him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个他妈的疯子。他说的东西都不靠谱，他妄想其他人都和他一样疯狂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizawhyhate_00059972_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of retard sees a courier doing their job and comes away from it thinking "Ah, this person must have a deep connection with this place."
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是个脑残，看到一个邮差做他们的工作，就脱离出来想到 “啊，这个人一定和这个地方有很深的联系。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizawhyhate_00059972_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If frequent visits to a location were indicative of some kind of spiritual connection, then we'd all be intrinsically linked to fucking bathrooms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果频繁访问某个地点就表示某种心灵上的联系的话，那我们都和他妈的澡堂有本质的联系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizawhyhate_00059972_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And what the fuck is this bullshit about "destroying your home, because you destroyed his" or whatever his point is?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有“毁掉你的家园，因为你毁了他的”这是什么屁话？不管他的意思是什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizawhyhate_00059972_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Woop-de-doo, you delivered an unmarked package that happened to contain a detonator. How are you morally culpable for that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你送来了一个没有标记的包裹，里面正好有一个引爆器。你怎么会因此受到道德上的责备？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizawhyhate_00059972_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It'd be like if a raider shot me, so I go and beat the gun's manufacturer to death. That doesn't make any fucking sense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就好像有个掠夺者用枪打了我，我就去把造枪的人给打死一样。那他妈也太说不通了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizawhyhate_00059972_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, oh my god, all this self-aggrandizing bullshit about creating and destroying nations. What the fuck is that?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢我的天，动不动就是创造和毁灭国家。这他妈到底是什么鬼？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizawhyhate_00059972_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's... it's fucking nukes! He hasn't uncovered some ancient secret or buried philosophy! He just has big things that go boom!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这...这他妈的是核弹！他发现的并不是什么古老的秘密或者隐藏的哲学！他只是发现了一些会爆炸的大家伙！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizawhyhate_00059972_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But he acts like he's the only one in the universe smart and special enough to do this, when he's just a dumb tribal with PTSD.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是他表现得好像他就是这个宇宙里最聪明和最特别的做这件事情的人，他不过只是一个有着创伤后应激障碍的愚蠢部落人罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizawhyhate_00059972_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I could forgive all of that, and just write him off as another prick who deserves a bullet to the brain without any thought...
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我都可以原谅，只把他当成一个应该不假思索地给他大脑一颗子弹的混蛋...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizawhyhate_00059972_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But he's so fucking in love with his own bullshit that he feels the need to wax poetic about his dumbshit world-views for as long as possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是他是如此地喜欢他那套狗屁理论，所以他觉得有必要尽可能地对那傻逼的世界观充满诗意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizawhyhate_00059972_12.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hate him. I hate his stupid gravel-gargling voice, I hate his self-righteous fucking speeches, I hate his fucking self pity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我讨厌他。我讨厌他那就像用沙子磨过喉咙发出的声音，我讨厌他那自视清高的演讲，我讨厌他那些自怨自艾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizawhyhate_00059972_13.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, do the world a fucking favor, and ice this motherfucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，替世界做件好事吧，干掉这个杂碎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizawhyhate_00059972_14.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really seem to hate Ulysses. Why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来真的很讨厌尤利西斯。为什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaUlyssesBribe
I... will pay you a thousand caps not to do that. No bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...宁愿花1000瓶盖让你别这么做。不开玩笑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizaulysses_00059974_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I at least want to hear him out, first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先我想至少听他说完。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaTakeBribe
Funny how often capitalism is the death of the pretentious and the fucking insufferable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可笑的是，自命不凡和难以忍受往往死于资本主义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizatakebri_00059976_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go. This right here- this is money well spent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你。就在这——这笔钱花得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizatakebri_00059976_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 1
setenemy aaaElizaFaction NVDLC04UlyssesFaction 0 setenemy PlayerFaction NVDLC04UlyssesFaction 0 player.additem caps001 1000
Yeah, alright. I've killed people for less.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，是的。我还因为更小的事杀过人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaRefuseBribe
Ugh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizarefuseb_00059978_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval - 1
Calm down. I just want to hear what his plan is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静。我只是想听听他的计划是什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaPlayerLovesUlysses
Well, you're both assholes, and kinda dumb. So, you can have a long, long conversation about those similarities, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们都是混蛋，而且愚蠢。关于你们的相似点，你们可以进行一个长长的对话了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizaplayerl_0005997a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval - 3
Quiet. I'm not shooting him without talking it out, first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 安静。没有把话说完我不会先向他开枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaNellisComments
aaaElizaForlornHope
aaaElizaBittersprings
aaaElizaFreeside
aaaElizaJacobstown
aaaElizaPervertClowns
Hmm, yeah... I guess "fucking pervert clown society" wouldn't fit on their business cards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...我想“变态小丑社团”这个名字不太适合印在他们的名片上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizapervert_0005bd91_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationBittersprings
I bet they didn't even wait for the bodies to cool down before they started setting up those fucking tents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打赌在他们开始搭建他妈的帐篷之前，甚至都没有等尸体冷却下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005b180_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "The only reason anyone has a problem with the NCR is the taxes!" Yeah, that's the only reason. Jesus Christ...
ESP.TRADUIT: “人们唯一对NCR有异议的地方就是交税！”是的，那就是唯一的原因。天啊...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005b17f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Massacre a bunch of noncombatants, give a token apology, and then set up a command tent on top of the graves. It's the NCR way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 屠杀一群手无寸铁的人，象征性地道个歉，然后把指挥中心建在坟墓上面。这就是NCR。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005b181_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If this were my family, I'd dedicate every last moment of my life to making the republic bleed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们是我的家人的话，我会穷尽我生命的每一刻来让NCR血偿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005b182_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try to make their own murders out as victims... "I shot a sick old woman in the head and hit the little girl behind her. God, think of how I feel!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 把他们自己的杀人犯当作受害者...“我向一个生病的老妇人的头开枪，还从背后打死了一个小女孩。上帝啊，想想我的感受吧！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments Comment (NAM2) : emph I EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005b183_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationOutpost
Maybe people would be more tolerant of NCR taxes if they didn't know the money was funding stupid shit like that ugly statue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果人们不知道他们交的税被用来建造那个丑陋的傻逼雕像的话，也许他们会对NCR的税收表现得更宽容些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005ed9c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, the unification treaty got the NCR an elite branch of badasses to fight for them, and it got the Rangers cessation of existence. Nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 统一条约使NCR获得了一个牛逼的精英分支部队为他们而战，也让游骑兵终止了存在。太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005ed9d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't believe no one's breaking down all that dead traffic on the road leading up here. Hard work, but someone will always pay for scrap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不敢相信居然没有人把通往这里的路上所有的坏车都清除掉。虽然工作很艰巨，但总有人会为废品花钱的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005ed9e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place could use more services and less hobos. Not like any of these grunts will be using their rifles here. Gotta have some surplus ammo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地方需要更多的服务和更少游手好闲的人。不像这里使用步枪的大兵们。得有些充裕的弹药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005f3a8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would it have killed them to put a little more effort into that statue? It's literally made of trash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那尊雕像上多花一点功夫会要他们的命吗？这简直是垃圾做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_000ad7fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationHope
Behold, the awesome military might of the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看啊，NCR那令人敬畏的军事力量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005b17a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Feel sorry for that radio-tender they got here. Would not want to be the only lady in a camp full of depressed dudes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我同情那个无线情报员。她可能不想成为这个全是意志消沉的大老爷们的营地里唯一的女性。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005b17b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The air seem especially dusty to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不觉得空气特别脏吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005b17c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, they send an elite sniper unit in to kill Khan babies, while they ship their bottom-tier grunts here to die on the front lines. Nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们把精英狙击手派去杀大汗帮的儿童，却把他们最底层的士兵派到前线来送死。太好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005b17d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? You're telling me that the troops stationed at Camp Forlorn Hope are demoralized? Get out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？你跟我说驻扎在一线生机营地里的部队士气低落？走开啦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005eda8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Morale might be a little bit higher if they changed the camp name to literally anything else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们把营地换个别的名字的话，士气可能会高一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0006c61c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationFreeside
Let's see, compete over who has the biggest hair, or keep their own streets safe? Glad to see the Kings made the right call.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们来看看，是要最酷的发型，还是维持自己街道的安全呢？很高兴猫王帮做了正确的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005b787_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cerulean Robotics is supposed to be around here, right? Name sure comes up an awful lot for a tiny pre-war manufacturer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天蓝机器人技术公司就在这附近，对吗？这个名字对战前一个小生产商来讲有点太高大上了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005b789_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Food is kinda scarce here, if you ain't rich. If this place devolves into cannibalism, I hope they eat the street criers first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的食物有点缺乏，如果你没钱的话。如果这个地方移交给食人族管理的话，我希望他们先把街上的罪犯给吃掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005b78a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Should hit up the Wrangler, if we have the time. Play a few hands, get wasted, pay a hooker to touch your butt... good times. Just saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们有时间的话，应该去原子牛仔嗨一下。玩几把牌，喝个够，找个妓女摸摸屁股...美妙的时光啊。只是说说而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005eda6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some people say that murdering children is unforgivable. Those people have never met that little bastard advertising Mick and Ralph's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人说杀害儿童是不可饶恕的。那只是没有遇到给米克与拉尔夫打广告的那个小杂种而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005eda7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There used to be this junkie here, told everyone jet let him see the future. A mugger stabbed him in the throat. Guess he didn't see that coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以前这里有个瘾君子，告诉每个人杰特让他看到了未来。一个抢劫犯用刀刺穿了他的喉咙。我猜他并没预料到这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0006c617_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In theory, I'm actually a big fan of the Kings. In practice... Bunch of twats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 理论上，我是猫王帮的忠实粉丝。而实际上...他们只是一群讨厌鬼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0008f126_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationGoodsprings
Sunny Smiles. There's no way that's her real name... is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 笑得真灿烂。那绝对不是她的真名...对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00058d62_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Want to check out the bar? I hear that all sorts of weirdos congregate there. Might be able to get some work, yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 想去酒吧看看吗？我听说那里聚集着各种各样的怪人。也许能找到工作，是吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00058d63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are half these houses boarded up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么这些房子有一半是用木板封起来的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00058d64_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't see any springs around here, good or otherwise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我并没有看到这里有任何泉水，这是好还是不好呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00059f78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is your grave plot still up in the cemetery? Look, I don't want to tell you how to live your life, but, uh... you need to bang someone in that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的坟还在墓地里吗？我不想告诉你应该怎么生活，但，呃...你应该把某个人干死然后扔那里面去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00059f79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationJacobstown
Oh man, it's great up here. Reminds me of home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，这里很棒。使我想起了家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005b78d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mutants must not feel cold. No one's wearing shirts around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 变种人一定不会感到寒冷。这附近还没人穿着衬衫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005b78f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It feels great up here. Didn't think I'd be seeing snow again any time soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里真棒。没想到我这么快又能再看到雪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005eda4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never could make any sense out of people who hate the cold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对那些讨厌寒冷的人来说没有任何意义。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005eda5_1.ogg
