ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank god for cold, fresh air. I can finally breathe again. Mojave's probably put a pound of dust in my lungs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢寒冷新鲜的空气。我终于又能呼吸了。我可能在莫哈维吸了一磅的灰尘进我的肺里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0008f127_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationNellis
Of course. A totally independent community of people who somehow match my love of firearms. Of course they're violently xenophobic. Goddamn it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。一个完全独立的社区，并且符合我对枪支的热爱。当然他们也极度排外。该死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00059f74_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh man, did you see that chick with the automatic grenade-launcher thing back there? This place is awesome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，你看到那个手拿自动榴弹发射器的姑娘了吗？这地方真棒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00059f75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Think they'd notice if I took one of those cool bomber jackets?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我拿走其中一件超酷的大炮族夹克他们会不会发现啊？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00059f76_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just so we're clear about it- that master-at-arms at the front gate? I call dibs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样我们搞清楚了——前门那个警卫长？我有权利要求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00059f77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I managed to haul an ICBM over here, you think these guys'd make me an honorary member?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我能把洲际弹道导弹拖过来，你说这些家伙会不会让我成为荣誉会员？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005eda9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationNovac
I can't believe they put a sniper nest in that giant gecko's mouth, instead of a massive fucking flamethrower. Missed opportunity, just saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我无法相信他们在那个巨大的蜥蜴嘴巴里面设置一个狙击点，而不是一个巨大的他妈的喷火器。错过机会了，只是说说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00059f7b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who named this place Novac? There's a thirty foot gecko statue in the middle of town, and they didn't name the place Geckopolis? Come on...
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁给这里取名叫诺瓦克的？这个镇中心有座30尺高的蜥蜴雕像，他们怎么不取名叫做蜥蜴城呢？哎...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00059f7c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You think this place is big enough to warrant a whorehouse? No? There has to at least be a bar somewhere... I hope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得这地方的大小来看会有妓院吗？不？这儿至少应该有个酒吧吧...我希望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00059f7d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My name is Dinky, king of kings. Look on my works, ye mighty, and despair.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫做大嘴，万王之王。看看我的作品，你们强大而又绝望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments Comment (NAM2) : This is my favorite joke. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00059f7e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, this is why we need to boot the NCR and Legion out of here. Can you imagine the heinous shit they'd do to Dinky if they took charge?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，这就是为什么我们要把NCR和军团都给踢出去的原因。你能想象如果他们接管了这个地方，会对大嘴做出多么恶毒的事情吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005f3a9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You like downers? Doctor around here can provide if you've got the money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你喜欢镇定剂？如果你有钱，这里的医生会向你提供的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005f3aa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaGeneralBarks
Someone a while back told me how much he enjoyed mutfruit. Is... is that how you say it? I've been saying mutfruit... I think I prefer my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不久之前有人告诉我他有多喜爱变异果。你...你是这么叫它的吗？我一直叫成变异果...我觉得我更喜欢我的叫法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_00058760_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh. Well, now I'm curious if there's anything going on in Mexico. Wait, let me guess: Crazy people with guns?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼。我很好奇墨西哥现在是什么情况。等等，让我猜猜：疯狂的人们拿着枪？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_00063047_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad to see someone else who knows how to maintain their weapons around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴看到这儿有人知道如何维护他们的武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_00063046_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...You totally banged Tabitha, didn't you? That's nasty. Was it good?
ESP.TRADUIT: ...你完全把塔比瑟干翻了，是吗？那太恶心了。这样好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_00063045_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like coyotes. I'm glad, uh... glad they're doing okay for themselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢郊狼。我很高兴，呃...它们自己过得还不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_00058761_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever run into one of those people who sing to themselves to fill silence? Fucking annoying...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你曾经碰到过那些唱给自己听以填补沉默的人吗？真他妈烦人...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_00058762_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Gun Runners manufacture weapons from scratch, right? What the fuck is up with their over/under shotguns? Some intern making them in his garage?
ESP.TRADUIT: 军火贩子是白手起家开始制造武器的，对吧？他们的霰弹枪是怎么回事？是一些实习生在他的车库里做的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0005b184_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mojave is lucky that Caesar's idiots are the only organized raider tribe they gotta deal with. The 80s would fuck this place up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 莫哈维很幸运，凯撒手下的笨蛋们就是唯一需要对付的有组织的掠夺者。80年代团伙会把这个地方搞得一团糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0005b185_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How have bloatflies managed to survive as a species?
ESP.TRADUIT: 辐射蝇是怎么生存下来成为一个物种的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0005b186_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Best racist joke, go!
ESP.TRADUIT: 最佳种族主义笑话，走！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0007679b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember to stay hydrated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记得保持水分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0005b187_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You reload your own brass? I never buy raw materials, myself. Way faster and cheaper to buy surplus in bulk and break 'em down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你重新装填了铜管？我自己从来不买原材料。而是以更快更便宜的方式大量购买多余的商品然后分解它们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_00068ffd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damnit, how does sand keep getting in my boots?
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，沙子怎么老是跑到鞋里面去？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0005edac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe those NCR hit-squads should team up with the Legion ones to take you down. No? Just a suggestion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许那些NCR突击队应该跟军团的人联合起来打败你。只是个建议而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0005f9b8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, look at that. The NCR and the Legion both hate you and want your head on a stick. Maybe they have common ground, after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看哪。NCR和军团都恨你，想把你的头插在棍子上。毕竟也许他们有共同点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0005f9b9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aren't Rangers supposed to be the best the NCR has to offer? How the fuck can they afford to waste so many head-hunting you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 派游骑兵来难道不是NCR最好的选择吗？为什么他们要浪费那么钱来悬赏你？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0005f9b7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, Boone. I've got an idea: Next gunfight we get into, you keep yourself busy by murdering some kids, and you stop stealing my fucking kills.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，布恩。我有个主意：下一场枪战时，你就继续忙着杀小孩，别抢我的人头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0005f9bf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why're you so enthusiastic about hand-to-hand? Does the Brotherhood have a stash of Bruce Lee holotapes or something? ...Because that would be cool.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么这么热衷于肉搏？难道说兄弟会里面有一堆李小龙的全息卡带吗...因为那会很酷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0005f9c1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I get the idea behind nuking places like New York, or D.C. or whatever, but... why waste bombs on Vegas, of all places?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能理解用核弹去炸纽约，华盛顿什么的，但是...为什么要浪费炸弹来炸维加斯呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0006fc01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sleeping under the stars must be weird in comparison to that bunker. If you get cold, uh, you just let me know. I'll warm you right up. Offer stands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和那个地堡相比，睡在星空下一定很奇怪。如果你觉得冷，呃，你就告诉我。我会让你温暖起来。随时服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0005f9c3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aren't the Brotherhood supposed to be a bunch of hard-ass tech-cultists in goofy armor? You sure you're a member?
ESP.TRADUIT: 兄弟会不是一群穿着愚蠢装甲的技术狂徒吗？你确定是他们的一员？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0005f9c2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... you like fisting things, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么...你喜欢用拳打破东西，哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments Comment (NAM2) : snickering EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0005f9c0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Must be a nice change of pace for you, huh, Boone? You know- killing folks who're actually fighting back. I can do this all day, asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对你来说一定是个不错的改变，哈，布恩？你知道的——要杀就杀那些会反击的人。我能一直这么做，混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0005f9be_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on, you couldn't spare a single paycheck to buy a shotgun that isn't held together with twine and happy thoughts?
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，你难道不能够花钱买下一把用细绳和快乐的想法紧紧绑在一起的霰弹枪吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0005f9c6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't mind you getting plastered while we work, cowgirl, but I expect you to share.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不介意你在我们工作的时候喝醉，女牛仔，但我希望你能分享。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0005f9c5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know that performance is way more important than looks, but goddamn those 12.7mm pistols are ugly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道性能比外表更重要，但是那些该死的12.7毫米手枪也太丑了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_00062a11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Somehow they've never scavenged a single fucking rock album, but they got twenty copies of "Uncle Fuzzy's Greatest Inoffensive Hits." Fuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知怎的，他们从来没有捡到过一张摇滚专辑，但是他们却有20份“毛毛叔叔精选合集“的拷贝。操。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0006c01b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I considered working as a caravan guard, once. I didn't, of course. A second apocalypse couldn't get me up that fucking early.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经考虑过当一名商队守卫。但我没有。就算是第二次世界末日来了也不能让我那么早就起床。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0005f9c4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "The last thing you never see." Yeah, 'cause they're geriatric and half-blind, right? I mean, you didn't just kill kids at Bitter Springs, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: ”你从未见过的最后一件事“。是的，因为他们又老又瞎，对吗？我的意思是，你没有在苦泉镇杀过小孩，是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0005f9bd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Robot, uhh, execute override command... gamma. Initiate transfer of all government secrets to user Kinney, Eliza, J. ...No? Well, I tried.
ESP.TRADUIT: 机器人，呃，超驰指令...伽马。启动传输所有政府秘密给用户金尼，伊莉莎...不行吗？好吧我试过了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0006c01d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Beep-boop, motherfucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哔哔啵啵，操你妈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0006c01c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't ask for much. All I need is an AK, a full magazine... maybe some bourbon... Plenty of caps... A couple sexy strangers... You getting this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的要求不多。我只需要一把AK，一个装满子弹的弹夹...也许再来点波旁威士忌...足够的瓶盖...一对性感的陌生人...你明白了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_00068ffc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uhh... Nice enough weather, I guess? ...Look, I'm trying to pretend you don't scare the hell out of me, alright, grandma?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...天气真好...我只是想装作你没吓到我好吗，奶奶？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0005f9bb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... Do stealth boys turn mutants blue, or are the blue mutants the only ones who are allowed to become Nightkin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么...隐身小子把变种人变成蓝色，还是说蓝色变种人是唯一能变成夜行者的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0005f9ba_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ten caps says those Legion assassin idiots will try to bushwhack us before the day's out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我赌10瓶盖，今天过后那些军团刺客傻逼们会来伏击我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizageneral_0005edad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaWeaponRepair
Sure, let me have a look at it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以，让我看看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaweaponr_0005edaf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: PlaySound UIRepairWeapon; Player.ModWeaponHealthPerc 35;
Could you fix my weapon a bit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能帮我修一下武器吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationNCRCF
"Alright, our jailbreak was a success! We're free from the NCR!" "Now what?" "Let's stay in prison!"
ESP.TRADUIT: “好了，我们越狱成功了！我们逃离NCR了！”“现在怎么办？”“我们继续待在监狱里！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005f3ac_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, this is the prison? How in the hell did all those escapees come from this one little shithole?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，这里是监狱？怎么所有那些逃犯他妈都会来自于这个粪坑的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005f3ad_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The dynamite was kinda overkill, huh? I could have this place wide open with five minutes and a pair of tin snips.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用炸药是不是太过火了？我只要用一把铁皮剪5分钟就能把这地方打开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005f3ae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't see any showering facilities. Guess that solves that particular mystery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有看到任何淋浴设施。我猜这解开了这个不同寻常的秘密。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005f3af_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, look! The NCR fucked up and the Mojave suffers for it. Guess there's a first time for everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，看！NCR搞砸了，倒霉的是莫哈维。凡事都有第一次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a2a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMaddieDragger
Oh, you did? Great. You have the ear, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，是吗？太好了。你有他的耳朵，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbo_aaamaddiedragge_000605ef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, that's, uhh... That's nasty. Hmm, well, good work. It won't undo anything he did, but at least justice is served, and all that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，这，呃...这真恶心。嗯，干得好。虽然不能弥补他犯下的事情，但是至少正义得到了伸张。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbo_aaamaddiedragge_000605ef_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's the payout. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是给你的酬劳。干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbo_aaamaddiedragge_000605ef_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 650 player.removeitem aaaDraggerEar 1 set aaaGrafsBounty.aaaMaddieTargets to aaaGrafsBounty.aaaMaddieTargets + 1
I killed Dragger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀掉了拖钩。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMaddieGraf
You did, huh? He was a nasty one, so I hope you're right. You got his ear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是吗，哈？他是个讨厌的人，所以我希望你没事。你拿到他的耳朵了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbo_aaamaddiegraf_000605f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, yes, that's his. Good work. Wish we could've done this before he did what he did, but... Well. That's not how it works.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，没错就是它。干得好。本希望在他做出那些事情之前就杀了他的，但...事情不是这么发展的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbo_aaamaddiegraf_000605f1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your payout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的酬劳。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbo_aaamaddiegraf_000605f1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 500 player.removeitem aaaGrafEar 1 set aaaGrafsBounty.aaaMaddieTargets to aaaGrafsBounty.aaaMaddieTargets + 1
I killed Graf.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我干掉了格拉夫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMaddieStanley
Best news I've got all week, if that's true. You got his ear, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这是真的，那就是我本周听到的最好的消息了。你拿到他的耳朵了，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbo_aaamaddiestanle_000605f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, look at that. He had this coming for a long time. Sick asshole. I imagine his victims will feel... maybe a little bit better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，看看这个。他很久以前就该由此报应了。变态的杂种。我想他的受害者们...也许会感觉好一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbo_aaamaddiestanle_000605f3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: More important is that he won't be hurting anyone else. Here's your money. Nice work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 更重要的是他再也没法再伤害别人了。这是你的钱。干得漂亮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbo_aaamaddiestanle_000605f3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 1000 player.removeitem aaaStanleyEar 1 set aaaGrafsBounty.aaaMaddieTargets to aaaGrafsBounty.aaaMaddieTargets + 1
I killed Stanley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我干掉了斯坦利。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationFiends
Hey, eyes open. Don't need to get bushwhacked by Fiends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，眼睛睁大点。别被恶魔帮伏击了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_000617e8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fiends are pretty well-armed. Wonder how that started... Vault armory, maybe?
ESP.TRADUIT: 恶魔帮的装备相当不错。我怀疑都是从哪弄来的...也许是避难所军火库吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_000617e9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever get the chance to hop in the sack with a Fiend, you gotta do it. All that crazy can manifest itself in some pretty... interesting ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你曾经有机会跟恶魔帮的人同床共枕。所有这些疯狂都可以以一些非常...有趣的方式表现出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_000617ea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personally, I got no problem just taking the scenic route around Vegas. Let's not fuck up here, alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: 以我个人来说，在拉斯维加斯风景优美的路上行走是没问题的。我们别在这里搞砸了，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0006c61a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationBoulder
Ah, yes, this smoking crater has a bar nearby, if I'm remembering right. The human spirit is just great sometimes, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，是的，这个冒烟的坑附近有个酒吧，如果我没记错的话。人的精神有时是伟大的，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_000617ec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wonder if anyone lived here before Hoover dam... And, uh, after the Great War, obviously.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怀疑在胡佛大坝战争之前这里有没有人居住...呃，当然我是说在大战之后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_000617ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Careful. Pretty easy to trip on some rubble, stick yourself on a length of rebar, and suffer the most anti-climactic death imaginable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心。碎石很容易将人绊倒, 使人栽倒在一根钢筋上被刺穿，然后你就会得到一种毫无气势的死亡方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_000617ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationNelson
I hope no one lived here before the NCR and Legion showed up...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望在NCR和军团出现之前这里没有人居住...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_000617f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion... Fucking savages. No hope for any survivors here, huh? Well, there won't be if I have any say about it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团...都是他妈的野蛮人。这里不可能有幸存者了，哈？要我说的话，这里不会有了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_000617f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The fact that the NCR hasn't wiped the Legion out of existence might be the least forgivable aspect of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR最不可原谅的事情就是没有把军团完全消灭掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_000617f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This shit... this is making my trigger finger itchy. Let's find some of those Legion cunts and settle the score.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这...这让我扣扳机的手指又痒了。让我们找那些军团的杂种报仇去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_000617f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationRangers
I respect these guys. Just... not the flag they're fighting under.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我尊敬这些人。只是...除了他们为之战斗的那面旗帜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00061ded_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR is everywhere... except in the places that might actually need them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到处都是NCR...除了真正需要他们的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00061dee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not sure how practical the dusters are, but they look cool... I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道防尘衣是不是实用，但他们看起来很酷...我认为。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00061def_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sure this is an NCR outpost? I don't see any land-grabbers or political whores.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定这是一个NCR的前哨站？我没有看见任何强占土地的人或者政治婊子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0006c61d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationFort1
Hope you brought a lot of ammo, partner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望你带够了子弹，伙伴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00061df2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slavers... fucking scum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奴隶贩子...妈的人渣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00061df3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most assholes, I'm satisfied with just shooting. Slavers and their types, though... Burn 'em all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对大多数混蛋我直接射死就好。但对于奴隶贩子这种，那要...烧死他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00061df4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationFort2
What, you drop your keys or something? Why are we back here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，你钥匙掉了还是怎么的？为什么我们要回来？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_000623ef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not a bad idea. There might be some survivors, trying to sift through the ashes... Let's put them down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主意不错。这里可能会有幸存者，想要从灰烬里面爬出去...让我们消灭他们吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_000623f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationHooverDam
That's... Yeah, I can see why someone might go to war for this thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是...是的，我能明白为什么有人要为此而打仗了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_000623f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Colorado's going to be running red for a while when this thing kicks off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当这件事开始的时候，科罗拉多的河水将会被血染红。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_000623f5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR could press forward, do the whole world some good...
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR应该奋力向前，为整个世界做点好事...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0006c61b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationRedRock
Damn pretty place. Khans got something nice going for them here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真他妈是个好地方。大汗帮在这里为自己准备了好东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_000623f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone once told me the rocks here are red, 'cause of all the blood been spilled here. That's bullshit, of course. It's iron.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人曾经告诉我这里的岩石是红色的，是因为所有洒在这里的鲜血。当然那是瞎说的。是因为土里含铁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_000623f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gonna have to go get me some downers while we're here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里得去弄点镇定剂来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_000623f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should really see about getting some tattoos...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真该考虑纹身了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationCampGaurdian
Let's see... Should be an old tunnel that heads north of here. That's how I came to the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看...这一定是个通向北边的旧通道。我就是这么来到莫哈维的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not so bad, up here. Always did enjoy a nice hike.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还不错。我总是喜欢徒步旅行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lakelurks? Are you shitting me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 湖沼蟹？你在开玩笑吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The troops here got killed to a man by fucking Lakelurks. I guess the Legion's got a pretty good chance, afterall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这只部队因为惹了湖沼蟹而被杀到只剩一个人。我猜军团终究得到了一个很好的机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0006c619_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never could get a handle on how to spell guardian. That U really has no business being in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来没有掌握怎么拼写守护者这个词。这个词（guardian）里面的U字母完全没有用嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments Comment (NAM2) : It's funny because my borderline illiteracy broke half the scripting for this mod. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_000ad7f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationNipton
Legion... Fucking animals, all of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团...妈的禽兽，全部都是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wouldn't do this to my worst enemy. Caesar will bleed for this, mark my words.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会这样对付我最大的敌人。凯撒会为此而流血，记住我说的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope this place can get back on it's feet some day. What a mess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望这地方有朝一日能恢复元气。真是一团糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a1a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The 80s were rough, but not even they did shit like this. Legion are feral dogs, nothing more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 80年代帮虽然很粗野，但他们也不会做出这种事。军团全都是疯狗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a1c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was Nipton's crime, again? They opened their doors to all sides of this war, and their mayor was a scumbag? Fucking Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尼普顿犯了什么罪？因为他们同时对战争双方都敞开大门，而且市长是个无赖？去他妈的军团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a1b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationCottonwood
These slavers are less than human. Don't let even one of the fuckers get away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些奴隶贩子连人都不算。别让任何一个混蛋跑掉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a1e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We should burn this shithole to the ground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应该把这个粪坑全烧了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a1f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion... bunch of fucking cowards. I'd kill every last one of them a dozen times over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团...一群懦夫。他们每个人我都要杀上十几遍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wish more of those fuckers were here... I'm not done killing them, not by a damn sight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望这里还有更多的杂碎...我还没杀够，一眼看去已经没有了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationBlackMt
Is it some unspoken, universal rule that anyone DJing a radio station has to be a fucking lunatic?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是不是某种无法言喻的宇宙法则啊，任何主持广播电台的人都得成为他妈的疯子？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surprised these guys don't hit Sloan or Goodsprings from here. Guess they really do just want to be left the fuck alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很惊奇这些家伙没有从这里袭击斯隆或者清泉镇。我猜他们真的只是想自己他妈的呆着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lotta tech to be salvaged here... If the mutants could be persuaded to calm down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有很多技术等待着被打捞...如果能说服这些变种人冷静下来的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How many Super Mutants you think are alive today? I mean, no one's been making new ones for, like... decades.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得现在有多少超级变种人存活了下来？我是说，没人在创造他们，已经有...几十年了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0006c618_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? "Super Mutants"? Who named them, a five year old? Oh, yeah, remember to watch out for scary-bugs and meanie-dogs, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗？“超级变种人”？谁取的名字，5岁小孩吗？噢，还要记得小心可怕的虫子和卑鄙的狗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0005b78e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationQuarryJunction
I hate you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我恨你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I get gored by a fucking Deathclaw, I'm haunting a demon right up your ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我被他妈的死亡爪给刺了，我就变成魔鬼缠着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Fucking really?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？他妈的真的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, this is still better than a Cazador nest. Not by much, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这至少比大毒蜂的巢穴要好。虽然也没有好太多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0008f125_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationCampGolf
"Lake Las Vegas" is kinda misleading, far as names go. "The Las Vegas Puddle" would be more apt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就名字而言，“拉斯维加斯湖”有误导性。“拉斯维加斯水坑”还比较贴切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a2c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, uh... what's the point of this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: ...这地方有什么意义？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a2d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa, what's that strange color? Could it be... green?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，这是什么奇怪的颜色？不会是...绿色吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a2e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Place could use a big gecko statue right in the center. ...What?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地方可以在中心放一个巨大的蜥蜴雕像...什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a2f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, good. I was worried the NCR didn't have any elite troops, but now I see they're all right here. Away from the action. Doing tequila shots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喔很好。我还在担心NCR没有任何精英部队呢，原来他们都在这里。远离行动。喝着龙舌兰酒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_000ad7fa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationStrip
Hell of a place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是个鬼地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a31_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We going to Gomorrah? 'Cause... we should.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要去蛾摩拉？当然...我们应该去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a32_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dunno how anyone can live here, just knowing that they're always surrounded by other people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道人们怎么能生活在这里的，只是知道他们总是被别人包围着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a33_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That whore around Gomorrah, with the dark hair and blue eyes? She's my favorite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个黑头发蓝眼睛的妓女？她是我的最爱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a34_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: God, I hope that fucking street performer isn't here tonight. That guy should be arrested for serial-raping comedy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，我希望那个他妈的街头表演家今晚不在这里。那个家伙应该为他那连环强奸的喜剧给抓起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a35_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ultra-Luxe wants to convince people to let clowns prepare their food, sight unseen. They need to be stopped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 超美多赌场想要说服人们让小丑准备他们的食物，在未见实物的情况下。他们需要被制止。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a36_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those drunk NCR grunts stumbling around here, flashing their titties and passing out on the street... they're my favorite branch of the military.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里跌跌撞撞的那些喝醉的NCR大兵们，袒胸露乳地倒在大街上...他们是我最喜欢的一只军队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shut that fucking music off! You only have, like, five tracks, max!
ESP.TRADUIT: 关掉那个他妈的音乐！你最多也只有五首歌在放！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never been great at playing the tables... Which doesn't mean I don't enjoy it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来都不擅长玩牌...但并不意味着我不喜欢它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationStreet
Looking for a good time, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 想找点乐子吗，哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a3b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Guess this place got crazy before the war, and just never stopped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜这个地方在战前就很疯狂了，而且从来没有停止过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a3c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could use a shot of whiskey, a deck of marked cards, and a couple of hookers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要喝一杯威士忌，玩一把牌，找两个马子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a3d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Easy to forget the war around here. Can't blame 'em, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里很容易忘掉战争。其实也不能怪他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_00062a3e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMaddieBackground
It's this, farming, or whoring. Or getting all dosed up and joining the Fiends, I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要么种田，要么当妓女。或者吸毒加入恶魔帮，我想就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbo_aaamaddiebackgr_00063c3e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Feels like a losing battle to me, but I guess we're still here. So... Yeah. Hooray.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我来说就像一场失败的战斗，但我想我们还是会待在这里。所以...是的。万岁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbo_aaamaddiebackgr_00063c3e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you join the militia?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么参加民兵？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMaddiePessimistic
Got a couple reasons. I've seen my friends get beaten, burned, raped, murdered, enslaved, and just plain vanished.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有几个原因。我看见朋友们被打，被烧，被强奸，谋杀和奴役，然后就这么消失了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbo_aaamaddiepessim_00063c40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every day we suffer some kind of casualty. And every day, more junkies drift off to Vault 3 so they can pick up a laser-gun to "earn" more chems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每天我们都会遭受一些伤亡。每一天，更多的瘾君子漂泊到3号避难所，想要拿起激光枪来“挣得”更多的毒品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbo_aaamaddiepessim_00063c40_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the Fiends don't get themselves killed, or reformed, or whatever pretty soon, we'll be overrun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果恶魔帮的人不能很快被杀掉或者改造，就会泛滥成灾的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbo_aaamaddiepessim_00063c40_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then what are our options? Run and live in North Vegas? Or Freeside? Or, god forbid, do we give it all up and beg the NCR to annex us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们有什么选择？逃跑到北维加斯？或者自由之城？或者，但愿这样的事不会发生，我们要乞求NCR来吞并我们？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbo_aaamaddiepessim_00063c40_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dunno. Pretty hard to see a light at the end of the tunnel, sometimes. Plus, I'm Irish, so there's that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。有时在隧道的尽头很难看到亮光。外加我是爱尔兰人，所以就这样吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbo_aaamaddiepessim_00063c40_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why so pessimistic?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么这么悲观？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMaddieWorksDone
Yeah, looks like it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，看上去没错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbo_aaamaddieworksd_0006543a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh. I guess I get so used to stuff going wrong around here, I didn't figure on anything ever working the way it should.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，我想我已经习惯了这里的事情，我没想到事情会像本来的那样运作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbo_aaamaddieworksd_0006543a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe this didn't really mean anything large-scale, but... Hell, it's enough to see just a little bit of actual justice once in a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许这不是什么大规模的行动，但是...操，就算只能偶尔看到一点真正的正义也够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbo_aaamaddieworksd_0006543a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here. 'Fraid you got the last of my caps, but maybe this'll make up for it. It's one of those little flare guns, modified to shoot 25mm grenades.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给。这是我全部的瓶盖，但也许可以补偿你。这是一把小型信号枪，被改装成了使用25mm榴弹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbo_aaamaddieworksd_0006543a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no use for it, given that I'm patrolling a tight, urban area... Better for you to have it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我已经没用处了，鉴于我主要在人群密集的城市区域巡逻...最好还是你拿着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbo_aaamaddieworksd_0006543a_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plus, with all the junkies and weirdos around here, having this thing in arms reach just about scares the hell out of me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外，这周围全是瘾君子和怪人，怀里抱着这东西抱让我很害怕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbo_aaamaddieworksd_0006543a_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess I'll see you around. Thanks again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们还会再见的。再次感谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maddie O'Doyle [0805C98C] (mod) Quest : ([0805C992]aaaGrafsBounty) OK, seriously, this scripting can go fuck itself. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaagrafsbo_aaamaddieworksd_0006543a_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaaGrenadePistol 1 set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaELMaddieHelped to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaELMaddieHelped + 1
I think that was all of your bounties, unless I'm missing some notices.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这是你全部的悬赏了，除非我还有什么告示没看见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaWhyMojave
Nothing in particular. Really, I make a habit of drifting around. I like seeing the world... Well, the country, at least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么特别的。真的，我养成了四处漂泊的习惯。我喜欢周游世界...呃，至少是周游全国。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizawhymoja_00067e12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, if you asked me why I'm still here, that's a different story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你问我为什么我还待在这里的话，那就是另一回事了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizawhymoja_00067e12_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's this fucking annoying little voice in the back of my head, and it keeps saying: "Don't move on until you've improved the Mojave, first!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我的脑后总是有一个他妈烦人的声音，它一直在说：“在你改变莫哈维之前不要继续前进！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizawhymoja_00067e12_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's more your department, I suppose. Still, there're plenty of Legion here that need bullets in their heads, and I can do that, at least.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想那更应该是你的事。这里还有很多军团人的脑袋等着我去收割呢，至少我还能做这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizawhymoja_00067e12_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what brought you to the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是什么把你带到莫哈维来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMartinezGangs
Hmm. Don't know that they're raiders, technically. There's actually only one real gang in town. Those ones with the energy guns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，严格地讲我并不知道他们是不是掠夺者。这个镇其实只有一个真正的帮派。就是那些拿着能量武器的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezgang_0006b425_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't know a whole lot about them. Their boss forbids them from coming in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对他们不太了解。他们的老大禁止他们来这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezgang_0006b425_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most of the guys here run solo. Sure, most of 'em got petty bounties on their heads, but it's not really 'cause of gang shit. Usually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的大多数人都是自己一个人。大多数人头上都挂着较高的赏金，但通常不是因为帮派的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezgang_0006b425_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And they generally don't go beyond that. Get to be an actual problem, that tends to be when Sheriff Ferrar suddenly notices them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且他们一般不会越线。当费拉尔警长注意到他们时，这更趋于成为了一个实际的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezgang_0006b425_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then someone with a badge will usually put them in the dirt via... acute lead poisoning, and the NCR gets word that they can suspend the bounty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个带着警徽的人通常会把他们打到在沙里...用枪，然后NCR得到消息说他们可以暂停悬赏了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezgang_0006b425_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about the raiders around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我这里的掠夺者的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaNorthRaiders
Not a whole lot to tell. They didn't have some kind of stupid name or anything like that. They were just people with guns and chems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么好说的。他们没有什么愚蠢的名字。他们就是一伙有枪又有毒品的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizanorthra_0006d210_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The claim was that they wanted to carve out this section of valley and make it their own. No NCR, no Legion. Make a truly free territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说他们想开辟这片山谷，然后把它变成他们自己的。没有NCR，没有军团。成为一个真正自由的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizanorthra_0006d210_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leader was this big asshole with a hammer. Rumor was that he was a Centurion in the Legion. He was supposed to claim the region for Caesar...
ESP.TRADUIT: 领头的是那个拿着大锤的混蛋。谣传他曾经是军团的百夫长。他本是奉凯撒的命令来占领这个地区的...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizanorthra_0006d210_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Instead, he lured his own men into a trap and had the raiders kill the whole lot of them. Then he declared himself the new boss of the whole area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他引诱自己的人掉进了一个陷阱，然后掠夺者杀了他们。然后他宣称自己是这片地方的新老大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizanorthra_0006d210_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was all bullshit, of course. They were raiders, just as cutthroat as any others. "Free territory" was code for: "Anyone who comes here dies."
ESP.TRADUIT: 这当然都是瞎说。他们是掠夺者，跟其他人一样残酷。“自由之地”的意思就是：“来者必死。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizanorthra_0006d210_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, fuck that. I walked away from those douchebags. I ain't drawing on innocent people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以去他妈的。我离开了那些傻逼。我不会利用无辜的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizanorthra_0006d210_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was this gang?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个帮派是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaWorthwhile
Yeah, look, I'm not from any villages or shit like that. I spent most of my life with my dad. That's it. We were loners.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我不是从什么村子里来的。我一直跟我的父亲生活在一起。就这些。我们是不合群的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaworthwh_0006d212_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was a town, a few miles away. We'd do a little trading, but we never lived there. We never got to know the people. We kept to ourselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个镇，在离家几里之外。我们会去做点小交易，但是我们从来没有住在那里。我们也不认识那里的人。我们基本足不出户。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaworthwh_0006d212_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And it was a good call, too. This was undisputed 80s territory. They squeezed that town for everything, and no one ever stood up to them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个很好的决定。这里是公认的80年代帮的领地。他们挤满了那个镇，从来没有人反抗过他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaworthwh_0006d212_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't fucking know. I've just got all these ideas in my head, about how people should act, what would be best for... fuck, everyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈不知道。我只是脑子里有这些想法，人们应该如何行动，什么对每个人才是最好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaworthwh_0006d212_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every time I thought maybe I found someone who really got it, it never lasted. They always fucked it up... somehow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 每次我想也许我找到了一个真正懂的人，但都只是一晃而过。他们总是搞砸...不知为什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaworthwh_0006d212_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've been different, so far. I appreciate it. That's all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到目前为止你不一样。我很感激。就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaworthwh_0006d212_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've really never met anyone you consider worth anything?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的从来没遇到过你认为有价值的人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyQuitWork
Well, that's a shame. And here I was, thinking of all the capital we stood to gain by working together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，真是遗憾。我就在这里，想着我们合作所获得的所有资本。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquitwork_0006de06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, thank you for the work you've already done for me. Off you go, then!
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢你帮我做的事情。那么，你走吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyquitwork_0006de06_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaFailRoyQuests 10
I'm done working for you, Sullivan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不再帮你做事了，苏利文。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentFailQuest
Then get the fuck out of my face, you waste-of-time motherfucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就给我滚出去，你这个浪费时间的王八蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentfailq_0006de09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaVincentWhoreQuest 55
No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentStartQuest
We'll see. Alright, so. There're a couple things that need to happen, here. You're going to coordinate it. Fuck up, and you're done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那。这里有几件事情需要做，你要做好配合。要是砸了你就得走人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentstart_0006de0b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Part one: There's an NCR VIP here on the Strip. Michael Shapiro. Some kind of political bullshit. I don't follow that garbage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一部分：在赌城有个NCR的重要人物。叫做迈克尔·夏皮罗。是个政客。我不喜欢那个垃圾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentstart_0006de0b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shapiro's pretty loud back in California. Wants the NCR to stop wasting time with Vegas; focus on their own bullshit in their own state.
ESP.TRADUIT: 夏皮罗在加利福利亚很吵。他想要NCR停止在维加斯浪费时间；而聚焦到他们自己国家的事情上去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentstart_0006de0b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the NCR stopped trying to occupy Vegas, we'd be looking at a huge loss of income at the casino. So, Shapiro needs to behave himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果NCR停止占领维加斯，我们赌场就会遭受巨大的经济损失。所以，夏皮罗需要守规矩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentstart_0006de0b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, while he's here, seems like a good time to see if we can get him to... rethink some things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当他待在这里的时间，看起来是个好时机，我们可以让他...重新考虑某件事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentstart_0006de0b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, here's where part two comes into play. In a perfect world, we'd get him under our thumb, singing our tunes with just a friendly conversation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接着是第二部分要开始了。在理想状况下，我们会控制住他，用一段友好的谈话来发出我们的声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentstart_0006de0b_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go and have a chat with him. See if you can get his head on straight. If not... Well, come on back here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去跟他谈谈。看看你能不能说服他。如果不行...就回到这里来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentstart_0006de0b_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got a little contingency plan that I'm sitting on, here. Still, try talking it out, first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这里还有个小小的应急方案。但是首先试着去说服他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentstart_0006de0b_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaShapiroREF.enable setstage aaaVincentWhoreQuest 20
Sure thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaShapiroIncite
I have the strong suspicion I'm not going to like whatever I find on it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我强烈地怀疑我不会喜欢里面的任何东西的...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapiroincit_0006de10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll check it out later. You should go, now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我晚点再看。你走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapiroincit_0006de10_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaaVincentBlackmail 1 setstage aaaVincentWhoreQuest 45 rewardkarma -25
Just here to deliver this tape to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是来给你送这盘带子的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaShapiroSpeech
[FAILED] Of course I would be. Why would that matter to me?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 我当然会的。但对我又有什么意义？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapirospeec_0006de12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are enough yes-men toeing the party line back home. I won't give up this fight so they'll like me more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 后方有太多凡事都顺从的应声虫。我不会放弃这场斗争，这样他们会更喜欢我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapirospeec_0006de12_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, it was good to speak with you, but I have other matters on my mind, so if there's nothing else...
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，跟你交谈很不错，但是我有其他的事情，所以如果没别的事的话...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapirospeec_0006de12_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaVincentWhoreQuest 25
You'd probably be more popular if you stopped speaking out about the Mojave campaign.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你停止说那些关于莫哈维战争的话，你可能会更受欢迎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] You... Have a point.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 你...你说得有道理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapirospeec_0006e40b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It would have been better if we never came here at all, but... if we withdraw now, it's the people of the Mojave who would suffer most.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们根本没有来这里的话会更好，但...如果我们现在撤退，最受苦的还是莫哈维的人民。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapirospeec_0006e40b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright. Once the Dam's been secured, and the Legion crushed, I'll see if we might be more willing to see reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。一旦大坝确保安全，军团被击溃之后，我会看看我们是否更愿意找出原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapirospeec_0006e40b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the meanwhile, at least I won't need to listen to Senator Burke whining about "aiding the enemy" for the foreseeable future.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与此同时，至少我在可预见的未来里不用听参议员伯克抱怨什么“通敌罪”了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapirospeec_0006e40b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I detest that man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我讨厌那个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapirospeec_0006e40b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardxp 20 setstage aaaVincentWhoreQuest 50
It's too late for the NCR to back out. Once the Legion is defeated, you can reintroduce the idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在对NCR来说要撤退已经太晚了。一旦军团被击败之后，你可以重新提出这个想法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationNCR
We here for any, y'know, reasons?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来这里，有什么原因吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0006ea0d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, we could be somewhere that doesn't suck right now. Just saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们可以去一个不这么糟糕的地方。只是说说而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0006ea0e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have an uncontrollable urge to start throwing cigarette butts all over the place around here...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一种无法控制的冲动，开始想把烟头扔得到处都是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0006ea0f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationHiddenValley
Watch out, a scorpion. He's over there, hiding behind that scorpion. I bet if you can defeat him, you'll get... a scorpion. Scorpion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当心，一只蝎子。他在那边，躲在那只蝎子后面。我打赌你要是击败了他，你就会得到...一只蝎子。蝎子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0006ea11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could be wrong here, but I'm pretty sure this ain't a valley. Sure as shit ain't hidden.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可能错了，但我相当确定这里不是山谷。而且他妈也没有隐藏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0006ea13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, good, we're off to traipse around the valley of scorpions and hostile winds. Joy of joys.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，太好了，我们得在这个蝎子和狂风的山谷里面到处晃悠。真正的快乐啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0006ea12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLocationPrimm
Well, we've done it. We've found the most boring city in the world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，我们做到了。我们终于找到世界上最无聊的城市了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0006ea15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Place feels like a ghost town. Guess the residents haven't got the memo yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里就像个鬼镇。我猜这里的居民都还没有拿到过备忘录。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0006ea16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place is like somebody's memory of a town, and the memory's fading. Like there was never anything here but desert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地方就像某人对一个城镇的记忆，而记忆渐渐消逝了。就像这里只有沙漠，从来没有过别的东西一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments Comment (NAM2) : It's not plagiarism, it's a HOMAGE. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_0006ea17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No whorehouses, no saloons, no gun stores... Just a shitty, podunk casino, and an old guy pawning garbage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有妓院，没有酒吧，没有枪店...只有一个无足轻重的小赌场，还有一个典当垃圾的老家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizalocatio_000ad7fc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMartinezRumors
Do you think Hawaii still exists? I can't imagine anyone bothering to waste a nuke on such a small target...
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得夏威夷仍然存在吗？我无法想象有人会浪费一颗核弹在那么小的一个目标上...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_00071fef_1.ogg
