ESP.ORIGINAL: If it did make it, those lucky bastards must have it better than the whole rest of the world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算被炸了，那些幸运的混蛋一定也比全世界其他的人过得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_00071fef_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the word?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么传闻？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Met a traveler from Wyoming a while ago. Sounds like the regional gangs are consolidating power for a full-scale war in Cheyenne. Good time to run.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不久前遇见了一个来自怀俄明州的旅行者。听起来当地帮派在跟夏安人全面开战来巩固自己的政权。真是好时机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_000701fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hear any rumors lately?
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近有传言吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That bounty hunter that slaughtered everyone in Brighton a while back? Word is he's been sighted passing through the Mojave recently.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道前一段时间在布莱顿屠杀了所有人的那个赏金猎人吗？听说最近有人看见他经过莫哈维。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_000701fc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ten-to-one odds the Rangers'll put a hell of a contract on his head. Shame I'm not much of a gunslinger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我赌10赔1的赔率，游骑兵会把赏金挂在他头上。可惜我不是个枪手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_000701fc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the word out there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 外面有什么传言？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard there's buried treasure somewhere near the Ivanpah race track. No way that's true... Right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说在伊凡帕赛马场赛道上埋藏着宝藏。不可能是真的...对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_000701fd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hear any interesting rumors?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听到什么有趣的传闻吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This one comes from Ledoux, so don't take it at face value, alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这一条是从勒杜那里听来的，所以不要把它当回事，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_000707f6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Supposedly, some gunslinger from his old gang took a trip to San Antonio. I guess he's whipping the locals into a frenzy... For some reason.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说，他原来的帮派里有个枪手去了圣安东尼奥。我猜他把当地人逼疯了...因为某种原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_000707f6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bet they're well-armed, though. I mean, what better place to stock up on heavy ordnance than Texas, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我打赌他们装备精良。我的意思是，还有什么地方比德克萨斯更适合储备军用武器呢，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_000707f6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hear any interesting rumors?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听到什么有趣的传闻吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like someone set up a couple of graves for the old sheriff's family. No such accommodations for Ethan, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好像有人给老警长一家挖了几个坟墓。但还是没有伊桑的住处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_000707f7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe someone felt a little bit of remorse for brutalizing an unarmed woman and a little girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许有人有点后悔残忍杀害一个手无寸铁的女人和一个小女孩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_000707f7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the word out there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 外面有什么传言？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear that some guys were trying to transport a big shipment of energy weapons on an old barge, around Lake Mead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说有些家伙想用一艘旧驳船运送一大批能量武器，就在密德湖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_000707f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dunno how that went, but if the Van Graffs or the Brotherhood caught wind of it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道后来怎么样了，但如果范·格拉夫家族或者钢铁兄弟会收到风声的话...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_000707f8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hear any interesting rumors, lately?
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近听到什么有趣的传闻吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have this suspicion that it's actually the politicians and their cronies that are really responsible for jet, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怀疑实际上政客和他们的亲信才是真正要为杰特而负责的人，知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_00071ff0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, they sure produce a lot of bullshit, don't they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是，他们确实说了大量的废话，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_00071ff0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any rumors out there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 外面有什么传言？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I really need to tighten the hinge on the front door, there...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真的需要把前门的铰链给拧紧，那里...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_000707f9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Know any good rumors?
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道什么传言吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I get customers in here, they say: "Alright, Martinez. Hook us up with the strongest drink you have on tap!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这里有些顾客，他们说：“好吧，马丁内斯。给我们尝尝你手头上最烈的酒！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_00071feb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I always tell them that they don't want my strongest. It's just too much for them, but they demand I serve them. So what can I do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我总是告诉他们别喝我这里最烈的。对他们来说劲太大了，但是他们还是要求我提供。所以我能怎么办呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_00071feb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And every time, they slam it down and start yelling at me about serving them something too powerful. I gave them a warning! How is it my fault?!
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后每一次，他们摔着瓶子开始抱怨我给他们的酒劲太大了。我警告过他们的！怎么会是我的错呢？！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_00071feb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hear any rumors?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说了什么传言吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's a little bit of secret bartender advice I've picked up over the years: There's no problem in the world that can't be fixed with booze.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有一点来自酒吧招待这些年总结出的建议：世上没有什么事情是一瓶酒搞不定的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_00071fee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, everything except for liver cirrhosis.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，除了肝硬化。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_00071fee_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything going on?
ESP.TRADUIT: 发生什么事了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Word from the West is that they finally caught the Brahmin-Prodder of '79. Sick bastard... Glad to hear there's still some justice out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 西边有人说他们终于抓住了2079年行刺双头牛的人了。杂种...很高兴听到外面还有正义在伸张。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_00071fed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hear anything interesting, lately?
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近听说了什么有趣的事情吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I caught Harlan trying to sneak an electric drill into my bathroom the other day. That man needs to be stopped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前两天我撞见哈兰试图从我的浴室里偷电钻。得有人来制止那家伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_0007ec18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me a rumor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我点传闻。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The patrons in here, they're always looking for any reason to spill blood. Normally, I try to avoid any and all violence in my saloon, but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的顾客们，他们总是会寻找理由来杀人。通常，我尽量避免在我的酒馆里发生任何暴力事件，但...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians Comment (NAM2) : This goes for the comments section too, you monsters. EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_00071fec_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I harnessed their urges for the better. My bar has only one firm rule: If you talk politics in here, everyone has permission to shoot you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我利用他们的欲望使之成为好事。我的酒吧只有一条铁律：如果你在这里谈论政治的话，那每个人都有权利向你开枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians Comment (NAM2) : This goes for the comments section too, you monsters. EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezrumo_00071fec_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the word out there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 外面有什么传言？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaCrier
"Come on down to Mick and Ralph's!" Shut up!
ESP.TRADUIT: “快来米克与拉尔夫武器店！”闭嘴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizacrier_00070df3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaShapiroPolitics
True, true. It would be more appropriate for us to frequent Gomorrah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，是。经常光顾蛾摩拉对我们来说更加合适。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapiropolit_00076d95_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm just here for the cheap rooms and the cheaper tables. My colleagues may, at the moment, prefer to discuss business in the embassy. Me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我来这里只是为了便宜的房间和更便宜的桌子。我的同事也许喜欢在大使馆谈生意。而我嘛...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapiropolit_00076d95_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if I have to spend a single second more than I have to with them, I'd be liable to shoot myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我在他们身上再多浪费一秒钟时间，我可能会开枪自杀的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapiropolit_00076d95_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Relaxing by the pool? Interesting place for a politician.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在泳池边放松吗？对一个政治家来说真是个有趣的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaShapiroAttitude
Isn't it, though? I've proven resistant to their bribes enough times that they're not especially interested in real socializing with me, anyhow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而不对吗？我已经拒绝了他们的贿赂很多次了，他们对和我真正地交往不是特别感兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapiroattit_00076d97_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Advocating for the peaceful withdrawal of NCR forces from this disastrous campaign is... markedly less popular than I anticipated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主张NCR军队从这场灾难性的战役中和平撤军...明显不如我预期的受欢迎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapiroattit_00076d97_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Interesting attitude.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣的态度。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaShapiroWhyWithdraw
Not a local, I take it. If you were, I expect you'd tell me: "Good. About time the NCR fucked off."
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是本地人，我猜测。如果你是的话，我认为你应该会说：“很好。是时候让NCR滚蛋了。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapirowhywi_00076d99_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at this mess. Our soldiers are dying out here, in the desert, far from home. We're dumping what little money we have on Nevada. Why?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看这烂摊子。我们的士兵在这里死亡，在沙漠里，在远离家园的地方。我们在内华达花掉我们仅有的一点钱。为什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapirowhywi_00076d99_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For space? We're not even close to running out of land back west. Resources? What's out here that we need that badly?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了土地？我们甚至还没到西部土地耗尽的时候。为了资源？这里有什么我们那么想得到的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapirowhywi_00076d99_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hoover Dam is of major importance, of course. But we're already getting power from it, per our agreement with House.
ESP.TRADUIT: 胡佛大坝当然是至关重要的。但是我们已经从那里得到电力了，根据我们与豪斯先生达成的协议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapirowhywi_00076d99_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Out attempts at annexation... It's unjustifiable. You can't force people to accept democracy at gunpoint; that defeats the whole concept.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们吞并的企图...是没有道理的。你不能强迫人们在枪口下接受民主；这就破坏了整个概念。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapirowhywi_00076d99_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why is that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaShapiroFuckOff
That does seem to be the consensus when I ask locals if they'd like us to continue overstaying our welcome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我问本地人是否他们想让我们继续逗留的时候，这回答似乎是共识。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapirofucko_00076d9b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kimball and his sycophants would, of course, respond by saying that they can't fuck off. If the NCR fucked off, who would defend the people here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 金博尔和他的马屁精们当然会回应他们没法撤出。如果NCR撤出，谁来保护这里的人民呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapirofucko_00076d9b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Securitrons, perhaps? Local militias? The same ways people have defended themselves from raiders for the last century?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许有电子防卫系统？本地民兵？就像人们在上个世纪里保护自己不受掠夺者袭击一样的方法？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapirofucko_00076d9b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you people had asked us to come and help you, that would be one thing. But how many times do you need to say it before we take no for an answer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你们让我们来帮忙，那是一回事。但是在我们拒绝之前你们需要说多少遍呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapirofucko_00076d9b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's all pride. Pride, personal ambition... and maybe just a bit of outright stupidity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 都是骄傲。得意，个人野心...也许只是彻头彻尾的愚蠢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapirofucko_00076d9b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. About time the NCR fucked off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。是时候让NCR滚蛋了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaShapiroProNCR
Yes, very good. That's the party line, all right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，非常好。这就是执政党的路线。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapiropronc_00076d9d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wrong, of course. But there it is, all the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而这当然是错误的。但仍然就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapiropronc_00076d9d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me, if the NCR expressed no interest in policing the Mojave... If we drew our power from the Dam, and allowed our people to visit Vegas...
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我，如果NCR对维持莫哈维的治安不感兴趣...如果我们从大坝上取电，允许我们自己的人民游览维加斯...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapiropronc_00076d9d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you think House would allow the Fiends to run roughshod?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你认为豪斯先生会允许恶魔帮为所欲为吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapiropronc_00076d9d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or, without us wasting our people and resources dealing with them, do you think he might deign to have his robots wipe them out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者，没有我们浪费人力和资源来对付他们，你觉得他会让他的机器人把他们都除掉吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapiropronc_00076d9d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion has no future. Our presence here only serves to unify them against one great, common enemy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团没有未来。我们的存在只会使他们团结起来对付一个强大的共同敌人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapiropronc_00076d9d_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless the people here want our help, our presence only serves to remove any chance for peace and stability.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非这里的人民需要我们的帮助，否则我们的存在只会抹杀任何和平与稳定的机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapiropronc_00076d9d_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR can't withdraw. They're the only chance for peace and stability the Mojave has.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR不能撤退。他们是莫哈维和平与稳定的唯一机会。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaShapiroPatriotism
Not at all. Everything I do, I do because I love my country, and I want to set it back on the right path.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一点也不。我做的每一件事，都是因为我热爱我的国家，我想要它回到正确的路上来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapiropatri_0007798f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It leaves me in the position of being rather unpopular back home. Given the state of the world, you'd think they might value peaceful dissent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这使我在国内相当不受欢迎。考虑到世界的现状，他们可能重视对和平持有异议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Michael Shapiro [08020909] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaavincent_aaashapiropatri_0007798f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't seem very fond of the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来不是很喜欢NCR。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDoctorMalpractice
aaaDoctorChoice1
aaaDoctorChoice2
aaaMartinezInventory
I live to serve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随时为您服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Martinez [080177E9] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult09\aaamiscdia_aaamartinezinve_0007ec1a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
I'm thirsty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我口渴了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMartinezGoodbye
aaaTraceyHJBackground
Ah, yes. "Handsome James" they call him. I don't know whether that's an ironic name or not. Terribly uncreative, these people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，是的，他们叫他”英俊“詹姆斯。我不知道这是不是个讽刺的名字。相当缺乏创意，这些人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyhjback_00082a30_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is known is that he's a mercenary on the payroll for a group called the Devil's Men, out of Arkansas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 众所周知他是一个雇佣兵，为一个在阿肯色州之外叫做邪魔者的组织做事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyhjback_00082a30_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Imagine Fiends, only their barbarism is fueled by bloodlust, rather than drugs, and you'll have the basic idea of what the Devil's Men are.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想象一下，跟恶魔帮不同，他们的野蛮行为是由嗜血驱使的，而不是毒品，这样你就对邪魔者有了一个基本的认知了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyhjback_00082a30_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: According to... a reliable source, we know that the Devil's Men are offering their services to the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 根据...可靠消息，我们得知邪魔者替军团做事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyhjback_00082a30_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, one of their members, James McDougal, is here in the Mojave. Seems to me like the man is begging to be made an example of.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而他们中的一名成员，詹姆斯·麦克道格尔，现在就在莫哈维。在我看来这个家伙在乞求能够以身作则。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyhjback_00082a30_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: According to an officer at Ranger Station Bravo, someone closely matching McDougal's description has been lurking around Camp Guardian recently.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据游骑兵驻扎站B的一位官员所说，一个符合麦克道格尔特征的人近期正在守护者营地周围潜伏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyhjback_00082a30_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, there you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，就是这样了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyhjback_00082a30_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaHandsomeJamesQuest 15
I'm interested in the bounty on James McDougal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对詹姆斯·麦克道格尔的悬赏很感兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaTracyBackstory
Fine. I was born in Oregon, well within NCR territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。我是俄勒冈出生的，就在NCR的领土里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatracybacksto_00083032_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I was old enough, I took work for the government. I made the right impression with the right people, and now I'm here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我足够大的时候，我开始为政府工作。我给正确的人留下了正确的印象，然后我现在就到这里来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatracybacksto_00083032_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that all sounds insufferably vague to you, well... I am a handler for government-sponsored assassins. Discretion is key, as I see it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这对你来说实在太含糊的话，呃...我是一名政府资助的暗杀组织者。依我之见，谨慎就是关键。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatracybacksto_00083032_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和我说说你自己吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaTraceyLouieBackground
Louie Kowalski, yes. He's an interesting individual.
ESP.TRADUIT: 路易·科瓦尔斯基，是的。他是个有意思的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceylouieb_0008362e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...Well, not really. But he's crossed enough important people that I can't avoid his name, regardless.
ESP.TRADUIT: ...呃，也算不上是。但他和很多重要人物有过交集，我无法避开他的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceylouieb_0008362e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He and a handful of thugs would hide around the outer Vegas streets, ambush travelers, and scurry off before anyone knew what had happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他和一群暴徒藏在外维加斯的街道里，袭击旅行者，然后在人们意识到发生什么之前就先逃走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceylouieb_0008362e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not exactly sophisticated, but it worked well enough. Of course, with most of those travelers being NCR, well... We were bound to find out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不算特别老练，但是效果还不错。当然，大部分旅行者都是NCR的人，呃...我们必然会找出他们的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceylouieb_0008362e_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It only took one well-placed source to learn about the old office building that the gang uses as a hideout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个恰当的消息来源得知这帮人把一个旧办公大楼当做他们的藏身处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceylouieb_0008362e_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's actually within walking distance, but there are enough Fiends around here that no one in the military wants to clear a building for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上步行就能走到，但是那周围有很多恶魔帮的人，军队里没有人愿意帮我们清理那栋建筑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceylouieb_0008362e_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaLouieBountyQuest 15
I'm after Louie Kowalski. Any advice?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找路易·科瓦尔斯基。有什么建议吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaTraceyJohnSellows
Sellows... Sellows. Ah, yes, that one. A defector from the NCR. For one reason or another, he threw his lot in with the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 舍罗斯...舍罗斯。啊，那个人。一个NCR叛逃者。由于种种原因，他投靠了军团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyjohnse_00083630_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The odd bit is that he's a civilian in every sense of the word. A self-proclaimed novelist, with the intention of writing Legion propaganda.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奇怪的是不管以哪个标准来看他都是个平民。自称是小说家，为给军团宣传而写作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyjohnse_00083630_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's hiding out near Cottonwood Cove, so expect Legion resistance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他躲在棉花丛湾附近，所以你应该会遇到军团的抵抗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyjohnse_00083630_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaSellowsBountyQuest 15
Have any intel on John Sellows?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有任何约翰·舍罗斯的情报吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaTraceyChrisParker
Yes. I'm not thrilled with our lack of intel on this one, as you might expect. Whatever it is, it's not stupid, more's the pity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。如你所料，我们缺乏这方面的情报并不能使人感到兴奋。不管是他什么，遗憾的是他一点也不蠢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceychrisp_00083633_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While your goal is, of course, to find and eliminate this... person... You'll have to do a bit of investigating, I'm afraid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的目标当然是找到并且消灭这个...人...我恐怕你得做一点侦查工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceychrisp_00083633_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A girl from California went missing around the Freeside area about a month ago. Nothing unusual, except this one has a rather important family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一名从加利福利亚来的女孩大约一个月前在自由之城失踪了。没什么稀奇的，除了她有一个非常重要的家庭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceychrisp_00083633_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A great deal of money was thrown around, and her body was finally found. What was left of it, as it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后她的尸体被找到了，大量的钱被乱扔在周围。实际上还能剩下什么呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceychrisp_00083633_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently, she was cut open and... hollowed. And she wasn't alone. The investigation for this one girl turned up 43 corpses... so far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然，她被切开和...挖空了。而她不是唯一一个。对这个女孩的调查发现了43具尸体...截止目前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceychrisp_00083633_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Men, women, even some children. All in the same condition. And, a good percentage of them were all NCR citizens, at one point or another.
ESP.TRADUIT: 男人，女人，甚至还有小孩。遭遇都一样。而且相当一部分比例是NCR市民。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceychrisp_00083633_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't need our people in Freeside breaking into hysterics over this. So, you need to find this "Harvester" and end him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不想让自由之城的人们为此变得歇斯底里。所以，你需要找到这个“杀人魔”并了结了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceychrisp_00083633_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A possible witness is being treated for shock at the Old Mormon Fort. She may know something useful. Or, maybe not. It can't hurt, either way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个可能的证人正在摩门要塞接受心理治疗。她可能知道点有用的信息。也可能不知道。反正问问也没关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceychrisp_00083633_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaHarvesterQuest 20
The warrant told me to speak with you about the Freeside Harvester. Whatever that is...
ESP.TRADUIT: 悬赏令指示我跟你谈谈自由之城杀人魔的事情。不管那是什么...

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMariaFriendly
Are... are you for real? You don't want anything for it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...你说真的吗？你不需要什么回报吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maria [08084904] (mod) Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaharvest_aaamariafriendl_00086102_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what to say. Thank you so much!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道该说什么。太谢谢你了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maria [08084904] (mod) Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaharvest_aaamariafriendl_00086102_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uhm... Alright, yeah... I'm gonna... buy a ride back home. Get out of this place for good. I never should have left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...好吧...我要...搭辆车回家。离开这个地方。我本就不应该离开家的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maria [08084904] (mod) Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaharvest_aaamariafriendl_00086102_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you again, and, uh... be safe, OK?
ESP.TRADUIT: 再次感谢你，还有，呃...请保重，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maria [08084904] (mod) Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaharvest_aaamariafriendl_00086102_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 500 player.rewardkarma 50 Setstage aaaHarvesterQuest 30
Alright, before I go, here's 500 caps. Don't put yourself at risk anymore, OK?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，我给你500瓶盖。别让自己再受到危险了，好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMariaIntroduce
You want to talk about... I-I don't know how much help I could be. I mean, I don't remember much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要问...我不知道我能帮上多少忙。我是说，我记不得太多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maria [08084904] (mod) Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaharvest_aaamariaintrodu_00085b01_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was just trying to get away. It's all a blur...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是试着要逃跑。一切都很模糊...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maria [08084904] (mod) Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaharvest_aaamariaintrodu_00085b01_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's alright. My name is &PCName;, and I just need to ask you about what you saw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。我叫&PCName;, 我只是想要问问你看见了什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMariaDetails
Oh... Alright, I'll... I'll try.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢...好吧，我...我试试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maria [08084904] (mod) Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaharvest_aaamariadetails_00085b03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... I was out, uh, working. Around the back alleys and stuff; the people at the Wrangler don't like freelancers on their turf...
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...我在外面工作。在后巷周围；原子牛仔的人不喜欢自由职业者在他们的地盘上...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maria [08084904] (mod) Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaharvest_aaamariadetails_00085b03_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A man came over... Uh, he was pretty... pretty normal looking, I guess. A little short, maybe? He... he had a beard, if that helps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个男人走过来...呃，他很...看起来很正常。也许有一点矮？他...他有络腮胡，这有用吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maria [08084904] (mod) Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaharvest_aaamariadetails_00085b03_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He offered me some Med-X if I went with him, but I don't touch that shit, so I told him. He just stared at me for a few seconds, all quiet-like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我跟他走，他就会给我注射剂X，但是我不碰那玩意的，所以我就告诉了他。他只是瞪了我几秒钟，一言不发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maria [08084904] (mod) Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaharvest_aaamariadetails_00085b03_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then he just rushed me. I ran, didn't look back. I heard him behind me. He... he almost got me. I felt him grabbing at my collar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后他冲向我。我逃跑了，不敢回头看。我听到他在后面追我。他...他差点就抓到我。我感觉他抓到了我的衣领。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maria [08084904] (mod) Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaharvest_aaamariadetails_00085b03_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess he got tired, 'cause he was breathing hard the whole time. I got out on Fremont, where the Kings were hanging out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜他累了，因为他一直喘得很厉害。我逃到了弗里蒙特街，那里有猫王帮的人在闲逛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maria [08084904] (mod) Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaharvest_aaamariadetails_00085b03_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The... the psycho guy, he was gone. I guess he gave up at some point. Then the Kings brought me here... Does... Does any of that help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那...那个神经病，他跑掉了。我猜他可能放弃了。然后猫王帮的人就把我带到了这里...这...这对你有帮助吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maria [08084904] (mod) Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaharvest_aaamariadetails_00085b03_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand. Just slow down and tell me how it began. You're safe right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白。慢慢地告诉我情况是怎么发生的。你现在很安全。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMariaPerception
Oh, no, he was probably... Forty-ish? You know, he was a little fat. Not giant, just... A little out-of-shape, I guess.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，不，他可能...四十岁上下？他有一点微胖。不是很肥，只是...身材有一点走样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maria [08084904] (mod) Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaharvest_aaamariapercept_00085b05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You said he got tired out. Was he very old?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说他累了。他很老吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMariaCharisma
Well, let me think... Yeah, he said how pretty I was, first. Then he asked if I was a local, and then he offered me the chems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，让我想想...是的，他先说我很漂亮。然后他问我是不是本地人，接着他就给了我药品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maria [08084904] (mod) Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaharvest_aaamariacharism_00085b07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's pretty weird, now that I think about it... Most people, y'know, just ask about prices.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这太古怪了，现在我想起来...大多数人应该是问问价钱的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maria [08084904] (mod) Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaharvest_aaamariacharism_00085b07_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did he say anything at all to you, before he offered the Med-X?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他有跟你说过什么吗，在他提出给你注射剂X之前？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMariaLocation
I don't, sorry...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不记得了，对不起...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maria [08084904] (mod) Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaharvest_aaamarialocatio_00086101_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was somewhere off the main drag, out of the way... Sketchy area, if that helps. ...It probably doesn't. Sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是在主干道之外的地方，在大街外...大概是这个区域...不知道有没有帮助。对不起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maria [08084904] (mod) Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaharvest_aaamarialocatio_00086101_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any memory of where this was?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还记得是在什么地方发生的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaMariaGoodbye
Oh, OK... Uh, goodbye, then. I really hope you find that crazy guy...
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，好的...呃，那再见。我真的希望你能找出那个疯子...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Maria [08084904] (mod) Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaaharvest_aaamariagoodbye_00086105_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Setstage aaaHarvesterQuest 30
That's all. I'm going to start hunting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样了。我要开始追捕了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWalterIntroduction
aaaWalterEthical
aaaWalterTerrifying
Whoa whoa whoa! Calm down, alright? We don't need to do anything crazy, here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哇哇！冷静，好吗？我们在这里没必要做任何疯狂的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck me if I didn't think you'd actually do it, too. Jesus. Sigh Alright. What do you want to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果不相信你会扁我的话我就操了个蛋了。天啊，哎，你想知道什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can tell me, right now, or you can scream it as I turn you inside out with my bare hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要么你现在好好告诉我，要么等我赤手把你翻个底朝天之后你再喊出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaTraceyLouieDead
Excellent. The NCR thanks you for all your hard work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常好。NCR感谢你所有的辛苦工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceylouied_0008791d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaLouieBountyQuest 30 player.additem NCRMoney100 30
Kowalski is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 科瓦尔斯基死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaJoke
So, a guy from North Vegas is fucking his sister, and she laughs and says: "You fuck just like dad does." And he says: "Yeah, I know. Mom told me."
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个来自北维加斯的家伙正在操他的妹妹，他的妹妹笑着说：“你操我的方式跟老爸一样。”然后他说：“是的，我知道。妈妈告诉我的。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizajoke_00087f1a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaTraceyHJDead
Excellent. Hopefully he wasn't too much trouble. Maybe his commanders will remember what happened here today, when they challenged us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常好，希望他没惹太多麻烦。当他们挑战我们的时候，也许他的指挥官会记得今天发生的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyhjdead_0008910c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your money. As always, thank you for your service.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的钱。跟往常一样，感谢你的服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyhjdead_0008910c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaHandsomeJamesQuest 30 player.additem NCRMoney100 100
James McDougal is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 詹姆斯·麦克道格尔死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaTraceySellowsDead
Yes, you did. And it was a waste of time, as it turns out. We found some of his writings after you had already been contracted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的没错。事实上这不过是浪费时间。我们在你签约后发现了他的一些作品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceysellow_0008910e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While his execution serves as justice for all the atrocities he committed against the English language, he was never any threat as a propagandist.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了需要为他对英语本身所犯下的罪行伸张正义而处决他以外，作为一个宣传者，他从来没有任何威胁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceysellow_0008910e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to attribute this nonsense to a failing on our intelligence offices. Your work, as always, has been exemplary.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把这些胡说八道归结于我们情报部门的失败。而你的工作就跟往常一样，一直是典范。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceysellow_0008910e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaSellowsBountyQuest 30 player.additem NCRMoney100 10
I killed John Sellows.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我干掉了约翰·舍罗斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWalterPayup
Such a shame. Well, I'm sure you can figure it out on your own. In the meantime, I'm sure he'll find plenty of playmates out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真遗憾。我相信你能自己解决的。同时，我相信他会在这里找到很多玩伴的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have 500 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有500瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pleasure doing business with you. Alright, what can I tell you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴跟你做生意。好吧，你想知道什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 500
Fine, here's your money. Now, talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这是你的钱。现在说吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWalterDetails
aaaWalterMotives
He opens them up, and scoops out everything there is. Some of their parts are worth a good deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他把他们剖开，然后把所有的东西都挖出来。有一些部位很值钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a pretty big market for organs. Lots of shady characters need impromptu transplants, and Doctor Parker makes sure it's possible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 器官买卖有很大的市场。很多背后的人物需要即时的器官移植，而派克医生就是完成这些活的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, money aside, he enjoys it. He has to. Why else would you harvest a drunk's liver, or... well, anyone's appendix, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，除了能赚钱以外，他还很享受。他一定是的。不然为什么他还割下酒鬼的肝脏，或者...正常人的阑尾呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why is he murdering people?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他为什么要杀人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWalterWhyNCR
Two reasons. First off, fuck the NCR. We don't need foreign freeloaders crowding our streets, taking our land.
ESP.TRADUIT: 两个原因。首先，去他妈的NCR。我们不需要外来的寄生虫挤满我们的街道，夺走我们的土地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Second reason is that the Kings aren't going to bother trying to investigate some dead NCR whores.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第二个原因是猫王帮才不会费力气去调查某些死亡的NCR妓女。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why does he target NCR citizens?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么他拿NCR的市民当目标？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWalterSpeechCheck1
[FAILED] It pays to know things, what can I say?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 想知道就得花钱，我还能说什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you know any of this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么知道这些？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I never said he was a stranger, did I? He was a combat medic for a merc group I served with, a few years back.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 我从来没说过不认识他，对吧？他曾是我几年前服役的一个佣兵组织的战地医生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was a sick fuck back then, and he's a sick fuck now. It didn't take much thought to put two and two together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那时候他就是个变态，而他现在还是个变态。不用花太多心思就能根据情况推断出来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardxp 5
You're exceedingly well-informed about this wanted serial killer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对被通缉的连环杀手的消息真是相当地灵通啊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWalterPerception
What? Of course he did-
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？当然了-
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Surprise
Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well played.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe after we left the company, he offered me independent work. Maybe I took care of some shit for him here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大概在我们离开公司之后，他给了我一些独立的工作。大概我还在这里帮他处理过一些事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What does it matter? I'm not a doctor, so I didn't assist him in killing anyone. And I stopped working for him, didn't I?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这有关系吗？我又不是医生，所以我没有协助他杀过人。我停止了帮他的忙，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: We aren't in business anymore. But, you know, I am in business with the Followers, now. And, uh, they wouldn't take too kindly to you shooting at me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们之间没有关系了。但是，我现在跟追随者有关系。而且，呃，你向我开枪的话他们不会对你太客气的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 提个建议罢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([08085AFD]aaaHarvesterQuest) My Fingers Ran With Blood EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: And he told you where his secret murder-hideout was, back when you were mercs, years ago?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那几年前你们当佣兵的时候，他告诉过你他的秘密屠宰场在哪里罗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaTraceyProofOfDeath
Absolutely not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 绝对不。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyproofo_0008a922_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me make this abundantly clear right now, so there won't be any confusion later, alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在就让我非常清楚地说明这一点，这样以后就不会有任何混乱了，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyproofo_0008a922_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do not bring any severed body-parts into my office, under any circumstance. Clear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要把任何切下来的尸体部位带到我的办公室里来，在任何情况下都不能。清楚了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyproofo_0008a922_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your boss wants me to bring in scalps, to prove my kills. You don't need anything like that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你老板要我把头皮拿来，以证明我完成了。你不需要像这样吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaTraceyKillAdvice
aaaCalebThugConversation
aaaWalterFuckOff
aaaWalterGoodbye
aaaTraceyParkerDead
I'm sure Freeside's hookers and vagrants will sleep much better at night with that man out of the picture.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想除掉了这个人之后，自由之城的妓女和流浪汉们晚上可以睡个好觉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyparker_0008d324_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, actually, given how high the rates of alcoholism are over there... They probably won't notice a difference.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实上，鉴于那边醉酒的比率...他们可能根本就不会发现什么不同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyparker_0008d324_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regardless. Excellent work, here's your money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管了。干得不错，这是你的钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyparker_0008d324_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaHarvesterQuest 60 player.additem NCRMoney100 100
I found the Freeside Harvester and put him in the dirt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了自由之城杀人魔，然后送他回老家了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaJoinUp
Fine, whatever. I got nothing better to do... For now. Maybe there'll be some caps to be made.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，随便。我也没其他事情可做...目前。也许还能挣点瓶盖花花。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rivas says you should tag along with me for a bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 里瓦斯说你应该跟我待在一起。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaAcceptQuest
Fantastic. Alright, so, the thing is supposed to be in the Mesquite mountains, near an old campground. Apparently it's named Big Jed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 漂亮。好吧，那东西应该在梅斯基特山里面，在一个旧营地附近。据我所知它的名字叫做大个子杰德。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaacceptq_0008df37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh man, this is going to be great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢老兄，这一定会很刺激的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaacceptq_0008df37_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 1
setstage aaaElizaQuest 70
Alright, Eliza. I'm in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，伊莉莎。我加入。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaHunt
A hunt for this giant fuck-off scorpion I heard about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 猎杀一只我听说过的最他妈巨大的蝎子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahunt_00090329_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard some NCR guys, back at the outpost, talking about this monster scorpion they saw.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听那个前哨站里NCR的人说过这只蝎子怪物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahunt_00090329_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They were just about pissing themselves at the thought of the thing. And that sound like a hell of a time, to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们只要一想到那东西就吓得屁滚尿流。而那声音听起来就像是来自地狱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahunt_00090329_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You in?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要加入吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizahunt_00090329_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of hunt?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么样的狩猎？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCourierNCR
The NCR. It's much more urgent than whatever you're doing here, I assure you.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR。我保证这比你在这里做的任何事都要紧急得多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [08077F88] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult08\aaamiscdia_aaacourierncr_00090f24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have a pleasant day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你有愉快的一天。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [08077F88] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult08\aaamiscdia_aaacourierncr_00090f24_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who is it from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 它来自于谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCourierThanks
Of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Courier [08077F88] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult08\aaamiscdia_aaacourierthank_00090f26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaShitmanName
[Shitman explains, at length, what his opinion of Westside is. It's probably a very eloquent speech.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [烂人详尽地解释了他对西区的看法。这可能是个非常有说服力的演讲。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shitman [0808BB14] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaarivasdr_aaashitmanname_0009391b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Westside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于西区你能告诉我些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaShitmanOutside
[Shitman explains his motivations and goals for you. You're sure it's fascinating.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [烂人向你解释他的动机和目标。你确定这很吸引人。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shitman [0808BB14] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaarivasdr_aaashitmanoutsi_0009391d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们在这干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaShitmanDrugs
[Unintelligible protestations.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [莫名其妙的声明。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shitman [0808BB14] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaarivasdr_aaashitmandrugs_0009391f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Inarticulate end-point.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [含糊不清的总结论点。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shitman [0808BB14] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaarivasdr_aaashitmandrugs_0009391f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm here on behalf of the Great Khans. We'd like to expand business here,
ESP.TRADUIT: 我代表大汗帮来到这里。我们想要拓展这里的生意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaTraceyMoney
What? No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？不。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceymoney_00094511_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caps are heavier, they take up more room, they have irritating pointy-bits, and they make that obnoxious jangling noise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 瓶盖更重，而且需要更多空间，它们的尖刺部分还会刺激皮肤，而且还会发出刺耳的噪音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceymoney_00094511_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honestly, why do people in this desert like to complain so much?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说真的，为什么沙漠里的人喜欢抱怨这么多？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceymoney_00094511_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are your contracts all for paper money? Can't I get my commission in caps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么你交易都是用的纸币？我能用瓶盖作为我的佣金吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaMoreGuns
aaaDakotaAccept
Sure, alright. You got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，没问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dakota [0805AB7A] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaarivasdr_aaadakotaaccept_000980ed_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaRivasDrugsQuest 25 player.additem aaaDakotaOrder 1
I'm with the Khans. We need you to double what you're buying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是大汗帮的。我们需要你把买的东西数量翻一倍。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, see... I can't afford that, dude. I wish I could, but everyone is all wound up about them convicts running around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...我付不起这笔钱，兄弟。我希望我可以，但是每个人在都为那些到处乱跑的罪犯而烦恼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dakota [0805AB7A] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaarivasdr_aaadakotaaccept_000992da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Travelers don't wanna swing through some lawless-ass town, and the permanent residents are all hiding away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 旅行者们不想到一个无法无天的城镇来，而常住居民又都躲起来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dakota [0805AB7A] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaarivasdr_aaadakotaaccept_000992da_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, gonna need things in Primm to settle way the hell back down, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们得学习普瑞姆那种方式把这个镇给重新安定下来，知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dakota [0805AB7A] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaarivasdr_aaadakotaaccept_000992da_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm with the Khans. We need you to double what you're buying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是大汗帮的。我们需要你把买的东西数量翻一倍。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDakotaSmalltalk
Right now, I just relax and slow-burn my stash all day. I ain't making money, but this might be even better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我只是轻松下来和慢慢消耗我的存货。我没有赚钱，但是这样可能更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dakota [0805AB7A] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaarivasdr_aaadakotasmallt_000980f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you do here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这儿是做什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just spreading the love, man. That's code for selling chems. And doing chems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 传播爱心，伙计。这是卖毒品的诀窍。也包括制造毒品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dakota [0805AB7A] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaarivasdr_aaadakotasmallt_000980f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you do here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这儿是做什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDakotaEasy
Hell yeah, man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然他妈的是的，伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dakota [0805AB7A] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaarivasdr_aaadakotaeasy_000992dc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Primm's doing better than ever. People are working, travelers come through most days... I got cash to burn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 普瑞姆比以前更好。人们在工作，大多数日子旅行者都会来...我也有现金可以花。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dakota [0805AB7A] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaarivasdr_aaadakotaeasy_000992dc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, hey, before you go, wanna hit this with me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，嘿，在你走之前，要跟我一起吸一口吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dakota [0805AB7A] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaarivasdr_aaadakotaeasy_000992dc_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, really? That easily?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，真的？就这么简单？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDakotaStoned
I mean, who wouldn't? Here, this is a good batch, man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁不会要呢？给，这可是上等货，伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dakota [0805AB7A] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaarivasdr_aaadakotastoned_000992de_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell yeah I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然他妈的要了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDakotaWinnersDontDoDrugs
Well, that's no fun, but... hey, more for me. Late, dude.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，真没意思，但...嘿，那我就多吸一口。再见，伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dakota [0805AB7A] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femaleadult01default\aaarivasdr_aaadakotawinner_000998db_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDurrlNovac
Well, I'm from the Hub, out west. My dad wanted me to be a soldier, but I ain't doing that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我来自西边的哈勃城。我老爸希望我当个军人，但我不想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Durrl [0808C10F] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult04\aaarivasdr_aaadurrlnovac_00099ee5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then my ma wanted me to stop getting high, but I ain't gonna do that, neither. So they kicked me out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我老妈希望我停止吸毒，但我也不想。所以他们就把我赶了出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Durrl [0808C10F] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult04\aaarivasdr_aaadurrlnovac_00099ee5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I came east with a caravan... I think I was working for them? I dunno, I was pretty out of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我跟随一个车队来到东边...我想我是替他们打工？我不清楚，我真是受够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Durrl [0808C10F] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult04\aaarivasdr_aaadurrlnovac_00099ee5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And... Yeah, there's this big-ass gecko statue here, and I keep getting stoned...
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后...啊，这里有个大到天的蜥蜴雕像，而我就继续吸毒...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Durrl [0808C10F] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult04\aaarivasdr_aaadurrlnovac_00099ee5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and sometimes I play cards with that old guy. They say he's crazy, but he makes sense to me, man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我有时候会跟那个老家伙玩牌。他们说他疯了，但他对我来说没有问题，伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Durrl [0808C10F] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult04\aaarivasdr_aaadurrlnovac_00099ee5_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说说你的故事好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDurrlDrugs
Hey, whoa, I can't afford double, man. Look, man, there ain't that many buyers in Novac. Double is crazy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，哇，我付不起双倍的钱，伙计。你看，在诺瓦克这里没有那么多的买家。双倍简直是疯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Durrl [0808C10F] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult04\aaarivasdr_aaadurrldrugs_00099ee7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm with the Khans. We need you to double your orders from us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是大汗帮的。我们要你把向我们购买的毒品数量增加一倍。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDurrlTerrifying
Holy shit, OK, OK, I'll buy double, or whatever! No problem, man. We're cool!
ESP.TRADUIT: 卧槽，好，好，我买双倍！没问题，兄弟。我们有话好好说！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Durrl [0808C10F] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult04\aaarivasdr_aaadurrlterrify_00099ee9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, tell your people to double their shipments here, OK? I don't want any trouble, now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，告诉你的兄弟们送双倍的货过来，好吗？我不想惹麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Durrl [0808C10F] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult04\aaarivasdr_aaadurrlterrify_00099ee9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaRivasDrugsQuest 35 player.additem aaaDurrlOrder 1
You're doubling your order, or I'll wring out your lungs and see how much product drips out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要么你买双倍的货，要么我就把你的肺拧干看看有多少货会掉出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDurrlSpeech
[FAILED] Hey, man, I would if I could. You can tell everyone that
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 嘿，老兄，如果可以的话我会干的。你可以跟大伙这么说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Durrl [0808C10F] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult04\aaarivasdr_aaadurrlspeech_0009aadc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're gonna double your order, or... or I'll tell everyone you're banging Old Lady Gibson!
ESP.TRADUIT: 要么你买双倍的货，要么...要么我告诉大家你操了老奶奶吉布森！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Whoa, for real? That's crazy, dude. OK, yeah, I'm in.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 哇，真的吗？真是疯了，伙计。好吧，我同意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Durrl [0808C10F] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult04\aaarivasdr_aaadurrlspeech_0009aadd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take my order to Red Rock Canyon, man. And you let everyone know that I helped out when it was important, OK?
ESP.TRADUIT: 把我的订单交给红岩峡谷，伙计。你会让所有人都知道我在重要的时候帮了忙，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Durrl [0808C10F] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult04\aaarivasdr_aaadurrlspeech_0009aadd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaRivasDrugsQuest 35 player.additem aaaDurrlOrder 1 rewardxp 10
Listen, Durrl. It's of vital importance that you double your order. Do you understand me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，杜尔。把订单翻一番是至关重要的。你明白我说的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDurrlNevermind
OK.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Durrl [0808C10F] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually, nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还是算了吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaTraceyPlayerBounty
Hm? Let me see that...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？让我看看...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyplayer_0009b6f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah, Lawrence & Pyke. They're a private firm that generally acts as a middleman for clients who want to remain anonymous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，劳伦斯和派克。他们是家私人公司，通常为那些想匿名的客户充当中间人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyplayer_0009b6f2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their offices are west of here, and they're never contracted by the government or military, so it's likely a private citizen who ordered it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的办公室在这里的西边，他们从来没有跟政府或军队签过合同，很可能是一个普通公民在经营。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyplayer_0009b6f2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll put our people on the lookout for anything else on this. Nothing's likely to turn up, but you never know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会让我们的人注意这件事。应该不会发生什么事，但谁又说得准呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyplayer_0009b6f2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Was there anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyplayer_0009b6f2_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found a bounty contract on myself. Anything you could tell me about it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现自己头上有一份悬赏。你能告诉我是怎么回事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaNedWhatHappened
aaaTraceyBountyFirm
Don't waste your time. You could spend a few days heading for the West coast, but then what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 别浪费时间。你得花上好几天时间去西海岸，但是然后呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceybounty_0009ceda_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nobody at the office could tell you who put the contract on you, in much the same way that I don't know who contracts the hits I assign you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 公司里没人会告诉你是谁要悬赏你，同样我也不知道我分配给你的打击对象是谁提供的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceybounty_0009ceda_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe the pissant Mojave thugs who normally cross your path make a habit of keeping their employer's details on them, but professionals don't do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许在路上打劫你的那些莫哈维小混混们会有他们雇主的各种细节信息，但专业人士从来不会那样做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceybounty_0009ceda_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to discuss the contract with them. Where can I find their firm?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想跟他们谈谈合同的事。我在哪里可以找到他们的公司？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaTraceyGoodbye
Right, until next time. Back to work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，下次见。回去工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceygoodby_0009cedc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaShitmanSpeech
[FAILED] [Mumbled soliloquy.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] [自言自语。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shitman [0808BB14] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaarivasdr_aaashitmanspeec_0009cede_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, Shitman, you do this for me... And I might just be your best friend. How's that sound?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，烂人，你如果帮我做这个...我就会成为你最好的朋友。你怎么说？

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] [Passionate, unintelligible gibberish.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] [充满激情，莫名其妙的胡言乱语。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shitman [0808BB14] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaarivasdr_aaashitmanspeec_0009cedf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Presumably, whatever he is saying relates to the order he hands you.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [大概是，他所说的一切都与他交给你的订单有关。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shitman [0808BB14] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaarivasdr_aaashitmanspeec_0009cedf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaRivasDrugsQuest 15 player.additem aaaShitmanOrder 1 rewardxp 10
Listen to me, uh, Shitman... I know that you're a man of honor and integrity. I believe in you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听我说，呃，烂人...我知道你是个荣耀和正直的人。我相信你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaShitmanKhans
[He buys drugs from them.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [他向他们买毒品。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Shitman [0808BB14] (mod) Quest : ([08093917]aaaRivasDrugsQuest) Crystal Blue Persuasion EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaarivasdr_aaashitmankhans_0009d4d9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your relationship with the Great Khans?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你跟大汗帮是什么关系？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentPersuadeFailed
Oh well, I tried being nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦好吧，我已经试过好好说了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentpersu_0009e117_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, if he won't listen to reason, we'll just go with blackmail. And, as it happens, I got something all lined up for him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，如果他没法讲道理的话，我们就只能威胁他了。为此，我为他准备了一些东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentpersu_0009e117_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's this employee we got here, real obnoxious cocksucker, and this was before he became a full-on jet junkie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们这里有个员工，是个相当令人讨厌的杂种，这还只是在他变成瘾君子之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentpersu_0009e117_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's worthless. I was gonna sell his ass to the Fiends, but this is much better. He's up in the supply closet, on the suites level.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个废物。我本来想把他卖给恶魔帮，但这样处理更好。他在供应室，就在套房的那一层。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentpersu_0009e117_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cut his throat for me, then come back, and bring me the knife you used to do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用刀割了他的喉咙，然后回来，把你所用的刀交给我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentpersu_0009e117_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sound good?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentpersu_0009e117_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shapiro refused to back down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 夏皮罗拒绝退让。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentRocky
Don't be a fucking pussy. This fucker is a liability. He's losing us money, he irritates clients, and his stupid fucking face pisses me off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别他妈像个娘们一样。这个杂种是个累赘，他害我们赔钱，他惹怒客户，我一看到他那傻逼脸就想发火。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentrocky_0009e119_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if that ain't enough, how about this? You can kill him yourself, nice and quick, or I'll have him taken out real slow and painful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果那还不够，那这么办怎么样？要么你给他个痛快杀了他，要么我就让他慢慢痛苦地死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentrocky_0009e119_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, you going to ice this fucker for me, or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，你会帮我干掉这个杂种，是不是？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentrocky_0009e119_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does this employee really deserve to die?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个员工真的该死吗？
