ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentAcceptRocky
Good. Here, use this knife. Come see me when you're done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，给，用这把刀。做完之后来找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentaccep_0009e11b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaVincentWhoreQuest 30 player.additem aaaCasinoKnife 1 player.equipitem aaaCasinoKnife
I'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentRockyDead
Excellent. Give me that knife back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常棒。把那把刀还给我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentrocky_0009e11e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, here are my terms for that dumb politician cunt. Deliver the tape for me, and I'll cut you in on the operation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，这是我给那个傻逼政治家的提议条件。帮我把这个卡带送过去，然后我就让你加入我们的行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentrocky_0009e11e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaaCasinoKnife 1 player.additem aaaVincentBlackmail 1
It's done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞定了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentPersuadeSuccess
You're fucking kidding me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈真是开玩笑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentpersu_0009e126_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That fucker was annoying incorruptible. I don't know how you pulled that off, but maybe Sullivan was right about you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个杂种真是讨厌地廉洁。我不知道你是怎么说服他的，但也许苏利文对你的评价是对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentpersu_0009e126_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, well, I guess I don't have any objections to letting you in on the business. Go back to Freeside. There's plenty of shit needing done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我想我不反对让你加入我们的生意。回自由之城去。那里还有很多事情要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentpersu_0009e126_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the meantime, I'm going to set up in that poker hall that you cleared out for Sullivan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同时，我要去你帮苏利文清理出的那栋楼里面把扑克牌大厅开业起来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentpersu_0009e126_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaVincentWhoreQuest 60 aaaVincentREF.MoveToMarkerWithFade aaaVincentPokerMarkerREF
I convinced Shapiro to reconsider his position.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说服了夏皮罗重新考虑他的立场。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentMailDelivered
Good. You think he might kill himself?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。你说他会不会自杀？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentmaild_0009e128_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever. You did good work. Alright, I'll tell Sullivan that you get a pass to work with us. There's a lot of cash to be made here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么样。你干得很好。好吧，我会告诉苏利文你已经通过考验跟我们一起工作了。这里有很多钱等着我们赚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentmaild_0009e128_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should go back and see him. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该回去见他。干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentmaild_0009e128_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yeah, and I won't be here when you get back. I'm setting up shop in that poker hall you cleared out for Sullivan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，对了，你如果再回来我将不在这里了。我会在你帮苏利文清理的那个扑克大厅里面开个商店。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentmaild_0009e128_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaVincentWhoreQuest 60 aaaVincentREF.MoveToMarkerWithFade aaaVincentPokerMarkerREF
Blackmail delivered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 威胁信送到了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyAboutKrieg
Do you remember Frank Doyle? He was an ex-Ranger turned gun-for-hire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你记得弗兰克·多伊尔吗？他以前是个游骑兵，现在是个职业枪手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroyaboutkrie_0009f31b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, you killed Mr. Doyle a ways back. Cleared him and his whole crew out of some derelict bar in Outer Vegas. Impressive work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你早就杀掉了多伊尔先生。在外维加斯一个废弃酒吧里面把他和他的手下全都干掉了。真让人印象深刻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroyaboutkrie_0009f31b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I don't begrudge you killing Doyle, not one bit. But, be that as it may, it's caused a little problem to crop up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我并没有对你杀了多伊尔有一点不满。但是，尽管那样，这还是引起了一个小问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroyaboutkrie_0009f31b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, Doyle and his boys were fairly reasonable, as far as raiders go. They let me conduct my business in Outer Vegas without interference.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多伊尔和他的手下还是相当公平的，相对掠夺者来说。他们让我不被打扰地在外维加斯做生意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroyaboutkrie_0009f31b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm entirely comfortable with paying bribes and protection money, when needed. I understand how to do business. And so did Doyle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我完全可以接受必要时候的贿赂和保护费。我知道怎么去做生意。多伊尔也知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroyaboutkrie_0009f31b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was actually a great help for my interests, without ever knowing it. His crew kept the Fiends in that area under control.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他对我的兴趣帮助很大，但却不知情。他的手下让那个区域的恶魔帮处于控制之下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroyaboutkrie_0009f31b_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, with all of them dead, there's a vacuum that's opened up. And, some Fiend warchief stepped in to fill it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，他们都死了之后，这里出现了一个真空。而某个恶魔帮的头领就出现并填补了这个真空。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroyaboutkrie_0009f31b_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I tried to pay him off. He had my messenger tied down and sliced open. Then, he shoved his arm into my employee's still-living entrails.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我试过收买他。他把我的信使绑起来剖开。然后，他把手臂伸进仍然或者的信使的内脏里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroyaboutkrie_0009f31b_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he can't be paid off, he'll just need to be removed. And you're more than qualified to do the removing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他不能被收买的话，那就必须得除掉他。你完全有资格来做这个铲除工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroyaboutkrie_0009f31b_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once you've taken him out, come on back here and I'll see that you're paid for your services.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦你除掉了他，就回这儿来，我会为你的服务付钱的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroyaboutkrie_0009f31b_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaRoyKriegQuest 10
What do you need now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在需要什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyKriegDead
Outstanding work, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是出色的工作，朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroykriegdead_0009f31d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rather a shame about that old saloon, I suppose. The owner, Saul, would host events on my behalf from time to time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个旧沙龙真是遗憾。它的所有者，索尔，会不时代表我主持活动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroykriegdead_0009f31d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How badly trashed was the interior?
ESP.TRADUIT: 它里面毁坏得有多严重？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroykriegdead_0009f31d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaRoyKriegQuest 30 player.additem caps001 750
Krieg is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克里格死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyKriegBG
Well, he calls himself Krieg, and he's apparently rather infamous in Westside because of his penchant for chainsawing living captives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，他称自己为克里格，他显然在西区相当声名狼藉，因为他有用电锯锯俘虏的爱好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroykriegbg_0009f917_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And he's... What's the politically correct nomenclature? Retard-strong? No, that isn't it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且他...在政治上正确的命名法是什么？死硬派？不，不是那个...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroykriegbg_0009f917_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, he's a seven-foot-tall mongoloid cannibal, and he'll tear your arms off and beat you to death with them if he gets close to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个七英尺高的蒙古食人者，如果他靠近你的话，他会把你的手臂扯下来，然后用它们将你打死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroykriegbg_0009f917_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know how old he is, where he comes from, or how inbred he is. All I know for certain is that he's the very worst kind of problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道他有多少岁，来自哪里，或者如果被近亲繁殖出来的。我能确定的就是他是个最糟的问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroykriegbg_0009f917_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's the kind that can't be bought off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是那种没法被收买的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroykriegbg_0009f917_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything else you can tell me about him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我关于他的其他情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyGoodbye
Take care of yourself!
ESP.TRADUIT: 自己保重！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroygoodbye_0009f919_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyKriegGuilt
Well, you have to keep in mind, I haven't seen any of this. I was just asking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须记住，我什么都没看见。我是在请求你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroykriegguil_0009ff13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand if you're a little upset. After all, you must be having those nagging little thoughts that all that blood is on your hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你感到不安我能理解。毕竟，你一定有那种手上沾满血的纠缠不休的小念头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroykriegguil_0009ff13_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, it is true that Krieg was only able to operate with impunity because you killed Doyle. I imagine that must be weighing real heavy on you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是，因为你杀了多伊尔，所以克里格只会逃过惩罚。我想那对你来说一定很沉重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroykriegguil_0009ff13_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regardless, we have more work to do. And, don't worry, I don't blame you for what Krieg did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我们还有很多事情要做。别担心，关于克里格的事情我不怪你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroykriegguil_0009ff13_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyways, let me know if you want more work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想要更多的工作，请告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroykriegguil_0009ff13_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The place was filled to the brim with the corpses of butchered innocents, you sick bastard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方都快塞不下被屠杀的无辜者的尸体了。你这个变态的杂种。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyKriegNeutral
Not a surprise, but still, I had to ask.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一点也不奇怪，但是我不得不问。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroykriegneut_0009ff15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh well, on to bigger and better things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢好了，我们要去做更大的事情了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroykriegneut_0009ff15_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me know if you want more work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想要更多的工作，请告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0809E723]aaaRoyKriegQuest) Where the Sun Never Shines EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroykrie_aaaroykriegneut_0009ff15_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Fiends used it as a drug den and slaughterhouse. That was before I shot the place up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恶魔帮把那里当作了毒品窝点和屠宰场。在我开枪之前是这个样子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaTraceyGoofyName
Apparently, he has a special fondness for beating captives to death with his bare hands, while raping them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然，他特别喜欢在强奸俘虏的时候徒手把他们打死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceygoofyn_000a0b16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What were you saying? Oh, yes. He has a very funny name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你刚说什么？噢，是的，他的确有个有趣的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceygoofyn_000a0b16_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: McDougal. That's a funny name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 麦克道格尔。真是个有趣的名字。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyBackground
Well, I was born in the great state of Georgia, far to the east of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我出生在伟大的乔治亚州，在远离这里的东边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroybackgroun_000a0b18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a violent, cutthroat place, and much hotter than here in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是个罪恶，残酷的地方，而且比莫哈维热多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroybackgroun_000a0b18_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vegas-types think they have a monopoly on heat, but humidity is another matter, entirely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维加斯人认为他们垄断了热度，但湿度完全是另一回事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroybackgroun_000a0b18_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are you from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来自哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyEastCoast
It's an... untamed sort of place, for the most part. None of these pleasantries we take for granted here. Clean water, power, plentiful food...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是个...多半不受约束的地方。这并非是你们想当然的那种客套话。那里有干净的水，电力，足够的食物...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyeastcoast_000a1d28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And strange, strange people. Without all the trappings of modern civilization, they've... Well, I don't know what to call it beyond simple insanity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有奇怪的人们。没有任何现代文明的迹象，他们...呃，我不知道除了说成简单的精神错乱还能叫什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyeastcoast_000a1d28_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are lunatic cults who worship radiation, and I swear to you I'm not making that up. I once met an individual who purported to be a vampire!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里有些疯子崇拜辐射，我发誓这不是我编造的。我有一次还遇到过一个想要变成吸血鬼的人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyeastcoast_000a1d28_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I even heard a rumor that, somehow, the Massachusetts wasteland doesn't even have prostitution. Not a single sex worker, can you imagine?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我甚至听说过一个传言，马萨诸塞州的废土上连妓院都没有。一个性工作者都没有，你能想象吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyeastcoast_000a1d28_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are a scattered handful of dismal little townships all around, but no lines of communication, and certainly no one producing anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 周围零散地分布着几个凄凉的小城镇，但是没有通信线路，当然也没有人生产任何东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyeastcoast_000a1d28_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only people East of the Mississippi that are actually producing new resources are the denizens of a place called the Pitt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在密西西比以东仅有匹兹堡的居民在生产新的资源。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyeastcoast_000a1d28_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I considered settling myself there, but from what I hear, it's a slaver dictatorship, much like what you might find in Arizona these days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我考虑过在那里定居，但据我所知，那里是由奴隶贩子独裁的，就像你现在在亚利桑那州看到的一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyeastcoast_000a1d28_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Madness and poor breeding, all around. I'm quite content in my choice to move on to more urbane pastures.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到处都是疯狂和野蛮。我对我搬到更为文明的地方的选择很满意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyeastcoast_000a1d28_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the East coast like?
ESP.TRADUIT: 东海岸怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyTravel
Traveling caravans were just about the only modern convenience they had in that place. I resolved to buy my way onto one and get out, fast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大篷车旅行商队是他们那个地方唯一拥有的现代便利条件。我决定交够路费尽快跑出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroytravel_000a1d2a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There was this junkie girl who lived nearby, Tanya. She was completely addled, without the slightest inkling of what was happening around her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个吸毒的女孩住在附近，她叫坦雅。她完全是糊里糊涂的，一点也不知道她周围发生了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroytravel_000a1d2a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I told the caravan hands that, if they would take me as far West as they would go, I'd allow them all to take turns with her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉商队的人，如果他们能把我带到足够西边的地方，我就允许他们轮流和她在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroytravel_000a1d2a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tanya was too stoned to protest, and the caravan workers all took me at my word that I managed Tanya's services.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坦雅吸毒太多而无法反抗，商队的工人都相信我在管理坦雅的服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroytravel_000a1d2a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Along the way, we were stopped by raiders, intent on cutting our throats and making off with our loot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在路上，我们遇到了掠夺者，想要割了我们的喉咙并带走我们的物资。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroytravel_000a1d2a_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First, they killed a hand named Dominic. I didn't like him very much, so I don't hold it against them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，他们杀了一个叫多米尼克的工人。我不是很喜欢他，所以我不反对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroytravel_000a1d2a_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But they were going to do the same to the rest of us. And, well, I like living. So, I asked them why they didn't ambush us sooner?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是他们想对我们剩下的人做同样的事情。呃，我想要活下来。于是我问他们为什么不早点来袭击我们呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroytravel_000a1d2a_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They explained that their rickety little bridge was all the territory they had. And I offered to help them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们解释说那座摇摇欲坠的小桥就是他们的地盘。然后我提出要帮助他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroytravel_000a1d2a_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told them, if they don't kill us, we'd be happy to serve as bait for the other regional gangs. While they extorted us, our captors would flank them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉他们，如果他们不杀我们，我们会很高兴充当吸引其他帮派的诱饵。当其他帮派抢夺我们时，这帮掠夺者就可以从侧面攻击他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroytravel_000a1d2a_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We did just that, and our new friends reaped the spoils of all their dead rivals. They became our loyal guards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们就这样做了，然后我们的新朋友们从所有死去的对手那里收获了战利品。他们就成了我们忠实的保护者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroytravel_000a1d2a_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When we parted ways, they were the strongest gang in the region. And the caravan boss gave me all the caps he had for getting him out alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我们分开的时候，他们已经是当地最强的帮派了。而且商队老板把所有的瓶盖都给了我，以感谢我救了他的命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroytravel_000a1d2a_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, how'd you end up way over here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那，你怎么跑到这里来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyCaesarsLegion
Without much trouble, as it were.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以说没有遇到太多的麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroycaesarsle_000a1d2c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't use chems, I have no interest in male sodomy, I'm obviously not from the NCR, and I'm not a woman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不吸毒，我对搞基没兴趣，我明显也不是从NCR来的，而且我也不是女人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroycaesarsle_000a1d2c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion really didn't have any interest in me, and that serves me just fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团真的对我没什么兴趣，这对我来说很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroycaesarsle_000a1d2c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How'd you get through Legion territory?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么通过军团的领地的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyEnough
Of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyenough_000a1d2e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough of that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyBusiness
My primary area of business is in the entertainment sector. Gambling, girls, porn, but I have my fingers in a lot of different pies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的主要业务领域是娱乐业。赌博，女孩，色情，但我参与了很多的产业。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroybusiness_000a1d30_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only industry that I have no stake in is the weapons trade. The Gun Runners work rather hard to maintain their monopoly on weapons sales.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我唯一没有参与的行业是武器贸易。军火贩子们相当努力地保持了自己在武器生意里的垄断地位。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroybusiness_000a1d30_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what exactly do you do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那，你到底是做什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentBusiness
Partners. I don't work for him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 合作伙伴而已。我不替他工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentbusin_000a2925_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And what I do is make fucking money. Sometimes I sell him the leftovers from the casino here, once they're too busted to make any cash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要做的就是他妈的赚钱。有时一旦他们被突击检查而赚不到钱，我会把这里赌场留下的东西卖给他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentbusin_000a2925_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes I just kick the shit out of dumb motherfuckers who don't do what they're fucking told.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候有些蠢货不他妈按你说的做，我就把他们他妈的踢出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentbusin_000a2925_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if business ever calls for some discreet triggermen, they come from me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果生意需要谨慎的枪手，我就派他们出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentbusin_000a2925_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's your arrangement with Sullivan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你跟苏利文是什么关系？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentRoySpeech
[FAILED] You want a fucking medal or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 你他妈是想拿奖章还是干嘛？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentroysp_000a2927_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Roy seems like good people. I like working for him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 罗伊看起来像个好人。我喜欢替他工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I don't. That fat Irish prick thinks he's big-time because he has a lot of businesses kick charity his way.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 不是的。那个爱尔兰肥猪自认为他成功了，他以自己的方式昧着良心做了很多生意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentroysp_000a2928_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could put a bullet in the back of his neck today, and have someone take his job tomorrow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我甚至现在就可以从背后给他一枪，然后明天让人接替他的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentroysp_000a2928_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only reason I don't is 'cause I don't feel like dealing with getting one of my boys settled in his position.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我唯一不这么做的理由是我不想把我的手下安排到他那个位置上去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentroysp_000a2928_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sullivan's a reliable business partner, and that's where it ends. Watering houseplants during meetings, with that fake fucking smile all the time...
ESP.TRADUIT: 苏利文是个可靠的生意伙伴，仅此而已。在会议期间给室内植物浇水，脸上总是挂着那副他妈的假笑...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentroysp_000a2928_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He irritates me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他让我生气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentroysp_000a2928_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardxp 20
Sounds like you do more than Roy. Why do you need him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来你比罗伊做的事情多。为什么你还需要他？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentGoodbye
Yeah, fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentgoodb_000a292a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyVincent
He's a reliable business partner. Reliable enough that I forgive his complete and utter disregard for class and decorum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个可靠的生意伙伴。可靠到我原谅了他完全的不顾等级和礼节。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyvincent_000a3b18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is it really necessary to swear every time he opens his mouth?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他每次开口都要骂人，真的有必要吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyvincent_000a3b18_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regardless, he provides an ample amount of discreet thugs, on the rare occasions that I may need them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管这些，他提供了大量行事谨慎的暴徒，在极端情况下我可能会需要他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyvincent_000a3b18_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: More often, he sends me womenfolk. Once their addictions become too problematic for the management, they need to go somewhere, after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他经常给我输送女人过来。毕竟一旦她们的毒瘾对管理造成了麻烦，就得把她们弄走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyvincent_000a3b18_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As it happens, the local clientele don't really care if their whores are strung out or... hygienic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恰好，本地的客户并不真的关心妓女是否神志不清或者...是否卫生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyvincent_000a3b18_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what's the deal with Vincent?
ESP.TRADUIT: 文森特是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyBeginPornoQuest
Well... It's a small job, and I wouldn't usually delegate it to someone of your skill set, but since you asked...
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...有个小工作，我通常不会派给你这样的高手去做，但既然你问了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaapornoqu_aaaroybeginporn_000a4112_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need someone to pick up a package for me, and, most likely, crack a skull or two in the process. Interested?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要有人帮我拿个包裹，并且，在过程中打碎几个脑袋。有兴趣吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaapornoqu_aaaroybeginporn_000a4112_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any miscellaneous work you need done?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么杂活要做吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyAcceptPorno
I'm not sure if you're just bored, or fishing for a raise, or you're deeply offended by subpar work, but consider me impressed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定你是不是只是因为无聊，或者想要得到提拔，还是说你对低劣的工作深感不快，但鉴于我对你的印象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaapornoqu_aaaroyacceptpor_000a4116_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, alright. There's an area, directly outside of North Vegas, that... well, I own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，好吧。有一个地方，就在北维加斯外面，那里...呃，是我的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaapornoqu_aaaroyacceptpor_000a4116_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have chem-slingers, whores, and pornographers there, all giving me a cut of the profit. Well, except the pornographer, recently.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在那里拥有毒品厂，妓女，还有色情电影，全都给我带来丰厚的利润。呃，色情电影近期不行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaapornoqu_aaaroyacceptpor_000a4116_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For some reason, I've yet to see a single cap from that hack director this week. I have a man who should be handling it, and yet...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道什么原因，我这周还没有收到那个廉价导演的一个瓶盖。我本来安排了一个人去处理，但是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaapornoqu_aaaroyacceptpor_000a4116_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First step is to see what the hold-up is with the last man I sent to deal with this. He should be operating in an old apartment in North Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先要去看看我上次派的那个人遇到什么障碍了。他应该是在北维加斯广场管理一座旧公寓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaapornoqu_aaaroyacceptpor_000a4116_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's expendable, so, feel free to kill him if you find yourself offended by his excuses. I won't extend protection to a useless employee.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是可以牺牲的，所以，如果你发现自己对他的借口感到不爽请随意杀了他。我不会保护一个没用的雇员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaapornoqu_aaaroyacceptpor_000a4116_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I look forward to seeing you when this is dealt with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你搞定这件事之后再来见我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaapornoqu_aaaroyacceptpor_000a4116_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaPornoQuest 10
Sure, lay it on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，包在我身上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyDeclinePorno
I figured as much. It's not exactly glamorous work. I could probably pay some Freeside urchins to do it, instead. We shan't speak of it again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也这么想。这可不是什么光彩的工作。我可能会付钱找一些自由之城的孤儿去做这件事。我们不该再谈论它了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaapornoqu_aaaroydeclinepo_000a4115_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't sound like something I'm interested in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来不像是我感兴趣的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaThugPeaceful
Yeah, of course, don't worry! You can tell the boss, I'm still good to collect from anyone else. Thanks, man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊当然了，别担心！你可以告诉老板，我还可以从别人那里收钱回来。谢了，兄弟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thug [08050696] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaapornoqu_aaathugpeaceful_000a4118_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, we're good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我们没事了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaThugMurderTime
What?! I ain't going, not like this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？！我不是，不要这样！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Thug [08050696] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaapornoqu_aaathugmurderti_000a411b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player aaaMusclemanREF.removefromallfactions
<Attack> What, and keep your useless ass on the company payroll? Close your eyes, I'll be quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击> 什么，你这没用的废物还想继续领工资？闭上眼睛，我会给你个痛快的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDirectorBusyHow
What the fu- Asshole, I don't know who the fuck you think you are, but I ain't paying Roy one more cap, you hear me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 操你妈-杂种，我不知道你他妈以为自己是谁，但我不会再给罗伊一分钱，听到了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Benny Alberta [0804C9A9] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaapornoqu_aaadirectorbusy_000a411e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can finance my own films, OK? I don't need that prick collecting a cut when he doesn't do a goddamn thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以自己资助我的电影，好吗？我再也不需要那个什么他妈也没干的鸟人分走我的利润了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Benny Alberta [0804C9A9] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaapornoqu_aaadirectorbusy_000a411e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Busy collecting the interest for your debt to Roy Sullivan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 忙着收你欠罗伊·沙利文的利息啊？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDirectorCaesarKiller
...What?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Benny Alberta [0804C9A9] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaapornoqu_aaadirectorcaes_000a4120_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, you're... Uh... Do you have any idea...
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，你是...呃...你知不知道...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Benny Alberta [0804C9A9] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaapornoqu_aaadirectorcaes_000a4120_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could have you...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能把你...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Benny Alberta [0804C9A9] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaapornoqu_aaadirectorcaes_000a4120_3.ogg
NPC : Benny Alberta [0804C9A9] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: God damn it, here. Take the fucking money. Tell Sullivan that it'll be on time from now on. Just don't do nothing crazy, OK?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢该死，给你。拿着这些他妈的钱。告诉苏利文从现在开始以后都会及时交的。只是别在这里做什么疯狂的事情，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Benny Alberta [0804C9A9] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaapornoqu_aaadirectorcaes_000a4120_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaaPornoMoney 1 setstage aaaPornoQuest 30
Hey, nice to meet you. I'm the one who killed Caesar, and I'm here to collect what you owe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，很高兴见到你。我就是那个杀死凯撒的人，我现在来收回你欠下的钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDirectorTerrifying
You're a very persuasive negotiator, and I've reconsidered my position on paying Mr. Sullivan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是个很有说服力的谈判者，而我重新考虑了给苏利文交钱的立场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Benny Alberta [0804C9A9] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaapornoqu_aaadirectorterr_000a4123_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you go, every single cap. And you can tell Mr. Sullivan that it'll never be late, uh, ever again. Ever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你吧，全部的瓶盖。你可以告诉苏利文先生以后再也不会晚交了。再也不会了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Benny Alberta [0804C9A9] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaapornoqu_aaadirectorterr_000a4123_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry for making you come all the way down here. It won't happen again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很抱歉让你大老远跑过来。这种事不会再发生了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Benny Alberta [0804C9A9] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaapornoqu_aaadirectorterr_000a4123_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaaPornoMoney 1 setstage aaaPornoQuest 30
I have a movie idea: I shove that camera rig up your ass, sideways, and see what wonders we find.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对电影有个想法：我把那个摄影机装置从一边塞进你的屁眼里，然后看看我们能发现什么奇迹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDirectorSmashRobot
You wouldn't dare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不敢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Benny Alberta [0804C9A9] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaapornoqu_aaadirectorsmas_000a4128_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaPornoQuest 25
Alright. If you're not going to be reasonable, I'm going to break your director-robot, upstairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。如果你不讲道理，我就弄坏你楼上的导演机器人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDirectorKilledRobot
Get out. Take your fucking money, and get the hell out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出去。拿着这些他妈的钱，给老子滚出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Benny Alberta [0804C9A9] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaapornoqu_aaadirectorkill_000a412a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I can keep this business running after what you've done, then that rat prick will get his fucking money on time, from now on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果在你走之后我能继续经营下去，那个贼眉鼠眼的杂种就能按时收到钱，从现在开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Benny Alberta [0804C9A9] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaapornoqu_aaadirectorkill_000a412a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just... get the hell out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...你他妈赶紧滚吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Benny Alberta [0804C9A9] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaapornoqu_aaadirectorkill_000a412a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaaPornoMoney 1 setstage aaaPornoQuest 30
Nope, but you have to ask yourself, how much money do you want to sink into not paying Sullivan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，但你得问问你自己，如果不还苏利文的钱，你将会付出多大代价？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaDirectorSpeech
[FAILED] Hey, fuckpump, you try to strong-arm me, and I'll have the Mastodonic Mutant throw your ass on the street.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 嘿，操你妈的，你想威胁我，我会让那个齿象变种人把你扔到街上面去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Benny Alberta [0804C9A9] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I'll let everyone know that your movies are made by a deal-breaker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我会让每个人都知道你的电影是不讲契约的人拍出来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] ....
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Benny Alberta [0804C9A9] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: God damn it, those fucking snakes wouldn't even take a second to consider it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的，那些滑头肯定他妈连想都不用想就会同意的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Benny Alberta [0804C9A9] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaapornoqu_aaadirectorspee_000a413b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, jackass. Here's Sullivan's stupid cut. Every fucking cap. I'll pay on time, like a good fucking dog. Happy? Good, now fuck off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，混蛋。这是苏利文的钱。全部他妈的都在这里。我会按时交钱的，就像只他妈的哈巴狗一样。满意了？那就滚吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Benny Alberta [0804C9A9] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01default\aaapornoqu_aaadirectorspee_000a413b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardxp 10 player.additem aaaPornoMoney 1 setstage aaaPornoQuest 30
How about I get word to Reno, offer your job to whoever throws you out and agrees to pay their dues?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要是我到新里诺放话出去，把你的工作提供给那些把你赶出去，并同意支付费用的人呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyPornoDone
See, this is why you're my favorite employee. You get things done, you're efficient, and you're willing to do tedious busywork.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看，这就是为什么你是我最喜欢的员工。你把事情搞定，效率很高，而且还愿意做乏味的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaapornoqu_aaaroypornodone_000a413f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's your cut of the take. And a snazzy hat, just because I appreciate a good work ethic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你应得的一份。还有一顶漂亮的帽子，只是因为我欣赏你良好的职业道德。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([08050699]aaaPornoQuest) Turn Yourself Around EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaapornoqu_aaaroypornodone_000a413f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaPornoQuest 40
Here's the cash from that porn studio. They won't be holding out on you again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是那个色情制片厂欠的钱。他们不会再反抗你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentRockwellQuest
Yeah, take this package to a guy named Jim Ferrar. He's the sheriff of this little shithole called New Rockwell, to the west.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，把这个包裹交给一个叫吉姆·费拉尔的人。他是这个名叫新洛克威尔的破地方的警长，就在西边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaarockwel_aaavincentrockw_000a533e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Buncha dumbshit raiders running around all over that place, so I don't trust any of my usual runners to not get themselves killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一帮傻逼掠夺者在那里到处乱窜，因此我无法相信我一般的手下去了那里会不丢了性命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaarockwel_aaavincentrockw_000a533e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't need to come back here after you're done. Sheriff will handle the payment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你完成之后不用再回来了。警长会处理好你的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaarockwel_aaavincentrockw_000a533e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaRockwellQuest 10 Player.additem aaaDrugPackage 1
Hit me with some work, Vincent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我点活干吧，文森特。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaTraceyMoreJobs
Are there any other posters on the board?
ESP.TRADUIT: 公告牌上还有别的告示吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceymorejo_000a5f53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No? Doesn't look like it. Well, in that case, no, I don't have any more work for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没了？我看好像是没了。好吧，既然这样，我想没有工作能给你了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceymorejo_000a5f53_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not overly surprising. Generally, there are a lot of branches of the NCR that are willing to hire freelance killers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不用太奇怪。通常，这里有很多NCR的分支部门想要雇佣自由职业的杀手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceymorejo_000a5f53_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have to meet some very specific criteria for this particular office to contract an assassination, understand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于专门负责暗杀的部门，你得满足一些非常具体的标准要求，明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceymorejo_000a5f53_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If any more jobs do come across my desk, and I feel that they would be a good fit for your skills, I'll send a courier for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我的办公桌上有更多的工作，而且我觉得它们恰好适合你的能力的话，我会让人给你送信的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceymorejo_000a5f53_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have any more work for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还有工作要给我做吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSawyerIntro
What does anyone want? Health, happiness, prosperity... maybe a couple of ungrateful children to break my things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一般人还能想要什么？健康，快乐，成功...也许是几个忘恩负义的小孩破坏了我的这一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerintro_000a6559_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In my particular case, I want you to do a job for me. In exchange, all the perks and benefits of this agency are on offer to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这个特殊情况下，我想要你帮我做一件事情。作为交换，这个机构的所有待遇和收益都能向你提供。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerintro_000a6559_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Money, information, a spotless record with the government... But more important is what it is I'd like you to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 金钱，消息，在政府的清白记录...但更重要的是我要你做的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerintro_000a6559_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaELMetSawyer to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaELMetSawyer + 1
So, what do you want? Your letter wasn't very specific.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你想要什么？你的信写得不是很明确。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentOmertas
I bring in some chems, and take out some expired whores.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我弄来毒品，还有弄走那些到期的妓女。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentomert_000a775f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's about it. Bosses are keeping to themselves, the miserable fucks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这些。老板们从不掺和，这些可怜的杂种。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentomert_000a775f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, you keep asking me shit. I got something I want you to answer for me, this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你一直在问问题。现在我有个问题要你回答。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentomert_000a775f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your role in the Omertas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在黑手党里面是什么角色？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm one rung down from the boss-man. Ordinarily, I'd resent the prick, but Cachino ain't the sort to go lording over his people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是帮老板传话的人。通常，我对那个鸟人感到气愤，但是卡奇诺不是那种作威作福的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentomert_000a7760_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As long as we don't go doing some fucking dumb shit like, say, trying to join the fucking Legion, it doesn't matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要我们不做那些愚蠢的破事，比如加入他妈的军团的话，那就没有关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentomert_000a7760_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Means I get to run my own jobs, which is how I fucking like it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那将意味着我可以经营自己的事情，那才是我他妈喜欢做的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentomert_000a7760_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, you keep asking me shit. I got something I want you to answer for me, this time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你一直在问问题。现在我有个问题要你回答。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentomert_000a7760_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your role in the Omertas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在黑手党里面是什么角色？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentCourier
You're a courier. A fucking mailman. How in the fuck did you make yourself a regional power-player?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个邮差。一个他妈的邮递员。你是怎么让自己成为这个地区的强势人物的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentcouri_000a7762_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, I gotta be honest. It kinda pisses me off. Like, you got Mr. House, President Kimball, Caesar, and... a minimum wage delivery-girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说，我得说真的。这让我有点生气。你得到了豪斯先生，金博尔总统，凯撒，还有...一个只拿底薪的小妞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentcouri_000a7762_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a courier. A fucking mailman. How in the fuck did you make yourself a regional power-player?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个邮差。一个他妈的邮递员。你是怎么让自己成为这个地区的强势人物的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentcouri_000a7763_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, I gotta be honest. It kinda pisses me off. Like, you got Mr. House, President Kimball, Caesar, and... a minimum wage delivery-boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说，我得说真的。这让我有点生气。你得到了豪斯先生，金博尔总统，凯撒，还有...一个只拿底薪的小伙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentcouri_000a7763_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentCourier1
Yeah, well, so are whores. And the most significant thing any hooker I've known has done is give me the fucking clap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，妓女也是这样。最重要的是我所知道的妓女所做的事情就是跟我啪啪啪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentcouri_000a7765_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can I say? I'm a people person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能说什么？我是个擅长打交道的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentCourier2
Yeah, I guess. You ice the right motherfuckers, people'll take notice. I know that for a fact.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜是的。你正确地干掉了混蛋，人们会注意到你。我知道这是事实。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentcouri_000a7767_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess I just killed the right folks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我只是杀对了人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentCourier3
And here I am, not making moves unless I know ahead of time that it's gonna turn out in my favor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也是，除非我提前知道结果会对我有利，否则我不会行动。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentcouri_000a7769_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, pretty sure your "luck" got you two in the head from that fucking moron running the Tops, so I still prefer my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我非常肯定你的“运气”帮你的头挡住了那个经营上好佳的白痴的子弹，所以我还是喜欢我的方式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentcouri_000a7769_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right place, right time, I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 地利，天时，我想是吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentCourier4
Fucking bizarre, the whole fucking thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真他妈稀奇，全都他妈稀奇怪了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentcouri_000a776b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have absolutely no idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我完全不知道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentStartMercs
Yeah, I got a problem. And since you're a partner in our little enterprise, that means you got a problem, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我有个问题。既然你是我们这个小公司的合作伙伴，那意味着这个问题也是你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentstart_000a776d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently someone from the NCR is aware of our little... poker club. He's working on running the info back west, which would disrupt our plans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然有个NCR的家伙知道了我们的小...扑克俱乐部。他正在西边收集信息，那会打乱我们的计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentstart_000a776d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The catch is, it could be any one of three guys. They're all independent contractors, working for the NCR, in the Mojave right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关键是，那可能是三个人中的任何一个。他们都是独立承包人，替NCR工作，现在就在莫哈维。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentstart_000a776d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, we could stalk 'em around, do surveillance, maybe even prod them for info... Real thorough, y'know? Learn everything they're hiding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我们可以悄悄接近他们，监视他们，也许甚至刺探他们的消息...真正彻底地，知道吗？找出任何他们隐藏的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentstart_000a776d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That'd make sure we get the right guy, but... Look, why take a chance? Least that's the way I feel about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样才能确保我们找出正确的人，但...为什么要冒险呢？至少我是这么想的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentstart_000a776d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The details are all here. Get it done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 细节都在这里了。搞定它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentstart_000a776d_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaMercenaryQuest 10 player.additem aaaVincentHitList 1
Any other problems you need dealt with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还有什么问题需要处理吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentFreeWeapons
aaaElizaPokerHall
How much cash you think is on that table? Hundreds of thousands? More? The flowers are a nice touch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得那张桌子上有多少钱？成千上万？还是更多？这些花真漂亮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizapokerha_000a8f7a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaLedouxRockwell
Right this moment? Drinking, while I wait for the sheriff to work up the nerve to lose another round of cards to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在吗？喝酒，然后等待警长鼓起勇气再输我一把牌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxrockwe_000df6c0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: More generally, I arrived here as the conclusion to a pointless chase. I had reason to believe my target was here. I was... misled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一般地说，我来到这里是为了结束一场毫无意义的追逐。我有理由相信我的目标就在这里。我...被误导了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxrockwe_000df6c0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you do here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这儿是做什么的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaLedouxBountyHunter
A recent state of affairs, I assure you. Though I'm loathe to admit it, I confess I'm not especially good at it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我向你保证是最近才做的。然而我讨厌承认，我坦白我并不是特别擅长干这事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxbounty_000df6c1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've never met a man who could best me with a pistol, but I simply have no interest in the hunt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来没遇到过用手枪胜过我的人，但我对打猎毫无兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxbounty_000df6c1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I expect I'll be hanging it up soon. I believe I'll head West. Perhaps seek work as a bodyguard for someone rich and important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望我很快就能退出了。我觉得我会去西区。也许找个给有钱的重要人物当保镖的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxbounty_000df6c1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If fortune smiles on me, and she does, my future employer will even have a pretty wife. Or daughter. Or both.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果幸运眷顾我的话，我未来的雇主甚至可能还有个漂亮的老婆。或者女儿。或者两者都有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxbounty_000df6c1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a bounty hunter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是个赏金猎人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaLedouxBackground
Well, it's funny. Before I decided to try my hand at law-bringing, I was something of a criminal sort, myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，相当有趣。在我决定尝试执法之前，我自己还是个罪犯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxbackgr_000dfcc1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing too unscrupulous, mind you. Caravan robberies, bank robberies, maybe the occasional spot of hostage-taking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这不是在肆无忌惮地炫耀哈。我曾经抢劫商队，抢劫银行，也许偶尔还会劫持人质。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxbackgr_000dfcc1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Joining up with a gang seems like a fine idea when you're young and perpetually drunk. It was a brotherhood, and other such bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你年纪轻轻又常常喝得醉醺醺的时候，加入帮派似乎是个好主意。这是兄弟之情还是什么的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxbackgr_000dfcc1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I consider it my highest honor that I turned my back on that life before the gang degenerated into murderous slavers, and other such assorted scum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在帮派堕落成凶残的奴隶贩子以及混杂的人渣之前抛弃了那种生活，对我来说这是我最值得荣耀的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxbackgr_000dfcc1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的故事是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaLedouxGang
Our leader lost his fucking mind, that's what.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的首领疯了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxgang_000dfcc2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He developed a psychotic hard-on for the NCR, and began to exclusively target their holdings with lethal force, every fucking time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他发展成对NCR有病态的欲望，开始用致命的武力专门攻击他们的财产，每次他妈的都是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxgang_000dfcc2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I first killed a man when I was 16 years old. He challenged me to a duel after catching me, eh, in flagrante delicto with his sister... and wife.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我16岁的时候第一次杀人。他抓住我之后要跟我决斗，呃，就在他的妹妹...和妻子面前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxgang_000dfcc2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've killed many men since then, but I've never once been party to cold-blooded murder. So, I gave that life up, and have been all the better for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从那之后我杀过很多人，但我从来都没有成为冷血的凶手。所以我放弃了这样的生活，然后一切都好起来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxgang_000dfcc2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaLedouxGangFate
It was ridiculous. They declared themselves freedom fighters. Freedom fighters. Most of their money at this point came from the slave trade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太荒唐了。他们宣称自己是自由斗士。还他妈自由斗士。他们的大部分钱都来自于买卖奴隶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxgangfa_000dfcc3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The boss, man named Sheridan, took it as a point of pride that the bounty on his head kept climbing higher and higher.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个首领，叫谢尔登的家伙，以他头上悬赏的赏金越来越高为荣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxgangfa_000dfcc3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Somehow, he took that to be proof that he was some kind of legitimate counterpart to the NCR, and installed himself as the owner of some small town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知为什么，他认为这证明了他是NCR的合法对立方，而且任命自己为一个小镇的主人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxgangfa_000dfcc3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: His glorious reign lasted two-and-a-half months, and then some posse of equally psychotic bounty hunters shot the place up. No survivors.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他光荣的统治持续了两个半月，然后一群同样有着精神病的赏金猎人袭击了这个地方。没有任何幸存者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxgangfa_000dfcc3_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sheridan, who conveniently wasn't around when the hunters came, fled the Mojave, tail between his legs. Fucking disgraceful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢尔登，在赏金猎人来的时候他正好不在，就夹着尾巴逃离了莫哈维。真他妈可耻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxgangfa_000dfcc3_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaELMetLedoux to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaELMetLedoux + 1
What happened to the gang after that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那之后帮派怎么样了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaLedouxSheridan
He was charismatic, relatively intelligent... A strong personality. He seemed like a great man. It was unfortunately easy to really believe in him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他有号召力，相当聪明...有很强的个性。他看上去像个人物。不幸的是你真的很容就相信他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxsherid_000e02bc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I confess, I believe the capacity for cruelty and barbarism was always there. Men don't suddenly wake up one day craving bloody murder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我承认，我相信残忍和野蛮的总是潜伏在人的内心的。人不会某天醒来就突然开始渴望血腥的谋杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxsherid_000e02bc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But when we first met, he seemed committed to the "noble outlaw" ideal. He balked at senseless murder. We looked down on slavers and rapists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但当我们第一次相遇时，他似乎致力于“高尚的逃犯”这个想法。他不做无谓的谋杀。我们瞧不起奴隶贩子和强奸犯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxsherid_000e02bc_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the NCR rolled in... I don't fucking know. Maybe he saw them as a challenge to his way of life. Look, what does it matter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当NCR出现时...我他妈也不知道怎么回事。也许他把他们视作自己人生道路上的一个挑战。可这又有什么关系呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxsherid_000e02bc_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've left that part of my life behind, happily replacing it with money, cards, and beautiful women. My advice: Leave the past where it lays.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经把我生活中的那部分抛在脑后了，用金钱，扑克和女人来代替它。我的建议是：过去的就让它留在过去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxsherid_000e02bc_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Sheridan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 能告诉我谢尔登的事情吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaLedouxRockwellOpinion
While it's hardly the first lawless shithole I've found myself in, it still fails to impress, all the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是第一次我发现自己处于法外之地了，它仍然一样没有给我留下深刻的印象。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxrockwe_000dfcc0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Far too many bearded reprobates, not nearly enough classy women. I'll consider it a deep, personal failing if I ever find myself returning here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有太多胡子拉碴的堕落者，还有不够优雅的女人。如果我再回到这儿来，我认为这是个人的深刻失败。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxrockwe_000dfcc0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The one silver lining to these sorts of places is that no one particularly cares if I shoot down anyone who accuses me of cheating at cards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种地方的唯一的一线希望就是如果我打死指责我玩牌作弊的人，而根本没有人会特别在乎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxrockwe_000dfcc0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think of New Rockwell?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得新洛克威尔怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaLouieDead
Goodbye, strange green-haired man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见，奇怪的绿毛怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizalouiede_000ad7ee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 1
aaaElizaSellowsDead
Huh. An illiterate moron in a basement. That's... that's actually exactly what I would expect out of a non-military Caesar-worshipper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哼，一个文盲蠢材。这...这的确就是我心目中非军事的凯撒崇拜者的样子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizasellows_000ad7f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 1
aaaElizaKriegDead
Christ, how does someone even get that fucked up? Glad to help put him into the dirt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，怎么会有人被搞成这样？很高兴能把他埋葬了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizakriegde_000ad7f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 1
aaaElizaJamesDead
Now he's really one of the Devil's Men, huh? 'Cause he's dead. I'll give you a minute to let the brilliance of that joke sink in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在他终于成为邪魔者了，哈？因为他死了。我给你一分钟时间让你明白这个笑话的精彩之处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizajamesde_000ad7f4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 1
aaaElizaMitchDead
Really? You don't have anything better to do with your time than murdering hobos?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？除了谋杀流浪汉，你就没有别的事情做了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizamitchde_000ad7f6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval - 3
aaaElizaParkerDead
Sick motherfucker. He probably wouldn't've been caught if he didn't accidentally kill someone rich and connected. So that's reassuring.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恶心的杂种。如果他没有杀死某个有钱又有背景的人的话，他可能还不会被抓住。真令人宽慰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaparkerd_000ad7f8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 2
aaaRoyInformantQuestStart
You know what, I do have something. Mr. Marino informed me about how you took care of those witness people for him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道吗，我确实有件事。马力诺先生告知我你是怎么帮他照顾那些证人的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b02fb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is sort of like that, but discreet. Uh, would you have reservations about shooting an unarmed man who poses no threat to you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 差不多也是类似这样的事，但是要谨慎一些。呃，你是否对杀死一个对你没有威胁手无寸铁的人持有保留意见？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b02fb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, this man is scum of the highest order, and he deserves all the fiery vengeance I can summon, but I know some people would refuse, all the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个人是个最高级别的人渣，他应该遭到我所有复仇的怒火，但我知道总是有人会拒绝的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b02fb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As always, I'll pay you generously. Would you be willing to do this for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟往常一样，我会慷慨地付给你钱的。你愿意为我做这件事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b02fb_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything you need me to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有什么要我做的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyInformantRefuse
OK, that's just fine. Everyone has a code, I understand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，没关系。每个人都有自己的道德准则，我明白。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b02fd_1.ogg
