ESP.ORIGINAL: Just put it out of your mind. I'll have someone else deal with it. In the meantime, you just let me know if you need more work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘掉它吧。我会让别人来处理。在此期间，如果你还想做事的话就告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b02fd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaRoyInformantQuest 55
I'm not going to do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会做的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyInformantAccept
Oh, that's great. You are just about my favorite employee, you know that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，太好了。你真是我最喜欢的雇员，知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b02ff_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, so this human trash-fire you're gonna be taking care of is named Ron Perkins. He actually used to have your job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，你需要对付的这个人叫做罗恩·伯金斯。他以前是做你的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b02ff_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is to say, he was a courier. His job was very, very simple. Pick up the package, don't open it, deliver it to the correct person, and get paid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也就是说，他曾经是个邮差。他的工作非常，非常简单。拿走包裹，保证密封，把它交给正确的人，然后拿到报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b02ff_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, because he's sentient garbage, he wasn't smart enough to do that. He breached our contract, and he decided to look at his delivery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，尽管他是个有感知能力的垃圾，然而他却不太明智地做了这件事。他违反了我们的合同，决定偷看他运送的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b02ff_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And then he went and ran it to the NCR, which, as even a fetal-alcohol baby could tell you, are not affiliated with the Jackals in any way!
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后他把它交给了NCR，就算是在娘胎里面喝醉了的婴儿都看得出来，他们跟豺狼帮没有任何关系！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b02ff_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Questions were asked, bribes were paid off, and it all culminated in wasting my time and money, while Perkins got a nice payout for his disloyalty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被询问了很多问题，花了很多钱去打点，这一切都以浪费我的时间和金钱而告终，而伯金斯却为他的不忠诚得到了不错的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b02ff_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't bore you with the details, but we know where he's hiding, now. I want you to go down there, alright? And I want you to shoot him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想拿琐碎的事情来烦你，但是我们现在知道他躲在哪里了。我想要你到那里去，好吗？而且我想要你干掉他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b02ff_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And then, I'm real proud of this part, then I want you to stick this package somewhere really obvious in his house.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后，我对接下来这部分感到非常自豪，我想要你把这个包裹贴在他房子最显眼的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b02ff_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the NCR investigates the death of their pet rat, they'll see that, and figure Perkins was dealing behind their back, and a deal went wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当NCR调查他们的哈巴狗的死因时，他们会看见它，然后会认为伯金斯背着他们搞交易，结果交易出了问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b02ff_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, so you go take care of that, and I'll get you paid. I'll see you when you get back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，你去把这事办好，我会好好赏你。等你回来时再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b02ff_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaaPlantedEvidence 1 setstage aaaRoyInformantQuest 10
I have no moral qualms about shooting unarmed, defenseless people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对杀掉手无寸铁的人没有道德上的顾虑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyInformantDead
That right there is the best news I've heard all day. I've got your pay, all counted and bagged for you, so here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我一整天听到的最好的消息了。我拿给你酬劳，全部都已经清点和包好了，给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b0301_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: ...You've got a strange look on your face, friend. Is something troubling you?
ESP.TRADUIT: ...你脸上的表情很怪，朋友。有什么困扰吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b0301_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 750
I killed Perkins and planted that evidence for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀掉了伯金斯，然后把伪造证据放好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyInformantKid
Told you that who had a kid? Perkins? I wasn't aware he had any family... Wait, you're saying he had a child at his home? What did you do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉你谁有孩子？伯金斯吗？我不知道他还有家庭...等等，你是说他房子里还有个小孩？那你做了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b0303_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You never told me he had a kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从来没告诉过我他还有个孩子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyInformantKidFate
You were born for this business, my friend. You're taking care of loose ends without even being asked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是生来就是做这事的料，我的朋友。甚至还没有交代，你就把未了结的部分给处理掉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b0305_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to give you a big bonus on this one. Excellent work, my friend. Really outstanding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了这件事我得给你一个大大的奖励。干得漂亮，我的朋友。相当的优秀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b0305_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 1000 setstage aaaRoyInformantQuest 60
I killed him, of course. No witnesses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然杀了他。不留任何证人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: OK, well... I wasn't aware there was any children, or else I would have given you different instructions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，呃...我不知道那里会有小孩，否则的话我会给你不同的指令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b0306_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I suppose we can't just leave the boy alone out there... I suppose we can put him to work, nice and safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们不能就这么把那个男孩留在那里...我想我们可以让他来工作，既安全又好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b0306_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, he probably won't even remember his daddy after a few months. This will be for the best, no doubt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，也许几个月后他根本不会记得他的父亲了。毫无疑问这样处理最好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyinformant_000b0306_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't shoot the little kid, if that's what you're implying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你是在暗示我灭口的话，我没有向那个小孩开枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyToWork
I mean that I know a fellow who will be happy to take the boy and get him out of the desert, and he will pay me for the opportunity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认识一个人会很高兴接纳这个男孩并且带他离开沙漠，而且他会付钱给我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroytowork_000b0314_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personally, I find children to be disgusting and obnoxious, and I strive to never interact with them, so I can only guess why he would want one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我个人来说，我觉得小孩子既恶心又讨厌，我尽力不与他们打交道，所以我只能猜他为什么想要一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroytowork_000b0314_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently he suffered a testicular injury in his youth and he can't produce any of the filthy gremlins himself. Again, I fail to see the appeal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然他年轻时伤到了命根子，所以他没法制造出小蝌蚪。我看不到任何兴趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroytowork_000b0314_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regardless, would you like to help? I can, as always, pay you an excessive amount of money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管这些了，你愿意帮忙吗？照惯例，我会付你一大笔钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroytowork_000b0314_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Put him to work? I'm going to need some details, here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让他工作？我想听听细节。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyRefuseKid
Oh, alright. Fair enough. The original contract didn't mention any children, and I would be loathe to exploit my employees.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，好吧。理解。最初的合同并没有提到任何小孩的事，我不喜欢剥削我的员工。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyrefusekid_000b0316_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I already paid you for executing the boy's defenseless father, after all. That was the deal, and it does seem to be all wrapped up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毕竟我已经为你杀掉小孩的父亲付过钱了。交易完成，看来一切都结束了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyrefusekid_000b0316_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll have somebody go down and pick him up, and hopefully his new caretaker will encourage him not to seek bloody vengeance against you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会派人去接走他，希望他的新看护人会让他别找你报仇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyrefusekid_000b0316_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for your service, you come back real soon now, alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢你提供的服务，你很快就会回来的，对吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyrefusekid_000b0316_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaRoyInformantQuest 60
I want nothing more to do with this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想再和这事扯上关系了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyAcceptKid
Oh, that's fantastic. Really, excellent. Alright, I'm just going to need you to head back to the house, real quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，太好了。真的，非常好。我只需要你尽快赶回到那个房子，要快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyacceptkid_000b0318_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell the kid to just stay put, alright? No running off to join the Fiends, or something stupid like that, now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉那孩子待在那里别动好吗？别跑去加入恶魔帮，或者干什么其他的蠢事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyacceptkid_000b0318_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You let him know that a nice man, a friend of mine, Mr. Mueller, is going to be coming by soon to pick him up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你告诉他有一个好人，我的朋友，穆勒先生，将会很快过去收留他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyacceptkid_000b0318_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And then you come on back here, and I'll give you a pile of caps. Alright, off you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后你就回我这里来，我会给你一大堆瓶盖。好了，去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyacceptkid_000b0318_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaRoyInformantQuest 40
What do you need me to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要我做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyAboutKid
Excellent, excellent. You're a consummate professional, my friend. I'm just going to give you this bag of caps. Here you go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 漂亮，真漂亮。你是一个完美的专业人士，我的朋友。我要给你这袋瓶盖。拿去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyaboutkid_000b031a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, this is above and beyond what I asked of you, and I appreciate that kind of work ethic. That's why I'm gonna keep on paying you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这超出了我对你的要求，我非常欣赏这样的敬业精神。所以我要继续付钱给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyaboutkid_000b031a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, you come on back soon now, alright? In the meanwhile, you take care, and try not to get killed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你会很快再回来，对吗？在此期间，请多保重，别死掉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyaboutkid_000b031a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaRoyInformantQuest 60 player.additem caps001 750
It's done. The kid is ready to get picked up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞定了。那个小孩已经准备好被收留了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaReggieInstructions

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reggie Perkins [080ADDF6] (mod) Quest : ([080AF6EC]aaaRoyInformantQuest) You're of Their Kind EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaRoyInformantQuest 50
I found a nice man who will look after you. Just wait here for him. Sorry about your dad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到一个好人愿意照顾你。只要在这里等他就行。我对你父亲的事情感到抱歉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaReggieOrders

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Reggie Perkins [080ADDF6] (mod) Quest : ([080AF6EC]aaaRoyInformantQuest) You're of Their Kind EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaRoyInformantQuest 50
Yeah, boo-hoo, I killed your daddy. Grow up. Anyway, someone's going to come pick you up soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，呜呜，我杀了你的老爸。成熟点吧。很快有人会过来收留你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaPerkinsDead
Maybe if you're gonna turn traitor on your murderous, criminal employers, you should carry a gun. Just saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想背叛你那凶残又罪恶的雇主的话，你应该带把枪去。只是建议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaperkins_000b0324_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentFinishMercs
Alright, good. Maybe next time someone sees something they shouldn't, they can fucking keep it to themselves, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。也许下次再有人看了不该看的东西，他们就该乖乖闭上嘴，哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentfinis_000b0f16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, this should cover your ammunition expenses, and then some.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，这些钱就当补偿你的弹药费，甚至还有多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentfinis_000b0f16_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaMercenaryQuest 30
Witnesses dealt with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 证人已经处理好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSawyerJob
The job is simple. Do for me exactly what you were going to do for Greene, but stop in to tell me what you find.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个工作很简单。做你帮格林尼做的一样的事，但请停下来告诉我你发现了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerjob_000b0f18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see, this bunker does exist, without a doubt. And it really was created for the purpose of developing biological and chemical weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，这个地堡毫无疑问的确存在。它被建造出来的真正目的是为了研究生化武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerjob_000b0f18_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have my doubts that there's anything to find, though. What Greene doesn't know is that some backwards tribe of degenerates live in that bunker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而我怀疑那里能找到什么东西。格林尼所不知道的是有些低级衰落的部落人还住在那个地堡里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerjob_000b0f18_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No doubt he would have them collared and sold as slaves. I would rather they all die, seeing as how they revere Caesar and his legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无疑问他会把他们都圈起来然后卖作奴隶。而我宁愿他们全都死掉，既然他们如此崇拜凯撒和他的军团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerjob_000b0f18_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal with them, and then find anything worth finding in that bunker, and tell me what there is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 处理掉他们，找到地堡里面有价值的东西，然后告诉我那里到底有什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerjob_000b0f18_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么工作？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSawyerRefuseJob
Now, see, that's not a very good attitude to have. Don't you know that negativity is proven to reduce the average human lifespan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看看，这可不是个好态度。你难道不知道消极被证明了会缩短人类的平均寿命吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerrefuse_000b0f1a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For example: Imagine, if you will, what would happen if you continue to be negative with me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 举个例子：想象一下，如果你继续对我如此消极会发生什么...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerrefuse_000b0f1a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Imagine how much longer you would live if every single soldier of the NCR had orders to gun you down on sight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想象一下如果每个NCR士兵都被命令对你格杀勿论，你还能活多久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerrefuse_000b0f1a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might ride on your reputation as the world's most dangerous postal worker, but how long before one of our many, many troops gets a lucky shot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可能会依靠你作为世界上最危险的邮政工作者的名声，但是谁又知道能过多长时间，我们众多的部队里面不会正好有人能给你幸运的一枪呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerrefuse_000b0f1a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, with that in mind, what's your answer? Given the Sword of Damocles you've called down, your choice should be an easy one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，考虑到这一点，你的答复是什么？鉴于你头上悬着的达摩克利斯利剑，你应该很容易作出选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerrefuse_000b0f1a_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm not interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，没兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSawyerBackground
My story is whatever line of garbage that I decide sounds good for the moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的故事是不管我决定用哪一种垃圾，现在听起来都不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerbackgr_000b0f1c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really, what else would you expect, given what I do and where I work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的，不然你还期待有什么，鉴于我工作的地方和我做的事情？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerbackgr_000b0f1c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的故事是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSawyerOffice
An uninteresting, inoffensive name that keeps people focusing on other things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个无聊又不讨厌的名字能让人们聚焦到别的事情上去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyeroffice_000b0f1e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, what is the Office of Mojave Affairs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那，莫哈维事务办公室是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSawyerTribals
Is there some reason I should?
ESP.TRADUIT: 难道我还需要什么理由吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyertribal_000b1518_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look at the progression of our species after the war. Some of them were ensconced in their vaults, a little chunk of preserved Americana.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看战后我们这个物种的发展进程。一些人安安稳稳地待在避难所里，就像一小块被保存起来的文物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyertribal_000b1518_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back West, we've created a near-perfect replica of the pre-war government, just on a smaller scale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在西边，我们创造出了近乎完美的战前政府的复制品，只是规模较小。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyertribal_000b1518_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And then there are tribals. They speak garbled nonsense that means nothing outside of their own little Luddite, inbred communes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后这里存在着部落。他们在自己那反科学、寄生的社会里面讲的语言，在其他地方是混乱不清的，什么意义都没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyertribal_000b1518_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of the things they're developing in the OSI even surpass the cutting-edge tech of the Old World. Not everything, granted, but bits and pieces.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些他们在OSI里发展出的东西甚至超过了旧世界的先进技术。不是完全的，但勉强认为都是很零碎的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyertribal_000b1518_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meanwhile, unwashed men in loincloths prance around trash fires, throwing rocks and spears at outsiders and practicing ritual pederasty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同时，那些穿着遮羞布的污秽的人围着篝火跳来跳去，向外来者扔石头和长矛，举行鸡奸仪式。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyertribal_000b1518_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, overshadowing all of that, is that they tend to support our enemies. Just like the group squatting in that bunker by the river.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但在这一切之上的原因，是他们倾向于支持我们的敌人。那些在河边占据了地堡的这帮人就是这样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyertribal_000b1518_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that's reason enough to put them in the grave, where they belong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个理由足以将他们送进坟墓，那是他们应该待的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyertribal_000b1518_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't seem to like tribals very much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看上去不太喜欢部落人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSawyerBetrayal
I'm sorry, were you under the impression that I care about your moral conundrums?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，你认为我会关心你的道德难题吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerbetray_000b1b12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it helps you sleep better at night, you can console yourself with the knowledge that you never really had a choice in the first place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有助于你晚上睡得安稳的话，你可以这样安慰你自己：你从一开始就没有选择的余地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerbetray_000b1b12_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, one way or another, there is a squad of Rangers poised to wipe Greene and his dogs off the map, and that's what's going to happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，无论如何，有一队游骑兵已经准备好将格林尼和他的走狗从地图上抹去，这就是将要发生的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerbetray_000b1b12_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want to backstab anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想陷害任何人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSawyerGreene
Samuel Greene? A proud remnant of our now-inconsequent old enemy, the Brotherhood of Steel? The unapologetic slaver who operates on NCR soil?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说萨缪尔·格林尼吗？那个前钢铁兄弟会的旧部？那个在NCR土地上经营的毫无悔意的奴隶贩子？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyergreene_000b2713_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, how indeed did I know about him? Here he was being so subtle, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我是怎么知道他的？他在这里也很狡猾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyergreene_000b2713_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only reason we haven't excised him and his sorry little gang is so we could milk him for any Brotherhood intel he may have been sitting on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还没有铲除他和那可怜的小帮派的唯一原因是我们希望他能吐出点钢铁兄弟会的情报来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyergreene_000b2713_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sadly for him, his time is rapidly running out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为他难过，因为他的时间快用完了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyergreene_000b2713_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you know about Greene?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么知道格林尼的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSawyerAcceptJob
That's what I like to hear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这才像话嘛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyeraccept_000b2715_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, before you go, there are two things I should mention. First, I'll personally pay you for the elimination of the tribals squatting in the bunker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你走之前，有两件事情我要提醒你。第一，我个人会付给你消灭地堡里的部落人的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyeraccept_000b2715_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm old fashioned, so for proof of the kill, go ahead and collect their scalps for me. Can you believe the NCR frowns on this sort of tactic?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我比较传统，所以为了证明击杀完成，把他们的头皮带回来给我。你能相信NCR不赞成这种策略吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyeraccept_000b2715_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Secondly, in the office directly opposite from my own, one of our people is prepared to offer you some assassination contracts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第二，在我对面的办公室，我们的一个人员会给你提供一些暗杀的合同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyeraccept_000b2715_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That won't involve me in any capacity, so she'll be handling the logistics of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会以任何身份参与，所以她会负责后勤工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyeraccept_000b2715_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that's all I have for you. If you have questions, now would be the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我要给你的全部了。如果你有问题，现在就问吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyeraccept_000b2715_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaBoltonBountyCore 10 setstage aaaGreeneQuest 20
Alright, I'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我会做的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSawyerScalp
And here's your money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你的钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerscalp_000b2717_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaaScalp 1 player.additem NCRMoney100 1
I have a scalp to turn in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有头皮要上交。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSawyerRefuseForReal
Well... Bye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧...再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerrefuse_000b271d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaGreeneQuest.aaaSawyerReputation to aaaGreeneQuest.aaaSawyerReputation + 1 setstage aaaGreeneQuest 25
aaaSawyerEnemyTriggerREF.enable
I'm serious. I'm not working for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说真的。我不替你工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSawyerTribalDetails
Don't expect any meaningful resistance. The Legion's already taken most of them elsewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不会有任何重大的抵抗。军团已经把大部分的人都带走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyertribal_000b2734_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand that the tribe's chieftain is hiding out in the bunker, though. I suppose this will save him from being lashed to a cross later on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我听说部落的酋长就藏在地堡里。我想他正好省得以后被绑到十字架上了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyertribal_000b2734_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything you can tell me about these tribals?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于这些部落人你能告诉我什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSawyerAboutGreene
He's a parasite. He was too coward to die alongside his brothers-in-arms at HELIOS, so he was taken prisoner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个寄生虫，他胆小如鼠，不敢跟他的兄弟们在太阳神一号一起战死，于是他被俘虏了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyeraboutg_000b2d33_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was released in exchange for selling out every covert Brotherhood operative he could think of. Now that he's free, he's taken to the slave trade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于他提供了他能想起的任何钢铁兄弟会的秘密行动情报，他被释放了。现在他自由了，开始经营起了奴隶买卖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyeraboutg_000b2d33_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard him speak over out wiretaps. It really is a shame that he isn't closer. I'd enjoy burying a blade in his guts and twisting it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听见他在窃听器里大声地说话。很可惜他离得不够近。我很想在他肚子上插把刀然后使劲转它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyeraboutg_000b2d33_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Greene?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于格林尼你能告诉我什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSawyerProgress
Not surprising. We'll send some people in and see if anything can be salvaged, but that's a formality.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一点也不奇怪。我们会派一些人进去看看有什么能回收的，但那只是例行公事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerprogre_000b2d36_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I know Greene ordered you to return to him was soon as you investigated the bunker, but you'll be making a little detour, first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我知道格林尼要你在调查地堡之后尽快回到他那里去，但是你得先绕点路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerprogre_000b2d36_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've had a few specialists head to New Rockwell ahead of time. They should be waiting around the sheriff's office for the go-ahead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经提前安排了一些专家到新洛克威尔去。他们应该在警长的办公室前面等待许可指令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerprogre_000b2d36_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, go let the sheriff know when you're ready to move out, and then you can all kill Greene and his friends together. Won't that be fun?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，当你准备好时告诉警长，然后你就可以杀掉格林尼和他的朋友们。是不是很有趣？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerprogre_000b2d36_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The research bunker is mostly collapsed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个研究地堡大部分都倒塌了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSawyerKillGreene
Good. I'll leave you to your work, then. Come back when you're finished.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，那我不打扰你工作了。搞定之后再回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerkillgr_000b2d38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaGreeneQuest 40 player.additem NCRMoney100 75
I'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSawyerSpareGreene
Fine, let the specialists take point and do all the killing. You can hide in the background like a coward, fervently pretending you hate violence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，让专家们接管并完成击杀吧。你可以像个懦夫一样躲在后面，强烈地假装你讨厌暴力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerspareg_000b2d3a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you are going to go into New Rockwell, and you are going to give that sheriff the go-ahead to start the operation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是你要去新洛克威尔，并且你要给警长开始行动的指令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerspareg_000b2d3a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if you refuse me again, I'll have you branded as a traitor to the Republic, with strict shoot-on-sight orders. How does that sound?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你再次拒绝我的话，我就会给你打上共和国叛徒的印记，并且命令格杀勿论。听起来怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyerspareg_000b2d3a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't kill Greene.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会杀格林尼的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSheriffKillGreene
What? I... Well, I suppose that's... that's fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？我...呃，我想那...那很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert

ESP.ORIGINAL: It isn't like I'll miss having those slaver bastards hanging around here. Alright, my people won't get in your way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会怀念那些混蛋奴隶贩子在这里游荡的日子的。好吧，我的人不会阻拦你们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffkillg_000b2d3d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forrester! Roarke! We got us some open warrants!
ESP.TRADUIT: 弗雷斯特！罗克！我们收到了公开的搜查令！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffkillg_000b2d3d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaGreeneQuest 50
Calm down, sheriff. These men are here for Greene, nothing more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 冷静，警长。这些人是来对付格林尼的，没别的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentWildWasteland
You could try Goodsprings. I hear that their doctor is some kind of psychotic weapon-hoarder. Keeps a whole arsenal of weird shit in his house.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以去清泉镇试试。我听说他们的医生是个病态的武器囤积者。在他的房子里有一整个军火库。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaavincentvoice\aaavincent_aaavincentwildw_000b3338_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I'm going to be hunting these guys, I'm going to need some weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我要猎杀这些家伙的话，我就得需要一些武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSheriffRockwell
Well, New Rockwell was built around the sulfur mines in the area. The mines ran dry a while back, but as you can see, we're doing better than ever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 新洛克威尔建在那个地区的硫磺矿周围。那些矿在不久之前已经采光了，但就像你看到的那样，我们比以前更好了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffrockw_000b393a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personally, I attribute the success to our local businesses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以我个人来说，我把成功归功于我们当地的商业。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffrockw_000b393a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the town?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我关于这个城镇的情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSheriffOutlaws
Nonsense. If they were outlaws, why would they be so amenable to the rules of this town?
ESP.TRADUIT: 胡说。如果他们是逃犯的话，为什么还要遵守镇上的规矩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffoutla_000b393c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, perhaps the people of the Mojave might have their own little vendettas and grudges against some of our citizenry, true.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许莫哈维的那些人们会有些自己的小恩怨，对我们这里的一些公民怀恨在心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffoutla_000b393c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But let's be honest, here. They'll always harbor acute animosity to anyone associated with the Republic, won't they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但老实说吧。他们对任何与NCR相关的人都怀有强烈的敌意，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffoutla_000b393c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It kind of looks like your town is infested with outlaws and raiders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来你的镇里有大批逃犯和掠夺者出没。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSheriffJob
Well, I was brought in from the West. Rather short notice, as it were. There was an unfortunate... incident... regarding the previous sheriff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是从西方来的。可以说走得相当的急。这里发生了一件不幸的...事故...跟前警长有关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffjob_000b393e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A replacement was needed, ASAP, and I happened to have the qualifications and the free schedule.
ESP.TRADUIT: 急需有人来接替警长，而我正好有这个资格和日程。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffjob_000b393e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you get this job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么搞到这份工作的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaWhatsUp
So, it occurs to me that you're alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没事对我来说很突然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizawhatsup_000b3f39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么想法吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, you're the first worthwhile person I've met in a long time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道吗，你是我很久以来遇到的第一个有价值的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizawhatsup_000b3f3a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess I've wanted to throw in with something that didn't suck for a while now. Just never worked out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我有点想好好投入做一件不太糟的事情。只是一直没有成功。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizawhatsup_000b3f3a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, the Khans were a bust. Before that, I had a really brief run with some gang up north. That was a waste of time, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是说，加入大汗帮是我的突发奇想。在那之前，我在北方一个帮派里待过很短的时间。那也是浪费时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizawhatsup_000b3f3a_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在想什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I got an idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有个主意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizawhatsup_000b3f3b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What would you say to going on a hunt?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得去打猎怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizawhatsup_000b3f3b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaProtectrons
Christ, can you imagine how loud it'd be if all these things were working? Goddamn loud-ass clanking walking trash-cans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，你能想象如果这些东西全部动起来会有多大声响吗？该死的叮当响的垃圾罐子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizaprotect_000b4535_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaWrangeler
If you're here for hookers, don't forget to get real drunk, first. Hey, where's that old prick McCaffery? He reminds me of my dad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你来这里找妓女的话，别忘了先把自己喝醉。嘿，那个老混蛋麦卡菲在哪里？他让我想起了我老爸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizawrangel_000b453c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaGomBark
Take your top off!
ESP.TRADUIT: 跳掉上衣！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizagombark_000b4541_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaGomBark2
Not sure it's a great idea to have men, women, and ghouls all dance in the same place. I mean, no matter what, someone is going to hate it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不确定这是不是一个好主意，让男人、女人和尸鬼在一起跳舞。我是说，不管怎么样，有人会讨厌这样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizagombark_000b4546_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaSilverRush
Pfft. Energy guns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噗。能量武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizasilverr_000b454b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaOfficeBark
Oh, what the hell... Just move to the Strip if you want to play at being fancy and shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，什么鬼...如果你想要炫富的话就去赌城啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizaofficeb_000b4550_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaMadridBark
Please, please tell me you aren't here for that fuckin' granny-hooker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，告诉我你到这里来不是为了找那个老妓女的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizamadridb_000b4562_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaL38Bark
This suite, uh... Not exactly impressive, is it? I think House might've screwed you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个套房，呃...并没给人太深的印象，对吗？我想豪斯也许把你耍了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizal38bark_000b4567_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaMuseumBark
Either that kid is on Quaaludes, or he's got a giant dick lodged in his throat...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个小子不是吃了安眠酮，就是喉咙里长了一个大鸡巴...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizamuseumb_000b456c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaBeer
Oh, shit, free beer!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，操，免费的啤酒！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizabeer_000b4571_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaRaulHouse
Pfft, my house is so much better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噗，我的房子好多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizaraulhou_000b4576_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaBathBark
Hello, naked people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，光屁股们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizabathbar_000b457b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaKitchenClowns
I knew it! I fucking knew it! Goddamn clowns are all a bunch of devil-worshipping cannibals!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就知道！我他妈就知道！该死的小丑们就是一帮崇拜恶魔的食人族！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizakitchen_000b4580_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaFuckYouToo
Oh look, someone wrote a message for us. Hey, fuck you too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢看啊，有人给我们写了条消息。嘿，操你妈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizafuckyou_000b4b80_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaGunRunnersBark
Man, I end up buying shit from these guys a few times a week, I swear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，我每周都会向这些家伙买几次东西，我发誓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizagunrunn_000b4b86_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaTraceyMercGroups
Far, far too many.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太多太多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceymercgr_000b5181_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose it isn't overly difficult to gather a handful of friends, some matching armor sets, and declare yourself an organization.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想召集几个朋友，准备一些相应的护甲，然后宣布成立一个组织并不是很难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceymercgr_000b5181_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In my experience, "mercenary" is the favored moniker of violent degenerates who consider themselves to be entirely separate from raiders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 以我的经验，“雇佣兵”就是暴力堕落者最喜欢的绰号，他们以此完全把自己跟掠夺者区分开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceymercgr_000b5181_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: OK, seriously, how many different mercenary companies are running around out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，老实说，这里有多少不同的雇佣兵公司？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaTraceyOffice
I can tell you that last year, we went by the name of the "Bureau of Property Involvement."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以告诉你，去年我们的名字叫“财产干预局”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyoffice_000b5183_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The title- and location- changes every couple of years. I can infer that the higher-ups are going for an "out of sight, out of mind" approach.
ESP.TRADUIT: 名字-还有地点-每几年就会换一次。我能断定高层们对此的态度是“眼不见，心不烦”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyoffice_000b5183_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And if that's the case, then it's working rather well. Beyond that, I'm afraid I can't tell you much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是这样的话，那这里就运作得非常的好。除此之外，我恐怕不能告诉你再多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyoffice_000b5183_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, literally, I cannot tell you much more. I don't know. Everything here is on a need-to-know basis, meaning no one tells me anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不能再说了。我不知道。这里的每件事都限制在仅需知道的范围，也就是说没人会告诉我任何事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceyoffice_000b5183_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about the Office of Mojave Affairs?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我关于莫哈维事务办公室的情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaTraceySawyer
Not really, no. We don't really interact very much. He has his duties, and I have mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 基本上不能。我们打交道不多。他有他的职责，我有我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceysawyer_000b5185_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand he used to work out in the field, though. I've only ever held safe, office positions, myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道他以前在野外工作。而我自己只做过安全的办公室工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceysawyer_000b5185_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know his name isn't actually Sawyer. Since I don't know what exactly his duties entail, I'll assume the fake identity is justified.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道他的真名并不叫索耶。由于我并不知道他的职责是什么，所以我只能假设他的假身份是有理由的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaatraceyvoicetype\aaaboltonb_aaatraceysawyer_000b5185_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything you can tell me about Sawyer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于索耶你能告诉我些什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaTraceySpeech
[FAILED] I'm not being reticent to save my job. I simply value the truth, and I'd prefer not to be party to gossip and rumor-spreading.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 我不是为了保住我的工作而保持沉默。我只是尊重真相，我宁愿不到处说长道短和传播谣言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry, no one will ever know. You can tell me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，没人会知道的。你可以告诉我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Yes, I'm aware of that. SIGH Fine, just don't take any of this at face value, alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 是的，我知道。哎好吧，只是别把这太当回事，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: Supposedly, Mr. Sawyer specialized in eradicating enemies of the State in ways that ensured the NCR had strong plausible deniability.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说，索耶先生专门消灭国家的敌人，以一种确保NCR能合理推诿的方式进行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anti-government activists tripping and breaking their necks on the stairs. Independent tribes suddenly being struck by disease, that sort of thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比如反政府活动家在自家楼上绊倒并摔断了脖子。独立部落突然被疾病侵袭，都是诸如此类的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know. I don't especially care, honestly. Don't waste time asking him about it, either. We don't discuss personal history, here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道。说实话也不特别关心。也别浪费时间去问他了。我们这里不讨论个人的历史。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tracey Bolton [0807D402] (mod) Quest : ([08082A2E]aaaBoltonBountyCore) 08082A2E (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardxp 10
Now it sounds like you're hiding something, and curiosity compels me to investigate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来你在隐藏什么，好奇心驱使我想要调查清楚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaEmbassyBark
Bunch of dirty fuckers who will stoop to any low if they can make a profit. Amazing the Omertas allow the competition to live right down the street.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一帮肮脏的混蛋，只要有利益他们就会下跪。我很惊奇黑手党就让竞争在这条街上进行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizaembassy_000b57ba_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSawyerCleanRep
I can do that. I'll send out word that your actions, while unpleasant, were performed on behalf of the Office, and you were just following orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能办到。我会放出话去，说你的行为都是代表本办公室做的，而你只是在服从命令。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyercleanr_000b57bd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It certainly wouldn't be the first time such a thing happened. Honestly, it's worth it just for the impotent, outraged letters it prompts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样的事情肯定不是第一次发生了。说实话，只是会激起一些无用、愤怒的信件而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyercleanr_000b57bd_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: removereputation repnvncr 0 5 removereputation repnvncr 0 5 removereputation repnvncr 0 5 removereputation repnvncr 0 5 removereputation repnvncr 0 5 removereputation repnvncr 0 5 removereputation repnvncr 0 5
I need you to clean up my reputation with the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想要你帮我恢复在NCR的声望。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSawyerGreeneDead
That must have felt good. Granted, I've never claimed a kill that I didn't enjoy in some capacity, but still, Greene was a disgusting little worm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那感觉一定很好。同意，我总是很高兴以某种身份来宣告一起击杀的，但格林尼仍然是个恶心的蛆虫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyergreene_000b57c0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd have his head severed and sent into the real Brotherhood's little bunker, but they probably wouldn't recognize him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把他的头割下来，然后送到真正的钢铁兄弟会的小地堡里去，但是他们估计不会认出他来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyergreene_000b57c0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Greene is dead. I saw to it, personally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格林尼死了。我亲眼所见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSawyerNoMore
If you liberate any more scalps from the tribal savages they belong to, I'm still paying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还割了更多的部落野蛮人的头皮下来，我依然会付给你钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyernomore_000b57c2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But as far as actual work goes, no. I have nothing suited for you, at the moment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但就实际工作而言，没有了。我目前没有适合你的工作了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyernomore_000b57c2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you haven't seen to it already, Miss Bolton is likely still contracting assassins. In any event, your work has been commendable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你还没看过的话，博尔顿小姐大概还有些暗杀合同。不管怎样，你的工作都是值得赞扬的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyernomore_000b57c2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you ever need your record with the NCR cleared of any crimes, let me know. You've earned it. Once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你再想要清除在NCR的犯罪记录的话，告诉我就是。那是你应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyernomore_000b57c2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaGreeneQuest 70
So, anything else you need from me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你还需要我做什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSawyerSickFucker
Perhaps, but if wanton slaughter makes a man sick, I think it's worth pointing out you've likely killed more than me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许吧，如果肆意屠杀使人变态的话，我想值得指出的是你杀过的人可比我多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyersickfu_000b57c4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I know. I've heard the justifications before. "I only kill in self defense. I don't enjoy it."
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我知道。我之前听过这个理由。“我只是自卫杀人。我不喜欢杀人。”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyersickfu_000b57c4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't need to hear your answer, but ask yourself this, if killing is really such a somber, unwanted occurrence in your life...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想听你的回答，但你问问自己，杀人在你的一生中是否真的是一个阴郁而又多余的存在...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyersickfu_000b57c4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you honestly say that you've never killed a man and laughed to yourself at the ridiculous position his body collapsed in?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能诚实地说你从来没有在杀死一个人之后，为他倒下时候尸体那可笑的姿势而发笑吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyersickfu_000b57c4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In any event, you've done your job. I have nothing else for you, although Miss Bolton might.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么说，你完成了你的工作。我没有别的事情交给你了，可能博尔顿小姐会有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyersickfu_000b57c4_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Feel free to return in the event that you need your record expunged, or you have more scalps to cash out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果需要抹去你的不良记录的话，欢迎随时回来，或者当你有更多头皮要换钱的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyersickfu_000b57c4_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaGreeneQuest 70
You're kind of a sick fucker, aren't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是个变态的混蛋，不是吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyConfront
It all seems fairly obvious, no? As I've said, my friend, I'm involved in a great many business ventures.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是很明显吗？就像我说过的那样，我的朋友，我参与了很多商业项目。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyconfront_000b63e1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, I don't begrudge you killing Greene. I didn't enjoy that man very much, and he wasn't a very reliable customer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我不会对你杀死格林尼感到不满。我也不是很喜欢那个人，并且他也不是一个很可靠的客户。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyconfront_000b63e1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I trust this won't be an issue between us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信这不会成为我俩之间的问题？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroyconfront_000b63e1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I found this note that implicates you in slave-trafficking. Anything to say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到这个字条显示你在从事奴隶交易。有什么要说的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSullivanSlaver
In terms of moral weight, I think it's worth mentioning that you've killed, blackmailed, and taken advantage of people to aid this business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就道德分量而言，我想值得提醒的是你为了支持这个生意而杀过人，勒索、还有强占了他人的便宜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaasullivanslav_000b63e3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, alright. I understand that the slave-trade is a serious ethical sticking-point for some people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是没问题。我理解奴隶交易对某些人来说是个非常严重的道德难点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaasullivanslav_000b63e3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In regards to why you shouldn't kill me, I can think of... Oh, let's say 50,000 reasons to let me live.
ESP.TRADUIT: 鉴于你不杀我的理由，我想...噢，50,000瓶盖的理由怎么样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaasullivanslav_000b63e3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can give you the location, and means of opening, a lockbox of mine with 50,000 life-insurance caps inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以告诉你地点，以及打开盒子的方法，那里面有50,000瓶盖的人身保障金。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaasullivanslav_000b63e3_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure you're thinking that's a lie, yes? Allow me to level with you, friend. I know who you are, and what you've done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你认为我在说谎，对吗？请允许我说明，朋友。我知道你是谁，还有你做过什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaasullivanslav_000b63e3_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am 100% confident that, in the event that I ripped you off, you would track me down to the ends of the earth to exact vengeance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我百分之百相信，如果我欺骗了你，你会追踪我到天涯海角来复仇的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaasullivanslav_000b63e3_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I prefer to deal nice and square with people, like gentlemen, yes? The money is what I pay to keep living. Do we have a deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我更喜欢和人和睦相处，就像绅士一样，不是吗？这些钱就是我用来保命的钱。我们可以成交吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaasullivanslav_000b63e3_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all you have to say? Give me one good reason not to kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是你要说的？给我个不杀你的理由。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyNoDeal
Oh. Well. That's... That's very unfortunate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，好吧。这...这真是不幸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroynodeal_000b63e5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eh, regardless, I'm sure we can work out some kind... of... Somebody help me! Security!
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，不管了，我想我们能够达成某种...快来人救我啊！保安！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroynodeal_000b63e5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaSullivanFinale 40
startcombat player
I'll tell you what, Roy. Every cap in the world couldn't save you from me. How's that feel?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉你，罗伊。没有任何一个瓶盖能救你的命。感觉怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyDeal
See, I knew you were a reasonable sort.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，我就知道你是个理智的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhoboquest_aaaroydeal_000b63e9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, the caps are in a safe, hidden in an old utility area, outside of Sloan. Word is that there are a few Powder Gangers squatting there...
ESP.TRADUIT: 瓶盖在一个保险箱里面，藏在一个老旧的设施里，就在斯隆外面。据说周围有一些炸药帮的人在游荡...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhoboquest_aaaroydeal_000b63e9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, here's your key. As always, it's been a pleasure. A pleasure!
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在给你钥匙。那么跟往常一样，很乐意为你效劳。十分乐意！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhoboquest_aaaroydeal_000b63e9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem aaaSullySafeKey 1 rewardkarma -250 showmessage aaaSullivanEscapeMessage aaaSullivanREF.disable aaaSullivanSlaveREF.disable setstage aaaSullivanFinale 20 set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaELSullivanFled to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaELSullivanFled + 1
50,000 caps? Alright, I accept your terms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 50,000瓶盖？好吧，我接受你的条件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaSullivanDead
Nothing clever to say, you piece of shit? That one felt good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么好说的了吧，你这个杂种？这感觉真爽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizasulliva_000b63fe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 5
aaaVincentSullivanDead
Excuse me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why the fuck would you do that, you piece of shit?! Give me one reason, one fucking reason, why I shouldn't put a bullet between your eyes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈为什么要这么做，你这个杂种？给我一个理由，一个他妈的理由，为什么我不他妈给你脑门来一枪！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed Sullivan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了苏利文。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentTerrify
Uh... What I meant was... I would appreciate an explanation as to why it is you just murdered my business partner. If you would...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...我的意思是...我希望得到一个解释，为什么你要杀了我的生意伙伴。如果你愿意的话...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll tell you what, Vincent. You can keep that attitude, or all of your teeth. Not both.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我告诉你，文森特。你可以选择保留你的态度，还是你的牙齿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentCombat
You just fucked yourself, you miserable cocksucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你完蛋了，你这个可怜的烂逼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
I think I'll just kill you, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我要把你也干掉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentSlaver
What, with those stupid collars and shit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，因为那些愚蠢的奴隶项圈吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eh, figures. Bet he did worse shit than that, too. Whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，了解。我猜他可能比这更糟。随便吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever shit happened between you two isn't my fuckin' business. I'm not interested in going to war with you over that douchebag.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们两人之间发生的与我他妈的无关。我没兴趣为了那个蠢材跟你开战。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was a slaver. He deserved to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个奴隶贩子。他罪有应得。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaVincentFinished
Yeah, alright. We don't got anymore business with each other, so that's all I have to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，好吧。我们之间没有关系了，这就是我要说的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vincent Marino [080011F2] (mod) Quest : ([0806DE04]aaaVincentWhoreQuest) Better Leave This Dream Alone EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaSullivanFinale 70
I think our business is concluded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们的生意结束了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSheriffIncident
Yes, incident.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，事故。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffincid_000b87e9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The previous sheriff, and his family, were butchered like animals in their home, as they slept.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前警长，还有他的家人，在家里被像动物一样屠杀了，在他们熟睡的时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffincid_000b87e9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nobody knows who did it, or why. The most information we have about the affair is that the killers came from out of town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没人知道是谁干的，也不知道为什么。关于这件事情我们所能得知的消息是杀手是从镇外面来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffincid_000b87e9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently, the old sheriff was quite popular. A man of the people, as it were. Having never met the man, I'll take their word for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然，老警长很受人们的欢迎。可以说是人民的公仆。我从来没见过他，我相信他们所说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffincid_000b87e9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can tell you this, though: If the people responsible make themselves known, I'll be making every effort to be rid of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我可以告诉你：如果能知道是谁对此负责，我会尽一切努力除掉他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffincid_000b87e9_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I concede that New Rockwell isn't the most... morally upstanding town, but I won't have children brutalized on my watch. No sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我承认新洛克威尔不是最...道德正直的城镇，但我不会让孩子们在我的监督下被残忍对待。不能先生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffincid_000b87e9_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Incident"?
ESP.TRADUIT: “事故”？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSheriffPaladins
Yes... Them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊...他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffpalad_000b87eb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They call themselves the Paladins, and they're apparently a rogue, breakaway faction from the Brotherhood of Steel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们自称为骑士，他们显然是伙强盗，是从钢铁兄弟会出来的分裂势力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffpalad_000b87eb_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It don't bother me none. As long as you ain't Legion, everyone is welcome in New Rockwell. Yes sir.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一点也不介意。只要不是军团，新洛克威尔欢迎每一个人。是的先生。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffpalad_000b87eb_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are those guys with energy weapons?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些拿着能量武器的是什么人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaHoboResponse
Uh... did you just give that hobo two grand? I'm all for philanthropy, but you know he's gonna shoot all that cash up his arm, yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃...你是不是刚刚给了那个乞丐2000瓶盖？我完全支持慈善事业，但是你知道他会把所有钱都都挥霍掉吗，啊？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizahobores_000ba007_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaJedDead
I know! It was great!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道！太棒了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizajeddead_000babf9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if you got anything outta that, but I have to say, I had a hell of a time. Never gone after anything like that before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你是否获得到了什么，但我必须要说，我玩得很开心。以前从没干过这种事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizajeddead_000babf9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, since you went along with me on this, I'm going to pay you back by letting you in with my weapon supplier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，既然你陪我一起完成了这件事，我决定报答你，让你进入我的武器储藏库。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizajeddead_000babf9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Right by my house, in that Bittersprings RV park, there's this little hatch that goes down into a little hideout thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在我家旁边，在苦泉游览区里面，有个隐蔽的地方下面有个小舱口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizajeddead_000babf9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Inside of that is this incredibly annoying little weirdo with a stash of really high-end gear for sale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 里面有个令人讨厌的小怪人，有一堆高级的装备在卖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizajeddead_000babf9_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, now, I'm gonna say we're even, yeah? Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，现在，我俩扯平了，对吗？是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizajeddead_000babf9_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 2
