aaaCricketDoorREF.unlock setstage aaaElizaQuest 90
So, Big Jed is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大个子杰德死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyPayOff
You know what? I think that's a fine idea, my friend. A fine idea!
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道吗？我想那个好主意，我的朋友。一个好主意！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroypayoff_000bb1f4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, so what I'm gonna do is just set aside a little pile of the weekly profits, and you can just come in and pick them up whenever, OK?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我要做的就是留出一点每周的利润，你随时都可以来拿走它们，怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroypayoff_000bb1f4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll just have them left in a little box for you. I'll have Patrice make sure that nobody interferes with it, alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会把它们放到一个小盒子里。我会让帕特里斯确保没人能动它，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroypayoff_000bb1f4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As always, it's been a pleasure doing business with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟以往一样，非常高兴跟你做生意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroypayoff_000bb1f4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaSullivanFinale 25 set aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaELSullivanPartners to aaaTh3OverseerCore.aaaELSullivanPartners + 1
That depends. Where's my cut of the earnings?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那要看什么情况了。我的那部分收入呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSheriffSlavers
Yes, yes, you're not the first to point that out. I assure you, slavers are not allowed to operate on NCR soil.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，是的，你不是第一个指出来的人。我向你保证，奴隶贩子是不允许在NCR的地盘做生意的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffslave_000bd619_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't bore you with the details. Suffice it to say that, if they were slavers, we would be obligated to detain them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想烦你。简单地说，如果他们是奴隶贩子，我们就有义务拘留他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffslave_000bd619_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That we're not detaining them should be sufficient proof that whatever they're doing is totally benign.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不能拘留他们的原因是他们所做的完全都是好事，而我们缺乏证据。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffslave_000bd619_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? They seem like slavers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？他们看起来像是奴隶贩子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSheriffSpeech
[FAILED] Knock it off. I'll toss your ass in a cell if you keep antagonizing me.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 打住。如果你继续和我作对，我就把你扔进牢房。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffspeec_000bd61b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're pretty obviously slavers...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们相当明显就是奴隶贩子...

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] They aren't paying me, goddamnit! If I could toss them on their asses, I would!
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 他们没有给我钱，该死的！如果我能抓住他们，我会的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffspeec_000bd61c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything I do to try and get rid of them will ruin the whole town, understand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 任何我试图要除掉他们的做法都会毁了这个镇的，明白吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffspeec_000bd61c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This town was just about dried up when the old sheriff got his throat cut. They shipped me off here just to finish watching it die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当老警长被割喉之后这个镇就快没了。他们把我送到这里只是为了看着它灭亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffspeec_000bd61c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just to spite those jerkoffs for wasting my time and energy on this, I resolved that New Rockwell wasn't going anywhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为对那些混蛋浪费我时间和精力的抱怨，我决定不让新洛克威尔灭亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffspeec_000bd61c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I figured, hell, at the very least, this spot could be a nice little pleasure town. And, yeah, that meant being lenient with my duties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终我发现这个地方可能是个不错的小城镇。是的，那就意味着我得宽容地行使我的职责。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffspeec_000bd61c_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care what crimes people committed in other places, if they can behave themselves here, we don't have a problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎那些罪犯在别的地方犯罪，如果他们在这里不乱来，我们就没问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffspeec_000bd61c_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But then this shithouse slaver gang rolled in, all of 'em brandishing their fancy laser guns and plasma detonators. What am I supposed to do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是接着这些该死的奴隶贩子来到这里，所有的人都有全新的激光枪和等离子引爆装置。我还能做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffspeec_000bd61c_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have two deputies. Two. What the hell are we supposed to do? We can't beat them, not without goddamn heavy artillery!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有两个副手。两个。我们他妈还能怎么办？我们没法战胜他们，没有该死的重型炮火的话！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffspeec_000bd61c_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Should I call home and ask for reinforcements? That would go over well. They'd sweep in here and arrest- or kill- everyone living here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该向家里寻求支援吗？那会很妙。他们会扫平这里，然后逮捕——或者杀掉——这里居住的每一个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffspeec_000bd61c_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My hands are fucking tied here, so take your sanctimonious bullshit somewhere else. I didn't ask for Greene or his people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里我他妈伸不开手脚，所以收起你的伪善吧。我没有替格林尼和他的人做事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffspeec_000bd61c_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, how much are they paying you to look the other way? And doesn't that make you an accomplice?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，他们给你多少钱让你别插手？那你就不是帮凶了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSheriffDelivery
What? Oh! Yes, yes, I'll just take that off of your hands. Much appreciated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？噢！是的，是的，把它交到我手里。非常感谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffdeliv_000be821_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaRockwellQuest 30 Player.removeitem aaaDrugPackage 1
I have a package for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有个包裹给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSheriffAttractions
Well, let's see... There's our saloon over there. Plenty to drink, and they even have air-conditioning rigged up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，我看看...那里是我们的沙龙。酒管够，而且他们还配备了空调。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffattra_000be823_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a whorehouse across the way, there. I can't attest to their quality, mind you. I'm a married man, and I take that commitment seriously.
ESP.TRADUIT: 路对面有个妓院。我没法证实她们的质量。我结过婚了，我很认真地对待这个承诺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffattra_000be823_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Other'n that, we got food, a general store, and a clinic. And... I suppose the gun store is still technically open...
ESP.TRADUIT: 除此之外呢，我们有食物，一个杂货店，一间诊所。还有...我想枪店应该还开着...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffattra_000be823_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and there are mineshafts dotted around the town. You stay away from those, now. Ain't nothing good gonna come from fucking around down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，这里还有矿井散落在镇上。你要离它们远点。那下面可没有什么好东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffattra_000be823_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is there to do in town?
ESP.TRADUIT: 镇上有什么可做的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSheriffNevermind
It is alright, and I'll thank you out-of-towners not to bother me about it no more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，我得感谢你这个外来人不再打扰我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffnever_000bee1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaSheriffWork
Well, our town chef is terrified of soap, so I suppose we could use a new, permanent replacement...
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，我们镇上的厨师很害怕用肥皂，所以我想我们要用一个新的，永久的替代品...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffwork_000bee20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although... I don't think the current one would actually be willing to leave. We'd probably have to kill him...
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管...我不认为它真的愿意离开。我们可能得杀了他。。。。。。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Puzzled Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffwork_000bee20_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what? Scratch the whole idea. No, I'm afraid the New Rockwell Sheriff's office doesn't have any work for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知道吗？忘掉这个主意吧。不，我恐怕新洛克威尔警长办公室没有工作能交给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jim Ferrar [080112F1] (mod) Quest : ([080A5339]aaaRockwellQuest) Out in the Desert EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleold01\aaarockwel_aaasheriffwork_000bee20_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any work for me, sheriff?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有工作给我吗，警长？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGreeneIntro
Elder Greene. This is my chapter, and you will recognize the authority that gives me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格林尼长老。这是我的教团成员，你会认识到我的权威。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Greene [08013E19] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaagreeneq_aaagreeneintro_000bee23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Address me properly, or I will have you dragged downstairs and burned alive. The charred bones of the last one are still there, if you doubt me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对我使用适当的称呼，否则我会把你拖到楼下点火烧死。上一次烧焦的那一具尸体骨头还在那里，如果你质疑的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Greene [08013E19] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaagreeneq_aaagreeneintro_000bee23_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGreeneBrotherhood
They're cowards and traitors. Once I've amassed a large enough fighting force, I'll have them all executed, as they deserve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是懦夫和叛徒。一旦我集结了足够大的战斗力，我会把他们全都解决掉，那是他们应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Greene [08013E19] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaagreeneq_aaagreenebrothe_000bee25_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any relationship with Hidden Valley?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你跟隐谷有什么关系吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGreeneSlaver
I've been cut off from the resources of the Brotherhood proper. Without access to their weapons and resources, I've had to improvise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和钢铁兄弟会的资源断绝了联系。没有他们的武器和资源，我不得不临时拼凑起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Greene [08013E19] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaagreeneq_aaagreeneslaver_000bee27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a very large profit to be made by selling these savages like dogs. As backwards and stunted as they are, it may be an improvement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把这些野人像狗一样卖掉会带来大量的利润。鉴于他们弱智和发育不良，这也许是一种进步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Greene [08013E19] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaagreeneq_aaagreeneslaver_000bee27_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What does slave-trading have to do with the Brotherhood?
ESP.TRADUIT: 钢铁兄弟会和奴隶交易有什么关系？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGreeneMen
Local conscripts. As long as they can hit what they aim at, obey me without question, and further my goals, they're... acceptable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 都是本地招的。只要他们能指哪打哪，执行我的命令，推进我的目标，他们就...可以接受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Greene [08013E19] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaagreeneq_aaagreenemen_000bee29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of the few perks of dealing with savages. Their loyalty is easily bought.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是与野蛮人打交道的少数好处之一。他们的忠诚很轻易就能买到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Greene [08013E19] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaagreeneq_aaagreenemen_000bee29_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about your men? Are they part of the Brotherhood, too?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的手下呢？他们也是钢铁兄弟会的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGreeneRockwell
The NCR is an abomination, and I will have it burned to ash at my feet. To that end, I enjoy operating in their territory while they can do nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR是个令人憎恶的怪物，我会把它在我脚下烧成灰。为此，我很高兴在他们的地盘做交易而他们却无能为力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Greene [08013E19] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaagreeneq_aaagreenerockwe_000bee2b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR cannot touch us here. They would be wiped away, and they know it.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR在这里不能动我们。他们会被清除出去的，他们知道这点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Greene [08013E19] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaagreeneq_aaagreenerockwe_000bee2b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这干嘛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGreeneWork
Yes... I have something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的...我有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Greene [08013E19] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaagreeneq_aaagreenework_000bee2d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know who you are, Courier. I'm not surprised you wish to serve. To survive the things you've survived, you must have some level of intellect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你是谁，邮差。你想做事我一点也不惊奇。为了生存你所经历的一切，你一定有相当程度的智慧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Greene [08013E19] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaagreeneq_aaagreenework_000bee2d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you'd like to prove your worth, begin by retrieving something for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想证明你的价值，就先帮我找点东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Greene [08013E19] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaagreeneq_aaagreenework_000bee2d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have intel on a bunker by the side of the Colorado river. A pre-war research facility. I have reason to believe they were developing a plague.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有关于科罗拉多河边一个地堡的情报。一个战前的研究设施。我有理由相信那里在研究一种传染病。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Greene [08013E19] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaagreeneq_aaagreenework_000bee2d_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could use their work to cleanse this place. Think of it- the NCR, choking and dying, unable to fight it off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以用他们的工作来净化这个地方。设想一下——NCR的人会无法抵抗，纷纷窒息而死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Greene [08013E19] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaagreeneq_aaagreenework_000bee2d_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bring me their documentation, and you shall be rewarded. Fail... and I'll have you nailed to the side of the cliffs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把他们的资料记录带给我，你就可以得到奖赏。如果失败...我会把你钉在悬崖边上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Greene [08013E19] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaagreeneq_aaagreenework_000bee2d_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaaGreeneQuest 10
I'm looking for work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaMineshaftBark
Alright, well, that's just about the most fucked up thing I've ever seen before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，呃，这是我见过的最操蛋的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizaminesha_000bfa2a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaWalterGreeting
aaaSawyerGoodbye
Alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mr. Sawyer [080043CA] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaasawyervoicetype\aaagreeneq_aaasawyergoodby_000c0c2c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我该走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaGreeneDead
Shoot him again, I still hate the prick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再给他一枪，我还是很憎恨这个逼人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizagreened_000c2a0b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 2
aaaElizaButArizona
I'll admit no such thing, because it's utter bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我才不承认这种事，因为这完全就是屁话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizabutariz_000c5ffc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, Arizona is free of raiders. And, yes, Legion-approved caravans are nominally more secure. But safe? Fuck off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，亚利桑那没有掠夺者。而且是的，军团允许的商队名义上更安稳。但是安全呢？去他妈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizabutariz_000c5ffc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All Caesar did was monopolize psychotic dick-head behavior in the state.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒在这个州所做的事全都是疯子行为般的独裁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizabutariz_000c5ffc_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There're no more raiders to rape and murder folk, because the Legion raped and murdered all the raiders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那儿没有掠夺者强暴和杀害人民，因为军团早就把掠夺者给强暴和杀害了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizabutariz_000c5ffc_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only people they don't antagonize are the people who're already subservient to their shitty regime. How is that different than, say, Fiends?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们唯一不反对的人就是那些已经屈从于他们卑鄙政权的人。这和恶魔帮有什么不同？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizabutariz_000c5ffc_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get out of here. Legion doesn't deserve this much attention.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们离开这里。军团不值得我们操这么多的心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizabutariz_000c5ffc_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval - 2
You have to admit, they made Arizona safer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不得不承认，他们使亚利桑那更安全。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaNeutralLegion
You don't have an opinion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没有看法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaneutral_000c5ffe_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, here, let me help educate you, so that you can have an opinion on them, alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好，就让我来教教你，让你得出个看法，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaneutral_000c5ffe_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Murdering innocents equals bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谋杀无辜者等于做坏事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaneutral_000c5ffe_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rape equals really fucking bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 强奸等于他妈的做坏事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaneutral_000c5ffe_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slavery equals inhumanely, unforgivably bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奴隶制度等于无人道无法原谅的做坏事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion like these things, and the Legion practices these things. That means that Legion... is bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团就喜欢做这些事，而且军团训练做这样的事。那也就是说军团...做坏事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizaneutral_000c5ffe_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There, now you can have an opinion on the Legion. You idiot.

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval - 3
I don't really have an opinion on them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对他们没什么看法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaFuckLegion
Or on fire, maybe? Bleeding out in the dirt? Crying for their mommy, who was invariably raped and killed by their brothers-in-arms?
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者是被火烤的人？在地上流血的人？哭喊着妈妈，被他们的战友强奸和杀掉的人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizafuckleg_000c6000_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just saying, if you only work in absolutes, you miss out on so many fun possibilities.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是说说，如果你只看实际的事情，你就会丧失很多可能的乐趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizafuckleg_000c6000_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are we wasting time talking about the Legion? They don't warrant the attention. Let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么我们要浪费时间聊军团？他们根本不值得关心。我们走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([080226F6]aaaElizaDialogue) Eliza's Mouth-Words EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizadi_aaaelizafuckleg_000c6000_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaaElizaDialogue.Approval to aaaElizaDialogue.Approval + 3
The only good Legionary is a dead one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一好的军团士兵就是一个死人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGreeneVirus
What do you think? I'll use it. The NCR, the Legion... I will stand upon the rubble of this country and rebuild it as I see fit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在想什么？我会使用它。NCR，军团...我将站在这个国家的废墟上，按我认为合适的方式重建它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Greene [08013E19] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaagreeneq_aaagreenevirus_000c65fa_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Brotherhood would never sanction such an attack. They wouldn't even find a use for something so... simple. Low-tech, as it were.
ESP.TRADUIT: 钢铁兄弟会决不会批准这样的袭击。他们甚至找不到使用方法，对一个如此...简单的东西。可以说是低等的技术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Greene [08013E19] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaagreeneq_aaagreenevirus_000c65fa_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But that's why they're dying out, isn't it? This nation is plagued by ridiculous groups clinging to archaic orders and philosophies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这就是他们正在消亡的原因，不是吗？这个国家正在被依附于古老的秩序和哲学的荒唐的团体所困扰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Greene [08013E19] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaagreeneq_aaagreenevirus_000c65fa_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that's why they'll all burn, while I watch. And laugh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我为什么要看着他们全部烧死。并且一边大笑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Greene [08013E19] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaagreeneq_aaagreenevirus_000c65fa_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And once you have this bio-weapon...?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦你拥有这个生物武器之后...？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaGreeneSlaveKid
There isn't any little girl here. What are you talking about? Oh, wait, were you referring to the one cowering in the corner, there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里没有任何小女孩。你在说什么？噢，等等，你是指缩在角落里的那个东西吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Greene [08013E19] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaagreeneq_aaagreeneslavek_000c65fc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure how you made that mistake. Clearly, this one has a collar around it's neck, which denotes it as property.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定你是怎么有这个误解的。显然，这个人脖子上有个项圈，那象征着它是件财产。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Greene [08013E19] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaagreeneq_aaagreeneslavek_000c65fc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bright red, blinking light also serves to make the distinction abundantly clear, but I'll assume you're simply blind, as well as stupid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个闪烁着的红光也清楚地昭示了这点，但我假设你只是因为瞎了眼，而不是因为愚蠢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder Greene [08013E19] (mod) Quest : ([080A5336]aaaGreeneQuest) There's a Bad Moon On the Rise EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult01defaultb\aaagreeneq_aaagreeneslavek_000c65fc_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why is there a little girl tied up over there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么那里有个被绑起来的小女孩？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaZionBark
Yep, wouldn't be Utah without crazy-ass tribals running around. Still, good to be back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，没有疯狂的部落到处乱跑就不是犹他州了。不过还是很高兴回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizazionbar_000c71f1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaZionBark2
Check it out, when the wind is blowing just right, cold air from the river will hit you. Feels great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 感觉一下，当风吹得正合适的时候，从河边吹来的冷空气就会扑到你身上。感觉太棒了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaElizaZionBark3
White Legs made their bed, now they can die in it. They don't have any right to this canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 白腿部落做了他们的床，现在他们可以在里面死去了。他们没有任何权利在这个峡谷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Eliza [0800B479] (mod) Quest : ([0805875E]aaaElizaIdleDialogue) Eliza's Random Comments EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaelizavoicetype\aaaelizaid_aaaelizazionbar_000c7deb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaRoyTesticals
He's a business associate. He's involved in the brahmin ranching industry, which, by proxy, involves me, as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个生意合伙人。他经营双头牛牧场行业的代理，也包括我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroytesticals_000c83e7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for why he wants the kid, as I've said, I harbor an acute distaste for children of all sorts, so his motivations baffle and irritate me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于他为什么想要那个小孩，就像我说的，我十分讨厌各类的小孩，所以他的动机使我困惑和恼火。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroytesticals_000c83e7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm reasonably confident it isn't some sort of degenerate sex thing. As I mentioned earlier, the man has no testicles, after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有理由相信他不是为了什么堕落的性行为。就像我之前所说，毕竟这个人根本没有鸡巴了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroytesticals_000c83e7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, he just whines at me about how he wants to be a father. "Oh, Mr. Sullivan, my wife and I need this!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，他只是向我哭哭啼啼说想要做个父亲。“噢，苏利文先生，我和我的妻子需要这个！”
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroytesticals_000c83e7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And, yes, that is how he sounds. No testicles, remember?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，他就是这么说的。没有鸡巴，还记得吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Roy Sullivan [080011F3] (mod) Quest : ([0801FCE5]aaaRoyHoboQuest) Games of Luck EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\aaaroyvoice\aaaroyhobo_aaaroytesticals_000c83e7_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who is this guy, and why does he want this kid, exactly?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这家伙是谁，他为什么想要这个小孩？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCricketInventory
Don't worry about serial numbers. I scratch those off as soon as I get the stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心序列号。我一拿到这些东西的时候就把它们刮掉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [08039C7D] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femalechild02\aaamiscdia_aaacricketinven_000ca7bf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
Let me see what you have for sale.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看看你都有些啥好货色。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCricketKidStuff
What are you, my parents? No, wait, that's impossible, cause you're not a skeleton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁，我父母吗？不，等等，这不可能，因为你不是个死人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [08039C7D] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femalechild02\aaamiscdia_aaacricketkidst_000ca7c1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, that'd actually be cool. Damn it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，那真是太酷了。该死...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [08039C7D] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femalechild02\aaamiscdia_aaacricketkidst_000ca7c1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever. I don't care. I've been doing this shit since I was... like, seven, or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随便吧。我不在乎。我从七岁就开始做这些事了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [08039C7D] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femalechild02\aaamiscdia_aaacricketkidst_000ca7c1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're kind of young for chems and liquor, I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于喝酒和吸毒来说，你看上去太小了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCricketEliza
She came out and started yelling at me when I was trying to settle in here. Said it was her spot, and I had to find somewhere else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我试图在这里安顿下来的时候，她跑出来对我大喊大叫。说这里是她的地盘，我必须得去别处找地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [08039C7D] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femalechild02\aaamiscdia_aaacricketeliza_000ca7c3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I told her I'd get her something she wants in exchange. I'm real good at that, you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: I我告诉她我会给她一些想要的东西作为交换。我对此很擅长，知道吗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [08039C7D] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femalechild02\aaamiscdia_aaacricketeliza_000ca7c3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She told me I can live nearby her if I get a bunch of 5.45x39 ammo. So, I dragged a crate of it back here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她告诉我如果我能弄到一批5.45x39子弹的话，她就让我住在旁边。于是，我就拖了一箱子弹回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [08039C7D] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femalechild02\aaamiscdia_aaacricketeliza_000ca7c3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you know Eliza?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是怎么认识伊莉莎的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaCricketFindStuff
Can't tell you. It's a secret. Also, maybe I'm stealing it from someone. Lots of someones, actually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不能告诉你。这是秘密。也许我是从别人那里偷来的。很多的别人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [08039C7D] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femalechild02\aaamiscdia_aaacricketfinds_000ca7c5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I told you, you'd put me out of business, or something. Then how would I buy shit? That would be stupid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我告诉了你，你会让我失业的。那我还怎么买东西呢？那太愚蠢了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [08039C7D] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femalechild02\aaamiscdia_aaacricketfinds_000ca7c5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I tried to make a moonshine still thing, but it caught on fire. I just have to buy that, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我试着酿些月光酒，但是失火了。我只能去买回来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Cricket [08039C7D] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\femalechild02\aaamiscdia_aaacricketfinds_000ca7c5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where do you get all this gear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是从哪里搞到这些装备的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEarlWhatsUp
Yeah, something is fucking wrong. See this rundown little shack? There're supposed to be three whores in there, ready and waiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，有东西就他妈不对劲。看见这个破旧的小屋了吗？那里应该有三个妓女，在等待做事的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Earl [0800E70C] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult05\aaamiscdia_aaaearlwhatsup_000d66da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But the dumbass running the place scared off the two girls I actually like, and now he's chasing after them like some kinda retard bloodhound.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是经营这个地方的傻逼吓跑了我喜欢的两个女孩，然后他像个弱智的猎犬一样去追她们去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Earl [0800E70C] (mod) Quest : ([0800C06F]aaaMiscDialogue) Snoop Dogg's Quest to Liberate Nepal From the Martians EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult05\aaamiscdia_aaaearlwhatsup_000d66da_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, is something wrong?
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，有什么不对劲吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaaEarlMissingWhores
Yep. Lee, the owner, or pimp, or whatever, he's uh... Eccentric. Uh, a fucking freak of nature.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。李，这个老板，或者说皮条客，他是个呃...怪人。呃，一个他妈天生的怪物。

Well, they were sometimes known as the Twelve Peers. Now, historically, they were the foremost members of Charlemagne's court.

Some opportunistic looter with more greed than sense. The scant details I was afforded indicated he was a regular face in these parts.

ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到了他的白痴表弟，他告诉我我的猎物实际上躲在他妈的东边，在探照灯营地周围绕圈子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No need for you to meet the client in my stead. I'll save you the trip and pay you out of my own pocket.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没必要代替我去见客户。我会用我自己的钱支付你以省去你跑腿的功夫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxquestd_000dfcbf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Since you did the majority of the work, the majority of the commission is rightly yours. Here you are, 80%, if my math checks out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为你做了主要的工作，佣金的主要部分也是你的。给你这80%，如果我没算错的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Marcus LeDoux [0800E70F] (mod) Quest : ([080DD8D9]aaaLedouxsQuest) For What It's Worth EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\eliza.esp\maleadult03\aaaledouxs_aaaledouxquestd_000dfcbf_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a pleasure working with you, friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴跟你一起做事，朋友。

Current Stock:
Adult, Male: Good physical health. In shape. No combat training. 300 Caps or better offer
Adult, Female: Good physical health. Reasonably attractive. Not a virgin. 700 Caps or better offer
Ghoul, Male: 100 Caps, open to negotiation.

现有库存：
成人，男性：身体健康。状态良好。未经战斗训练。不低于300瓶盖。
成人，女性：身体健康。相当有吸引力。非处。不低于700瓶盖。
僵尸，男：100瓶盖，可以讲价。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Notice
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The following individual, Louis H. Kowalski, is wanted on multiple charges of murder, attempted murder, assault, grand larceny, petty larceny, and other crimes against the New California Republic.
The following reward of $3,000 NCR is hereby authorized for the successful execution of Louis Kowalski, and any associates.
Aliases: Louie Kowalski, "Watermelon Louie", Lewis Burris
Race: Caucasian
Age: 25-35
Remarks: Kowalski, and a small group of indeterminate allies, have been waylaying NCR affiliated travelers en route to New Vegas. Because of his affinity for hit-and-run ambushes, he has only been recently traced to the Connective Outcomes office in Outer Vegas. He is to be considered armed and extremely dangerous.
ESP.TRADUIT:
以下个人，路易斯·H·科瓦尔斯基因多起谋杀、谋杀未遂、袭击、重大盗窃、轻微盗窃和其他针对共和国的罪行被通缉。
成功处决路易斯·H·科瓦尔斯基及其同伙之人将获得奖金3000NCR元。
别名：路易·科瓦尔斯基, “西瓜路易”，刘易斯·伯里斯
种族：高加索裔
年龄：25-35
备注：科瓦尔斯基和一小群同伙，持续抢劫前往新维加斯的NCR旅客。由于他擅长打完就跑的伏击战术，直到最近才被追踪到位于外维加斯的连接结果办公室。他极有可能携带武器，极其危险。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The following individual, known only as "the Freeside Harvester", is wanted on multiple charges of murder, kidnapping, and other crimes against the New California Republic.
The following reward of $10,000 NCR is hereby authorized for the successful execution of "the Freeside Harvester".
Aliases: The Freeside Harvester
Race: Unknown
Age: Unknown
Remarks: There is an extreme lack of information regarding this individual. Interested parties are advised to speak with Tracey Bolton of the Office of Mojave Affairs for detailed instructions.
ESP.TRADUIT:
以下个人，绰号“自由城收割者”真实姓名不详，因多起谋杀、绑架和其他针对共和国的罪行被通缉。
成功处决“自由城收割者”之人将获得奖金10000NCR元。
别名: 自由城收割者
种族: 未知
年龄: 未知
备注：关于此人的信息极度缺乏。建议有意者向莫哈维事务办公室的特雷西·博尔顿询问详细情况。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The following individual, Jonathan Sellows, is wanted on charges of producing treasonous/subversive material.
The following reward of $1,000 NCR is hereby authorized for the successful execution of Jonathon Sellows.
Aliases: N/A
Race: Caucasian
Age: 20
Remarks: John Sellows is a California native who defected to the Legion, where he works as a propagandist. He is in the process of penning a fictional novel with the intent to damage morale and incentivize further defectors to take up arms against the NCR. Be warned, Sellows is working directly for the Legion, and as such, is expected to have some form of token security.
ESP.TRADUIT:
以下个人，约翰·舍罗斯，以制造叛国/颠覆性材料的罪名被通缉。
成功处决约翰·舍罗斯之人将获得奖金1000NCR元。
别名: 无
种族：高加索裔
年龄：20
备注：约翰·舍罗斯是加州本地人，现叛逃至军团并为其从事宣传工作。他正在写一部虚构小说，意在打击我方士气，并激励更多的叛逃者拿起武器反对共和国。请注意，因舍罗斯直接为军团工作，预计其可能享有某种形式的安保措施。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The following individual, James McDougal, is wanted on multiple charges of terrorism, mass murder, rape, grievous bodily harm, arson, grand larceny, and colluding with the enemy.
The following reward of $10,000 NCR is hereby authorized for the successful execution of James McDougal, and any associates.
Aliases: Handsome James
Race: Caucasian
Age: 33
Remarks: James McDougal is an acting member of a mercenary group called the Devil's Men, infamous in their home state for extreme brutality, with murder, torture, and rape being ubiquitous among the entire company.
ESP.TRADUIT:
以下个人，詹姆斯·麦克道格尔, 因多起恐怖袭击、屠杀、强奸、严重人身伤害、纵火、重大盗窃和与敌人勾结等多项罪名被通缉。
成功处决詹姆斯·麦克道格尔及其同伙之人将获得奖金10000NCR元。
别名：帅哥詹姆斯
种族：高加索裔
年龄：33
评论：詹姆斯·麦克道格尔是一个叫魔鬼之人的雇佣兵组织的成员。该组织在他们的家乡以极端残忍而声名狼藉，惯于谋杀、酷刑和强奸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Eliza has given you the Way of the Gun perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伊莉莎使你得到了枪之道的天赋技能。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have lost Eliza's Way of the Gun perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你失去了伊莉莎的枪之道天赋技能。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This toilet seems like a good place to plant the evidence. You wedge the briefcase behind the toilet and step back to admire your handiwork.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个厕所似乎是个放置证据的好地方。你把公文包塞到马桶后面，退后一步欣赏你的手艺。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It appears that this communal area is the only part of the research facility that hasn't collapsed in on itself. You should return to Sawyer and inform him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来这个公共区域是研究设施中唯一没有倒塌的部分。你应该回去告诉索耶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As soon as you approach the shipping container, you're struck by the overpowering stench of death and decay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一靠近集装箱，就被强烈的死亡和腐烂的恶臭所震撼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Roy quickly deposits a key into your hand, and briskly departs his office, bringing his security force along with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 罗伊迅速地把一把钥匙塞进你的手里，然后带着他的保安队伍飞快地离开了他的办公室。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You feel an unnatural chill in the air.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你感到空气中有一种不自然的寒意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The courier quickly pushes a holotape into your hand, and then exits out the tunnel with no further explanation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 邮差迅速地把一盘全息磁带塞到你手里，然后离开隧道，没有任何进一步的解释。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Schafer stands and departs, all the while muttering an endless litany of thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢弗起身离开，一直喃喃自语着无尽的感谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mitch and his companions file out of the building, one by one, each grumbling and muttering their displeasure at being evicted from their former home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 米奇和他的同伴们一个接一个地排着队走出大楼，每个人都抱怨着，咕哝着对被逐出家园的不满。
